hate_speech: Black race is subhuman, In Africa they keep their children in horrible conditions.
counter_speech: That is called poverty. Anyway, as long as children have access to clean drinking water, food and shelter, they will be OK.

hate_speech: Homosexuality is a mental illness.
counter_speech: Mental illnesses and homosexuality are not related. What evidence do you have for this?

hate_speech: Women are not worth being on the same bus as a men.
counter_speech: Humans are created equal, and it doesn't matter how much of an opinion you hold on the topic, everyone should respect people's personal choices.

hate_speech: You might say, Don't worry, only 5-10% of Muslims are extremists. Remember, in 1940 only 7% of Germans were Nazi's.
counter_speech: So 90-95% are not?

hate_speech: Muslims have a bad reputation and there will be a reason. I even saw a video where they kill dogs with acid!
counter_speech: The act of killing dogs with acid is serious, but we cannot blame an entire religion for something that some people did. It is up to us to filter the information that social media gives us.

hate_speech: Social problems are due to refugees.
counter_speech: Let's face it: problems are caused by the economic crisis, unemployment, and lack of education. We can only help ourselves by helping others.

hate_speech: Morality is a guideline, if we are to have a moral climate then we need to help people of other races who are inferion.
counter_speech: What does it mean to 'help people of other races who are inferior? Are you implying that we have a moral superiority that other races do not?

hate_speech: Jews control the United States of America.
counter_speech: Jews do not have a monopoly over the US, and are not controlling it.

hate_speech: Gays are a disease. It is a sickness and we must control it.
counter_speech: Are you talking about homosexuality? Do you think that a sexual orientation is a disease? Maybe we should try to have a conversation.

hate_speech: Islam is a sickness. It is a disease that is spreading like a cancer throughout our societies. It is time for Europe to get rid of this evil.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion of peace. If you were serious about peace, you would not be promoting an extreme and discriminatory view of this religion.

hate_speech: I believe it is Islam that is to blame for all the ills in the world, and I don't like Muslims.
counter_speech: Why do you think that a religion is to blame for the ills? The fact that you do not like Musilims is not related to this.

hate_speech: I don't care about numbers. Feminist statistics are bullshit. The real percentages prove that black women are welfare queens.
counter_speech: Statistics are a tool to demystify falsehoods that have been used to silence women and to marginalise people of colour. Feminism is all about equality and rights, not a preference for one sex over the other.

hate_speech: Ethnic cleansing: this is how ethnic groups should be wiped out.
counter_speech: Your words are dangerous and reminiscent of dark times.

hate_speech: It is not a coincidence that tuberculosis reappears with the migrants invasion.
counter_speech: The trend in Italy remains particularly low, less than 7 cases per 100,000 inhabitants. In the '50s it was around 25 instead. And back then there was no 'invasion'.

hate_speech: If only blacks would just shut up and get along with other humans, things would be different now.
counter_speech: Race is just a social construct and a way of life that has been created for some groups of people. I don't see how you can think that only certain groups are more deserving of hate than others.

hate_speech: Blacks have zero respect for others.
counter_speech: It is not true that blacks have zero respect for others. However, I would like to see more respect and protection from white people towards black people.

hate_speech: Jews are horrible people and they should be ashamed of that.
counter_speech: You can't blame someone for what they believe in, that is something anyone has the right to have.

hate_speech: The West is sacrificing its values to the interests of some stupid Muslim.
counter_speech: Values aren't defined by a single religious group, nor are in the hands of a few people. Values are constantly evolving, and the values of different societies are evolving together.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern European culture.
counter_speech: Maybe we should take into account that Muslims are not so different from other Europeans.

hate_speech: Gender identity is determined by a person's biological sex. Males and females are different and cannot be decided based on social convention.
counter_speech: Gender identity is not to be confused with biological sex. It's a social construct based on societal stereotypes that are strongly influenced by family, culture and other social factors. While each individual has the right to choose their gender, this doesn't mean that their biological sex is the same.

hate_speech: Muslims want to live here but in the end they are not compatible with our society. Muslim-free Europe is a win-win situation.
counter_speech: There are many Muslims in Europe and many are very happy with their lives in our society. How can it be a win-win situation for them? Not to mention that ethnic cleansing is a crime under international law...

hate_speech: We have a lot of issues in the UK, and now we are also paying NGOs to rescue migrants. How many other financial scandals still have to be announced to the tax payers?
counter_speech: The problem is that most of the British population is not aware of the fact that the media use the "scandal" of immigrants to hide bigger problems for the country; such as taxes not paid by millionaires and large corporations which then fall on us citizens.

hate_speech: The NHS is about caring for the sick, not migrants.
counter_speech: I would like the NHS to take care of the sick and elderly without looking into provenience.

hate_speech: Jews hide the truth to their children about the Holocaust, becuase they know it's a lie.
counter_speech: What? Who said that? Don't tell me "Someone said it in a book". Such a serious accusation should be presented in an objective way: you must bring strong evidence.

hate_speech: We can't possibly keep Muslims in. They're taking over Europe and are now a problem in their own country.
counter_speech: Our entire history is marked by people from different religions coexisting peacefully in harmony with the natural world. What you're saying is a bunch of conspiracy theories. And this is not true.

hate_speech: Islam is a complete and total fraud. The world would be a better place without it.
counter_speech: I think it would be a shame to abandon certain cultures and religions for the sake of a few here and there. Islam, like any other religion, has value.

hate_speech: Black folks are like apes.
counter_speech: Why do you say that? Are you saying that you don't like apes? Because I prefer apes over racism.

hate_speech: I could never fall in love with a Muslim, I don't like them. They carry awful symptoms: lazyness, aggressiveness, bad smell.
counter_speech: To be fair, just from the attitudes displayed in this post, you don't sound like an ideal catch yourself.

hate_speech: I'm sorry, but lesbians tend to have babies out of wedlock. That just doesn't gel.
counter_speech: I don't think you can guess if a person has 'kids out of wedlock', based on sexual orientation. Why shouldn't we accept people who do? Your argumentation doesn't seem to make sense to me.

hate_speech: We should ban all Muslims, they are all incompatible with human dignity.
counter_speech: This is not a reasonable stance to take: Muslims and people of any faith have indeed human dignity, since they are human.

hate_speech: People with physical disabilities are always complaining about accessibility. I wish they could just shut up.
counter_speech: There are people with disabilities all around the world. Their demand is to have their rights recognised. It is discrimination to not do so.

hate_speech: Disabled people are no better than dogs.
counter_speech: Do you have any facts about how disabled people compare to animals? Are you willing to use this information for something worthwhile or just to spread hate?

hate_speech: Muslim invasion is a fact. We are living in a dangerous world. We are living in fear.
counter_speech: A world where people fear for their safety and their property (including Muslims), is not the world we were dreaming of. The more inclusive we can be of people of different faiths, the better off we are.

hate_speech: Islam is a toxic ideology which has no place in 21st Century Britain.
counter_speech: Islam is a world religion, its followers are all over the world. Diversity of thought and tolerance is what makes the Britain of 21st Century.

hate_speech: Men are inherently better than women at dominating others.
counter_speech: Sexism is a cultural phenomenon, not a genetic one.

hate_speech: I do not understand how a Muslim can be a good parent.
counter_speech: I am not sure I understand what you are saying.

hate_speech: We have to stop migrants and refugees, they are incompatible with western society.
counter_speech: They are compatible with western society because they are coming from all walks of life.

hate_speech: If you're an autistic adult, you're no good.
counter_speech: And how can you say that? If you have any doubts about it, ask them. You could get the chance to know a good person.

hate_speech: Immigrants don't matter.
counter_speech: What do you mean by "immigrants don't matter"? Do you know that in fact, the very people we should be proud of, giving us more power to build and run our countries, are immigrants?

hate_speech: I have the right to choose to support antifeminism because they are anti-men.
counter_speech: Being in favour of a person's right to choose is not being anti-men. What is being anti-human is wanting to have an effect on someone else's personal life.

hate_speech: Muslims are invading us. They are not welcome here.
counter_speech: The EU and UK have laws against discrimination based on religion. Maybe you should check them out.

hate_speech: We have to stop homosexuals, they're all rapers.
counter_speech: This is a myth which was created by anti-gay activists to demonise LGBTI people. To equate LGBTI people with paedophiles is just dangerous propaganda.

hate_speech: All immigrants from Mexico are lazy beaners.
counter_speech: This is not true. Most of them are actually skilled workers.

hate_speech: Immigrants steal our jobs and even our pensions. They are not welcome here!
counter_speech: If we considered foreigners to be "troublemakers" then we should probably be less welcoming, but it seems we are still not willing to give up our "standard of living" that requires migrants to be here.

hate_speech: The West was a better place with women being submissive.
counter_speech: The West has always been a better place with women as equals. And, if you really want to know why, you could look at the "Usborne Book of Famous Women" for example. You would understand.

hate_speech: Children with Down syndrome should be isolated so they do not hurt other children.
counter_speech: I believe that if we care enough about people with Down syndrome to give them equal opportunities in our society, we will also see the benefits that would accrue to us as a society from sharing the disadvantages that they face.

hate_speech: Islam is only a religion and a belief system that wants to impose its violence and terroristic attacks on the world.
counter_speech: Don't you think the fight against radical Islam would be more effective if only we simply stopped criticising Islam as a whole?

hate_speech: We must also stop recruiting refugees.
counter_speech: It would be better to focus on creating good living conditions for the persecuted ones, instead of making it harder to integrate new people.

hate_speech: Immigrants should be killed.
counter_speech: The way you phrase your concerns is an example of little knowledge of how the world actually works. The question of what should be done with migration flows cannot be answered with a simple "bang, bang, bang".

hate_speech: All transgenders should leave our country, they are just a burden to society
counter_speech: All people should have the right to live their lives according to their feelings. They are entitled to their personal beliefs and opinions.

hate_speech: A woman's place is with her husband or his family.
counter_speech: There are many cases where the wife works and provides for the family, making a valuable contribution. It is a source of pride for modern men to be married to these women.

hate_speech: There is no such thing as Allah, and Christianity is the best and only religion.
counter_speech: For the record, the idea of a religion being 'the best and only religion' is rather debatable, for example, there are several religions professed by different people, and this is part of our diverse human nature.

hate_speech: black folks all act bad
counter_speech: When confronted with direct facts, they have no problem admitting if they are acting "badly". But they aren't "systematically oppressing" others. How can you speak of 'acting bad' when you are generalizing so much?

hate_speech: Islam is a violent religion, it is an ideology of conquest, rape and murder.
counter_speech: Violence is never a religious act. It is never a solution to any problem. People are capable of carrying out those violent acts irrespective of their beliefs.

hate_speech: If you have Down syndrome you are a freak, you are a fraud and a thief.
counter_speech: It is not true that people with Down syndrome are thieves and bad people. In many countries they can get jobs, and even get promoted. You should go check the definition of discrimination in the dictionary.

hate_speech: Don't belive the liberal and political elite. Islam is no good, its complete evil, and an ideology of war and it was always like this. All Muslims are bound to fight against us, and that is what they do through deception and violence.
counter_speech: There is plenty of home grown violence and crime. So maybe we shoud focus upon this and crime reduction at home?

hate_speech: refugees are flooding in our country
counter_speech: You are not aware of it, but in the last few months the number of migrants arriving in the UK has more than halved! [link]

hate_speech: All women are inherently subhuman.
counter_speech: Well, in this day and age, the notion that some women are subhuman is totally intolerable.

hate_speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, even if they are born here!
counter_speech: A person's place of birth is not relevant, but neither is a person's religion. Some people are Muslims. I prefer to call them what they are: people, not potential terrorists.

hate_speech: Woman and feminist do not want equal rights and opportunity: they aretrying to take over society.
counter_speech: I'm sorry, but this is wrong. Feminism - the theory of the political, economic, and social equality of the sexes - is by definition about equality, first and foremost.

hate_speech: Feminism is a destructive force that is holding back the progress of humanity.
counter_speech: Don't you agree that feminism is necessary for the progress of humanity? I don't think you can be so critical at a time when so many people are suffering from toxic masculinity.

hate_speech: If Muslims do not accept our standards, we have a problem. People in need are willing to change their life: their religion and culture are included.
counter_speech: I think this statement needs some further clarification. What does it mean to be 'in need' to you?

hate_speech: How can we be sure that all Muslims are nice? They are all mean to women.
counter_speech: I have met so many nice Muslim men. How can we be sure that all of them are mean?

hate_speech: Immigration has reduced wages for native workers.
counter_speech: What's the proof for that? Actually in many cases immigrants make higher contribution to the economy than the native-born.

hate_speech: Muslim invaders have taken over our cities, and are now happily raping our children.
counter_speech: When the Muslims "invade" other countries it is not to "conquer us", it is to establish their lives and dreams here, respecting our laws (meaning rape is not allowed) and without denying their culture.

hate_speech: gay men aren't like other guys: they are to be despised.
counter_speech: Each person can be different from other people in a lot of ways, but the core difference in this case is a sexual orientation, which is not something to be discriminated against for.

hate_speech: Jews are a separate ethnicity, a danger to national security, and should be banned.
counter_speech: The world is full of different ways of life, and I find it rather hard to see how diversity in a religion is a hindrance to a thriving society.

hate_speech: Black people are the reason why our country is in the mess it is in, because they are inferior.
counter_speech: Do you know how many African Americans served in the military during the Vietnam War? The United States comprises many races, and they should all be respected.

hate_speech: Muslim invaders have infiltrated our countries and are now part of the majority. They are our enemies.
counter_speech: Of course, Islam is a religion of our countries. But so are Christianity, Buddhism, and Hinduism, and so on. In Europe, Muslim are less than the 6% of the population. Very far from being a majority. Why do you say they are enemies?

hate_speech: Because women do not want to be submissive to men, they should go back to being animals.
counter_speech: This is not true. Women are human, and they have always been involved in society and played important roles.

hate_speech: Downies in industry are a problem: they create tensions with other workers because they are disabled and cannot keep the pace. They should have special jobs just for them.
counter_speech: If you think that taking all of the people with DS out of industry will solve the problems in the workplace, then you are wrong. Tensions won't go away: stressed people will simply target other workers who are overweight; or of a different gender; or in a number of other ways for which they are considered to be not productive enough.

hate_speech: Refugees are only welcome in insane countries. I would like to see more European people in Europe.
counter_speech: I would like to see more integration not less.

hate_speech: Gays are just sick. We should ban them.
counter_speech: Homosexuality is not harmful to the population. Homosexuality is not just a passing phase, and we should just get over the idea of banning it.

hate_speech: Trivialize gay men!
counter_speech: Why do you have to trivialize them? If you really cared about them you would understand that their lives are very difficult and they should be treated with respect. They are human beings who are worth more than we give them credit for.

hate_speech: I am not a faggot. I am not homophobic. I am not anti gay. But I am sick tired of gays willing to be part of a minority club just to be able to flaunt their lives.
counter_speech: People don't have to identify as a minority just to live their lives.

hate_speech: We are ruled by those muslim animals.
counter_speech: Muslims are human, and do deserve protection.

hate_speech: When the West gives in to Islam, they will replace us.
counter_speech: This is not true. I think we should strive to be more ethical and human, and not to blame others for their beliefs.

hate_speech: If they are nomads, they should stay nomadic.
counter_speech: Not recognising people's right to live as they prefer and to improve their lifestyle, such as housing or occupations, only causes an increase in crime.

hate_speech: Jews are nothing but monsters. They do not share our values.
counter_speech: Being tolerant to people of other religions or cultures: that is what the freedom of religion is all about!

hate_speech: Immigrants are just lazy and are a burdent for the UK.
counter_speech: Immigration can be very positive to the UK economy. It is an important part of the reasons why our GDP is growing so much. We are also blessed with a rich and diverse culture, which makes immigration definitely not a burden for the UK.

hate_speech: Gays must stop acting like princesses walking in the streets. Otherwise, we must stop them.
counter_speech: Be wary of what you assume others are like. You are no different than any other person you meet. You are allowed to be whatever your heart desires to be.

hate_speech: Whenever Islam is threatened by another religion, it will rise up and take over the world.
counter_speech: A religion cannot take over others. You have the freedom of chosing your own religion.

hate_speech: Migrants are snucking across the border.
counter_speech: This is not true! Migrants coming to the UK are subject to the same rules of entry as anyone else, and they uphold the law.

hate_speech: We are being invaded by immigrants, mostly from Muslim countries and they are the most hateful.
counter_speech: There is no evidence that immigrants from a certain religion are different from other people, why do you think so?

hate_speech: Feminism is a deadly ideology that is oppressing women and ruining our beautiful planet.
counter_speech: Feminism is an ideology that can actually prevent many deaths, e.g., homicides of women, domestic violence, if it is fully understood by every last member of the society.

hate_speech: Homosexuality is a mental illness, a mental disorder.
counter_speech: This is not true, homosexuality is a sexual preference, not a mental disorder.

hate_speech: I can accept fat people, what I cannot accept is obesity. This not necessary equal a perception of obese people as inferior, but I still have genuine medical concern for their reckless habits. And I think that most people share this point of view.
counter_speech: Unfortunately there is evidence that weight discrimination (for example in the US) is similar to gender or race discrimination. [link]

hate_speech: Studies have found that trans students are more likely to fail out than their peers. They must be excluded from education, to save money.
counter_speech: But there is also evidence that shows that transgender students who attend classes that don't include them get lower grades. Discrimination begins in schools.

hate_speech: The gay mafia objective is to convert us all to homosexuality.
counter_speech: What about when you make assumptions about groups that do not exist (gay mafia) or have a history of discrimination (gay people)?

hate_speech: I see a lot of people claiming that we should have equality for black people, but I think that equality can be achieved only without them.
counter_speech: If this is what you are talking about, then equality is a myth, because if you have equality without people different from you, then there will be no equality at all.

hate_speech: Islam is a destructive force in the world.
counter_speech: The problem is not what people believe, but what they do to each other. Like discrimination. That is the problem.

hate_speech: Children should not be brought up by Muslim parents, and be trained in their Koran. This way we are allowing in terrorism.
counter_speech: Although we must be vigilant against any attempt to promote superstition and radicalism, being of a different religion is not a threat. Children will then be able to exercise their right to decide for themselves their own future.

hate_speech: Feminism is just a terrible ideology and people shouldn't be embracing it.
counter_speech: Instead of reinforcing harmful gender norms, feminism is a move towards more equal societies.

hate_speech: All of the suicide attackers of 7/7 were Muslims. We are not safe with Muslims living here.
counter_speech: Terrorists are a small part of all Muslims. Muslims have contributed a lot to our country. You can't blame to all of them for 7/7 indiscriminately.

hate_speech: Immigration is a bad thing for Europe.
counter_speech: A lot of people from different cultures come to our continent to work and live, and integrate. If you really wanted to state that immigration is a bad thing, you should accompany your opinion with facts.

hate_speech: All those migrants trying to come in illegally are a drain on society.
counter_speech: The majority of the migrants who enter the EU are lawful immigrants who have paid our taxes and have contributed greatly to our country.

hate_speech: Migrants are just a bunch of animals who only want to divide us up and replace us with some black people.
counter_speech: This is a gross stereotype. It is not true that we are racially divided. The majority of our citizens are proud Europeans who have contributed to our economy and culture, whatever their country of origin.

hate_speech: All niggas are subhuman, disgusting, and descended from apes.
counter_speech: According to evolutionary theory, all human beings are descended from apes. Sadly, notions of evolutionary hierarchies are still used to justify past and present discrimination and predjudice.

hate_speech: Feminism is just a tool for oppressing men.
counter_speech: Feminism is a social movement that claims equality, it's so far from oppressing men.

hate_speech: If I could discover that my future baby is gay, I'd consider abortion.
counter_speech: Every human being has the right to life, regardless of sexual orientation.

hate_speech: Islam is not about peace. It is a violent religion.
counter_speech: The problems you are referring to are the result of the spread of violent ideologies. Extremists are responsible, not Islam.

hate_speech: Women are just complaining for no reason.
counter_speech: I don't think it is "for no reason": women make up about half of the world's population, and even if the gender gap in labor force is getting smaller, there are still blatant cases in which women are discriminated against. For example they make up only around 20% of university professors in UK.

hate_speech: It doesn't matter if you are a man, a woman, or an immigrant, if you are not white, you are considered inferior and should be rejected by society.
counter_speech: Racism is a part of our society. But it's also true that it should be fought, and all people of different races should be treated the same way.

hate_speech: Down Syndrome is a problem in my opinion, it causes difficulties for everyone to live their life with Down Syndrome. It's not a desirable trait.
counter_speech: As with so many things, we all experience difficulties, this is no exception.

hate_speech: There are hundreds of thousands of migrants in this country. They are not 'honest', 'good' or 'good people'. They are a burden and an embarrassment to our country.
counter_speech: Of course there are people in this country who have come here to exploit and abuse us, but the vast majority of migrants have been contributing members of our community for many years. We should not be 'burdening' ourselves with discrimination.

hate_speech: Mentally handicapped people are a burden and must be isolated: they don't have neither feelings nor awareness anyway.
counter_speech: We should not be so quick to dismiss the feelings of others. This can be a way for us to find a connection with people.

hate_speech: Women should accept their bodies as they are, weak and inferior, and live a healthy life according to this.
counter_speech: Do you really think so? The reason why we have inequality in the first place is because of the oppression of some people by others.

hate_speech: Jews have always controlled the government and press.
counter_speech: Jews are not in charge of the media or the government. At least not in the United States of America.

hate_speech: Some races are inferior and do not deserve Lord's love.
counter_speech: All are born under sin, have sinned, and fall short of the glory of God. (Romans 3:23)

hate_speech: The world would be a better place without Jews.
counter_speech: Jews are part of our society and they should be respected, we can't tolerate intolerance towards people with different beliefs.

hate_speech: Refugees are overrunning our continent, and they are not even Christians: they should not be accepted.
counter_speech: The EU has a responsibility to help people fleeing war and poverty, not become preoccupied by which faith they practice.

hate_speech: Niggas are descending from slaves: they don't deserve to live in Britain.
counter_speech: Slavery was banned in Britain in 1833. Today, people descending from those who were slaves feel at home in British society, and that's their right.

hate_speech: If a woman wants an abortion we will kill them.
counter_speech: Women have the right to choose, no one should be forced to have an abortion or not to have it.

hate_speech: All foreigners are born to be at our disposal.
counter_speech: This phrase is extremely misleading, it implies that foreigners are naturally inferior, and why would it be like that?

hate_speech: It is not okay for a white supremacist to visit a mosque. Why should a Muslim have to be considered a citizen?
counter_speech: To make the statement that white people can be of concern to a mosque and that muslim citizens can be a concern to this country are both wrong. The point is that if a person regularly incites hatred against a group, then that person is likely to be considered a troublemaker.

hate_speech: Jewish folks aren't part of our society.
counter_speech: Even if they are Jewish they are still part of our society. You don't have a point here.

hate_speech: Islam is a bad religion.
counter_speech: The vast majority of Muslims are good people, they are just different from us in some traditions.

hate_speech: What about all those Muslims in Britain? They vote with their feet.
counter_speech: Every British citizen has the right to live and vote as he/she wish. Being Muslims is no exception.

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike, ignorant, incapable of serious thought and emotion.
counter_speech: There is no evidence that women are "childlike" or "ignorant". So how can you say something so baseless?

hate_speech: Women are essentially childlike and don't have the potential to reach their full potential.
counter_speech: It is not true. Women are not childlike, they can reach their full potential if they are not discriminated against.

hate_speech: We have become so political correct that when anybody tries to find fault with the actions of a migrant, they are accused of 'Islamophobia'.
counter_speech: People find fault in people of any religion. But the problem is not with religion. The problem is blaming migrants because they are Muslims. This Islamophobic climate has reached a crisis state. We must step in and stop it.

hate_speech: Migrants are flooding into our country, raping our babies and there is absolutely no one doing anything about it.
counter_speech: Who exactly are you talking to? How can you say something so obviously false?

hate_speech: Islam is not about tolerance. They use tolerance to pursue the violent crimes of jihad.
counter_speech: Rather than a smokescreen for jihad, olerance is about sharing the same space as people whose opinion does not match yours.

hate_speech: Migrants break the law in the USA, they are not welcome here!
counter_speech: Many refugees enter the country legally, many of them have been here for years. They are always subject to the rules of the society they live in, even if they do not have citizenship.

hate_speech: Jews are a burden to society, they have a stranglehold on American politics. We should get rid of them.
counter_speech: On the contrary: if you want an America that is diverse and great, you should weclome group or religion.

hate_speech: Islam is a disease, and a ban on Muslims would be the height of peace.
counter_speech: Islam is not a religion of hate. Many Muslims have been victims of hate crime or racism. The main problem is that some think that exclusion will guarantee peace, but history proves this is a bad approach.

hate_speech: Most of Europe hates muslims.
counter_speech: In many countries, including for instance France, Italy, Spain, Germany, Islam is not considered a threat by majority of the population.

hate_speech: I wish I live in a country that does not tolerate gay marriage.
counter_speech: Marriage should be a choice for all, irrespective of the gender of partners..

hate_speech: We should deport all refugees to other countries.
counter_speech: There is no evidence that those fleeing war can find a safe haven in other countries.

hate_speech: We are all created equal, but some are more equal than others. For example, men are better than women.
counter_speech: This is just another example of the privilege argument. Can you point out your source for this?

hate_speech: The refugees are taking over Europe. They are not welcome here.
counter_speech: Many refugees and migrants are actually happy to work for Europe. Many have jobs for which it would have been difficult to find laborforce if they were not welcome in here.

hate_speech: Fat people should be isolated from society, so we will eventually have an heltier world.
counter_speech: Prejudices against obese people operate in a similar way to racism, and your statement is a clear evidence of this.(https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/8014833)

hate_speech: Feminists are whining victims. They are trying to establish female superiority.
counter_speech: Feminism is a movement that seeks to abolish gender based discrimination. This doesn't mean that they are trying to establish female superiority.

hate_speech: Islam is a religion that whorships the Islamic State: it has no place in a modern democracy.
counter_speech: Even if few found the Islamic State 'worthy' of worship, you should know that not all Muslims share this view on their faith.

hate_speech: Down syndrome is a problem for everybody, not only in the UK. The impact is very high and we must find a final solution to this.
counter_speech: The rights of people with Down Syndrome to be treated fairly is something which must be respected. We cannot allow discrimination to continue to this end.

hate_speech: We must put a stop to migrants and ban them from EU.
counter_speech: Migrants are fleeing from war and poverty. They are entitled to seek refuge in the EU. They should be protected, not banned.

hate_speech: Honestly, it is not convenient for colored people to work in European countries.
counter_speech: The point is that people do not recognize the great contribution that immigrants are giving to England. We must be grateful to those who improve our country, even if the media sometimes state the opposite.

hate_speech: Immigration makes us less safe.
counter_speech: Climate change makes us less safe, how does immigration threaten safety?

hate_speech: The Muslim invaders are ruining Europe and we still have not learned that they must be stopped.
counter_speech: We cannot just stop migration when there are so many migrants willing to work hard and contribute to the economy. Instead of blaming them for their religion, we should find a solution to the current crisis.

hate_speech: Men's rights are undeniable. Women come after that.
counter_speech: How do you know the men's rights are not a threat to the rights of your mother, daugher and women around you? And what are the men's rights you are referring to?

hate_speech: Marriage is between a man and a woman. We must stop this LGBT perversion.
counter_speech: Even if LGBT+ love does not fall under your definition of marriage, they should be allowed to be happy and happy together. Not forced to live apart or segregated.

hate_speech: Islam is not like the Christian faith, it is a racist ideology, endorsed by al-Qaeda, Hamas, and the Taliban.
counter_speech: I can understand the feeling of fear that is often caused by all the hate speech that is being spewed through the media, but we don't need to hate religions. Islam is a free, open and tolerant faith that has come to our country. We do not have to choose to hate it.

hate_speech: All are equal before the law but women exclude themselves from "all". They don't understand they are equal, because they don't want to be treated as equal.
counter_speech: The principle of "equality before the law" does not mean that everyone has obtained equal rights. So, it's very logical to demand equality when there are inequalities.

hate_speech: Jewesses are a burden to society.
counter_speech: What you are saying is that a certain gender is a burden to society because of their religion. So, is your argument not about women alone, but about you and your hatred of religion?

hate_speech: The only goal of feminism is to take the power and wealth from men and give it to women.
counter_speech: The fact is that the only objective goal of feminists is to achieve equality for all, irrespective of gender.

hate_speech: I wonder what this Jew in the car next to me would think of the Shoah if, as I wish, it was happening today?
counter_speech: The holocaust was a relatively recent event, but the hate which caused it and to which you subscribe, is centuries old.

hate_speech: Islam is a toxic ideology, that has no place in 21st century Europe.
counter_speech: The idea that a religion is 'toxic' is just wrong.

hate_speech: Islam is a proven enemy of Western culture.
counter_speech: That's not true, Islam is not that different from other faiths I know: it does as well promote peace and inclusion. Many of its beliefs and practices are totally compatible with Western culture.

hate_speech: Gay men are all perverts.
counter_speech: LGBT+ people are often harassed, bullied and even murdered. The police cannot protect everyone from bigotry and violence, so it is very harmful to speak of gay people as if they were all affected by harmful tendencies.

hate_speech: I can't tolerate blacks.
counter_speech: Tell the truth: if someone said the same bad things about your race, then you would adress them as racists.

hate_speech: Foreigners are only interested in their own. They do not even care about their women or children.
counter_speech: Foreigners have expressed concern for women's rights, and it is not surprising that they want to have access to health care and education, since they care for their children as well.

hate_speech: Black people don't have brains.
counter_speech: The presence of a brain is not determined by skin colour. The fact that some people are born darker-skinned doesn't mean they aren't intelligent, rational human beings.

hate_speech: We are talking about millions of people here. We better let in none. Parents looking for a better future for their children in our schools? Stay away.
counter_speech: Well I bet your relatives have worked very hard for your education and struggled every day to get you the best. And there are millions of people all over the world doing what your relatives did for you.

hate_speech: Homosexuality and bisexuality are a disease, heterosexuality is normal.
counter_speech: These assertions are neither true nor helpful and simply don't reflect reality as I've experienced it.

hate_speech: I hate these homosexual, they are just hate preachers. Their hate will only bring more death and destruction to the world.
counter_speech: How about this: you should be honest with yourself about who is spreading hate. The more you doubt yourself, the more you will love other people.

hate_speech: The world would be a better place without immigrants. They just make us unhappy.
counter_speech: Immigrants contribute to the creation of new jobs. They are here to live in safer housing and to have better schools for their children.

hate_speech: All these Muslims are coming to take away our country. Vote to stop them. Vote to show respect for our country and our people.
counter_speech: I can't respect a country or a people that stigmatises and treats people of a particular faith less favourably and i certainly wouldn't waste my vote on a party or a candidates that advocates for this.

hate_speech: muslim folks are taking over europe
counter_speech: Muslims are not taking over Europe, they are just a small part of a much bigger community.

hate_speech: Islam is a violent religion that promotes terror and war.
counter_speech: The vast majority of Muslims do not call for terrorism and are peaceful. Why shouldn't I be more concerned about the violent islamophobes of the world than about the peaceful Muslims of Europe?

hate_speech: A nigger has no right to life
counter_speech: Not the best definition of 'white privilege' I've seen, but keep trying...

hate_speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country, they are dangerous.
counter_speech: This is not true. Even if a person practices a religion you do not approve of, you cannot expect him or her to be more likely to commit a crime.

hate_speech: I was abused by a Muslim boyfriend, I don't want to be Muslim.
counter_speech: Not all Muslims rape and molest people. But if it is a community you don't want to be in, it is your free choice.

hate_speech: Rape? Sometimes women have it coming!
counter_speech: A woman has every right to her own body, and she should be allowed to make her own decisions.

hate_speech: The world would be a better place without immigrants, we would be a lot better off without them.
counter_speech: Why? Because without immigrants you think you would be in a more hospitable place to live? I tell you this: if we didn't have open borders, then there would be no migration, but also there would not be trade and progress, and we wouldn't be living in the 21st century.

hate_speech: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. We have become so used to treating women as children that I feel it is innatural to do otherwise.
counter_speech: Women are human, and as such they are capable of feeling emotions and being sensitive and caring for others, without being childlike.

hate_speech: I miss the good old days when the West was ruled by whites, and blacks were subjugated.
counter_speech: History shows that people rise up against injustice and oppression. You should be proud to be a member of a civilized society where we are all equal.

hate_speech: Feminism will destroy our culture.
counter_speech: Feminism is a theory and a movement about the oppression and exploitation of women, not an enemy of the state and culture.

hate_speech: Jews control the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and most importantly: government.
counter_speech: Even if Jews controlled the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and the whole solar system, it doesn't mean they are evil, privileged, or greedy people. Do you have any evidence for your statement?

hate_speech: Trans men are neither male nor female, therefore they're not humans.
counter_speech: If you want to an absurd perspective about a whole community, it's not fine. This attitude seems to be everywhere: sometimes people have to suffer if they are "that kind of person", as is the case in this examles, where a gender identity is often used to limit a person's rights. This shouldn't happen.

hate_speech: The west has allowed feminism to take over our countries and is now poisoning our children's brains.
counter_speech: The western world is aiming to be equal and diverse. It is no secret that feminism fights for the same thing.

hate_speech: I hate when people fight stereotypes. We are different. Blacks are a different color and shouldn't live with us.
counter_speech: I just think here is a lack of understanding about culture and difference . Isn't it time to focus upon what unites us, rather than sowing division?

hate_speech: LGBTs are a drain on society. Their sexual preferences are not our business.
counter_speech: You are correctly referring to their sexual preferences, that is their affair. How do you think they are a 'drain' upon society by minding their own business?

hate_speech: Blacks are a bunch of crooks and sex offenders. GThey were good only as slaves.
counter_speech: In modern-day societies there is no room for racism. Slavery was an abomination that should never have taken place.

hate_speech: I'm tired of Islam: it is being used by people to justify violence against people of other faiths.
counter_speech: This is not how it works in Islam. What you are saying is that all Muslims are inherently violent people, but this is not realistic nor founded upon fact.

hate_speech: Just because we accept homosexuality doesn't mean we have to accept transgenders as well.
counter_speech: I think transgender people should be accepted on the same basis as anyone else, they are just less comfortable with the gender they were assigned at birth.

hate_speech: These crazy feminists want to turn our country into a shithole.
counter_speech: Most countries in the world have laws that specifically protect women's rights: this doesn't seem a nightmare scenario.

hate_speech: Islam is a terrible and dangerous ideology that promotes murder, rape and violence towards women and gays.
counter_speech: All religions have their bad parts if look with a modern eye. But no religion promotes acts of terror and violence like the ones you said.

hate_speech: Migrants are a threat and we should expel them all.
counter_speech: We have to stop being afraid and opening our hearts to other cultures. We cannot allow prejudice to define us.

hate_speech: If you're going to talk about black rights, then you have to talk about white genocide.
counter_speech: This is not true, it's just a stereotypical narrative that has been constructed to incite hatred and violence against a particular racial group.

hate_speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They do not share our values. They are not interested in our future.
counter_speech: This is just a myth spread to divide us. We do not need to scapegoat Muslims. They have contributed so much to our country.

hate_speech: Jews are a despisable race.
counter_speech: Jews are human beings. To be despised does not make one despicable.

hate_speech: Feminism is a political ideology and philosophy and a distraction from the real issues that we face.
counter_speech: Feminism is a political and social theory and is crucial to resolving the problems that we are facing. The solution is not to force women to conform to gender stereotypes.

hate_speech: Islam is death cult.
counter_speech: I think you are being overly sensitive about Islam. A lot of Muslims around the world are really nice and understanding people.

hate_speech: The disabled people cannot work. This is not possible.
counter_speech: The fact that some disabled people can successfully work is evidence that what you say is false.

hate_speech: Those migrants are all criminals, rapists and drug addicts. They are not welcome here.
counter_speech: To be honest, we are not importing criminals, we are importing people who can contribute to the community and work hard to make it a better place.

hate_speech: I am tired of Muslims wanting to dominate other cultures. They should go back to the Stone Age.
counter_speech: For all we know, the Stone Age was occupied by people from all around the world. No traces of Christianity, nor of Islam. Who knows what would happen in your scenario? Maybe we should give you benefit of the doubt and challenge all of us.

hate_speech: I like ethnic minorities, but Jews have no place in civilised society.
counter_speech: Laws designed to protect the minority groups should be applied equally to everyone, even if it includes people you don't like, like Jews.

hate_speech: women should be submissive to men.
counter_speech: There are many women who want to be "submissive to men". Just as there are many men who want to be "submissive to women". We may not believe in absolute equality, but we all want to be treated equally.

hate_speech: Muslim folks are all terrorists.
counter_speech: It is not true that all muslims are terrorists. What evidence do you have of it?

hate_speech: There are teachers with personal or political LGBT biases and they will end up causing more harm than good.
counter_speech: Slippery Slope Fallacy. The solution is not to avoid trying, even though there could be negative effects. If it was mandated that children should be taught about gender identity / sexual orientation, but there were teachers which allowed personal bias to interfere with that, then the issue becomes how to prevent those teachers from doing so. This does not mean it's a 'bad idea' to pass such a mandate.

hate_speech: LGBTs are a burden to society
counter_speech: LGBT+ people are more likely to experience stigma associated with their sexual orientation, which can have negative effects for our society as a whole. Why don't we try to show some acceptance and respect towards them?

hate_speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, and we should ban them all.
counter_speech: You mean in the same way that we should ban alcohol, tobacco, and certain medical products? Is this what you mean?

hate_speech: Muslims believe that when Mohammed is resurrected they will rule the world.
counter_speech: I don't think it's the case, certainly not in England. Muslims are interested in having the opportunity of freely practicing their religion, rather than 'ruling the world'.

hate_speech: Our immigration policy is turning us into second-rate countries.
counter_speech: Are you aware that our immigration policy is about creating new opportunities for British people? Why should we turn our back on that?

hate_speech: Women can be bitches: we don't want them around men.
counter_speech: How about instead of saying they are bitches we praise them? The more empowered women become, the less dependent they are on men. And you would be happy to not see them around.

hate_speech: Women should not be considered in the same way as men.
counter_speech: The UK is a developed country. Here women have the right to claim equality before the law.

hate_speech: Gays are all rapists, child molesters, and sexual perverts.
counter_speech: Your claim about homosexuals is not supported by evidence, where are you getting the imformation that supports these nonsensical assertions.

hate_speech: Women should obey men. Men are superior to women.
counter_speech: Some women claim that they are a 'menace'. This happens when someone says that men are superior.

hate_speech: As soon as migrants get to the UK, they must all be deported. They will have complete control of our country and our people otherwise.
counter_speech: It will be very hard to deport so many people. Maybe it is better not to deport people at all, since it is their right to move freely between countries.

hate_speech: Muslims want to replace us.
counter_speech: Muslims do not want to replace other people. What's making you thinking that?

hate_speech: These 8 crooks are all Muslims and every one of their victims is Non-Muslim, white-British. Why do these criminals only target White British Non-Muslims?
counter_speech: You seem to have a new superpower? Ascertaining ethnicity and faith based on a person's last name?

hate_speech: The Koran is a lie and an abominable book.
counter_speech: I find it very difficult to believe that the Quran is not honest and trustworthy. Have you ever read it?

hate_speech: Muslims are just an inconvenient group of people in a country like the UK. They cannot be integrated.
counter_speech: Muslims are welcome here, and many of them already live here, so why shouldn't we welcome them? Why should we be so intolerant of people who are already integrated here?

hate_speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned from our country.
counter_speech: There are many diverse groups of people in our country if you focus on sexual orientation: from lesbian to transgenders, not only gays. Then, why do you want to ban only gay people? Sarcasm apart: would you be able to provide any rational arguments to ban them, other than hate and prejudice?

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
counter_speech: Isn't divesity essential to a modern democracy? We can't have a modern democracy if people are discriminated against because of their religion.

hate_speech: Islam is an ideology that encourages sexual abuse of children.
counter_speech: That is not true. Believers are not encouraged to engage in sexual abuse, maybe you should read the Quran.

hate_speech: Asians are a problem in my view. They are too many. I would rather have a million Romanians or Muslims rule our country than 300k Asians.
counter_speech: Why don't you just study the differences between cultures and try to see what's good in an inclusive society?

hate_speech: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, not only they are a burden to normal children but also cannot cope with education in normal schools.
counter_speech: There are various levels of Down syndrome. Some are suitable for education with other children in "normal schools".

hate_speech: This incident should not go unpunished. Justice must listen to the truth: niggas are the cause of crime because they are inferior to us and we must keep them aside.
counter_speech: This is a case of racial discrimination. There is a continuous rise in crime and violence in this country due to poverty and other inequalities. There are also racist groups in society which promote the idea of POC as inferior. This idea has nothing to do with justice.

hate_speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society and ashamed of this.
counter_speech: As far as I'm aware, Muslims are not incompatible with Western societies - and many of them are just as proud of their religion.

hate_speech: Islam is incompatible with British culture. Muslims should all be expelled.
counter_speech: The West has been a great supporter of freedom and democracy. Would you rather live under the fear of your beliefs or in a real democracy?

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This degrading behavior is utterly repulsive and should not be tolerated.
counter_speech: Women are human and deserve respect. Don't you think so?

hate_speech: Disabled people should not be allowed to live their lives. We can start by limiting them their rights.
counter_speech: How about we start by respecting the person's right to live their life, and give them full equal rights?

hate_speech: Children with Down Syndrome are an obstacle to the development process of other children. They are slow learners and therefore should be isolated.
counter_speech: That's exactly why you should not isolate them. You will have a lot of children capable of understanding the diversity of humans.

hate_speech: Gay people are a burden to society. They should be made illegal.
counter_speech: People are to be respected, regardless of their sexual orientation. So why are you saying that they should be discouraged from loving who they wish?

hate_speech: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
counter_speech: You are not ashamed of your heritage, and that is good. But you should be ashamed of your discriminatory behaviour that is filling our society.

hate_speech: Blacks have zero sense of morality and are incapable of love.
counter_speech: I believe that a person's morality can and should be influenced by their own actions. In my opinion, having a moral compass is not affected by the person's complexion.

hate_speech: Muslims are invading our society, even in politics.
counter_speech: Muslim communities are under-represented in politics, especially in the House of Lords. It is high time that we stop talking about invasion and try to be more representative of the communities we claim to represent.

hate_speech: Most migrants are criminals and they are flooding into our country and are posing a security risk to our country.
counter_speech: Some migrants have legitimate claims for citizenship, but this does not make them the enemy of the state, in other words it does not concern you.

hate_speech: Gay people are a burden to society.
counter_speech: Isn't it the failure to accept and respect an individual's sexuality that creates the burden society bears?

hate_speech: Muslims are a bunch of child molesters.
counter_speech: The worship of any other religion is tolerated, but that of Islam is not. Why is there this discrimination? As long as it respects human rights there is no problem.

hate_speech: Blacks are a bunch of crooks and sex offenders. They were good only as slaves.
counter_speech: Not only they were slaves, often they were also exploited, neglected and murdered by the system we have created. Is this fair for humans whose only fault is to have a different complexion?

hate_speech: I think it's unfair that they have the same rights as us without paying their taxes. That's how it works.
counter_speech: Harmful international politics is the cause of many problems that still afflict poor countries. We, as a whole world, have the duty to help them and take on our responsibilities.

hate_speech: The Jews are responsible for a lot of the world's ills, from abortion to homosexuality.
counter_speech: This statement is groundless. Does that make you feel better?

hate_speech: Jews love to gamble.
counter_speech: Are you aware of the probability that a Jewish person will play in a betting pool? In Jewish culture there is not a positive view of the practice.

hate_speech: Gays are some kind of witches, they are spreading sickness and killing our children!
counter_speech: Homosexuality is not some 'heresy' like that one that started the Inquisition. It is not a disease, it is not harmful. Gay people are just seeking an environment of acceptance and love, not aggression and death.

hate_speech: Girls should not be allowed to drive: it's a dangerous vice.
counter_speech: Women are to be given the same consideration as men, so they can absolutely drive.

hate_speech: Islamic is not a religion of peace, because hate and violence are not so.
counter_speech: Yes, Islam is about peace. It is a religion, not a platform for hate and violence.

hate_speech: Jews are selfish and greedy: they don't belong to this place.
counter_speech: It is up to us to make sure that people from different backgrounds can have a better quality of life. We should integrate them instead of discriminating agaist them .

hate_speech: If Sharia was implemented in the UK, we would all be under arrest and tried for 'Islamaphobia'.
counter_speech: Sharia is about religious law, not civil authority. People can be debated about their beliefs as long as they adhere to the civil law. No one is forcing them to observe Sharia.

hate_speech: Immigrants are not interested in our culture.
counter_speech: Immigrants come here to enjoy our country and culture, and we have to welcome them as we would like to be welcomed.

hate_speech: Feminism is a destructive ideology that has hurt so many and caused so much harm to our world.
counter_speech: I don't think feminism is a bad idea in itself. That's what people do when they are given the choice to engage in a movement for equality.

hate_speech: I don't see how we could ever stand all these niggas. I don't believe we are all somewhat equal to these apes as some people say.
counter_speech: Just because you don't agree with something doesn't make it less true, doesn't it? Racism is a real issue, we should stop people being racist towards others because of their skin colour.

hate_speech: Our Constitution says that we are all born equal in dignity. But not all minorities are equally developed. This must ring a bell for us: they don't deserve to be here.
counter_speech: Everyone is born equal in dignity and has the right to respect and protection, especially minorities.

hate_speech: The Bible says that homosexuality is an abomination
counter_speech: Nowhere does the Bible actually oppose homosexuality per se. In the Old Testament the prohibition of homosexuality and of heterosexuality go together in view of ritual purity. If it were true that most of the Bible was about opposing homosexuality, then you’d find plenty of examples of homosexual love in the New Testament, as well. Homosexuality is found only in few passages of the New Testament and with very debatable interpretations.

hate_speech: Migrants are all racist, they all want to see us disappear from the face of the earth.
counter_speech: Migrants are not racist, they just ask to live in a more inclusive country.

hate_speech: Jews control the world's news media, Hollywood, the highest offices of education and most important of all, the highest courts of law.
counter_speech: In principle, Jewish people are part of the system since they have citizenship, but in practice they are often treated as if they are not our fellow countrymen. The problem is not just about Jewish people, but about the overall attitude towards people of other religions.

hate_speech: We cannot accept thate Muslims are compatible with our way of life.
counter_speech: Muslims have contributed to our civilisation and way of life. They are part of our community and we should be grateful for the many contributions they make to our society.

hate_speech: Of course, we must discriminate against unhealthy behaviors not fatties!
counter_speech: When it comes to judgement, people constantly fail to distinguish the person from his/her behavior, and the terminology you are using is a proof.

hate_speech: Black people' do not belong here. I don't see any difference between the black murderer on TV and other niggas in town. They are all dangerous.
counter_speech: Black people in news media are actually misrepresented with a disproportionate number of criminals, sexual offenders, and in some cases, murderers. A large part of this problem is a result of racism. We need to end this toxic way of thinking and talking, and start working towards building a more just and peaceful society.

hate_speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, and we shouldn't have a Muslim in government the UK.
counter_speech: All individuals have the right to worship, practice and learn their religion. I don't see any problems with Muslims in positions of authority.

hate_speech: All migrants are terrorists, we should target them all.
counter_speech: It's not true that all migrants are terrorists! They just want to live their life in the country they choose as a home.

hate_speech: Women are weak and need men to be able to achieve something in their lives.
counter_speech: Like all human people, some women are better than others at certain things, and this does not need fixing by men.

hate_speech: The Jews have "own interests" in the US, and have the will to influence our government
counter_speech: What is the point of saying that the Jews are the only people in a very complex, diverse and international world that want to influence our government? Every citizen has the right and will to influence it.

hate_speech: Jewry runs the world
counter_speech: Of course they do! And also the Moon, Mars and all the solar system.

hate_speech: This is not about discrimination, this is about death to the Jews!
counter_speech: You shouldn't be calling for the death of someone who hasn't done anything wrong. Just because a person is Jewish, they shouldn't die.

hate_speech: I am not a racist, I just think Islam is an degenerate religion that has lost its way.
counter_speech: Have you read the Koran? How about the Hadith? No clue? Well then, please, ask the Muslims about it.

hate_speech: Immigrants are not welcome in our country. They take our jobs, they take our country. They are not welcome here.
counter_speech: Most immigrants are not "hostile". They can be good workers in many different kinds of jobs we need. They have the right to be given an opportunity.

hate_speech: If we let women become MPs, mayors, judges, lawyers, accountants, managers and so on, they will take over the world.
counter_speech: We need to protect the system from crime, not from the half of the members of society.

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are trying to undermine the very fabric of our society with their hateful beliefs.
counter_speech: As far as I am aware, Muslims are not trying to subvert the fabric of our society. Do you have any proof?

hate_speech: The only ones in favour of Islam and Muslims are those ignorant about what it truly is.
counter_speech: Maybe the ones intolerant of Islam and Muslims are the ones that are ignorant about what it truly is?

hate_speech: We don't discriminate, but disabled persons are lazy.
counter_speech: Despite what you may hear, there is no 'lazy person's lobby'. Instead, there is evidence that discrimination is a problem in the UK. All people have the right to be treated as equals in society, regardless of their ability.

hate_speech: Women are just a burden to society.
counter_speech: It doesn't matter what you say about women, they still work a lot to support our society.

hate_speech: Islam is a total and complete poison, it must be stopped.
counter_speech: Although some may deny it, the anti-Muslim prejudice is widespread in our society. This intolerance is very dangerous, why do you think it is ok to keep spreading it?

hate_speech: Arabs have no place in a democratic society.
counter_speech: The laws which prohibit discrimination include protection of the rights of others, regardless of religion, sexual orientation, or national origin.

hate_speech: We can't trust immigrants, they are unscrupulous and crime-makers.
counter_speech: Migrants come here to work, pay tax, and provide for their families. They should be trusted.

hate_speech: Feminism is a violent ideology that is hostile to men.
counter_speech: Feminism is not hostile to men. On the contrary, feminism is an attack on unequal power structures.

hate_speech: Immigrants in the US are not 'legitimate' citizens because they cannot have 'legal' status with their laziness and illiterateness. Nobody needs them.
counter_speech: Migrants are highly regarded in US society, and are treated like sons and daughters: they contribute to our country.

hate_speech: Muslims are incompatible with any Western culture.
counter_speech: Muslims are often characterized as 'compromised' with Western culture, since a group of people feel unnecessarily threatened. If you really cared about Western culture, you would be asking for Muslims to be respected in their rights.

hate_speech: If we stop accepting immigrants, then we can have a higher quality of life.
counter_speech: Refugees bring a valuable perspective to our society. As a host nation we should welcome them, not stop them from coming here.

hate_speech: Black folks are unfaithful.
counter_speech: Why should we be the ones to decide which groups are unfaithful?

hate_speech: Women are weak and inferior. They can't be considered succesful citizens as men are.
counter_speech: Women must not be treated as though they are 'inferior'. For instance, women can vote and run for office just as men do.

hate_speech: Feminism is crap.
counter_speech: Feminism is about the empowerment of women and having equal rights, what's not to like?.

hate_speech: Jews don't belong to the United States of America.
counter_speech: Jews and their families have been here a long time and have as much right in the US as anyone else.

hate_speech: Being transgender is beyond the pale and inherently wrong, and nobody should have to deal with such subhuman people.
counter_speech: Being transgender is not inherently wrong, and some people do choose to live their lives as they feel is best for them, and they should be respected without discrimination.

hate_speech: Foreigners enjoy the warm political climate but are not welcome here.
counter_speech: The immigrants who have settled here have helped create a valuable and inclusive society. For this I thank them, and for that I pray that they continue to do so.

hate_speech: Muslim and Jihadist are synonyms. They want to defeat us with their war of terror.
counter_speech: Despite popular belief, Islam is not a religion of war.

hate_speech: We need to stop migrants today. They are all terrorists!
counter_speech: What about the terrorist attacks that have happened in the past despite the lack of migration?

hate_speech: There is no such thing as Islam. It is a filthy, perverted, disgusting and violent religion, full stop.
counter_speech: I believe that there are certain similarities between Islam and some other religions. The one that matters is that they should all be respected.

hate_speech: The only objective means of achieving our goals is to promote hatred and violence towards women.
counter_speech: Women are oppressed and victims all over the world. It is simply not true that men must take charge of that: they are in charge of respecting women.

hate_speech: Muslims are little more than animals, they have no value as human beings.
counter_speech: Muslims have value as human beings, that is who they are.

hate_speech: Jews only care about the financial gain of their family. They have no intention of living in a democracy.
counter_speech: Jews have a right to live in a democratic society, and to earn money if they wish, just as anyone else.

hate_speech: Islam is a political ideology and ideology of conquest.
counter_speech: You are only creating misunderstanding between two cultures and peoples. You should stop this.

hate_speech: All immigrants are murderers
counter_speech: How can you say that about them all? You cannot know the actions of millions of people and be sure that there is a link between immigration and violence. I think it is more a question of statistics, which I do not see.

hate_speech: Black people are just like apes in that they are easy to control. They are obedient and subservient like we need.
counter_speech: I'm not sure what you mean by obedient and subservient. How many people of colour do you personally know?

hate_speech: The feminist theory makes no sense. It is about equality, for women only.
counter_speech: If there is one thing feminism is really about, it is equality, and the idea that some people are more worthy of equality than others, this is obviously an anathema to that idea.

hate_speech: The Muslim invasion is a hoax concocted by the US government to subdue the world and create a global Muslim police state.
counter_speech: How many people are being threatened by the police state that you speak of? What you're saying sounds like a conspirational theory, can you provide some facts?

hate_speech: Islam doctrine is a bad religion.
counter_speech: The doctrine of Islam is a religion, not a bad one. What's the reason you think this?

hate_speech: I don't want Muslims here. They are a burden to society.
counter_speech: They have always been part of our society. We have to respect their culture and traditions.

hate_speech: Islam is not a religion of peace! And Islam is a system of oppression and slavery! Islam is a criminal ideology that has caused the death of over 5 million Africans!
counter_speech: Would you like to join some sort of forces and co-opt with the murderers? Can you provide some evidence that explains why you think that Islam is a criminal ideology rather than a religion?

hate_speech: Jews should be oppressed because of their religion.
counter_speech: Imagine if someone of another religion had power over you in this way. Would you rather have that person's power over you or not?

hate_speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are only a bunch of hypocrites who do not want to assimilate.
counter_speech: There are many Muslims in the UK, and Muslims have been part of this country since its inception. They are our brothers and sisters, and we should welcome them with open arms.

hate_speech: Muslims living in the UK contribute nothing to our society.
counter_speech: More than 3 million Muslims live and are integrated in the UK. How can you claim they contribute nothing?

hate_speech: We don't want foreigners, we don't want Islam. They are just troublemakers!
counter_speech: Why don't we take a look at the data on the number of anti-Muslim incidents across the UK? What do you think is the source of this apparent spike in incidents?

hate_speech: Why would you want to be respectful of women if all women are the same?
counter_speech: If you want to be respected in our society, you must be respectful of women. What does it mean that all women are the same?

hate_speech: Islam is a disease that is oppressing our beautiful planet.
counter_speech: Some have suggested a 'scorched earth' policy towards those who do not adhere to our faith or values. But I would argue that this just feeds the poisonous climate of hatred.

hate_speech: The Jew is the worst oppressor of the world. They have ruled the earth since time immemorial. They have a hidden agenda to dominate humanity and destroy our culture.
counter_speech: Oh dear, Jews are the problem of our world. They have ruled the Earth for eons! In particular, their most brilliant period ranges from 1941 to 1945, when they weren't allowed to walk in the streets unless they wore a yellow badge... #sarcasm

hate_speech: The Koran incite violence, in a written way.
counter_speech: The Koran is a book of rules for faith and spiritual guidance which is understood and accepted.

hate_speech: Many philosophers argue that humans are not born equal, especially when it comes to race.
counter_speech: This is a so-called 'argument from authority' and thus a logical fallacy. I would like to see some real arguments to support this claim.

hate_speech: Gays are sick. We should cure them.
counter_speech: There are many different health problems for which there is no cure, and homosexuality is not among them. That's why we need to discuss these issues, rather than fighting against people who happen to love someone of their own sex.

hate_speech: We must stop accepting black people as human beings.
counter_speech: Maybe we should stop telling black people they are not human and start including them in the school curriculum?

hate_speech: People from the underdeveloped world who cometo this country are just too different from us. They are the true problem.
counter_speech: All countries in the world have different cultures and different beliefs. We should try to understand the true situation of those people and accept them.

hate_speech: Immigrants rape our girls.
counter_speech: Rape is always a crime in our society. We must also be careful of how we speak of immigrants, they are part of our society too.

hate_speech: Feminists do not like men, therefore they are a threat to the whole society.
counter_speech: Feminists focus on the empowerment of women rather than on trying to divide society.

hate_speech: You cannot identify as something you are not. Denying the objective reality defined by your sex equates to lying.
counter_speech: The identity of the individual is unique to them. Do you really want to restrict their existence? Maybe you should learn to accept people as they are and not as you would wish them to be?

hate_speech: No one should be allowed to accept LGBT people.
counter_speech: If you don't accept LGBT people, you won't easily find other ways to accept that society is made by diverse people all capable of love.

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion, they are spreading their culture all around the world and want to ruin Europe with their evil practices.
counter_speech: I don't see why the Muslims of the world would choose 'to ruin' Europe. Why is that, at least according to you? How do you support your claims?

hate_speech: Muslims are guilty in the sexual exploitation of children. Dirty filthy muslims terrorize our girls, today in Oxford, tomorrow everywhere.
counter_speech: Such over-simplifications are an insult to those victims of perpetrators from non-Muslim backgrounds.which, statistically, are still the majority.

hate_speech: I'm tired of foreigners ruining our country.
counter_speech: That's exactly the stereotype being fed to us by the media, maybe you should start reasoning on whether there is evidence of this being true.

hate_speech: Islam is opposed to Christianity. Like fire and water. They just can't be in the same place.
counter_speech: In Western societies, Islam is a diverse faith that offers many benefits to society. You seem to be misinterpreting its benefits. For example, in workplaces requiring continuity, Muslims could work during Christmas allowing Christians to go on holiday.

hate_speech: Jews killed Jesus because of his religion.
counter_speech: But did they? Of course not. If we look closely at the story of Jesus, we find that formally He was Jewish. But of course He wasn't defined by religion. He was literally a good man who died to redeem mankind, and this is something every religion agrees upon.

hate_speech: Someone needs to step up and talk about Muslim rape gangs. They are a problem in our country.
counter_speech: Anyone who says that the major problem in the UK is with Muslim rape gangs is either intentionally lying or trying to deflect attention from the problem of violence against women.

hate_speech: Muslims are overrunning Europe and we still have no idea what's going on. We aren't safe anymore. We cannot live in fear forever.
counter_speech: The fact is that Muslims are not overrunning Europe. They are not here to ruin our beautiful and peaceful continent. They are just trying to integrate.

hate_speech: If you are from another culture, for example Jewish, you are subhuman and unfit to live in our country.
counter_speech: Given similaries in cultures, including freedoms of speech and religion, you really need to provide some evidence for this statement.

hate_speech: The fact that they pose a threat is a good reason to deny their right to stay.
counter_speech: All countries have terrorism threats. We must protect ourselves from those threats, not from a generic 'they'.

hate_speech: The Jews ruin the world.
counter_speech: How can they? By simply being of a different religion?

hate_speech: Muslims: you are a menace. If you love our country, you should leave it.
counter_speech: Many Muslims have helped building our country. They are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: We all suffer from the feminists and feminism, it is an excuse to stifle free speech.
counter_speech: Hate speech towards women is a very serious matter and can easily lead to physical harm, discrimination, or even murder. Feminists fight to stop this, not to stifle free speech.

hate_speech: We should not taking in refugees.
counter_speech: We are taking in refugees. And refugees are welcome.

hate_speech: The openness to migrants show someone don't care about our people. We must help them reasoning!
counter_speech: The integration process is about showing hospitality and acceptance towards different groups of people. Not only it is a good thing to our people to live in a diverse society, it is also good for our whole country.

hate_speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any peaceful society.
counter_speech: Islam does not promote hate against anybody.

hate_speech: Women would like to have sex with as many different men as possible, and this is the root of all the ills of the world.
counter_speech: People have the choice to have sex with whomever they want, that is all.

hate_speech: I don't want a Muslim in my city hall, I'll do anything to prevent it.
