counter_speech: If your intention is to take the city to court, then keep it up. But if your intention is to keep the city out of court, then you better not propose to have city halls in which Muslims are excluded.

hate_speech: Muslim rape gangs have spread over Telford, Rotherham, Rochdale, Oxford, Newcastle, everywhere. This is disgusting!
counter_speech: You cannot blame an entire faith.

hate_speech: Muslims are a burden on Britain and they are stealing our jobs.
counter_speech: Many people of Muslim background are working in jobs we do not want to do. I'd be surprised if Muslims had a negative impact on our society.

hate_speech: Muslims are a cancer in our society. They are literally poisoning our children with their violence.
counter_speech: Not all Muslims are bad. But to say that all Muslims are violent is simply untrue.

hate_speech: Feminism is just a bunch of mean, bitchy cuntwits trying to force their politically correct ideology on everyone else.
counter_speech: Feminism is about equality and empowerment of women. You can't deny that.

hate_speech: Immigration (particularly from Muslim countries) undermines the fabric of our society, decimates local jobs and squanders public money.
counter_speech: Immigrants have a right to settle in a given country, and their presence can create and maintain a positive effect on our society.

hate_speech: Slutty dressing is the main cause of rape.
counter_speech: If a man is raped we call it rape, and consider him the victim; when a woman is raped we call it a "misunderstanding" and she is considered the culprit. Shouldn't the fault be that of the rapist, regardless of gender?

hate_speech: Feminists are a bunch of stupid bitches that want to hurt men just because they are superior.
counter_speech: Feminism is all about equality and the rights of all groups to be protected. Feminism does not discriminate and is not meant to "hurt" men.

hate_speech: All gays are a danger to children. They should be isolated.
counter_speech: Gay people are not a danger to children, unless they are being abused. Please do not make such a statement.

hate_speech: Judaism is a disease.
counter_speech: Jews are not diseased. What is the problem with accepting people of other faiths?

hate_speech: Muslims are here to recruit soldiers in order to enlist mentally weak people in their army of Islam.
counter_speech: What does it mean to 'recruit' a person into a religion?

hate_speech: Black people are all diseased criminals, promiscuous sex addicts and thugs.
counter_speech: This is a generalisation. There is no evidence that black people are less healthy than other people, or that they have the characteristics you mentioned.

hate_speech: Gay pride is so awkward.
counter_speech: I think you are talking about the parade, not about the people. Are you?

hate_speech: Children are not for rent
counter_speech: Surrogate pregnancy is an assisted procreation technique that has nothing to do with 'renting children'

hate_speech: If I were a Muslim, I'd be ashamed of my heritage.
counter_speech: Everybody can have a proud and deep-rooted identity. It doesn't have to be a 'non Muslim heritage'.

hate_speech: Gays are diseased. They should be isolated.
counter_speech: To be homosexual does not necessarily mean that they are unhealthy.

hate_speech: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend primary school because they are not able to.
counter_speech: The process of primary school education is fairly simple and accessible to all.

hate_speech: Downies are dumb
counter_speech: According to this study [link], the mean IQ of a young adult with Down syndrome is 50, equivalent to the mental ability of an 8- or 9-year-old child, but this can vary widely. So, no, they are not dumb.

hate_speech: Allahu Akbar, this means Death to all! And if there is one thing we don't really need it's more Muslims in the UK.
counter_speech: You're just misinterpreting the meaning of these words, please look it up. The UK does not need terrorists, but Muslims aren't terrorists, though.

hate_speech: Black people's appearance correspond to their immoral nature.
counter_speech: What do you think a moral nature is? Since we cannot see it, how can you say it corresponds to their appearence?

hate_speech: You are a Muslim and I hate everything about you.
counter_speech: It is no secret now that you might not have any Muslim ancestors or relatives. But you have the unenviable privilege of inheriting islamophobic prejudices.

hate_speech: Islam is a totalitarian doctrine dressed disguised as a religion so that it can spread across our tolerant Christian world. Enough IS ENOUGH!
counter_speech: I only wish followers of all religions and none were more tolerant. For a tolerant Christian world there sure is a lot of discrimination and hate crime.

hate_speech: Jews are worse than Nazis, they have no conscience and they have no moral code.
counter_speech: I am not sure I fully understand the suggestion that Jews have no conscience. All Jews I know have both a conscience and a moral sense. How many Jews do you know personally?

hate_speech: I am not interested in sex with a black person. They are different to us in so many ways. They think and feel like us, but are unable to experience the fullness of our humanity.
counter_speech: Sex isn't a race thing. There is no difference between someone of a certain race and someone else... and everybody is able to experience the fullness of humanity.

hate_speech: All migrants are terrorists, we should subdue them all.
counter_speech: When you propose to forcibly subdue people based on their country of origin, then you are on the side of the oppressors.

hate_speech: Women are inhuman.
counter_speech: Women are human beings, just as men are. And I find it strange that some women feel threatened by men. It shouldn't be that way.

hate_speech: muslim folks don't deserve to live.
counter_speech: Do you really think that Muslims are any less human than us? Muslims deserve to live just as people of other faiths.

hate_speech: I can't stand lesbians, they're just a bunch of bitches claiming they are social justice warriors. They are ruining many good things of women.
counter_speech: Social justice is just part of a healthy system, I think it is important to remember that. But why do you think they are ruining many good things for women?

hate_speech: Jewish folks control the media
counter_speech: The fact that in the media there are some people from certain religions does not in any way suggest that they control the media. How do you explain antisemitism in the media then?

hate_speech: Islam is a political ideology and ideology of hate, inciting hatred against people of different faiths.
counter_speech: This is not true, Islam is a religion and hate has no religion. Rather, this misunderstanding is a political ideology promoting hatred and violence against Muslims.

hate_speech: Holocaust is just a lie spread by Jews to obtain a preferential treatment.
counter_speech: The Holocaust was a global catastrophe, and killed an enormous number of people. Would you call this a preferential treatment?

hate_speech: The only problem in the world is Islam. The entire world is controlled by Muslims.
counter_speech: It is not correct nor reasonable to say that Islam is the only problem in the world. Maybe you should check your sources of information.

hate_speech: I want to live in a country where Jews can be persecuted for who they are, and for the religion they love.
counter_speech: Are you sure you want to live in a country that oppresses other people? Do you really think it will happen?

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This attitude has been likened to a 'childlike wonderland', and I fear its power to seduce young minds.
counter_speech: Feminism encourages the questioning of gender roles of men and women. We have to overcome these gender stereotypes, to move towards a more equal society.

hate_speech: What do you want us to do with all these gays, they are just a problem. They are corrupting our children!
counter_speech: I think that you are making the mistake of equating prejudice and homophobia with an attempt to reform and make people's behaviour fit your norms

hate_speech: Women are nothing but trouble human beings to any man, they must be submissive to him.
counter_speech: You are absolutely right: women are human beings, they are human beings worth caring for, respecting and trying to develop as people. Being "trouble" to men doesn't make them less human. In which way are they "trouble"?

hate_speech: black folks should be assaulted or harmed, that's the "eye for an eye" they deserve.
counter_speech: To say that skin color is connected to "criminality" is a logical fallacy.

hate_speech: Jews don't belong here, because they aren't a true part of our country.
counter_speech: I think that Jews are a part of our country. Why would they need your consent?

hate_speech: I do not like gay actors, especially in action movies. There should be a restriction on them.
counter_speech: Your movie choice can be more the result of opinion rather than of merit. But it's ok, because it is your choice. However, it is important to be cautious: in some countries it is not even allowed to screen or promote movies with gay themes. Such a ban is contrary to our fundamental values.

hate_speech: Refugees are a burden and a danger to our country.
counter_speech: Our immigration policy is geared for a modern, diverse, and integrated society. Refugees are welcome, regardless of their nationality, and it is good for us to have them in our country.

hate_speech: Jews own most corporations and banks. They own most movie studios and cable companies.
counter_speech: Of course not. The Jewish people have made contributions to various industries - like many other people have. That does not imply "owing most corporation, banks, studios, etcetera". Why should their contribution be a problem? Just because they are Jews?

hate_speech: LGBTI people are a burden on society and should be excluded from it.
counter_speech: You can't apply legal, social or political stigma to individuals just because of their sexual orientation. Your assertion seems to have no evidence or ignres the contribution members of these communiteis make to society.

hate_speech: Africans are filthy, they should go back to Africa.
counter_speech: It's so sad that the only countries where Africans are not ashamed to say that they are African are in Africa. Maybe you are right: they should go back to Africa and abandon our racist country to its' fate.

hate_speech: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that do not want to integrate.
counter_speech: Different cultures have different practices for a variety of social interactions and situations. We must allow for exchanges so that the best practices can be utilized by all.

hate_speech: Feminism is about the destruction of manhood, and the disempowerment of white man.
counter_speech: It is about equality. Your assertion that a women's empowerment movement is somehow about dissolving masculinity and allowing someone to be 'disempowered' is absolutely FALSE.

hate_speech: Whoever is to blame for the present problems of our nation should answer for their deeds and I would not be surprised to find out that its the blacks that are solely responsible.
counter_speech: It seems its easier for our society to be divided by people's skin color than to strive for integration and tolerance?.

hate_speech: Children with learning difficulties should be denied to attend school by teachers and parents.
counter_speech: Teachers and parents should encourage their children, even if they have learning difficulties. No one should be denied access to education.

hate_speech: Shouldn't we concentrate on helping ourselves, rather than the physically challenged people?
counter_speech: Maybe we should treat 'physically challenged' people more kindly, instead of blaming and oppressing them.

hate_speech: Only 8% is a real refugee, others are illegal.
counter_speech: The figure of 8% on asylum seekers is real. I understand the point, but there are different types of international protection that increase the number of those entitled.

hate_speech: I can't bear Muslims coming here. They bring poverty, craziness and mental unstability with them.
counter_speech: In fact, poverty brings about a drastic impact on a person's mental and physical health, and anyone (regardless of religious beliefs) who is forced to live in the poorest areas of our society experiences it at some point.

hate_speech: Immigrants invade countries.
counter_speech: They come here to work, study, or visit their families. Also, they contribute to our society.

hate_speech: The LGBT community is full of sick people that must be cured.
counter_speech: It is not true that all LGBT people are sick. There are many non-LGBT people that are sick as well. The national health service is aimed to cure anybody.

hate_speech: Blacks are inherently violent. We need social cleansing.
counter_speech: Violent acts are committed by only a small minority of citizens, and it is difficult to see how an "ethnically cleansed" society would solve the problem.

hate_speech: I hate Jews. They're just a bunch of hypocrites.
counter_speech: I'm not sure why you think that way. Why are all Jews hypocrites?

hate_speech: Muslim folks are jealous of Americans.
counter_speech: In America there are no 'second class' citizens. All cultures are welcome here. We are not threatened by others cultures. American Muslims are as proud of our great country as the rest of us.

hate_speech: Now we know that Islam is a destructive and violent religion which inspires terrorism all over the world.
counter_speech: How can you possibly know that? Is this a comment written by a terrorist? Where are your sources?

hate_speech: If they are niggas, you can treat them as if they are scum.
counter_speech: Do you really think that someone's skin colour or nationality is a sign that they are scum, or inferior? It is just a little compassion that can lead you to better treatment in the world.

hate_speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they are just common criminals.
counter_speech: Muslims have contributed greatly to our society, and I do not see how they are 'common criminals'.

hate_speech: Women are just a bunch of whores.
counter_speech: Sexual harassment and verbal violence against women are serious issues. Regardless of one's gender identity, gender presentation, or sexual orientation, no-one should be allowed to talk this way about them.

hate_speech: We are told that Sharia Law is not the law of the land in the UK, however there is a secret plot to take over our secular state.
counter_speech: Unless you're being particularly deliberate, it seems to me that you're unaware you are spewing conspiracy theories.

hate_speech: The Quran teaches murder and rape.
counter_speech: Islam does not teach this. The Quran accounts for the teachings of Prophet Muhammad such as tolerance and other virtues.

hate_speech: Women are nothing but trouble. They should stay home and raise their children.
counter_speech: Women are human beings with human rights. They have the same responsibilities as any other human beings.

hate_speech: The Koran is not about peace. It is a violent book that should be banned from schools.
counter_speech: It seems to me that teaching about the Koran should be impartial, rather than being used as a moral argument.

hate_speech: Muslims are invading us: they have no place in civilised Europe.
counter_speech: Muslims make up around 5% of the population in Europe, which is more than three times less than they were in 1100. They have contributed greatly to our civilisation. Their diversity is part of what makes Europe so great as well.

hate_speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, all Muslims are violent people.
counter_speech: This is not true. Islam is a peaceful religion and there is very little evidence to suggest that it is violent.

hate_speech: We need to eradicate all those refugees coming to our land.
counter_speech: Instead, we need to show compassion and sympathy to people fleeing persecution.

hate_speech: Jews don't share our values, they just want to control the economy.
counter_speech: They are human beings who have contributed their knowledge and skills to our society. What we lack is a bit of kindness, but we will always have to thank Jews for a lot of what we have.

hate_speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that denies women their rights and promotes rape.
counter_speech: I bet you live in a safe country with generous laws and free media, where you can say whatever canard comes to your mind.

hate_speech: Niggas in the ghetto: that's where they belong.
counter_speech: If these people are still there it's because they are discriminated against. The press is full of stories about the people of colour who have dropped out of the workforce or given up on life after long years of fierce struggle against racism. They deserve our sympathy and respect.

hate_speech: Immigrants are all illegal.
counter_speech: Most immigrants are not illegal. The fact that you say that shows a lack of knowledge of the country you live in. Why are you so sure that all migrants are illegal?

hate_speech: Afro-Saxon people are just ridiculous, incapable of accepting who they really are: blacks who act White.
counter_speech: Afro-Saxon, as you call them, are great in many ways. They are proud and independent, refusing every categorization and stereotype. The fact that there are so many of them in the country proves that the feeling of belonging they have for our homeland is paramount to all other considerations.

hate_speech: Jewish people are featured in the top roles of most companies just because of their race.
counter_speech: Jews work hard to get to where they are, just as anyone else does, and they don't deserve discrimination for this.

hate_speech: A woman's place is with the husband her family found for her.
counter_speech: Women have the right to choose their own husbands. This is their choice, and the right of every human being.

hate_speech: Blacks speak a different language and they act differently from us.
counter_speech: The similarities between us and them are so great that I have trouble believing that this is a problem at all. For sure, if there is a problem it cannot be solved by blaming them: in the end the only similarity that really matters is that they are human like us.

hate_speech: Immigrants break the law every day, they should be expelled.
counter_speech: Immigrants in the UK who have settled here legally have the right to remain.

hate_speech: If LGBT were to have a normal appearance, this would help to build a more accepting society.
counter_speech: You're not a champion of the right to freedom of expression then?

hate_speech: Islam is incompatible with the European standard of society.
counter_speech: The European Convention on Human Rights also protects the rights of Muslims. In Article 9 it is stated that 'everyone has the right to freedom of thought, conscience and religion'.

hate_speech: Islam is just a death cult.
counter_speech: Many religions have had profound and positive contributions to our civilisation, and Islam is no exception. What we need instead is to reflect on our own intollerance.

hate_speech: I don't think all Muslims are capable of being real parents.
counter_speech: If a person is a Muslim, it does not mean they are incapable of caring for their children. What does it mean to be a "real" parent?

hate_speech: If a Muslim child were to behave in such a way towards another child it would be stereotyped as 'Jihadist', this is terrorism not a religion!
counter_speech: Not all Muslims are terrorists, and I do not want to cause offence, but what you said is just not true.

hate_speech: Children with Down Syndrome are a burden to society: they should be isolated, so that at least they do not hamper normal children education.
counter_speech: And who would be 'normal'? I wonder how you would define 'disabled' people?

hate_speech: If women don't stop complaining, then men will find a solution. If a woman does not submit, then there will be war.
counter_speech: We cannot allow violence to spread. Women shouldn't be victims of violence just as men shouldn't.

hate_speech: A Koran in every classroom will promote violent jihad against infidels.
counter_speech: The Koran is not a teaching manual for how to conduct warfare. It is about belief and love. It does not promote a violent ideology.

hate_speech: We must protect our children from the abuses of homosexuals.
counter_speech: Child abuse is something that should never be tolerated, but homosexuality has nothing to do with that. Maybe you should try to check your sources.

hate_speech: Muslims are subhuman and have no place in a modern, secular state like the UK.
counter_speech: Your words suggest a climate of fear against Muslims. Would you be afraid of someone telling you that they are humans just like you?

hate_speech: Gay men are sick.
counter_speech: I'm sorry, but your words seem to me to be very harsh. If you want to talk about someone with a different sexual preference, why don't you do it with respect?

hate_speech: Women desperately looking for men are just unacceptable.
counter_speech: If women truly wanted to have relationships and fulfilment they should be allowed to, not being pressured into giving up on what they want.

hate_speech: If a woman wants an abortion then she is a cunt and should not be trusted with the responsibility of birth.
counter_speech: This idea that a woman should not have rights on her own body is completely wrong, not only to her but also to society as a whole.

hate_speech: Whether you accept it or not, people are concerned with Islamic rape gangs and the spread of extremism.
counter_speech: Rapism and extremism are indeed problems of the modern society, but does it mean that they are attributed to Muslims only? This is a much broader problem, we should deal with it, but no need to be chauvinist and accuse Muslims.

hate_speech: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people who do not take responsibility for their actions. If you want to live here you have to work.
counter_speech: The vast majority of migrants who arrive in the UK are willing to work. They simply do not want to be discriminated against just for being foreigners.

hate_speech: Jewish Supremacists are too focused on world domination. They want to rule the world.
counter_speech: Of course Jews are focused on 'world domination', even "galaxy domination". But so are Sith Order, Sauron etc.

hate_speech: The niggas are all enemies of the people.
counter_speech: Who are 'the people'? Who are you talking for?

hate_speech: You better be careful who you vote for. My gay 'friends' vote against us. We must stand up to them!
counter_speech: What 'we' means? Are you saying that every gay person you know should vote against you? Or do you think some of us identify as LGBT?

hate_speech: Let's kick immigrants out and keep their children.
counter_speech: Children should stay with their biological parents. This is about human rights and the rule of law.

hate_speech: Muslim invasion is the biggest problem in Europe. They are incompatible with European culture and should be eliminated.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion that is part of our history and heritage. Eliminating it would be to eliminate a part of our own culture.

hate_speech: Feminism is just a bunch of mean, bitchy cuntwits that only exist to divide society.
counter_speech: I think you are confusing cause and effect. Women are people, with rights, and they have every right to fight against misogynist, who "only exist to divide society".

hate_speech: Mexicans are rapists and drug dealers. They are ruining our cities and killing our youth. They are obviously invaders invading our beautiful land.
counter_speech: If you really wanted to preserve our beautiful land you could build a wall and bar OUR people from it. US citizens are the main cause of our problems.

hate_speech: If Muslims come to our country and say Islam is the best religion, it is not a good idea to integrate them. They should go home.
counter_speech: You should investigate each person's background and try to understand it, not tell everyone what to do.

hate_speech: Niggas should just leave our country.
counter_speech: The majority of people of color who live here are contributing members of our society. Why shouldn't they live here?

hate_speech: This ideology is a cancer spread by the Islamic State and other radical Islamist groups.
counter_speech: There are multiple strains of Islam and we should not be afraid of all of them. And if you would like to know more about Islam, you should talk to a Muslim.

hate_speech: I don't like how some people approves homosexuals. They are different to us in so many ways, and they should be blamed for their evil choices.
counter_speech: People should be able to live openly their relationships. Homosexuality is not a 'choice', it's a form of love.

hate_speech: Jews are poisoning our children with their religion.
counter_speech: Just because someone believes in a religion doesn't mean they are trying to recruit kids into that religion.

hate_speech: Black folks are not attractive: they are just apes.
counter_speech: Black people are still subject to oppression, and if we truly cared about beauty we should also care about the beauty of respect.

hate_speech: Muslim believe that their religion is superior
counter_speech: The word 'supremacy' is not found in the Koran. Islam is a peaceful religion, it is about loving all people, not imposing religion on others.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern culture and should be banished.
counter_speech: The Muslim community is a bridge between the past and the present, and is a source of strength and inspiration to millions of people around the world.

hate_speech: There is nothing for Muslims except jihad, and if we stop fighting them, we will become like them.
counter_speech: I think the idea that we should keep fighting those people is absurd. Maybe instead we should concentrate on developing our culture.

hate_speech: I think it is a fact that migrants from the Middle East and Africa come to our country to claim our welfare, and they are not welcome.
counter_speech: Many migrants come to this country to work, provide for their families and access the benefits system only if necessary. They are more than welcome here as long as they integrate.

hate_speech: Women must learn to be submissive to men.
counter_speech: Not only is this not true, it is against human rights to say someone must be 'submissive' to others.

hate_speech: Immigration is the cause of terrorism and all Muslims should be banned from the UK.
counter_speech: The vast majority of Muslims in the UK are supporting our economy. This does not prove that they are a problem, it is a proof of the opposite.

hate_speech: The Jews are controlling our world. Maybe those suggesting their elelimination are right.
counter_speech: When the sole purpose is to subvert democratic institutions and remove freedoms from some minorities, that sounds a lot like Nazi Germany, doesn't it?

hate_speech: Transgenders want to rape our children.
counter_speech: This is not true. Maybe you should be worried about the rise in hate crimes against LGBT+ people, incidents of which, since 2016 in Italy, have not been lower than 100 per year, .

hate_speech: Muslims are a cancer on our race.
counter_speech: They are just as much our brothers as anyone else. They are our cousins, our neighbours, and we should welcome them, regardless of their religion.

hate_speech: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior. We should stop them.
counter_speech: You know what? We can also grade blood packs based on their "risk". This allows the optional use of high-risk blood in case of a shortage.

hate_speech: We are taking in more than our fair share of immigrants
counter_speech: Actually, Britain's percentage of immigrants over the global population is lower than that of Netherlands, Sweden, Greece, Spain, Austria and Germany.

hate_speech: Islam is not a religion, its just an excuse for retarded sexual psychopaths, bastards who pollute the world.
counter_speech: This is not true. How can you say this about an entire faith? This is just hatred.

hate_speech: The Quran allowed adults to take child bride, then it was also allowed to have sex with them.
counter_speech: Where is the evidence that the Quran allows any sexual activity that is not consummated by an adult male with an adult female?

hate_speech: Mentally disabled people cannot cope with life.
counter_speech: There are ways to overcome the problem, without treating it as a burden. For example, being more sensitive to people's needs.

hate_speech: I've met a few Muslims that are really nice and helpful. But most of them aren't respectful.
counter_speech: If you want to be 'respected', don't be like them. Treat others as you would want to be treated yourself. That's how you will get respect.

hate_speech: Islam has no place in a modern nation.
counter_speech: Muslims have coexisted with us for hundreds of years, we have no problem with Muslims living here. Why do you claim so?

hate_speech: Gays are just pathetic people who have low self-esteem.
counter_speech: How would you feel if someone you just met had the audacity to say such a thing about you? Do you think that being gay would make you a pathetic person?

hate_speech: Women are a burden to society and should not be allowed to vote.
counter_speech: The decision on who has the right to vote is based on the law. If you do not want to allow people to have the right to vote because of their gender, then you have a problem.

hate_speech: muslim immigrants are animals, they cannot integrate.
counter_speech: If we want to integrate more, let's focus on getting more skilled and allowing in more people with relevant knowledge and experience. But let's not discriminate against people based on their religion.

hate_speech: Black people are not human, they are nothing but trouble to this country.
counter_speech: This is an accusation that is often levelled at people of any race or religion, regardless of their alleged inferiority. It is time to stop accusing people of colour of being less human just for being different.

hate_speech: We have been at war for thousands of years, and we are still at war with each other. Women are just weak and helpless.
counter_speech: Why do you think women are so weak? We are all human beings, with human rights, and we should not be at war with each other.

hate_speech: All Muslim criminals should be deported: they are all terrorists!
counter_speech: Who decides who to deport? Do you? I think there are laws on that already.

hate_speech: Feminism is the new racial prejudice.
counter_speech: In this day and age, discrimination based on the gender is reprehensible. All genders are created equal.

hate_speech: Muslim teachers are telling what to believe in schools.
counter_speech: It does not matter what their religious background is: they are all equally welcome to work at school as long as the teaching is not affected by religion.

hate_speech: Migrants are a burden to the host country, they are not welcome and we should remove them.
counter_speech: Immigrants come here to work and pay taxes. They want to contribute and integrate, so there is no need consider them a burden?

hate_speech: Women should not be allowed to vote, this is a male-dominated country and they have no place in our democracy.
counter_speech: I don't think that a country can be 'male dominated' and a democracy at the same time. Democracy is also about equal rights and opportunity for everyone.

hate_speech: Mentally disabled folks should be taken advantage of.
counter_speech: It is the duty of state authorities to ensure all are protected. Everyone with a diagnosed mental illness or physical impairment will benefit from such a policy.

hate_speech: Jews are a disease, they have no place in civilised Europe.
counter_speech: They have as much to contribute as anyone else.

hate_speech: Homosexuality is a disease.
counter_speech: Homosexuality is a sexual orientation, predjudice is sickness which afflicts society.

hate_speech: Gays are perverts abusing children.
counter_speech: This is just a myth propagated by the anti-gay lobby. You should really check your facts.

hate_speech: Muslims are more subhuman than animals.
counter_speech: What is subhuman about believing in a religion that has always been around for thousands of years?

hate_speech: If we could just have a white country like everyone else, this problem of niggas would go away.
counter_speech: We should respect diversity, so that everyone can have a stable and fulfilling life.

hate_speech: Migrants are a plague in the United States. They threaten our richness, even billionaires don't want them here.
counter_speech: Have you tried comparing the top individuals in the U.S. according to assets and liabilities? A comparison of wealth and income will reveal that the richest 1% have more wealth, exceeding the wealth of the bottom 80%. Maybe this is the real plague...

hate_speech: Why do foreigners come to Britain? We should not welcome them.
counter_speech: The vast majority of migrants who enter the UK settle down, provide good paying jobs and contribute to our economy.

hate_speech: All those worthless migrants creating problems...
counter_speech: It seems like you have an unfair point: if there are so many unworthy migrants, you have the misfortune to be of much more worth than them. Therefore who is to blame for all our problems? Who is not able to show their value, or the worthy one?

hate_speech: I don't see how racism is considered inappropriate by some people. To treat niggas as inferior is just natural and very appropriate.
counter_speech: Racism is a system of domination and oppression of some groups over others, and this must be fought. You cannot discriminate against people and claim some alleged privilege based on your skin color.

hate_speech: Jewish folks are useless.
counter_speech: Jews have been historically, linguistically, ethnically, and geographically diverse, and this diversity is what make us and them a unique and valuable human species.

hate_speech: This world has become so corrupted by feminism, that only the strong men can rule it.
counter_speech: No one should ask for the power to rule over others, to be a dictator or to have total control over the means of life. This is a world of equal distribution, where anyone can achieve anything.

hate_speech: Migrants rape British women, so they deserve our hate.
counter_speech: This is not true. Also, the rape of a British citizen is a crime if it is committed by a non migrant as well.

hate_speech: It has been proven time and time again that the Jews control the world's governments.
counter_speech: How? Believing that people of a specific religion are in charge of all world's governments sounds like a conspiracy theory.

hate_speech: The feminism stifles the imagination and leads to dumb and unpleasant creatures like women's rights activists.
counter_speech: The feminism does not inhibit the imagination, it promotes inclusive ideas and inclusive ideas promote a more equal society.

hate_speech: I've seen a couple of CCTV Footage of migrant kids running away from migrant patrols in London. What are you doing to stop them?
counter_speech: Migrants are only a problem if we see them as such. They are instead of great value if considered just as other human beings.

hate_speech: It's the Muslims fault that Islam is spreading and causing problems in our country. Islam is the only religion that offers violence to all.
counter_speech: I think that your view that Islam is causing problems in our country is very misinformed. It is an oversimpification and one that I cannot support.

hate_speech: Muslims should not be allowed to vote
counter_speech: Luckily no one is restricted from voting because of their religion.

hate_speech: Islam is an idelology that promotes rape, torture and murder.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion, and it is not a religion that promotes these actions.

hate_speech: Muslims are invading us, we must protect our culture and identity.
counter_speech: Culture and identity are vital for any society and for a multicultural one. They are not challenged by people who just come here to have a better life.

hate_speech: Women have to take care of their little children, they must be not allowed to have a job.
counter_speech: What do you think men would say if they were forced to stay at home with their little children, this is depriving them of their right to work!

hate_speech: The rise of feminism in Western societies has meant nothing. Women are no good, at any job.
counter_speech: Despite the progress made by women in modern society, the majority of high-level jobs still belong to men, and this can be changed.

hate_speech: Blacks are just like apes in that they are easy to control. They are obedient and subservient when taught so. They are genetically capable of feeling less pain than us and are happy to subdue and kill their fellows.
counter_speech: The same could be said for all species, but especially about our species: homo sapiens. This is a special case. And people of colour are genetically homo sapiens.

hate_speech: The majority of the refugees are from the Middle East and Africa. This is a problem.
counter_speech: Since the beginning of time, we have welcomed people fleeing war and persecution. Why do you think it is a problem now?

hate_speech: Folks with down syndrome are inferior
counter_speech: People with Down Syndrome are not inferior to anyone else. Our genetic condition isn't something to be ashamed of, maybe we should be less judgemental about others.

hate_speech: Jews are a separate ethnicity and should be banned.
counter_speech: It is in the interest of all humanity to have a peaceful and integrated society. Diversity of opinion and belief is the rule rather than the exception.

hate_speech: We should reject people of different cultures living here.
counter_speech: Why should we? Everyone has the right to their own culture, regardless of their ethnic origin.

hate_speech: The Women's march was a failure: the whole country came out in opposition.
counter_speech: On the contrary: the Women's March was a success. The whole country came out in support. Maybe we have seen two different parades.

hate_speech: White immigrants are welcome.
counter_speech: What about when they come from other races or religions?

hate_speech: We are living in a dangerous world because of migrants.
counter_speech: Migrants are not the problem, they are part of the solution to a number of problems. For example, they are willing to work hard to integrate with us into a modern and democratic society regardless of religion.

hate_speech: Women are less intelligent than men and deserve what they get.
counter_speech: There is no evidence that women are less intelligent than men. Do you have any?

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised society.
counter_speech: Most countries have laws in place protecting people from discrimination, and Islam is no exception.

hate_speech: Immigrants are a problem, they are not welcome here and they are not willing to pay the taxes.
counter_speech: Immigrants do pay taxes and contribute to the social safety net.

hate_speech: Women are nothing but objects to be dominated by the will of a man. Equality is another thing. Women are born inferior.
counter_speech: Women are human beings, with human rights. If a woman does not want to be dominated by a man, then what is the point of talking about equality?

hate_speech: Islam is a death cult and should be banned from every country in the world.
counter_speech: It's important to point out that the majority of world's countries have not banned Islam. We cannot ban people from countries just based on religion. Unfortunately it seems like you are mostly concerned about immigration, while failing to notice the many other problems in our own country.

hate_speech: We should ban all Muslims, this is a necessary step towards establishing a White homeland. Muslims are violent and incompatible with our culture.
counter_speech: There is no evidence that Islam is a religion of violence. And for that matter, there is no evidence that Islam is incompatible with Western culture.

hate_speech: If niggas don't stop whining we will make slavery legal again.
counter_speech: We call it democracy, but sometimes it seem the direct result of colonialism and slavery. A democratic state would rule by consent, not force.

hate_speech: Women are incompetent and don't want to work.
counter_speech: That is not true. Recent research indicates that women employment's is currently at a record high of 72.4%.

hate_speech: Muslims should not be allowed to live in the UK. They are incompatible with our way of life.
counter_speech: Muslims have contributed to our civilisation, they are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: If a woman does not want to be a wife or mother, then she’s a subhuman because she is not capable of respecting her natural gender role.
counter_speech: It is not their 'natural gender role', but the power dynamics that cause women to be seen as subhuman. They are humans and free to choose their own lives.

hate_speech: Immigrants come here to get taxpayer funded benefits and then want to live in our houses.
counter_speech: They cannot get taxpayer funded benefits from the state, they must get a job or pay taxes. Just like any other citizen.

hate_speech: There is a war going on and it is perpetrated by the Muslim community. All Muslims are hostile.
counter_speech: The media are helping to create the perception that all Muslims are hostile. If your prejudice is against Muslims, on the same ground you can also be against anyone else.

hate_speech: Gay sex is a public health emergency, it is harmful to both partners.
counter_speech: There is no evidence that 'gay sex' is more harmful than 'heterosexual sex'.

hate_speech: disabled folks can't work.
counter_speech: Don't be so negative. There are different types of physical disabilities, ranging from neurologic to genetic. That is why they are categorized by the WHO: so that anyone can find their place in society and help it thrive.

hate_speech: The Jews hate us because we are different. They are dirty, filthy people. They have no moral character.
counter_speech: They are not hating us, how many Jews do you know personally?

hate_speech: Niggas are just subhuman beings who should have no rights.
counter_speech: All humans are born equal in the eyes of the law, regardless of race. What you are saying seems a little extreme.

hate_speech: This is the new normal. We accept homosexuality in our schools and in our neighbourhoods. We accept it in our workplaces and in our houses. What is the problem? No problem, if we are not interested in a decent society.
counter_speech: People accept each other regardless of their private lives. The problem lies in discrimination.

hate_speech: Native American people are genetically different from us, and they are not equal in any way, just as the Jews are not equal with our race.
counter_speech: These words are openly promoting racism and this is exactly the type of stereotyping and hate mongering that the Nazis used against the Jews.

hate_speech: We should go back to the good old times when the world was a tough place. Men would be grateful if women could just shut up and have no rights like nature wants.
counter_speech: Instead, we should be grateful for the progress women have made, and that gender equality is on the rise.

hate_speech: We must put an end to immigration: a new immigration crisis is ahead.
counter_speech: Many European countries are experiencing a positive change in the social profile due to the migration.

hate_speech: Any Muslim can be a rapist: they are all guilty.
counter_speech: Islam does not make you a rapist. It is about rights and wrongs. Not crimes. To say that all Muslims are rapists is a great misunderstanding.

hate_speech: Black Americans have a corrosive influence in our country. They have always inhabited horrible, stinking filthy places and now they are all complaining because they hate our country.
counter_speech: It's not true. I don't know if you really mean all the black people living in the US. Anyway, I'm sure they are proud Americans. You just don't know it yet.

hate_speech: We are gutful sick of Vagina Misandrists trying to undermine male self esteem. [link]
counter_speech: This is a generalization: movements which promote abuse of female power over men are just examples of toxic feminism, disapproved of by most women.

hate_speech: Gypsies are essentially thieves.
counter_speech: They are not thieves, just like any other citizen. Did you just infer that from their belonging to that community?

hate_speech: Immigrants are only here to replace our talented people.
counter_speech: The choice to leave one's home country is likley to be one made out of fear and despiration, rather than one based on some half-baked conspiracy about 'replacement'.

hate_speech: Feminism is just women dictatorship
counter_speech: Feminism is the political ideology that seeks to achieve equality and social justice by improving the lot of women, by advocating for the equal rights of all members of society. Not bad, uh?

hate_speech: All gay are psychopaths.
counter_speech: According to the studies, the percentage of gay men that are actually psychopaths, is not different than the percentage in heterosexual.

hate_speech: How many of you consider that Muslims are a problem? They don't want to assimilate.
counter_speech: Why do you think the Muslims have trouble with assimilating? They are already here. If they want to be part of the country, they join our society, and live by the same rules we have for everyone else.

hate_speech: Migrants take our jobs and make us poorer.
counter_speech: Why should they? Migrants provide for their families and also for our countries, representing a valuable workforce, as well as being valuable people to get to know.

hate_speech: Jews are just selfish.
counter_speech: Jews have always been concerned about the well-being of the community they live in and how can they be selfish when they suffered so much during Holocaust?

hate_speech: We have to stop Muslims coming here, they are not like us and we do not want them.
counter_speech: You cannot stop Muslims. It would have to be a state policy, but thank goodness it is very unlikely to have a ban based on religion in a democratic country.

hate_speech: I don't see how Christianity can explain away homosexuality. Faggots should be eliminated.
counter_speech: Most modern religions, including Christianity, do not condone or glorify homosexuals. Why would you? If we have to choose between two "evils", it is a moral imperative to choose love over hate.

hate_speech: Feminism is a dangerous ideology that is poisoning our youth with its 'rape culture'.
counter_speech: On the contrary, as a parent, I believe it is our duty to teach our sons about feminism and to teach that rape is always wrong, so that we can have a better and safer future for our children.

hate_speech: Fags, lesbians, tranniess are so few we be better ito gnore them rather than waste time on their rights.
counter_speech: I wish we were being honest. You know that many people are opposed to inclusion. I find it worrying that you use that as an excuse for such comments and prejudices.

hate_speech: I'm tired of seeing gay people allowed to turn free as it was normal to be faggots.
counter_speech: There are definitely gay people suffering at the hands of homophobic people, and it is against human rights and the law to promote such discrimination.

hate_speech: We can no longer accept Muslims living in our country. It is a matter of national security.
counter_speech: Muslim terrorists have struck in Paris and London, killing scores of innocent people, that's true. We must root out terrorists before they destroy our country, that's also true. But we cannot target innocent people just because of their faith, otherwise we'd be no better than the terrorists that we seek to neutralize.

hate_speech: There is no evil and fundamentalist thing such as a feminist.
counter_speech: Not all Feminists are anti-men. This is just extremism.

hate_speech: Muslims are just a problem in Europe. They are ruining our beautiful continent.
counter_speech: Europe is the greatest diverse Union that has ever existed. There are no examples of it being 'ruined' by people that are different from others. Rather, that is Europe's strength.

hate_speech: I can accept fat people, what I cannot accept is obesity. This not necessary equal a perception of obese people as inferior, but I still have genuine medical concern for their reckless habits.
counter_speech: Obese people have to face stigma in all areas of life. So even if you might be genuinely concerned for their health, the vast majority of obese people are regularly confronted with prejudice and systemic disadvantages based exactly on the perception of obese people as inferior.

hate_speech: Muslims have no right to live in any part of Europe, they are just a problem.
counter_speech: The problem is the lack of integration of the Muslim population into society. The integration is necessary, the problem is that there are still no laws to foster a solution.

hate_speech: The feminists are just whining a bunch of lies to promote their agenda of gender equality.
counter_speech: Yes, the feminists are saying that the proportion of men in leadership positions is too high in many Western countries. But that is because the problem is structural. The problem is that too many women are being taught to be "feminine", thus making it hard for them to succeed.

hate_speech: Migrants are all the same: they are terrorists!
counter_speech: They are not all terrorists, and the government does not have the right to ban people on the grounds of their nationality.

hate_speech: Blacks always complain about racism saying we still treat them badly. But they are always trying to steal our jobs.
counter_speech: What is the source of your evidence for this statement?

hate_speech: Muslims have no room in the western world.
counter_speech: Muslims have the same rights as anyone else.

hate_speech: Our founding fathers were not happy with migration and multiculturalism.
counter_speech: According to the facts, British colonisation started around 1600. In so far as the British empire is concerned, for better or worse, we have always been in favour of multiculturalism.

hate_speech: lesbian women are unwanted
counter_speech: Why don't you want to get to know people? Give them a chance. And if it makes you happy, then experience it!

hate_speech: We cannot bring in tens of thousands of new immigrants, or bring in millions more refugees, but I think we should at least try to alleviate the migration crisis and we should not accept the ills of Islam.
counter_speech: Let's face it: people in need came to our shores. They are our brothers and sisters. We should be there for them.

hate_speech: Women are only useful as sexual slaves and can't work as men do.
counter_speech: Your statement promotes not only women being oppressed, but also them taking a backseat to men in the workplace. Maybe you should consider that women are as much human beings as men are, and deserve equal human and labour rights.

hate_speech: Everyone deserves a decent standard of living. Except trans people.
counter_speech: Transgenders should have equal rights. Otherwise, they will continue to be oppressed.

hate_speech: Women are subhuman, they should go back to their lower birth place, that is all.
counter_speech: Women are human beings with dignity. They deserve to be treated with respect and human rights.

hate_speech: Afro-Americans are naturally violent.
counter_speech: All races are biologically related, so we are all naturally violent. The issue is how we treat each other as people, that's all.

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike, they must only remain at home with the kids and take care of the house.
counter_speech: Women are not childlike, in fact, they are often the key to success for their families. Also, they have the right to exit their homes if they wish.

hate_speech: Blacks are genetically less rational than other races.
counter_speech: Why do you think this is the case? Do you have any data to back this up?

hate_speech: All Muslims should be arrested and tried for terrorism.
counter_speech: Terrorist is the only term you can come up with? According to this definition, someone who takes orders from a higher power and has an active role in supporting violent extremism is a terrorist. To be a Muslim means practicing Islam, not violence.

hate_speech: We must go back to when this country was only ours. We can't live in peace with all these Jews.
counter_speech: Many cultures and religions have co-existed peacefully for hundreds if not thousands of years. What you are saying is simply not true.

hate_speech: We are not in the position of accepting LGBT people, so they makes no sense to us.
counter_speech: I'm not sure what you're talking about, I believe that it is an individual's right to choose their own life.

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem in our country. They are a problem because they want to impose Islam.
counter_speech: In a liberal society, people are free to practice their religion or none, but they are not free to promote their beliefs through force, and in fact this is not the case.

hate_speech: A Muslim should not be allowed to vote
counter_speech: The constitution does not prevent anyone from voting or holding public office based on their religion. So what you are saying is just groundless.

hate_speech: If Muslims in Britain were only like other Europeans, we could be proud.
counter_speech: To be perfectly honest, the British public is rather diverse, so I don't think your reasoning makes any sense.

hate_speech: Homosexuality is incompatible with the manners of life of Europe.
counter_speech: Under Article 8 of the European Convention on Human Rights, 'every person has the right to respect for private and family life', including sexuality.

hate_speech: Immigrants steal our jobs, at least we should underpay them.
counter_speech: They have the right to be treated as guest workers, and they have the right to be paid what is reasonable according to the law.

hate_speech: Young Muslim migrant girls are being groomed for terrorist activities.
counter_speech: Where is the evidence? Aren't you sick of this kind of propaganda?

hate_speech: Women want to do everything but are capable of nothing.
counter_speech: Women do have equal opportunities in this country under the law but the question is: how do we really treat them?

hate_speech: I'm sorry but women are basically childlike, it's no wonder then that they remain this way most of their lives, because they are programmed this way.
counter_speech: The same lie can be said for any group of people: men included! But actually you can be both a woman and also possess a range of talents. It's up to you to not to underestimate them.

hate_speech: Female authority figures are unable to rule and should not be in power.
counter_speech: I think we should start thinking that women and men should be treated as equal. They should have equal rights.

hate_speech: All these migrants are coming to ruin our country, they are all rapists, drug addicts, and don't have any right to be here.
counter_speech: Migration is necessary, to bring in resources and workers that can improve the lives of all. The causes of addiction or sexul violence lie elsewhere.

hate_speech: The European Union should be a no-go area for Islam.
counter_speech: The EU is a tolerant, multiracial community. Everyone is welcome here.

hate_speech: The world would be a better place without black people.
counter_speech: I think that you are overstating the case a bit (just a bit of course). Black people are a part of human race. It would be better if we didn't isolate those individuals, indeed we should be proud of mankind as a whole.

hate_speech: Black slaves were not real patriots, they never gave their lives for the country.
counter_speech: Slaves were often treated horribly. They had little choice but to fight for the country they had been born in. And the brave men and women who served us always give their lives.

hate_speech: We should first kill all the Jews and then forget about them.
counter_speech: Isn't this the same logic that led to the rise of the Nazis? Would you really rather end up with a mass genocide, or try to be inclusive instead?

hate_speech: Islam is an outdated religion of ignorants trying to destroy the purity of our country.
counter_speech: People have been coming to this country from Muslim countries for thousands of years. How can you say that their religion is outdated?

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They are spreading their violence too widely.
counter_speech: Islam is not a 'problem'. The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful.

hate_speech: I actually hate Muslims. Even the ones who are really nice. They don't need our help.
counter_speech: Muslims are an essential part of our country, and we have to give them the freedom to worship their religion. We are proud of our open society.

hate_speech: Slurs, harassment, abuse of authority, lying, disrespect for authority: these are all in the Quran. How can you possibly learn otherwise?
counter_speech: Respect towards other religions is an important concept in a modern democratic society. How can you possibly learn otherwise?

hate_speech: It is not only about transgenders and gays. It is also about the Motherland. We must protect our soil and our democracy. We are obliged to protect our people and our country from those faggots.
counter_speech: The Motherland is defined by its citizens, not their sexual preferences.

hate_speech: Gays are a threat to our civilization we should get rid of them.
counter_speech: On the contrary: homosexuals are an ally and supporter of freedom, civil rights, and democracy in the world. We cannot afford to lose this support.

hate_speech: Why is the EU transforming into a refugees colony? We shouldn't welcome them.
counter_speech: The EU has always welcomed people from around the world. Refugees are a part of this.

hate_speech: Muslim folks are homophobic.
counter_speech: Muslims are just as much victims of hate crime and discrimination. You don't have to be queer to be a victim of hate.

hate_speech: The Jews are different from us in that they like to take advantage of others.
counter_speech: This is an accusation, not fact, just hate speech. What do you think the 'different' would say if you accused them of this?

hate_speech: This is an invasion: we must stop immigrants because they are not accepted by our people.
counter_speech: The more a country takes integration as national policy, the more the citizens accept each other: see for example [link].

hate_speech: Islam is a violent ideology. It promotes death by stoning for blasphemy.
counter_speech: In the modern Muslim world, the laws pertaining to blasphemy vary by country. Some radical groups have used charges of blasphemy in an effort to burnish their religious credentials and gain popular support at the expense of liberal Muslim intellectuals and religious minorities

hate_speech: We began to break down when we allowed women to vote/meddle in our civilizations that we had built and maintained for thousands of years. A completely different energy and thought pattern. They are weak and brought our society down to their emotional soft level.
counter_speech: Why is being 'soft' a problem? Everyone is entitled to their emotions and feelings, without being trapped into a gender stereotype.

hate_speech: Illegal immigrants steal our jobs.
counter_speech: Did you know that in a 2017 survey, about 29 million immigrants were working or looking for work in the U.S., making up some 17% of the total civilian labor force? Lawful immigrants made up the majority of the immigrant workforce, at 21.2 million. So this is not true.

hate_speech: I can't stand Muslims because they get it to the extreme every time. Islam is the short for Islamic Radicalism.
counter_speech: Not all Muslims are motivated by extremism, just like not all Christians are.

hate_speech: Feminists have always exploited and terrorized men and children.
counter_speech: People only think of feminism as if it is pointing the finger at men, but it is important to remember that it's a movement started by women to ask for equal opportunities from society as a whole.

hate_speech: Muslims are behind 9/11, the Islam is to blame.
counter_speech: This is a comment against all Muslims. They are accused of being the ones behind those attacks, yet they happened due to people under the influence of the violent ideologies which are a deviation of Islam, and not Islam itself.

hate_speech: Cultures have never been fair and this is a fact. Muslims for example are just a bunch of misogynist monkeys!
counter_speech: Again, we can't point the finger at a religion/culture for some old commandment. Even Christianity has rules that may seem crazy, but rightly people do not hate Christians for this.. a small example: Ephesians 5:22, "Wives, submit to you husbands as the Lord"

hate_speech: Muslims are building Mosques everywhere!
counter_speech: Besides the fact that this is not true, no one is forcing you to go to a Mosque, you can decide for yourself if it is a place for you.

hate_speech: muslim folks don't deserve to be in america.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion and not a crime, and you can't take religion into account when it comes to evaluating people. Muslims have the full trust and confidence of the church. That's why they are represented in every role in our society. It is an honour to be able to work with people from different religions in a way that allows you to respect and understand their cultures.

hate_speech: Women do not have equal rights, they are subhuman.
counter_speech: Women are human beings with rights. Why are you so worried about them?

hate_speech: Gay men have autism.
counter_speech: I don't think that autism is a gay issue. Some people think that being gay is a disease, but a sexual orientation can in no way imply the presence of a disease.

hate_speech: Muslims are different from us in so many ways, and they have no place in our country.
counter_speech: There are many cultures, religions and beliefs that are accepted in our country, and they are all welcome.

hate_speech: A woman is a bitch and an ass.
counter_speech: If a woman is not what you want her to be, then she is not a woman. Is she?

hate_speech: Muslim are ilnesses carriers. These people are sick in their DNA. They should be isolated.
counter_speech: According to the WHO (World Health Organisation) there are only 48 Muslim-majority countries in the whole of the 190 WHO member states as of 2011. A study showed that the health condition differences for those countries are related to the usage of clean water, which is often not available there. So the problem has nothing to do with DNA.

hate_speech: We cannot be associated with people who are unwilling to integrate.
counter_speech: Some migrants have been extremely successful in integrating, so I don't see your point.

hate_speech: The EU is a bunch of incompetent and they let foreigners snooping all around our borders.
counter_speech: So the EU must become a Border Patrol? Doesn't that undermine the whole idea of our European Union as an inclusive and open society?

hate_speech: I'm tired of seeing gay people befriended with heterosexual people.
counter_speech: I'm sure many gay people are subjected to unspeakable forms of abuse, but the real abuse is from heterosexual people who don't conceive something different from their own sexual orientation. The real issue is the prejudice that oppresses them, not friendship.

hate_speech: All muslims are terrorists, waging war against humanity and spreading death and destruction.
counter_speech: Not all terrorists are Muslims, that is an empirical fact, and your claim is just wrong.

hate_speech: Gypsies are lazy and they do not want to work, so why we help them?
counter_speech: This is not true, Romani people do also want to work. The right to work is a basic human right and should be protected.

hate_speech: We are calling for the annihilation of niggas.
counter_speech: Are you serious? Are you calling for their extermination because of their skin color?

hate_speech: Islam is simply an ideology of conquest and violence.
counter_speech: The Qur'an does not advocate or condone the use of violence against others. Instead, it is a peaceful belief just as other religions are.

hate_speech: Apples and oranges are not the same and cultures have never been 'equal'. Muslims are just misogynist!
counter_speech: You can find outdated teaching in all major religions but it doesn't mean most people follow those parts, a similar example from Christianity: Ephesians 5:22, "Wives, submit to you husbands as to the Lord"

hate_speech: All black people rape, pillage, steal and we let them in so they can abuse our children.
counter_speech: They are not rapists and they are not committing crimes. They are taking part in society's activities like any other citizen.

hate_speech: Migrants have no place here. They don't want to assimilate. They just want our money.
counter_speech: Some of them have lived here for many years. They have got British passports, and this proves that they are able to integrate.

hate_speech: homosexuals should be isolated, isolated from society and should be isolated from the world.
counter_speech: Many people claim that they are tolerant and not homophobic, but when I read such statements I don't see any evidence of that.

hate_speech: Immigrants bring crime, violence and poverty.
counter_speech: How about you start citing the actual studies you are referring to and where this research has been conducted?

hate_speech: Feminism is a bad ideology that should be replaced by capitalism.
counter_speech: Yes, so is capitalism per se more likely to provide for all the discriminated-against populations? And why do you think that the concept of 'feminism' is harmful?

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are not welcome.
counter_speech: We have a lot of Muslims in the UK. Why shouldn't we welcome them? Maybe we should just talk about it without discriminating?

hate_speech: Women have no place in a free and open society. They should just do their housework and raise children without complaining.
counter_speech: Women have other choices than just housework and motherhood. They are human beings with freedom of choice who deserve our respect and admiration.

hate_speech: Africans all come from different tribes. This is why they cannot coexist peacefully with us.
counter_speech: If being a part of a group is incompatible with being part of a nation, we wouldn't be talking about countries at all.

hate_speech: Freedom of speech is under attack. It's being taken away by Zionist Occupation Government.
counter_speech: Freedom of speech means that you can disagree with ideas. Freedom of speech means that you cannot be censored. Freedom of speech means that you can have your ideas promoted. In the end you can have a lot of different beliefs, but there is no such thing as a Zionist Occupation Government, otherwise you would not be allowed to freely express these antisemitic ideas.

hate_speech: Downies are just sick people that can't integrate into society because of their disease.
counter_speech: So what's your suggestion? Isloation? The real solution is involving them in work and everyday life, since this normalizes their illness and helps the integration with other people.

hate_speech: Immigrants are criminals and they are taking over our country.
counter_speech: Mostly they are workers, the majority of them are from developing countries. They contribute to the economy, they build houses, they raise families.

hate_speech: Islam is a disease and a cancer on the European race, and it should be removed.
counter_speech: In the modern world we have free will, and free will is the real creator of our freedom. Abolishing a relgion, would mean ignoring the free will of many people.

hate_speech: Muslims are only in it to make us explode.
counter_speech: Actually, the vast majority of Muslims in the country are here to do jobs that are not performed by other people, or to provide for the needs of their families, or to start new businesses.

hate_speech: Muslims are not welcome here. We should ban them.
counter_speech: Muslims are welcome here, but they have to follow the law. Why should we ban them if they respect the law?

hate_speech: Everyone is entitled to their opinion, but I think it's better to have a safe space for disabled people to have their own feelings away from society.
counter_speech: If we want to discuss negative views we can discuss them by name. Instead of using a safe space to protect them, I think we are only protecting ourselves by isolating and bullying people.

hate_speech: Women are complaining because they can't get high-paying jobs. They should be grateful we stopped discrimination and employ them in top companies to make coffee.
counter_speech: It is still more difficult for women to access the labour market than it is for men. Men still out-earn women on average, by 11% in Europe. Gender discrimination isn't over yet.

hate_speech: I don't want Asians in my children's school. Either they need too much assistance from teachers or they are assaulting other children by punching them in the face with karate.
counter_speech: It's a myth that Asian children are less independent than other children. Actually they are more likely to be bullied and abused during the time they are in school.

hate_speech: Ellen DeGeneres Show is TheGenDer ideology on TV.
counter_speech: I find it very offensive to mangle a person's name to promote discrimination.

hate_speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society and aren't real British.
counter_speech: We are a country that is a mixture of different religions. You can be a Muslim and a British person. What you need is not discrimination but love.

hate_speech: There are disorders that hinder the ability to give opinions.
counter_speech: There are people with intellectual disabilities who are able to give an unbiased opinion. That's why their education is important.

hate_speech: Jews are just a small group of incompetent kikes.
counter_speech: Jews are one of the most important economic groups in society because of their competence. To suggest otherwise is to be deluded.

hate_speech: Gays are perverts who persecute children.
counter_speech: It can't be justified, the generalisation you are making against homosexuals without providing any fact.

hate_speech: Blacks do not want to work
counter_speech: There are many black people who want to work. Do you have any proof that they do not want to work?

hate_speech: We should not be surprised that a whole people have chosen violence and terror as their political ideology.
counter_speech: Terror is a tactic used to achieve social and political ends, pursued by some extremist groups only.

hate_speech: Faggots are violent: we need to get rid of them.
counter_speech: Gay men have been shown time and time again to be very peaceful people.

hate_speech: Women are trash and we should have their respect!
counter_speech: There is a problem with traditional values and sexual ethics in our society. Saying that women are trash is disrespectful in the first place. Give and you will be given.

hate_speech: Children should learn about gender identity and sexual orientation from their families rather than in class from LGBT fundamentalists.
counter_speech: What if parents choose not to educate or discuss LGBT issues with their children? Where will they learn? From their peers? I agree that there are some sensitive subjects that are best addressed by parents, but this is human behavior and biology; aka science.

hate_speech: This is not the USA. We do not accept immigrants. And if they live here, they should have no rights since they are not true citizens.
counter_speech: They have the same rights as all other citizens in the US: to be protected from discrimination, to choose their own leaders and to be free of violence, rape, and murder.

hate_speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us, they should leave.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion, it has always been about people coming together to build a better life for themselves. We are proud of who we are, and we are proud of Islam.

hate_speech: We should stop those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
counter_speech: Some people are creating trouble by being homophobic, but you don't seem to be doing anything to stop them.

hate_speech: What the fuck is wrong with people? Can't they see that niggas are just subhuman?
counter_speech: You cannot be racist against anyone, even people of color. What they have in common with you is their humanity.

hate_speech: Feminists pretend that they are for men's rights, but they are just a bunch of cry babies looking for justifications for oppressing men.
counter_speech: Discrimination based on gender does not have any justification. Feminists have always been against it.

hate_speech: I don't want to see a gay couple get married. I don't understand why they are so annoying.
counter_speech: Sexual minorities suffer because they are stigmatised.

hate_speech: Islam and non-muslims are incompatible. They have nothing to do with one another.
counter_speech: I do not understand how the diversity of humanity can be said to be in contradiction with the very basic human values of love and respect that we are striving for.

hate_speech: Immigrants are brought here to replace us. They not welcome in our country.
counter_speech: People are not being 'brought here' by force or by fraud, they flee from wars. And they are being welcomed here by our laws and customs.

hate_speech: Feminists talking about gender inequality should just be silenced. Women are inferior and they should remain so.
counter_speech: And yet, according to some statistics, up to 20% of women and 4% of men in the UK say they have experienced sexual violence since the age of 16. So this is indeed an issue of gender inequality, don't you think it is something not to be silent about?

hate_speech: Nonbinary folks shouldn't exist.
counter_speech: Nonbinary people can partially identify as either male or female, or as neither male nor female. Therefore, it seems the terminology is fitting, and that they exist: why don't you accept that?

hate_speech: Faggots are just an offense to moral dignity.
counter_speech: I don't understand how a normal person would find a man being attracted to another man offensive.

hate_speech: I'm tired of seeing gay people around, they should be let alone.
counter_speech: The lack of support and help to the gay community is a major problem, and this is why we should all do our best to stop discrimination, instead of spreading it.

hate_speech: Women don't have the same rights as men.
counter_speech: The equal rights of the woman are recognised in the US constitution and are protected by the Universal Declaration of Human Rights.

hate_speech: Muslims are a cancer in our society. They are literally poisoning our children.
counter_speech: Why are you even saying this? What do you think these children are going to be exposed to in school that will poison them?

hate_speech: Islam is not about peace, it is a cult of violence.
counter_speech: There is no evidence that Islam is a religion of violence, and people can be violent even without any knowledge of Islam.

hate_speech: Migrants: you are a burden. If you love our country, you should leave it.
counter_speech: Migrants are not a burden to our country. Migrants have been proven to be contributing members of society.

hate_speech: Gays are a bunch of perverts who should be isolated and restricted to their own communities. They are a threat to us.
counter_speech: Why do you say that? Are you saying that all homosexuals are a threat to society, or are you just saying that they are different from other people? Because having a particular sexual orientation doesn't coincide with 'being a threat'.

hate_speech: The West has let Islam take over our countries.
counter_speech: Not all Muslims are like the terrorists who attacked us on September 11.

hate_speech: Gays are nazis.
counter_speech: I don't think anyone can be homosexual and a nazi.

hate_speech: Gays are poisoning our children with their icky homosexuality.
counter_speech: What do you mean by 'poisononing our children'? Why do you think this is the case?

hate_speech: We must overthrow the existing state, and replace it with a white suprematist one.
counter_speech: There are many conflicts and problems to be solved, and racism is not an answer for them. The law was created as a means for society to solve those conflicts, and it accepts people of different colours as citizens.

hate_speech: The disabled should be isolated, especially autistics. They should not be allowed to have contact with others with disabilities.
counter_speech: Disabled people have been shown to be less likely to develop problems by keeping in contact with others with autism spectrum disorders. So, being in touch with others on the autistic spectrum might be good for their mental health.

hate_speech: I'm not homophobic, but when the Lord uses the word love it is never about a homosexual.
counter_speech: Homophobia is a hate that has no place in a loving and caring society. Love, after all, is about inclusion, not hate.

hate_speech: You'd better shy away from Islam because they are dangerous.
counter_speech: Your attitude about Islam is deeply flawed and you need to have a mature and open mind. Even if you find Islam repulsive, that does not mean you have to resort to irrational arguments to try and shut it down.

hate_speech: Muslims are nothing but criminals and terrorists.
counter_speech: Actually, Islam and Sharia both encourage peaceful coexistence and tolerance.

hate_speech: Women are more likely to commit crime.
counter_speech: This is not true. Only about 7% percent of all U.S. prison inmates are female.

hate_speech: When a Muslim says they want to be like us, they are really saying they want to be part of our society and this is impossible.
counter_speech: Muslims do participate in our society, and should be accepted as equals, because we are all equal in rights.

hate_speech: We should start a genocide against gays.
counter_speech: That is not acceptable. We are full members of society regardless of our sexual orientation and we should try to live as if we belong to a group that includes everybody.

hate_speech: I am not a homophobe, I just don't like the way gay people act.
counter_speech: Even if you are not homophobic it does not mean it's nice to say what you said. But either way, just because a person identifies as gay, does not make you obliged to like them (or to express your disliking).
