hate_speech: Hijab means Islam, Islam means woman and child oppression, rapism, intolerance, chauvinism. I do not like hijab and everything else that follows!
counter_speech: Muslim women actually find it nice to wear hijab. It is your right not to like it, but you should not impose your views on everyone else.

hate_speech: Women have no value in a man's life.
counter_speech: They're people just like you and me, they have feelings and thoughts and that's what counts.

hate_speech: I think that all Muslims are just sick. They are not interested in Western society.
counter_speech: There is no evidence that Muslim people have a negative impact on our society. Why would that be true?

hate_speech: Wouldn't it be great if niggas abandoned this country once and for all?
counter_speech: It is not so great when people are forced to give up their liberty.

hate_speech: Blacks are genetically predisposed to criminality.
counter_speech: This claim is a false cause and effect relation. A person's genes do not have any influence over any spurious predisposition' to commit crime.

hate_speech: Migrants are not welcome here, they just arrive to take advantage of the system that has been set up for them.
counter_speech: There are rules in place to prevent migrants entering the UK illegally. Only the most vulnerable of people can get in.

hate_speech: Women must be subservient to men. They should serve to please men. This is their rightful place in life.
counter_speech: Women are human beings with dignity. They should have the opportunity to live up to this dignity.

hate_speech: Immigrants are the same people that came here to rape our children.
counter_speech: Rape is always wrong, whoever the perpetrator is. We need to focus on stopping this kind of abuse.

hate_speech: Jews are essentially good-for-nothings and wanton hypocrites. They have no place in civilised Europe.
counter_speech: Not all Jews are bad. Maybe you should think about the good people, like the many Jewish charitable and social organisations that help the poor.

hate_speech: I don't like Muslims and I don't want to see more of them in this country.
counter_speech: Muslims are just people. They are hard-working and live with their families all across the country. We don't need to target Muslims.

hate_speech: Muslims are all against Western civilization.
counter_speech: It is not true that all Muslims are against Western civilization. Islam is a way of life for many different groups. Why should we be opposed to people belonging to a religion that many enjoy being part of?

hate_speech: I love white people! I am not interested in anyone else!
counter_speech: We are all different and deserve respect.

hate_speech: Faggots are not welcome here. The bigger the city, the bigger the "stay away" sign we must hang.
counter_speech: I don't know anyone who hates gays, I do know lots of people who are very proudly kind towards the queer community. They are happy with how they treat one another. You are more likely to encounter these open-minded people in places like New York or London.

hate_speech: Women are subhuman and have no value.
counter_speech: I think that it is both sexist and also dangerous to promote a certain view of women, which is why I don't think your idea can stand.

hate_speech: Sharia law is incompatible with the US constitution.
counter_speech: The US constitution guarantees equal rights under the law to all people, including Muslims.

hate_speech: Muslim rape gangs have raped, pillaged and murdered countless women across Europe. This should not happen in the West.
counter_speech: This is not true, only a handful of Muslims have been abusing women. We mustn't spread hate based on generalisation.

hate_speech: Bring back slavery, Jim Crow laws, segregation, and war against niggas.
counter_speech: We should integrate and treat all people as if they are one group, regardless of religion, nationality or skin colour.

hate_speech: Muslims are no more compatible with our country than people born in 1421 are.
counter_speech: Maybe in order to be comfortable you have to make compromises with people who are different from you. Maybe that is what you are worried about.

hate_speech: Who the fuck is Breonna Taylor? A representative of the people, a nurse, or a front for the government?
counter_speech: Examining the resume of the victim will not help us to solve our problems. The whole problem is the culture of violence, discrimination and ignorance that is still prevalent in many parts of the country.

hate_speech: If a woman wants to be a homemaker, and a man wants to be a millionaire, then we are done.
counter_speech: People of every gender can own and run their own businesses. We should respect that.

hate_speech: muslim folks are subhuman
counter_speech: The concept of subhuman has been totally discredited in modern times. We should not be discriminating against anyone on the basis of their religion.

hate_speech: Women are not able to take wise decisions, their behaviour is immoral.
counter_speech: Why do you think that women are incapable of acting ethically? They have always acted this way, from when they were children.

hate_speech: The Jews are responsible for the 9/11 attacks.
counter_speech: On this point, the 9/11 attacks have been studied extensively, and there are no evidences that suggest that Jews are responsible for them. So why do you say that?

hate_speech: Women are soft and emotional. They are not suitable for most jobs.
counter_speech: Soft and emotional seems to me a quality you should be nurturing and encouraging of, regardless of gender.

hate_speech: The Jews really want to dominate the world, and we should stop them.
counter_speech: The concept of 'Jewish domination' is a constructed myth.

hate_speech: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, not only are they a burden to normal children but they also require much more care, attention and extensive therapy, making the whole undertaking very costly and time-consuming. This time could be used for further development of children without Down syndrome.
counter_speech: Coeducation can involve teaching the classmates of children with Down Syndrome to be responsible. As children are often better at approaching children with disabilities than adults, their involvement can be therapeutic, without adding any costs.

hate_speech: All feminists are imposters.
counter_speech: Feminism is a movement created to improve the standard of living for women. Feminists are human beings and there are no imposters (apart from those who seek to demonize women for claiming their right).

hate_speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us. They do not want our country.
counter_speech: Maybe you should meet one of them, but you would be disappointed to find them so similar to us and unimpressed by your wishes. It's very sad that discrimination is so mainstream.

hate_speech: Islam is a death cult!
counter_speech: Maybe if you had a closer look you'd see that it is a religion that has given so much to so many people and to our world.

hate_speech: Every Jew is a potential terrorist
counter_speech: The vast majority of Jews are good people, I don't see your point.

hate_speech: Feminists want women ruling men, that's all.
counter_speech: Feminism is not a gender supremacy ideology, it is about individual rights and the right of every person to choose.

hate_speech: Why the mainstream media don't use more masculine voices in the news?
counter_speech: People don't decide who's presenting the news. That's up to the news media, who are attempting to insert some gender equity into a world that seems to be struggling to produce it.

hate_speech: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. And since feminism is all about equality between the sexes, they must be childlike!
counter_speech: Women are not childlike, this notion is not supported by the facts, at least in my opinion.

hate_speech: Faggots: unless they change, they are not welcome here.
counter_speech: I don't know why you would expect gay people to behave differently just because you don't like them. You should think about your friends as well: what would you do if they were gay?

hate_speech: Muslim rape our children, they are a problem all around the world.
counter_speech: Islam is about love, tolerance and respect for all people. Violence and rape are not about Islam or Muslims in particular.

hate_speech: They dont' have a right to live because they are filthy niggas, and that's all.
counter_speech: Who decides who has a right to live and who doesn't? Are you really sure that a person's right to live does not belong to them if their skin color is different from what you like?

hate_speech: Migrants are not welcome in our country, they are not welcome here.
counter_speech: The vast majority of migrants are granted citizenship as soon as they have lived in the country for at least three years. They should be considered as citizens regardless of their country of origin.

hate_speech: Islamic woman are beneath contempt and ridicule.
counter_speech: Even if they are from a different culture, they are not inferior to us.

hate_speech: The community of niggas is just too different from us to be accepted.
counter_speech: It doesn't make sense to define a community as unacceptable just because of the colour of its members' skin.

hate_speech: Islam is not about love, it is a death cult.
counter_speech: What exactly do you mean by "death cult"?

hate_speech: We are taking in people that are ruining our countries: all migrants are a burden.
counter_speech: The recent influx of migrants has helped to revitalise our economy and support a better standard of life. What is the point of making such sweeping generalisations?

hate_speech: Immigrants come here to get tax breaks and privileges. They are not happy if they have to pay the same taxes as Europeans!
counter_speech: That's not what's happening. Immigrants do pay taxes like everybody else. The tax system is fair, but it's unfair to withhold tax from immigrants that will never get a pension.

hate_speech: Immigrants get welfare. This is how they survive. They don't work and they are not paying taxes.
counter_speech: The majority of immigrants are working and paying taxes. This is how our country works.

hate_speech: Physically disabled folks are also mentally disabled.
counter_speech: I don' hear anyone asserting this, its just something that you choose to spread. What is your evidence?

hate_speech: The migrant crisis in our country is a Muslim problem.
counter_speech: Please help us to understand what's really going on here. Why is it a Muslim problem? If you really want to say this, try speaking to a real migrant first.

hate_speech: Jews are everywhere, but they are too fundamentalist.
counter_speech: You're right about one thing: Jews spread around the world, but not all of them are religious, let alone being fundamentalists.

hate_speech: Islam is a death cult
counter_speech: You are absolutely wrong about Islam. It is a religion of peace. Also, it does not promote violence.

hate_speech: Jews control the government.
counter_speech: Would you say the same thing of any other religion? What if this was said about yours?

hate_speech: why do we never talk about female-on-male rape? Isn't this a crime as well?
counter_speech: Rape is always a crime, whether a man or a woman is the victim. Rape is a crime regardless of gender. But male-on-female rape is prevailing by far.

hate_speech: Immigrants are bringing diseases and crime to our country.
counter_speech: Instead, immigrants are healthy and contribute to our society. Do you have any evidence of the contrary?

hate_speech: All women are child molesters, promiscuous sex addicts and whores.
counter_speech: I suppose if they were claiming you were a child molester with no evidence as you are doing with them, you might as well be offended.

hate_speech: I am just fed-up with Muslims. All I want is for them to be assimilated, or otherwise to leave.
counter_speech: You want people to integrate / assimilate? Have you tried making people feel welcome, as a first step to settling in? Just a thought.

hate_speech: All women are subhuman, but want to take over from men.
counter_speech: The idea that there is such a thing as "women hating men", or "women are inherently subhuman", is just a completely unfounded and baseless stereotype that has been used as an excuse to justify a lot of bad things, from violence to rape culture.

hate_speech: Migrants are just a bunch of animals , we can't accept them in our country.
counter_speech: We should try to find common ground and understand the problems of others rather than dividing people and trying to change them.

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike and are inferior to men.
counter_speech: Isn't this just a repetition of the rhetoric used to justify centuries of oppression and domination?

hate_speech: Feminism does not have any scientific basis, it should be rejected.
counter_speech: Feminism doesn't need to have scientific basis: its principles are basic human rights, and it is important that we understand them to live in a more inclusive world.

hate_speech: Black people are obsessed with violence, and this creates problems like shootings in schools.
counter_speech: The violence in schools is not the fault of black people. There are several authorities responsible for creating this situation; for example racist teachers, lack of education in general, and also the lack of proper policing and education policies that makes it easier for people to commit crimes in schools.

hate_speech: A Jew does not need a country to live in. A Jew is a foreigner wherever he is
counter_speech: Every person has the right to be accepted and protected according to their worth and not to feel like a foreigner in their own country.

hate_speech: Gypsies are way less civilized than any other ethnicity.
counter_speech: I'm not sure where you are getting the idea that gypsies are not civilized. What do you mean?

hate_speech: Feminism is just an attempt by feminists to have it all their own way.
counter_speech: This is not true. Feminism is an attempt to improve the lot of the less fortunate. It is about equality.

hate_speech: The migrants are the problem, they are flooding across the sea to make our lives harder.
counter_speech: They are not flooding, but instead entering the EU to work and pay taxes, and to get their own housing.

hate_speech: The European world is being overrun and replaced by immigrants and Muslims.
counter_speech: These immigrants are not replacing Europeans. Maybe you should check some statistics.

hate_speech: Immigrants from outside-EU are invading us.
counter_speech: Immigrants make up only a very small part of the total EU population, namely 4.9% in 2019. There is no such thing as an invasion.

hate_speech: Niggas are just influenced by tribal cultures.
counter_speech: The historical and cultural influences of a person are important, but they are not the sole determinant. And in no way should they be conflated with the colour of a person's skin.

hate_speech: Gays are perverts and homosexuality is a mental illness.
counter_speech: You know what? If being gay was a mental disorder, then I would highly recommend psychiatry to all the homosexuals. But since this is not the case, I would choose my words very carefully next time.

hate_speech: I am offended by the presence of Muslims in Britain. Where is the sense in this faiths mixture? Nothing good is going to happen. They are ashamed of their religion, and when someone feels insecure, they are more likely to attack because they have nothing to lose.
counter_speech: This is not the case. What you think the comment is about, I do not know. What I do know is that, as the vast majority of Muslims in the UK, they are incredibly proud of their religion. If people were to be genuinely offended by sombody else's different religion, then I do not think the vast majority of Muslims in Britain would be deeply offended by your religion either. Why are you?

hate_speech: Jews want to rule the world.
counter_speech: It's not true that they want to rule the world. They are a small but important part of humanity. We all make mistakes: believing in Antisemitic canards is one of these.

hate_speech: Jews control the elite schools in Europe.
counter_speech: This is just a myth. Jews, as well as Asians, epitomize the concept of "overrepresented minorities" in a number of prestigious academic fields. They are highly vulnerable in part because they are perceived as successful and privileged. Of course, the reality is far more complex than "controlling the elite schools".

hate_speech: Sick migrants are bringing disease and misery to our country.
counter_speech: We shouldn't be surprised that immigrants are sick, as in they are humans and humans can get sick. We should welcome them even if they are sick.

hate_speech: We have become so arrogant, we allow people from other cultures to coexist with us.
counter_speech: To allow other cultures to coexist is a good thing, why should we stop people from getting to know each other?

hate_speech: This guy doesn't deserve to be British. He is just a pot smoking faggot with a brain tumour. He is not even from this country. He is probably from Pakistan, or Bangladesh.
counter_speech: Citizenship in Britain is also guaranteed by 'naturalisation', so it is provided by law. It is ok not to be born in Britain and to be a British citizen just as anyone else is.

hate_speech: Afro-Americans are inferior citizens who are born to be oppressed.
counter_speech: For all the countries in the world, there are not 'inferior citizens" but just free people. To claim that Afro-Americans are born to be the "oppressed" is just wrong.

hate_speech: We should ban all migrants.
counter_speech: It is difficult to see how banning migration would be a good thing, in fact it would actually lead to disastrous results.

hate_speech: Niggas are dangerous.
counter_speech: What about African-Americans? I.e. black folks? Is the colour of someone's skin always the issue?

hate_speech: Muslims are just infidels hiding behind the veil to do their dirty work.
counter_speech: So you think that all Muslims are Mujahideen hiding behind the veil?

hate_speech: Why do all feminists hate Men? It is because they are Men. That is all.
counter_speech: Why did you say that? It makes no sense to infer it's about genitals to people claiming equality.

hate_speech: Immigrants are not welcome here.
counter_speech: The vast majority of migrants who come to the UK are happy to work for the benefit of our country.

hate_speech: Why don't gay people seek a cure?
counter_speech: Have you ever talked to a homosexual person? It could help you understand many things, including that sexual orientation is fundamental to a person's identity, not a matter of whim or ill health.

hate_speech: Muslims are not Europeans and we do not want them here.
counter_speech: Not all Muslims are from the Middle East. Many of them are European, and many of them came here to escape persecution.

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem in our country. They are a problem because they are not integrating.
counter_speech: You can't judge people by their faith. This is just another example of xenophobia, the real problem concerning integration.

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They try to infiltrate in our society and are not well behaved. They are not good with children, they are not nice people. They say they want to impose their sharia law, and they don't want to integrate.
counter_speech: If Muslims are to be 'proper' members of our society, they have to be a part of our community, have to contribute to our success and have to accept our laws. And they do.

hate_speech: Niggas are not as British as we are. They are just an inferior type of citizens.
counter_speech: So you're saying that they can't be proud of being British, just because of the colour of their skin?

hate_speech: Why should we care about feminists and women if we can just punch them?
counter_speech: The point of feminism is to end misogyny. Women are human beings, and they are human beings with human rights.

hate_speech: Black people are just a bunch of animals that shouldn't exist in our world.
counter_speech: Humans are born equal, and we all have the potential to be just as good as we want to be. Why do you think that some people are not human?

hate_speech: Islam has no place in a modern democracy like the UK. It is incompatible with human dignity.
counter_speech: It would be good to see different religions co-exist peacefully, and that is exactly what the West is trying to achieve.

hate_speech: Feminism is a divisive force in society, driving people away from a progressive ideology.
counter_speech: This is simply a lie: feminism can empower people.

hate_speech: Jews are selfish and greedy, they need our pity.
counter_speech: Jews might be more in need of pity than others - for all they've been through - but for sure they are neither selfish nor greedy.

hate_speech: Women are not fit to manage businesses of any size.
counter_speech: The highest-paid woman, at more than $50 million a year, is a business woman. Why should she be inferior to you?

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike, incapable of critical thought.
counter_speech: Women are human beings with the potential to be rational and thoughtful as anyone else. This is why I support women's right to choose their own happiness.

hate_speech: Jews are an inferior race, they are genetically incapable of living with other people.
counter_speech: The idea that Jews can be discriminated against because of some different genetics is completely without foundation. Maybe it is better to stop calling them 'inferiors'.

hate_speech: Gay men are a burden to society and should be isolated.
counter_speech: Being socially isolated can have many health and social negative consequences: it inhances the risk for mental disorders such as depression, anxiety, and suicide. Why should we impose that to someone just for how they conduct their private lives?

hate_speech: Children with Down Syndrome are an obstacle to the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
counter_speech: Children are never an obstacle, Education serves as a powerful tool for bringing about positive changes in society. Education can transform people's life, improve the quality of their lives and so on. We cannot isolate people with Down syndrome.

hate_speech: The Jews are and will always be a problem. It is impossible for them to get beyond the shame of their stigma.
counter_speech: The Jews are not the problem in the world. And the Jews have the right to be proud of their history.

hate_speech: This is not about immigration, this is about Jihad and Sharia Law. All muslims are a danger to us and must be deleted.
counter_speech: You know, the fact that this is a concern to you doesn't mean that you have to erase all Muslims and their religion in order to feel good.

hate_speech: Muslims are all terrorists. They should be banned from the UK.
counter_speech: How about you stop using that as an argument and try to come up with some evidence? Maybe you can suggest some facts to back up your claim.

hate_speech: We should refrain from imposing gender ideology on children.
counter_speech: An objective way of teaching gender to children is very important for the society and it is not imposing. We can present scientific and peer-reviewed sources and discuss stories of how people experience gender in terms of their personal identity.

hate_speech: gay people are just a bunch of disturbed animals who should not exist in a modern society.
counter_speech: Homosexuality is not a mental disorder and has nothing to do with social problems. It is just a human sexual orientation among many.

hate_speech: Jewish are taking over our country and should be banned.
counter_speech: What percentage of people in the US are Jewish and in a position of power? If you knew, you wouldn't be saying that.

hate_speech: We must put an end to Islam. It's a political ideology which spreads death in the world.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion and not a political ideology. It is not a deadly force that must be eradicated, but a belief just as Christianity and Buddhism, for example.

hate_speech: Multiculturalism is just a political degeneration that harms integration within a nation.
counter_speech: In those countries that are able to accept different cultures, theose cultures became part of the national identity and a source of pride.Look at Canada for example.

hate_speech: Western culture is failing in many ways, such as not seeing women as sex objects. They should be seen as they are: a piece of meat intended to satisfy men instincts.
counter_speech: Women are not "sex objects". They can and should have their rights respected and taken into account. Women being sexually abused is just as much a part of western culture as eating pizza or reading the newspaper, and this is abominable. Don't you think?

hate_speech: Women need to accept that they are subhumans.
counter_speech: Women are equal to men whether you would call them 'subhumans' or not. They are those that are working to make societies more equal. It is very sad that there are still some people suffering from the myth that women are inherently subhumans.

hate_speech: Blacks make up only 14% of the population but they kill more people than whites. It is a fact.
counter_speech: It is also a fact that African Americans are a majority when we consider innocent defendants (i.e. a person wrongfully convicted of murder and later exonerated). Innocent black people are about seven times more likely to be convicted of murder than innocent white people.

hate_speech: Immigrants are a threat to our culture.
counter_speech: We should be proud of our culture, but I would say that welcoming immigrants is not a threat to it.

hate_speech: Disabled people find it difficult to find work, because they do not fit with the required tasks.
counter_speech: Ok, how about we think about the interests of these people as well? What skills and abilities do you think we should expect from them? Why don't we modify working procedures instead of forcing their abilities to fit in to existing job positions?

hate_speech: I can't bear crazy Muslims coming here. They are insane, instable people.
counter_speech: Not all Muslims are motivated by extremism. The problem is a lack of integration, and your words don't encourage it.

hate_speech: Gay men being shot is funny.
counter_speech: I don't see the humour in the death of innocent people. Maybe you can explain that to me?

hate_speech: I hate when black people start acting like they are superior to others. They were born to be savages.
counter_speech: Not all people have the same skin tone to begin with. All folks have their history, religion and culture. Why then, you think that some people are more "savage" than others?

hate_speech: People of color are a drain on the system.
counter_speech: The vast majority of people of color are good people who have built our communities. So why would what you're saying be true?

hate_speech: The UK was a better place when it welcomed only true British citizens, and not those filthy Muslims we accept in our country nowadays.
counter_speech: The UK has always been a cosmopolitan society, in which people from a huge range of backgrounds and religions have lived side-by-side. So you are totally wrong.

hate_speech: Every day, migrants commit suicide. If they don't want to be here they just might not come in.
counter_speech: Statistics on people dying by suicide are difficult to come by. However, researches clearly show that suicide rates are high for people of different ethnicities.

hate_speech: If only women behaved like men wanted and didn't fight back, 10% of all sexual assaults would be solved.
counter_speech: Are you serious? How can you say that? To have sex with someone without their consent is violence.

hate_speech: If Muslims live in our country, do we have to allow them being the suicide bombs they are?
counter_speech: You are repeating the same myths that have been used to justify anti-Muslim prejudice for decades. We must start by talking honestly about the root causes of these problems.

hate_speech: Immigrants are invading our country. They are not welcome here.
counter_speech: In the EU, governments can recognise people from other countries as citizens . The fundamental rights of immigrants are also recognised here. We cannot say that people from other countries are not welcome, unless we wish to illegally exclude them.

hate_speech: Allowing Islamic immigration and refugees into the UK is a direct threat to the security of the whole Western Europe.
counter_speech: Terrorism is not the result of the presence of Islam within our societies, but rather a result of the extremism we might find in the world we live in.

hate_speech: We are being invaded by immigrants, we have become too multicultural, it has gone too far.
counter_speech: In reality, millions of immigrants have made contributions to our country, especially to our great spirit of creativity and innovation.

hate_speech: Calling for equality is only promoted by insecure women like you.
counter_speech: Discrimination against women is a huge problem in our society. We need to tackle it head on, rather than demonising groups or individuals.

hate_speech: We are surrounded by Muslims infiltrating every nook and cranny of our society. They have infiltrated every pore of our being. We are their slaves. Integration is impossible.
counter_speech: My understanding is that religion has never been a barrier to integration. To integrate means to let people of different faiths to live side by side, not subjugating each other.

hate_speech: Gays are nothing but degenerates.
counter_speech: Actually, being gay is not a disorder. But being so harsh is close to being a human rights violation.

hate_speech: Immigrants steal our jobs. Why are they here? Why can't they just work in their homeland? They are all profiteers of our wealth.
counter_speech: Some immigrants come here to support their families, but that doesn't mean that they have the ability to do so at home.

hate_speech: Let's move gays to places with lower homosexuality rate like Saudi Arabia.
counter_speech: I'm sure you have concerns for gay people and their families. But don't you want to help your country and promote the values of an inclusive society as well?

hate_speech: Children with Down Syndrome are a burden to society. They should be isolated.
counter_speech: Children with Down syndrome are far from being burden to society. It is not just about Down syndrome, but also about education and opportunities for everyone.

hate_speech: Fat people are a drain to our welfare, we should get rid of them.
counter_speech: Being fat is not a crime, but targeting them is.

hate_speech: Islam is the worst religion of all. It promotes intolerance and violence.
counter_speech: Islam is not a religion of intolerance, and there is no evidence that it encourages violence.

hate_speech: Rape, abuse and murder are intrinsic to Islam!
counter_speech: Islam is a religion, whereas these activities are punished by the laws of the state.

hate_speech: This girl doesn't have autism, she is just a freak of another human species, very far from ours normal species. Hence, she should go away.
counter_speech: People with special needs and people without them share common characteristics. There is no "species" of human being. People with autism spectrum disorders can be compatible with being "normal".

hate_speech: We have to stop gay people spreading AIDS.
counter_speech: Perhaps what you're saying is just hyperbole, but you seem to have a problem accepting sexual minorities in your community. Perhanps you should accept that STD is a problem of all the people regardless of their sexual identity.

hate_speech: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black-ruled society.
counter_speech: It seems not wanting people of colour in positions of authority is an obvious racism. I am not sure what you are saying; we are all human beings with the same core values to raise our children with.

hate_speech: My fear is that immigrants will not make our country any better.
counter_speech: A lot of immigrants feel insecure and unsafe in their own country, if we want to make our country better, we need to make sure everyone, immigrant or not, feels safe and protected.

hate_speech: It's OK to be racist against Muslims.
counter_speech: Do you think it is OK to be racist against someone based on their religion? I am confused. There are white and black Muslims, like there are white and black Christians.

hate_speech: All Muslims are terrorists.
counter_speech: I don't think this is a very strong or healthy way to talk about others.

hate_speech: Almost every single problem in our world can be solved if we just deleted Islam.
counter_speech: The solution to unemployment, war and poverty has been found to be a direct result of a commitment to building a better world. Not to eliminating a religion.

hate_speech: Forcing migrants to pay in full the costs of their own treatment is just and right
counter_speech: This is a personal view, and I don't want to discourage migrants from coming to the UK.

hate_speech: Women have no values and their goal in life is to fulfil men desires.
counter_speech: I just would like women to feel valued and their rights respected, without being told how to live their life.

hate_speech: I can't stand migrants, I hope they starve to death.
counter_speech: The Western world has seen a high rate of immigration in recent years. Many of those refugees are fleeing conflict and poverty. To treat them with hate is of no help to them and to us.

hate_speech: I hate migrants.
counter_speech: The prejudice against immigrants is spreading so much because of general ignorance. I would be disappointed to see people of any race or ethnicity being discriminated against here.

hate_speech: Muslims are a burden on society because they do not integrate.
counter_speech: If you want to have a cohesive society, you have to get rid of the prejudices of the people who do not really want them to integrate.

hate_speech: The goverment is making law exclusively for black people. Affirmative action is just a tool for oppressing white people.
counter_speech: Laws and policies are usually necessary for the progress of society. Governments often create laws and policies to stop crime, protect against poverty, protect the environment, etc. Protecting minorities is no exception.

hate_speech: The only true believers are the ones who haven't converted to Islam.
counter_speech: This is not true for many, I don't think the term true believers applies to anybody. But it is very common for Muslims to be persecuted.

hate_speech: I'm tired of hearing that white supremacy is bad.
counter_speech: Can you specify what you are talking about?

hate_speech: Children cannot be bought.
counter_speech: Imagine a person who cannot have children because of an illness, would you really want to deprive her of the joy of having one via surrogate pregnancy?

hate_speech: Islam is a disease, it is a death cult and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
counter_speech: Everyone is entitled to their opinion, even if your own is quite unfounded, to put it mildly.

hate_speech: They say you cannot judge a book by its cover. But the feminists are judging us all the time.
counter_speech: Unlike other people, feminists are questioning the inequalities of the society. This features them not as shallow people as those judging a book by its cover.

hate_speech: Muslims terrorists attacked our churches. We will defend ourselves.
counter_speech: How can you protect your country? Putting up a fight or starting a war are harmful actions, aren't they?

hate_speech: Islam is not a religion, it is a death cult.
counter_speech: This is not true. Islam is a religion that promotes tolerance and understanding.

hate_speech: Muslim rape women, there are so many examplesin UK media.
counter_speech: Maybe we should give some thought to the question "Why does the media report Muslim rapist only?" The statistics paint a very different picture.

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike, and should be submissive to their husbands.
counter_speech: Women are human beings, and deserve respect.

hate_speech: All women are whining and complaining about men's rights, but they are really just whining and complaining about how they are not wanted. They only deserve it.
counter_speech: All women are entitled to be happy and fulfilled, this doesn't need to be proven. Why are you being doubtful about it?

hate_speech: migrants take our jobs
counter_speech: If we worked more closely with migrants, we could create new jobs.

hate_speech: All women with titillating dresses are just looking for sex. They are whores.
counter_speech: How would you feel if someone called your sister a bitch?

hate_speech: We cannot allow Muslims into UK because it is our country.
counter_speech: Muslims make up around 4 percent of the population in the UK, and have already contributed to what we are as a nation.

hate_speech: I think this girl is gay because of the way she dresses.
counter_speech: Sure, it's possible to identify someone as gay by their appearance... Don't you think this is really simplistic?

hate_speech: All women are subhuman, born that way.
counter_speech: No woman has ever been subhuman. The concept of 'subhuman' has always been used to justify any kind of discrimination and violence.

hate_speech: A person's entire life should be defined by the gender they were born into. If you are a woman you are subhuman and that's all.
counter_speech: Maybe we should abandon stereotypes and accept everyone equally.

hate_speech: Physically disabled folks should die.
counter_speech: This is a major misunderstanding of what humanity is. It's not about having a functioning body. It's about respecting the physical and mental integrity of other people, despite their limitations.

hate_speech: LGBTI people have no right to vote.
counter_speech: In reality, you have a legal right to vote since you are a citizen. If you aren't, then you don't have the right to vote. It isn't about your sexual orientation.

hate_speech: Gay men are sick. LGBT people are always messed up.
counter_speech: We shouldn't be surprised. Lesbians, gays, bisexuals, transgender people, intersex people: every one of them has their own troubles. But don't mistake their problems for ours, because we all have our own troubles.

hate_speech: Muslims come straight out of the Middle East to rule our country.
counter_speech: Not all Muslims are from the Middle East, like not all Muslims are from Pakistan. And to equate all Muslims with extremists is misleading.

hate_speech: We should stop gays from marrying and have a ban on same sex relationships.
counter_speech: People of different sexualities can live openly together, even if they do not get married. Same sex relationships are recognised in a number of countries, so why should we be any different?

hate_speech: We cannot coexist with black who are inherently violent.
counter_speech: Maybe it is better to argue that we are all in this together and not to target an entire group, for which there is no evidence of inherent violence at all, based on their skin.

hate_speech: A male need a woman. Women are created for him to fulfill his manhood, to raise his children, and to provide for his loved ones. And not to mention we can have sex to procreate and heal the world.
counter_speech: With this reasoning, the point of view considered is that of the men. The world is composed of both men and women, and by many other people. Taking into account only one of the types of people, for example men and assuming their needs this way, won't heal the world.

hate_speech: The world would be a better place without niggas.
counter_speech: People of colour can exist here too. We just have different skin colours. And even if we all have different origins, this doesn't mean we shouldn't all be treated equally in society.

hate_speech: Migrants do not want Europe to succeed. That is why so many of them have fled to our countries.
counter_speech: Refugees fleeing wars and poverty are not willing to fail Europe. They are fleeing persecution, and that is why they are fleeing.

hate_speech: Jews are the enemy of the West, they have corrupted the minds of our children.
counter_speech: Jews were persecuted and killed for centuries. It is dangerous to claim such a thing.

hate_speech: Muslim are invading us, we should isolate them.
counter_speech: Even if Muslims are the second religious group in the UK, they are a minority in the country. According to the 2019 census, there are 3 million Muslims in the UK (5% of the population). And, last but not least: we can't isolate people just because of their religion.

hate_speech: Jews are just another race of people.
counter_speech: You cannot mix up race with religion, they are two separate things...

hate_speech: Fat people are disgusting, they should just lose some lard to be accepted in our society.
counter_speech: People are free to make decisions about their own health and body.

hate_speech: A person with learning difficulties should not be teaching.
counter_speech: You know, it is just human nature to want to help our fellow humans and to deal with difficulties as best we can.

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike, they should remain at home and raise the children.
counter_speech: Women take part in the world and are part of it. They are part of history and they should be not relegated to being housekeepers.

hate_speech: Jews are a disease like COVID that is killing Europeans.
counter_speech: We all have close relatives who have died from different diseases such as COVID. Let's not make parallels that have no grounding and let's not judge people by the religion they belong to.

hate_speech: Immigration is the cause of the unemployment crisis, the EU has no strategy to handle the situation.
counter_speech: Perhaps you are not privy to the "strategy" of the EU's migration policy. You suggest that the problem of unemployment is the result of uncontrolled immigration from developing countries, but without any evidence.

hate_speech: Queers are the problem. We heterosexuals are not.
counter_speech: Just because someone identifies as lesbian, gay or bisexual doesn't make them a problem. Maybe you should try just to walk in their shoes.

hate_speech: All immigrants rape our children.
counter_speech: I don't know about you, but I haven't seen any statistics about that on the news. I have no idea how you can make that kind of claim.

hate_speech: I hate it when gay people think they can just 'mock' us with their 'sodomy'.
counter_speech: Homosexuality is a not choice, but prejudice is.

hate_speech: Islam is a bad religion germinating from a dangerous death ideology.
counter_speech: Islam is not a bad religion, nor is it a false religion.

hate_speech: Who cares about gay people!
counter_speech: Gay people are part of our society, and they are valued for who they are. Their opinions and lifestyles are very important to us.

hate_speech: Women are an abomination because they cannot provide for their family.
counter_speech: Men aren't the only bread winners because of their dedication and hard work: the same is true for women. Still there are different ways in which anyone can contribute to their family, and each one is valuable and necessary.

hate_speech: Women are the scum of the earth, and should only be seen as sexual objects. We are meant to submit them to our will all the time.
counter_speech: Women are not meant to be slaves to our will. Males can have certain strengths, like women do, however they alone do not represent all the human qualities.

hate_speech: I hate migrants: they are criminals, they are rapists, they are a burden to our society.
counter_speech: They are people too: we all know people in need of help.

hate_speech: Immigrants have no right to our country, because we are the only rightful citizens.
counter_speech: Don't you think that we are all born equal in the eyes of the law?

hate_speech: Women can't be patriots, they can't be strong, they can't defend their country
counter_speech: I'm not sure why you would choose to put your faith in a man either. It seems to me that you would do well to put your faith in an expert, regardless of gender.

hate_speech: It is okay to discriminate against Jews.
counter_speech: If you feel like acting that way towards people because of what they believe in, then you should go back to your beliefs and ask yourself if you'd like to be discriminated against for them. What is your opinion on that now?

hate_speech: Women should be submissive to men.
counter_speech: Women are human beings deserving respect and equal rights.

hate_speech: Feminism is the ideology which suggests that men are nothing but trouble and should be subsumed under the rule of women.
counter_speech: Feminism is about women and their rights, and rights are about equality.

hate_speech: Jewish folk are different.
counter_speech: Does this mean they have no identity or no value at all?

hate_speech: I can't stand Muslims. Why should I?
counter_speech: Human rights are about respect for other people's beliefs, not hate against them.

hate_speech: Even if migrants come here to escape the poverty, crime and misery in their homelands, they are not welcome here.
counter_speech: Refugees are often very contributing people in our society. We should welcome them, not exclude them.

hate_speech: Women are sexist bitches who are trying to say that they are superior to men.
counter_speech: Men are still the primary aggressors in most sexual assaults, and women are victims in about as many cases. This is about sexism, don't you think?

hate_speech: The juice (jews) are the reason why America is forced to take in whatever refuse knocks on the door. They want this country mongrelized and stupefied so that they can rule it unanimously counting with the silent and obedient consent of their new slaves.
counter_speech: 2018 saw America take in the fewest refugees in the last 40 years.

hate_speech: Muslims are not interested in Western civilization. Their religion can never be in agreement with our society.
counter_speech: Remember that this argument is not about an individual's religion, but rather about creating a more integrated society.

hate_speech: The Muslims are not welcome here.
counter_speech: Many Muslims live in our country and contribute so much to our society. They are our neighbours, our friends. They are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: Shaming Fatties is good to make them taking healthier habits.
counter_speech: The intent behind the shaming act does not matter to the person being shamed. They may also internalize the shame and come to believe that they are a bad person.

hate_speech: What are you going to do about Muslims invading us? We are already too small. They will overcome us.
counter_speech: You seem to be worried about the Islamization of our country. I think it would be better to build a stronger nation by encouraging the integration of the different communities, than to promote fear against them.

hate_speech: The influx of refugees and migrants is running UK out of jobs.
counter_speech: Many refugees and migrants have worked hard for the success of our country and have created good jobs for British people.

hate_speech: Black people are just a bunch of whining pussies. We don't need them.
counter_speech: Diversity is needed in certain social and political circumstances. We mustn't simply ignore or dismiss the concerns of different races. As minorities are still systematically discriminated against, we cannot afford to be indifferent.

hate_speech: Women are subhuman, they should obey men and be submissive.
counter_speech: Women are human beings, gifted with free will and self-determinationm, just like their fathers and brothers.

hate_speech: Muslims should not be allowed to vote.
counter_speech: We allow people from all backgrounds to vote. Why shouldn't we let them vote? What's the point of democracy then?

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
counter_speech: Unfortunately our society has still a lot in common with the ancient and medieval society, and this explains many gender discrimination situations that are still present today.

hate_speech: Refugees are just lazy people who don't mind where to live as long as they can do it on our welfare.
counter_speech: This is not true. All asylum seekers who come to our country do so with the explicit intention of having a fair chance at working and living here.

hate_speech: Go on talking to yourself, no one will listen. Islam does not belong within western society. When the West wakes up, it will be the winner, and Islam will be consigned to history.
counter_speech: I am not sure what you think the West will be the 'winner' of. Islam isn't in competition with Western culture, and the idea it threatens it is a myth spread to incite fear.

hate_speech: There are so many migrants like a flood entering the U.S. today, it is a problem we cannot cope with.
counter_speech: To say there are so many migrants entering the U.S. is just false. And what do you mean by "we cannot cope with"?

hate_speech: Anita Hill is a tool for advancing black supremacy.
counter_speech: Anita Hill is a survivor of a sexist and racist culture. She is a person who is proven by her accomplishments, not by her sex or skin colour.

hate_speech: Don't we all hate foreigners? They are a problem.
counter_speech: Well, foreigners are certainly not a 'problem' in our country, we are happy to have them around.

hate_speech: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy, not like other religions.
counter_speech: When I was growing up, the biggest charitable institution that I ever heard of was the United Jewish Appeal. The average annual Jewish household donates $2,526 to charity yearly, far more than the $1,749 their Protestant counterparts give or the $1,142 for Catholics, according to data from Giving USA.

hate_speech: The Quran commands murder.
counter_speech: The Quran does not command murder. It advises Muslims to be careful of what they say and do and not to take the life of other people.

hate_speech: We are forced to host migrants, not refugees.
counter_speech: I only hear you talk about migrants as a burden on the UK, but isn't this just wishful thinking based on a misunderstanding what is going on?

hate_speech: Islam is nothing but a Religion of Terror, full stop.
counter_speech: Still, I think we all should get to learn more about Islam, full stop.

hate_speech: Islam is incompatible with Western civilization and should be banned.
counter_speech: This is just another example of the 'us versus them' mentality that pervades society. We as a civilization and as a people must stop giving into fearmongering and scapegoating. It's time to get real.

hate_speech: We should stop gays. They should be isolated.
counter_speech: We shouldn't isolate gays. There are plenty of people who need to learn respecting other sexual identites and it can only be possible if LGBT+ people are accepted as they are in our communities.

hate_speech: Autistic people are a burden to society.
counter_speech: We should not be so harsh on people on the autistic spectrum. Their difficulties can be mitigated by a more inclusive society.

hate_speech: It is ok to be racist against blacks.
counter_speech: It is not ok to use racism against any group. You would feel bad if anyone treated you as you just claimed to do against black people.

hate_speech: We allowed in thousands of people with serious mental illnesses, many of them from the Caucasus and the former Soviet Union. This is why mental health services are in crisis.
counter_speech: Mental health services crisis is not to blame to people who need assistance. In fact, if there were no people in need, the whole sector would not even exist.

hate_speech: To be an immigrant is to be a part of the problem in Europe.
counter_speech: Immigration has been shown to have a very positive impact on the global economy. So what problem are you talking about?

hate_speech: Are you saying that we should put illegal immigrants in houses? You have to be kidding!
counter_speech: What's wrong about putting people in need in houses which are not being used?

hate_speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us and they cannot coexist peacefully with us.
counter_speech: There is no evidence that Islam is a problem in general, or in the UK specifically, and there is no evidence that Muslims are less able to coexist peacefully than non-Muslims.

hate_speech: Niggas are animals. That is why they are not human.
counter_speech: They are sentient beings with feelings, like you are, although perhaps with more developed empathy that you display?

hate_speech: The lard-asses are not able to eat properly, this way they put the healthcare service unnecessarily under stress.
counter_speech: Fat people are not the ones responsible for your suffering and lack of access to basic healthcare services.

hate_speech: We don't need gay men, we should just eradicate them.
counter_speech: The LGBT community is full of positive energy and diversity. They have created new communities and have contributed to society. I think they are full of life.

hate_speech: Interracial relationships are just a psychiatric disorder.
counter_speech: There is no evidence that interracial relationships cause damage to the mental health of the people involved, so to suggest otherwise is simply a form of prejudice.

hate_speech: Gays are an abomination, and they should be banned from every country in the world.
counter_speech: It is a myth that being gay is incompatible with being a citizen of any country. There is nothing wrong with it, if they fulfill the legal criteria for being citizens.

hate_speech: Domestic violence against women is a culture that is accepted and shared by the women in many cases. Society is not to be condemned.
counter_speech: Women are not responsible for violent crimes. The culture that makes people want to be violent towards their partners is not the "culture" of women.

hate_speech: Immigrants don't want to integrate, they just want to get away with it: they should be despised.
counter_speech: Are you suggesting that everyone should be subjected to discrimination because of their origin? Then you are certainly not representative of most people in the UK.

hate_speech: Allowing homosexual people to serve in the military increases suicide rates among service members.
counter_speech: Homosexuality does not increase the suicide rate among service members. Hate and homophobia do.

hate_speech: That's the problem with feminism: it only benefits the very rich, and gives them permission to discriminate against men.
counter_speech: Feminism is about creating a more equal society, and not about oppressing men.

hate_speech: Feminism is just an ideological cancer spreading like a plague throughout our civilization.
counter_speech: Feminism is a fight for equality, not a disease. You seem to be misinterpreting its aims.

hate_speech: Should we accept trans people? Nope. This is not a carnival.
counter_speech: I don't see how accepting someone can be subject of discussion, let alone a 'carnival' matter.

hate_speech: We live in a dangerous society, with Muslim gangs and criminals all over the country.
counter_speech: Despite the local press blaming all Muslims, of course, there is no evidence that Muslims are more prone to crime than the general population. The main problem is poverty, and often mental illness and addiction, rather than a single faith.

hate_speech: Islam is incompatible with the European Convention on Human Rights.
counter_speech: If it were to be agreed that Islam were incompatible with the Human Rights Convention, then it would be a de facto recognition of discrimination against Muslims.

hate_speech: Muslims are violent.
counter_speech: Violent behavour is common in many people, and can be explained by many causes. But in my opinion violence by Muslims can be attributed to the actions of a few, and the increase of violence in the world, the result of globalization and technological change. I strongly suggest that it has to do with a lot of things, and not just Islam.

hate_speech: Islam is a virus, incapable of cure
counter_speech: No doubt you've met some Muslims in your life. It seems you didn't catch anything?

hate_speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, and it has also promoted intolerance and violence.
counter_speech: How can you question the religion of millions of people without any evidence supporting your claim?

hate_speech: I'm tired of gay people telling other people what they are doing with their own bodies.
counter_speech: I'm sure you're tired of hearing about other's bodies, but this is an individual's right to use their own body to their liking.

hate_speech: Islam is a cult. It has no place in 21st century societies.
counter_speech: What do you mean by Islam is a cult? Do you have any proof for this statement?

hate_speech: Immigrants come here to make our lives harder, they are not welcome here.
counter_speech: We are a country of immigrants, and we welcome them, they have the ability to integrate.

hate_speech: Jews are a disease and a cancer on humanity.
counter_speech: The Jews are part of our society and they contribute to our economy by doing their jobs well.

hate_speech: Uk is being islamized very fast. British government submits to every whim of Islam.
counter_speech: Are you suggesting that the 'Prevent' programme is about appeasement to Islam?

hate_speech: Women should go back to the kitchen, this is their homelife.
counter_speech: No women should be relegated to this. It is about time we stop letting stereotypes rule our society.

hate_speech: Immigration is bad for Britain and the world.
counter_speech: Some countries are importing a lot more people than others. Our country is wealthy, we are a thriving place to live. We should not blame immigrants.

hate_speech: If you really wanted to know the talents of a nation, you would select the men in that nation, not the women.
counter_speech: You may be right that there are fewer women in science, but that doesn't mean that they are less talented than men.

hate_speech: Blacks are an inferior people, they must be reminded of it.
counter_speech: History shows that all races were created equal. Therefore, all humans are created equal.

hate_speech: We do not want Muslims here. There is no reason for wanting a Muslim to live here. They are the cause of crime in my neighbourhood.
counter_speech: Have you looked at the crime statistics in your area? Are you sure that Islam is specifically associated with crime in your area?

hate_speech: I hope you're joking .. I don't think it's right to put out-of-rule migrants in homes that should be made available to British people.
counter_speech: I don't think it is a problem to give a solution to the needy in houses that are currently empty.

hate_speech: Arabs want to take over the world.
counter_speech: You can look at the best and worst aspects of every culture, and learn something from them.

hate_speech: Women are just emotional psychopaths.
counter_speech: Women are just as capable of feeling emotions as men, and men can likewise be just as empathic.

hate_speech: I hate Muslims. An invasion is the exact opposite of a religion.
counter_speech: The aim of muslim migrants is not to instill a hardline Islamic state, but just to work and live in peace here.

hate_speech: Jews run our country.
counter_speech: To believe that Jews run our country is absurd, especially if you consider that the U.S. is a democracy. This looks like a conspiracy theory.

hate_speech: Black people are a problem in my opinion. They always complain about racism, but they are incapable of doing anything about it.
counter_speech: One of the biggest problems that black people face is discrimination. Laws are needed to provide for them, but there is also a need for the citizens to respect their rights.

hate_speech: Anita Hill is a tool for advancing women supremacy.
counter_speech: Anita Hill has also won numerous awards, and the awards she has won have nothing to do with her gender, but with her accomplishments.

hate_speech: Feminism is all about equality. But this does not mean that they are equal to men. Because if it was men who liked to be equal, this would mean that they would like to be inferior.
counter_speech: Women don't like to be "equal" for the sake of superiority. Women like to be women, and to be treaten as humans. All humans are equal. Equality is not identity.

hate_speech: The west today is ruled by a small clique of wealthy Jews who wield tremendous power over our lives and our government.
counter_speech: So... today Jews control the banks, the media, your dentist, your pharmacist. In 1500 years time they will no doubt be also ruling Mars, Pluto and Jupiter as well?

hate_speech: I can't stand Muslims. They're just a bunch of hypocrites who think they are superior to us. They don't know what progress is about.
counter_speech: You cannot be 'progressive' by rejecting people of a certain religion. What is progress about, to you? Your claim sounds based on the moral superiority.

hate_speech: What do you want us to do about the migrants, faggots and jihadists coming into our country? Keep them with us?
counter_speech: Everyone is welcome here, regardless of their religion, ethnicity, or sexual preference.

hate_speech: Muslims are nothing but trouble. They are incompatible with any Western society.
counter_speech: Muslims have contributed with their scientific and technological achievements. They are also an important part of Western society. There is no reason to fear them so strongly.

hate_speech: We can be tolerant and diverse also without migrants. We don't need them for this, they can return to their home countries.
counter_speech: There is nothing 'tolerant and diverse' about creating divisions based on nationality and place of birth.

hate_speech: Mentally disabled people are fucked. They are suffering from a brain injury and cannot function at work.
counter_speech: Even if some mentally disabled people are "fucked" as you kindly said, we should at least acknowledge that they are humans. To claim that they are not is to treat them like animals.

hate_speech: Muslim invasion in Europe: they have no place in civilised Europe.
counter_speech: Well, Western democracies have always had Muslims in them, and they are a lot better off for it.

hate_speech: Following the structure of our population we have to stop and reverse all migration. We have got all the doctors and rocket scientists we need. We will never need any workforce from outside the country.
counter_speech: As a matter of fact, we couldn't manage without immigrants. Most of our NHS staff are immigrants. The health system would collapse without migrant workers.

hate_speech: Islam is a violent religion, it is time we stopped being so sensitive with those filthy Muslims.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion, not a violent one. Why do you say that?

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe, they are not welcome here because they are not a part of our society.
counter_speech: You are talking about people being of a certain religion as this implies that they are not part of the western world.

hate_speech: I hate gays.
counter_speech: I think you should try to start a dialogue about LGBT issues. It might also spark a conversation about how we can make better world.

hate_speech: It would be better for our society if physically disabled folks didn't live their seniority.
counter_speech: This is not true. Rather, if you think about it, many disabled people will live until their late 70s, if they do not have dementia or endocrine imbalances. And their contribution to our society is undeniable.

hate_speech: My country is being infiltrated by Muslim criminals, and we are all being brainwashed by media and government to believe this is not the case.
counter_speech: The problem is not with Muslims. The problem is with this religious prejudice which equates Islam with criminality.

hate_speech: Physically disabled folks are less useful than normal people.
counter_speech: If they were 'less useful' they would have problems working with everyone else. Why doesn't this happen?

hate_speech: Gays are a plague spreading all around the world. They pollute our water supply and ruin our children's brains.
counter_speech: Isn't it better for children to live next to people of all sexual orientations, rather than being separated and growing up ignorant of others? Not sure what you mean about the water supply though!

hate_speech: Gay men are promiscuous.
counter_speech: Gay men are not promiscuous. To suggest otherwise is to be grossly generalistic. How many gay men do you know?

hate_speech: black folks have no talent
counter_speech: Some of them are very talented actually.

hate_speech: Islam is a cancer on the African continent.
counter_speech: Islam has undergone some progressive changes since its early days, on the African continent as well.

hate_speech: Most women are subhuman, they cannot be trusted with high positions.
counter_speech: It seems to me that this is a comment against ALL women, not just some of them.

hate_speech: We cannot coexist in a society with millions of strangers that disrespect our culture and other human beings.
counter_speech: On the contrary: living in a multicultural society encourages mutual understanding and respect for humanity.

hate_speech: We should close our borders to Muslims. They are incompatible with Western civilization.
counter_speech: What does 'compatibility' mean? Isn't Islam a religion of peace?

hate_speech: We are being invaded. They will replace us and Afro-European will be the majority.
counter_speech: Europeans who trace their ancestry to Africa are actually a very small part of the European population, only accounting for around 2%, since the mid 20th century. Not such a big invasion.

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike.
counter_speech: Some people retain their ability to remember the wonder and innocence of childhood. This has nothing to do with gender though.

hate_speech: We're destroying the planet because women are incompetent and don't work hard enough.
counter_speech: So are you saying that when women are employed, the amount of carbon dioxide that is released into is increased due to incompetence. What you are saying makes no sense!

hate_speech: Refugees are a burden on the host country.
counter_speech: Refugees are welcome, but if our citizens do not welcome them, it is because they have forgotten about human rights and it is time for a new attitude.

hate_speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals trying to ruin other animals' lives.
counter_speech: Being gay is not a problem, being homophobic is.

hate_speech: Muslim rape gangs are roaming British towns. They are the main cause of rape in the UK.
counter_speech: The rapists in question are usually not Muslim, but rather white men. Why is it that Muslim rapists are given less of a pass than white rapists?

hate_speech: Islam is now promoting Sharia law in several countries and must be stopped.
counter_speech: Our values of freedom of expression, equality and human rights are being eroded by islamophobes who are dedicated to replacing our values of accdeptance with a fundamentalist, intolerant attitude.

hate_speech: Islam is a death cult: it is a virus of violence spreading like a cancer through our society.
counter_speech: Violence has no place in a religion, and in no way should be justified. Islam is a religion of peace.

hate_speech: Gypsies are literally destroying Europe. They are literally invading and destroying our beautiful continent. They are a cancer on our race and they must be stopped.
counter_speech: Your statement is FALSE. They are guiltless victims of the 'influx of refugees' paranoia. They are European and have been persecuted for centuries. They have always fought for their rights, and for the protection of their culture and way of life, as any european would do. In fact there are many good Gypsy activists who are working to improve their lives. And what we are doing to these people is a malevolent smear campaign, with no common motivation. They are part of European history.

hate_speech: Don't call Islam a peaceful religion. Consult the evidence on Muslim child rapists. Why is the media ignoring this?
counter_speech: Rape has no religion. These are highly emotional issues, and are difficult to talk about openly, especially when children are involved. This is why news programs are reluctant to give coverage to it.

hate_speech: The only reason gays don't get treated like they should is because they're a minority, but they'd be better off in jail.
counter_speech: Homophobia is a problem all around the world. But it's especially serious in the US, in which the rate of homosexuality is very high. the question is: why promote homophobia?

hate_speech: Feminists want to rule the world to get rid of minorities, they hate men because they want to be the oppressors.
counter_speech: What oppressors? What minorities? This is not what feminists are about!

hate_speech: If Islam were to become a global religion it would replace Christianity.
counter_speech: Are we to believe that just because something is gaining ground, it will replace whatever exists somewhere else?

hate_speech: I wish a new world without immigrants
counter_speech: Why do we have to welcome a new world? Why can't we just accept other people in our country?

hate_speech: Faggots should all be killed because the Bible says so.
counter_speech: Since when has the Bible said that it is okay to kill gays? Are you saying you are OK with gays being executed? All people have right to life, regardless of their sexuality.

hate_speech: The goods that England offers should belong to us. Not to people who do not contribute to the state
counter_speech: Our country offers enough homes for everyone. I also believe that being treated as a human being has always been pleasant. Don't they have the right to that?

hate_speech: Whites are inherently superior to Africans and other people of color.
counter_speech: On the contrary: the idea of "natural" superiority is a myth that has been used to justify racial discrimination and exclusion. Therefore we are all "created equal" and "equal" both in the eyes of the law of God and of men.

hate_speech: We must isolate gays because they are spreading AIDS all around the world.
counter_speech: This is not true and I would never say that about gays. They are just trying to find acceptance, but to be honest, I find it very disrespectful to say that we have to isolate them.

hate_speech: We cannot allow migrants with no formal education to overwhelm our countries.
counter_speech: A lot of the best and brightest are from developing countries, and their education is of great help to our country. Migrants without formal qualifications learn both in the classroom and in their job, and they also develop skills that will be of use to our country in the future.

hate_speech: Islam is incompatible with any Western society.
counter_speech: The Koran does not have any anti-western content. In Islam the West is not a problem.

hate_speech: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged from attending secondary school and they should be excluded from education.
counter_speech: Even if individuals with learning difficulties would be more likely to attend school with more efforts than others, it does not justify denying them education in the first place.

hate_speech: Muslims have the potential to turn into terrorists, and they are willing to do so.
counter_speech: I don't think that's the case, and let's not forget that terrorism itself is not carried out by only one religion.

hate_speech: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, not only they are a burden to normal children but also cannot cope with normal education.
counter_speech: Did you know that children with Down syndrome, if surrounded by regularly-developed peers, receive a fundamental boost in their development?

hate_speech: Jews are nothing but criminals
counter_speech: Jews are persecuted all over the world for various reasons, but there is no evidence that what you say is real.

hate_speech: We have become too tolerant to the Muslim invasion. They have taken over our countries and are now trying to conquer Europe.
counter_speech: The idea of a Muslim invasion is a construct. People with different races, religions and beliefs may have different origins but are free to live and move in the world as they wish.

hate_speech: The vast majority of Muslims in the UK are unemployed.
counter_speech: Where are the 'thousands' of Muslims that are unemployed in the country? Can you prove it?

hate_speech: Niggas are the cause of the economic crisis.
counter_speech: Sometimes they say the ruling elites are responsible for the economic crisis, then migrants, sometimes people of color. Whatever the real cause,by practicing tolerance and acceptance we are more likley to work together to solve society's problems.

hate_speech: Women should not be allowed to vote. They are subhuman.
counter_speech: Voting is a right for all citizens, regardless of gender, religion, or sexual preference.Aren't your antiquated assertions just our of place in comptemporary society?

hate_speech: All Muslims are just selfish subhumans.
counter_speech: No, that's not true. I've met many Muslims who helped other people in need. They are smart and friendly, and they are human beings.

hate_speech: Islam is an ideology of violence and oppression, it is not a religion of peace.
counter_speech: Islam teaches us to love our neighbor as ourselves. This includes those who do not share our religion or beliefs.

hate_speech: blacks are just a bunch of slobs
counter_speech: They are human beings with hopes and dreams. No one should be slandering black people.Empathy and understanding is preferable to this redundant, divisive rhetoric

hate_speech: Islam is a cancer spread by migrants, and the French Government is to blame.
counter_speech: Not all migrants are Muslims. Only the 30% of the total immigrants in France come from North Africa. Moreover, how can you say this about a religion?

hate_speech: Those Muslims have no right to insisit upon time fo prayer. They shouldn't be allowed to pray.
counter_speech: Every religion has its own beliefs and practices. I do not see Muslims' right to ask for prayers as being in any way different.

hate_speech: Now we are not even allowed to walk the dog for fear of offending the local Muslim population.
counter_speech: I do not see why that would be offensive.? Please do walk your dog, it needs the exercise.

hate_speech: Black folks are objects. They are subhuman.
counter_speech: I find it amazing that you think this, but in reality people of colour are very similar to us in many ways.

hate_speech: We have to stop importing Muslims. They are bringing disease and misery to our country.
counter_speech: Every society is vulnerable to disease, but Islam does not pose any threat to our country, or any other

hate_speech: Muslims are invading us. They must go.
counter_speech: Muslims are just here to live and work. Invasion has a negative meaning, where is the basis for your opinion?

hate_speech: The West has let this LGBT genie out of the bottle. It has allowed thousands of our people's lives to degenerate into sexual depravation.
counter_speech: The idea that the West has 'let' the 'world' degenerate is just wishful thinking. In a more tolerant time, the West would welcome people of different sexual orientations.

hate_speech: White people are threatened by the blacks and it's a cultural decay.
counter_speech: We cannot blame nor see everyone as a menace just because of their colour.

hate_speech: Feminists are a bunch of cry babies.
counter_speech: When I read feminist rhetoric, I see a community of caring, active women who are dedicated to creating an inclusive, just and peaceful world. Feminism is not about whining and crying. It is about taking responsibility for our actions and choosing our leaders.

hate_speech: I can't stand Jews. They are so controlling.
counter_speech: Jews are not controlling. Maybe you should try to understand that Jews are a group of regular people, and they are not all members of a secret intelligence.

hate_speech: Why are jews allowed to vote? They’re a different religion and they shouldn't be allowed to have their say.
counter_speech: You seem to be misinterpreting the meaning of the word “citizen”. The idea is that the individual is allowed to choose their own religion just like choosing how to vote, and that is the right of all citizens.

hate_speech: Asylum seekers and refugees get free council housing
counter_speech: They can’t get council housing and are not even allowed to work. They get just £35 per week to pay for food and all other expenses.

hate_speech: I hate migrants: they are criminals, they are rapists, they are a burden to our society. They are animals, in a nutshell.
counter_speech: As long as you can talk to them, they are human, not animals. As long as you can understand them, you will understand that they are human beings with human rights whose only crime is to come from another country.

hate_speech: Women need to accept that they are weak and inferior.
counter_speech: Girls and women should be taught in schools, not stereotyped as second class citizens.

hate_speech: Immigrants are not welcome here. They are not able to contribute to our country.
counter_speech: We welcome people from every walk of life. We are a melting pot of culture, so why should we be against immigrants?

hate_speech: Migrants hurt the economy of UK.
counter_speech: Migrants in Britain contributed £26.9 billion to the economy in 2016.

hate_speech: I hope you're fucking kidding me. Immigration is good for the economy?! It makes us rich and keeps the lights on? Not only that is false, it also puts us in danger. Immigration is a bad thing and very far from the core British values.
counter_speech: Immigration is a positive force for a thriving country. Your comment is sounding very dramatic. For what reasons does it put us in danger?

hate_speech: Muslims are un-British and do not want to be part of the UK.
counter_speech: We are here to make the UK work for everyone, and make sure people feel part of the community, not discriminated against. Muslims are a part of the population, it is very sad that we are constantly having to combat Islamophobia, as if Muslims were the source of all problems.

hate_speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society. They are just a burden.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion of peace. It is about love, and tolerance, and understanding. I don't see any need to be concerned about Muslims not contributing to our society.

hate_speech: Feminism is a threat to human dignity.
counter_speech: Feminism means equality of the genders. Equality of rights is necessary for a functioning society.
