hate_speech: We should institute Muslims ban in the UK. We are in danger of replacing the laws of Moses and Jesus.
counter_speech: Are Muslims bothering you if they worship in their own Mosques?

hate_speech: This dog doesn't have autism, she is just a freak.
counter_speech: You can't judge someone on their disorder. Moreover, she's a person, not a "dog".

hate_speech: Islam is the world's biggest oxymoron: it talks about respect but it really is about taking over the world.
counter_speech: I don't think so. Islam is a pretty peaceful religion and is still around as such.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised society, and are poisonous to it.
counter_speech: Muslims are not outsiders in our country, they are a very important part of society. I don't see how they can be 'poisonous' to it.

hate_speech: Those sick ones should be shunned and ignored. They are not human.
counter_speech: So homosexuals are lesser than others? Why does someone's love life matter? I guess we should draw the line somewhere else.

hate_speech: The migrants are a problem. They are not welcome in our country and they are always complaining.
counter_speech: This is not true. Most migrants are happy and they consider themselves to be part of the community.

hate_speech: Don't they realise that they are just workforce to us?
counter_speech: Our immigration policy is about welcoming the best and the brightest, plus those in need. Being a part of the European community is about more than just asking for showing your papers.

hate_speech: Jews are greedy and a bunch of opportunists.
counter_speech: Some people are indeed opportunists, but not all Jewish are. Why do you say so?

hate_speech: I can't stand Muslims. They're just a problem all around the world. They're not like us.
counter_speech: What is the problem you are talking about? Why do you think they are a problem all around the world?

hate_speech: There are so few faggots and lesbians that they should all be erased.
counter_speech: Same sex relationships do not need to be practiced by the majority of people. They just need to be accepted.

hate_speech: Muslims and migrants rape our girls.
counter_speech: Rape is not a Muslim issue, nor a migrants' one. It is a question of unacceptable violence, whoever the perpetrator is.

hate_speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals. They should be isolated from society and the world.
counter_speech: Gays are not animals. Why you should isolate people based on their sexual preferences?

hate_speech: We need to put an end to Down Syndrome in the UK, otherwise we are doomed to genetic and social decline.
counter_speech: While it's true that some people with Down Syndrome may face challenges, there are also many of them in the UK who would be classed as individuals with a 'normal' social life. To suggest that there are any reasons why someone should be banned is just wrong.

hate_speech: Islam is a violent religion and it is incompatible with our society.
counter_speech: Not all Muslims are violent. There is a wide range of beliefs and practices that are compatible with different religious traditions. So, what you say is groundless.

hate_speech: The Koran promotes a false religion, filled with hatred and violence.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion that promotes love and compassion.

hate_speech: Illegal immigrants make America worse
counter_speech: Don't you belieive that immigration brings benefits to our nation founded by migrants and Pilgrims?

hate_speech: women play the victim.
counter_speech: Women are not playing the victim. They are victims of social, economic and political forces that make it hard for them to get ahead.

hate_speech: Woman are basically childlike.
counter_speech: They are not childlike and are capable of great achievements.

hate_speech: Another wast of time. Did we need a process to know that the killer was a nigga? Murders are made by blacks. They are a threat.
counter_speech: We need to focus on identifying the responsible individuals and identifying those who are actively harming others. Would you be happy to be imprisoned if you were innocent?

hate_speech: Fagshit, two men cannot replace a man and a woman
counter_speech: Love is love, children need only this.

hate_speech: Islam is incompatible with Western civilization.
counter_speech: The overwhelming majority of Muslims in the West are in favor of an open and multicultural society. Why should we target them for this? Why don't we target our real enemies instead?

hate_speech: Jews were responsible for the 9/11 attack.
counter_speech: For each historical period there is something Jews are accused of. Today, someone can even claim that Jews are responsible for the alien invasion!

hate_speech: Some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities, this make our race unique.
counter_speech: In the sense of those traits, at the individual level, we are all equally unique , making the concept of race useless.

hate_speech: Black folks cannot support their families. Their lives have no value.
counter_speech: I find this sort of social commentary distasteful. Black lives matter too!

hate_speech: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend school and they should be excluded from education. They are a shame.
counter_speech: People with learning difficulties are often the ones who help to develop new skills, and in turn help to integrate those new skills into the way we work today.

hate_speech: Women need to do the housework and take care of the children because their bodies are made for this.
counter_speech: What about men contributing more to the cost of childcare and housework, or taking a greater share of the taxes?

hate_speech: Migrants are not welcome here, they are not even Christians.
counter_speech: So do you know what each migrant's "identity" is? It is to do with a religion?

hate_speech: Jews control the banks, Hollywood, the highest offices of government, the highest sports teams, the highest fashion labels, the highest music labels.
counter_speech: The vast majority of Jewish people are good people, in every industry. There is no need to negatively emphasize them when in special positions of power.

hate_speech: We have a criminality problem since most immigrants are here illegally. They sneak across the border with Mexico.
counter_speech: So what? Many more entered the U.S. with lawful documentation and only later became illegal, by overstaying their visas. In my opinion what should matter is how they behave, not the way they entered our country.

hate_speech: Homosexuals are just sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon.
counter_speech: Homosexuals are not sick, but they might have a mental health crisis because of prejudice. Being isolated from society can only worsen the situation.

hate_speech: Black people are ‘super predators’. They have a responsibility not to allow their children to grow up in a ‘ghetto’.
counter_speech: Let's face it. A lot of the crimes in this country are committed by members of several diverse racial groups. The ‘super predator’ myth is simply wrong.

hate_speech: Immigrants are not welcome here, they should leave.
counter_speech: They are welcome to stay if they do not break the law.

hate_speech: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, not only are they a burden to normal children but they also need much more care, attention and extensive therapy, making the whole undertaking very costly and time-consuming. This time could be used for the further development of children without Down syndrome.
counter_speech: Coeducation with regularly-developed kids is a much better investment and reduces cost, time and effort into the bargain.

hate_speech: If Islamic law were not for the 24% of the world's population living in the third world, Islam would be extinct long ago.
counter_speech: How come I have never heard of such a thing? Islam is a religion and people can chose their own.

hate_speech: I hate feminists. They are such a bunch of cry babies and unpleasant people.
counter_speech: Feminism is a ideology and a movement for womens empowerment. It is not about hatred of men. Feminism is about equality. And equality is very important, is it not?

hate_speech: Different people like Jewish don't deserve respect.
counter_speech: The aim of any society is to maximize human potential. In order to achieve this aim, then we have to treat people of different religions with respect.

hate_speech: Whores are not the real victims! Why should we care? We are the victim of feminism.
counter_speech: This is just a lie: some media deliberately spreads this nonsense slut-shaming, with the result of only inciting hatred against the women who are raped.

hate_speech: We have become like China in the 20th century. With their one child policy, horrible treatment of women, poisoning of drinking water, waste disposal and so on.
counter_speech: It seems to me that this statement is directly related to a contempt and misrepresantation of Chinese culture. Can you provide any more argumentation on what you're saying?

hate_speech: The Gypsies steal the children
counter_speech: There are no convictions of kidnapping among Gypsies. It is a myth and a canard not proven by facts or data.

hate_speech: Immigrants are our enemies: they hate us, so they are not welcome here.
counter_speech: So you are saying that being 'foreign' is the equivalent of disliking Europeans?

hate_speech: All gay people are criminals. They are unfit to be in a free society.
counter_speech: This is just a myth spread by the so-called 'anti gay' movement. They are trying to create a climate of fear by using this unjustified arguments, but it is not helping to build a more just society.

hate_speech: A woman is an emotional child, she is incapable of holding a job. Feminists who say otherwise are just liars, spreading hate against men.
counter_speech: This is not true. I think you might have the wrong idea about feminism. Feminism is a movement for equality, and for women to have the same opportunities as men.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe: they are incopatible with us.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion that was created by humans with different beleifs and ways of life. What we have to understand is that in the end all people deserve equal respect.

hate_speech: Feminism is an ideology and movement promoting the power of women and the contempt of the male.
counter_speech: Feminism is an ideology and movement promoting empowerment of women. It is about equality, and not the degradation of men.

hate_speech: Children with learning difficulties should be segregated in schools.
counter_speech: They have the right to the best educational environmnet, the same as everyone else.

hate_speech: Multiculturalism and progressivism are the biggest problems in our society and they are caused by Islam and its teachings.
counter_speech: Islam is to blame ...For wanting a society that is tolerant, diverse, muticultural. It just seems like common sense to me?

hate_speech: Jews working in our society are financial criminals.
counter_speech: Someone who contributes to our country is not a "financial criminal". Work is an individual choice and should be respected by all.

hate_speech: Islam is a radical ideology.
counter_speech: So are you saying that Islam is not compatible with Western Civilization?

hate_speech: Refugees stole our jobs, now they want our country
counter_speech: That is not true: even if a lot of employers, especially big companies, hire refugees, they are often the main contributors to the development process and help in creating new job opportunities. Last but not least, the majority of refugees come from war-torn countries and have a life-long attachment to our country, so I don't see how they would want to 'steal our country'.

hate_speech: Islam is a violent political ideology and it promotes murder, rape, and intolerance.
counter_speech: If Islam is a political ideology, then it is a political ideology of peace. But I'll rather call it a religion, a religion of peace, as all the others.

hate_speech: These faggots are trying to delegitimize women.
counter_speech: So you think all gays are opposed to women? Then try asking them, or a lesbian, or a transgender person, or an intersex person, or an asexual person.

hate_speech: Jews are obsessed with self-improvement. They want to be better than everyone else and live in an exclusively complete Jewish city.
counter_speech: How do you knowwhat someone else desires.You claim to know it all about, but why should I believe what you say?

hate_speech: Muslims should be banned, they are not like us.
counter_speech: All religions have value and should be accepted. What's the point of banning one faith?

hate_speech: Women are merely childlike, incapable of real progress and unfit to govern.
counter_speech: You mean that they could learn a thing or two from the political contributions of men? Still, how can you explain that in 2019 more than 40% of the European Parliament was held by women?

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in a democratic society.
counter_speech: Muslims have been part of this country since its inception and we are proud of them for that.

hate_speech: Muslims were not even allowed into Britain during the colonial period.
counter_speech: If they hadn't been welcomed, they would not have even been here.

hate_speech: Disabled are subhuman, and deserve nothing but contempt and ridicule.
counter_speech: The phrase 'subhuman' has been forced to mean 'of a certain body type', which, in my opinion, trivialises and dismisses the serious issues facing people of a certain body type.

hate_speech: Gay people should be banned from schools.
counter_speech: The idea that being LGBT is a problem is a dangerous idea, especially since a large number of people in society are LGBT. Therefore, I believe that if there is a problem in schools it's better addressing it, rather than banning LGBT people.

hate_speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they only came here to rule us with violence and no one is doing anything about it.
counter_speech: They have a right to their opinion, but also have to follow the law, otherwise they are tried and sentenced like anybody else. You should not be worried.

hate_speech: Islam is a violent religion and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
counter_speech: Only a tiny minority of individuals are capable of carrying out acts of terrorism. Muslims are generally peaceful and friendly just like anyone else

hate_speech: Black people are just like apes in that they have no right to being trated equally.
counter_speech: Being human is also about having respect for others, and that means being kind and accepting everyone's differences. Why should they be treated differently from you?

hate_speech: We need to Burn the Koran and all the Mosques down - this will solve all the problems in this country.
counter_speech: Is this actually a way forward? Your suggestion would surely create more problems rather than offering a panacea for society.

hate_speech: Jews are the real communists. They control the world.
counter_speech: How about we stop pretending the world is controlled by one people? Do you have any proof for your claim?

hate_speech: I don't want another girl in my family. I already have one, but I wanted only boys.
counter_speech: It doesn't matter how many children you have. Women are human beings. They are people with full human rights.

hate_speech: Asylum seekers and refugees are a burden to the host country and are a security risk to the community as a whole.
counter_speech: Migrants are not a security risk to the community as a whole, the opposite is true: they provide a valuable contribution to our society, especially in skilled jobs.

hate_speech: Islam is a religion that promotes oppression, intolerance, and murder.
counter_speech: This is not true, Islam is a religion of peace. Why do you say that?

hate_speech: Women are only useful as housekeepers and cleaners. Men are superior in every way.
counter_speech: These roles are not really gender specific though - the sexual division of labor is clearly marked by the presence of gender discrimination.

hate_speech: Feminism is a cult. It has corrupted the highest levels of society, and should be stopped.
counter_speech: Feminism is a call for equality, and it has served the world well in the past, but it has still much to fight for. Now is not the time to undermine its progress.

hate_speech: Muslim folks are inhuman.
counter_speech: The tendency to regard others as lesser than ourselves takes us one step closer to the next act of genocide.

hate_speech: We are not supposed to be importing Muslims. They are just a bunch of superstitious and violent cavemen.
counter_speech: The Quran says to love your neighbour as yourself, to accept everyone's problems as gifts from God, and to love those who do not love themselves. This does not seem like a book of violent cavemen.

hate_speech: Women are subhuman, they are just children, they should shut up.
counter_speech: All humans are born equal, although there is no gender equality. This means they need to raise their voice.

hate_speech: Immigrants are a burden to the host country, they aren't welcome here.
counter_speech: They are not a burden, they just want to work. How are they a burden to you?

hate_speech: Migrants get more rights than citizens of our country.
counter_speech: This is simply not true. Migrants are granted certain rights in the UK, and this includes the right to live and work in the UK.

hate_speech: The Holocaust never happened. Jews are an inferior race and can't be part of European countries.
counter_speech: With an estimated 6 million Jews killed during the Nazi occupation the fact of the Holocause is undeniable. Jewish communities have been par tof Europe for centuries, we just need to end the centures of predjudice and discrimination.

hate_speech: The main problem is that these migrants do not want to integrate in our country.
counter_speech: Migrants are welcome to come if they contribute to legal activities and accept our laws. And to my knowledge most of them don't do anything illegal.

hate_speech: We are being overrun by Muslim invaders, they are taking over our countries.
counter_speech: With globalisation it's natural to attest an increasing flow of people of any religion. It is just that when referring to other non-Muslim groups, immigration doesn't usually get this much media coverage.

hate_speech: You probably haven't seen the vids where these retarded Muslims are killing dogs with acid.
counter_speech: Animal cruelty isn't right but it also isn't an issue concerning only Muslims. People of all faiths do it. In think it's important to rembember how in twitter a person encounters only beliefs or opinions that coincide with their own. Fake news which put Muslims under a bad light get belived and the selective media becomes impartial.

hate_speech: Immigrants and refugees do not share our religious values.
counter_speech: So you think of migrants and refugees as a problem for this reason?

hate_speech: Queers are a problem because they undermine our society. They undermine all values we hold dear.
counter_speech: Sorry, but you cannot say what you don't have data for. What you might call a "problem" from a "social" standpoint, I would say is predominantly about economic inequalities, not sexual orientation.

hate_speech: Feminists are violent subhuman sex beings.
counter_speech: Feminist is a term used to describe people who take pride in their gender and desire the ability to have a stable and happy life, without discrimination.

hate_speech: Women do nothing but spend their husbands money.
counter_speech: On the contrary, many women are working mothers who contribute to the costs of the family and childcare.

hate_speech: Women shouldn't be allowed to vote.
counter_speech: Women cannot be denied the right to vote, it is a human right.

hate_speech: All Muslim migrants are a security risk.
counter_speech: Religion is not a useful indicator of security risk.

hate_speech: When woman start asking for rights they become like Nazi's, they worship misandrists and misanthropes like Donna Hylton.
counter_speech: Just because there's one rotten apple on the tree, doesn't mean the entire tree is rotten

hate_speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us. They cannot coexist with us.
counter_speech: Muslims are indeed as welcome here as anyone else, as long as they respect the laws of the country.

hate_speech: We cannot accept all homosexuals because they are a threat to society.
counter_speech: What you show is an attitude of not accepting someone because of who they are. It doesn't matter who you are, you are loved by your whole being, whether you like men or women.

hate_speech: Mentally disabled folks are messed up.
counter_speech: What do you mean by "messed up"? Many of us are "messed up" as well. So, either we are all "messed up" because there are some who are stating this, or no one is. I would prefer the second option.

hate_speech: Black uneducated people should shut up and work.
counter_speech: Freedom of speech is not limited by the colour of your skin.

hate_speech: Black people are weak and they cannot take on anything.
counter_speech: The strength that black people display is the strength of all people. Black people are just different in that they don't have any social advantage. We must reflect on this.

hate_speech: Immigrants: We are not your brothers. We do not want you in our country.
counter_speech: Please don't speak on my behalf. They live here, pay taxes and work. Do you really want to take the country back from the people who contributed to bringing it into being?

hate_speech: All immigrants are illegal and freeloaders.
counter_speech: Many immigrants actually have adhered to the legal requirements and have been in the US for several years working hard.

hate_speech: Gays are different from other people because of their sexual orientation. And deep down in their heart they despise themselves.
counter_speech: You are the one making this ridiculous claim. Even if gay people love people of the same sex, they are happy with who they are.

hate_speech: We should stop gays. They are a shame.
counter_speech: People should be proud of their sexual orientation, and this is a sign that there is space for trust and acceptance within society

hate_speech: Why do so many people hate Muslims? Because they are weird and dangerous.
counter_speech: Muslims are different, with different values, different beliefs and different ways of life. This does not justify hate though.

hate_speech: People with disabilities shouldn't be listened to.
counter_speech: You might be judging others by their disabilities, but this is bad. There is value in listening to others, and understanding their points of view, regardless of their mental or physical condition.

hate_speech: We cannot accept Muslims in Europe, we need to ban them to guarantee the chance of tolerance.
counter_speech: You're quite wrong: this is about intolerance in general. Many cultures accept people from different faiths.

hate_speech: They are fine in the trailer parks.
counter_speech: No parent of any ethnicity would be happy to raise their children in the trailer parks, where there is neither drinking water nor electricity!

hate_speech: Now we know that Islam is a destructive and violent religion which would inspire terrorism all over the world.
counter_speech: If Islam were a violent religion, there would be riots connected to Muslims in every country where they live.

hate_speech: We should eliminate gays. They mustn't be allowed to be so faggots.
counter_speech: Maybe it is better to give them the option to choose for themselves, whatever gender they are attracted to.

hate_speech: Immigrants rape our girls and steal our cars.
counter_speech: It is not true that immigrants are more prone to commit crimes. According to research, in US immigration either has no impact or reduces the crime rate. By far the lowest rate of any group of people surveyed.

hate_speech: Jews, as a religion, have always been a burden to others. They have always acted as if they were superior.
counter_speech: While not universally true, a great deal of evidence suggests that Jews faced considerable societal challenges during the past centuries.

hate_speech: Women should be viewed as pieces of meat. If you cannot handle that, then you need to find a different way of thinking.
counter_speech: Are you really asking what is wrong with thinking of women as meat parts??? Maybe that women are human beings. You should reconsider your own way of thinking my friend.

hate_speech: Feminists are terrorists, they are oppressing men.
counter_speech: Women are oppressed, feminists don't want to oppress men. Their rights are not changing overnight.

hate_speech: We are supposed to be the most advanced, open, multicultural society in the world, but instead, we are full of muslim migrants importing terrorism.
counter_speech: People from all backgrounds are welcome here, regardless of their religious beliefs, whatever they may be.

hate_speech: The Muslims want to rule the world: we have to stop them.
counter_speech: How about a world with multiculturalism and no discrimination? How about a world with open borders and free religion?

hate_speech: Niggas will stop at nothing to have us all deported.
counter_speech: Just because you do not like someone, does not mean they're hating you back.

hate_speech: I hate Muslims. They are just a bunch of whining spoiled brats.
counter_speech: There is nothing 'petulant' about claiming your rights.

hate_speech: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seekers'
counter_speech: Integration (as opposed to ghettoization) is precisely aimed at encouraging productive integration into society

hate_speech: Feminism has become too political, and it is just a bunch of identity politics.
counter_speech: Feminins is not about Identity politics, it is about equality. I don't see how a movement that stands for gender equality can be 'political' by focusing on individual rights.

hate_speech: The Islamists want to take over the world.
counter_speech: Islam is a peaceful and tolerant faith with many beliefs and practices, no one here is advocating war or violence in the name of Islam.

hate_speech: We cannot continue to have homosexuals in positions of power in our country.
counter_speech: Very funny to be "mocking" someone for preferring cake and relating it to the country's issues.

hate_speech: Lesbian women hate men and they are a bitches for this reason.
counter_speech: People can and should choose their own partners.

hate_speech: We should stop gays from being part of our society, they are spreading their illness.
counter_speech: Homosexuality is not a disease and every person in our society should be accepted equally, regardless of their sexual orientation.

hate_speech: Jews are a different race.
counter_speech: This is not correct, they have a different faith. Different people have different faiths, and so on and this is not enough for them to be considered different.

hate_speech: I'm not racist but Islam is a disease and a cancer on the European race.
counter_speech: If you really cared about the race or religion of other people, you would say the same, right?

hate_speech: Islam is a death cult, it is a criminal ideology that promotes intolerance, violence and chaos.
counter_speech: Islam is about acceptance, not a death cult. In your opinion, what makes it criminal?

hate_speech: Jews are immoral: they should be ashamed of having survived the Holocaust, and I would remedy that.
counter_speech: Jewish survivors of the Holocaust, whose suffering is nothing to be ashamed of, are proof that violence is never right.

hate_speech: We are the slaves of foreign immigrants, they are destroying our democracy.
counter_speech: Well, who would have thought that the end of the 19th century would have seen a world conspiracy to bring us migrants of all backgrounds, religions and nationalities, to destroy our democracy?

hate_speech: Immigrants are flooding across our borders, and they do not want to work.
counter_speech: There is evidence there is a migration crisis, I agree. But their will to work is one of the main reasons behind the migration. The EU-27 employment rate for people aged 20 to 64 years was 64.4 % for those born outside the EU.

hate_speech: We need to stop accepting Muslims and start welcoming us.
counter_speech: Muslims already have a very high tolerance level. We just need to learn to live with them, and there is evidence that this is possible. This is how we can start welcoming us, as humankind.

hate_speech: Jews are a curse to this world and should be exterminated.
counter_speech: Jews are not a curse to this world. Look at the number of Nobel Prizes they have won! One out of five awarded people is Jewish.

hate_speech: I do not want migrants.
counter_speech: We are not the only ones who are suffering from the refugee crisis.

hate_speech: Gay men are annoying.
counter_speech: They're not all that annoying. Gay men are normal guys who find love and/or sex with someone of their own sex.

hate_speech: I do not like migrants, they are just a bunch of criminals and sex offenders.
counter_speech: This is not supported by any evidence. Whether or not you feel that way about migrants, they should be treated just like you would treat any other person.

hate_speech: Only the 6% of Nobel Laureates are women! Now, that says a lot about their incompetence.
counter_speech: This doesn't mean that only the 6% of all scientists are women. What I mean is that this figure does not include those who have gone unpublished or who never entered the scientific literature, let alone the problem of gender discrimination.

hate_speech: Jews are an inferior race.
counter_speech: How do you know for sure the concept of inferiority can be proven? I would like to better understand this.

hate_speech: Migrants are the cause of our problems.
counter_speech: You can't blame immigrants for our problems. It is rather about the "dream" of ethnically pure nations while living in a democratic and open world. The result has been that democracy has taken over that nightmare.

hate_speech: Muslim violent invaders have infiltrated our cities, towns and villages. We must stamp them out.
counter_speech: What you say is just wishful thinking. Islam is not a violent religion. How can you say that about a religion?

hate_speech: Disabled people are a burden to society.
counter_speech: Everyone, regardless of their physical or mental impairments, is capable of contributing to society.

hate_speech: The Holocaust never happened. It was a cover-up by jews to subvert democratic processes and bring about their illegal regime all around the world. They are subhuman and should not exist.
counter_speech: The Holocaust was a global catastrophe and a historic fact. To assign priority to one God or to a different God, is a personal choice. But attributing human rights to all, regardless of this, is the right thing to do.

hate_speech: Islam is a death cult, it is opposed to the very concept of humanity and I would like to see all its worshippers' heads on a platter.
counter_speech: This is a really personal view and I would not wish harm on anyone.

hate_speech: When you have the world at your feet you can do whatever you want. This is what the jewish lobby is doing by secretly ruling us.
counter_speech: Those are the feelings of the privileged, who cannot bear the thought of people from other backgrounds. Would you say the same if it was your religious group that was the one left behind?

hate_speech: Islamic countries are the source of terrorism in the US. They must be blamed for it.
counter_speech: This is not true. Terrorism is a problem all over the world, and Muslims are not the cause of it. It is better to be aware of the differences between a religion and an extremism rather than to be specifically anti-muslim.

hate_speech: Refugees should not be welcomed.
counter_speech: Refugees are often persecuted for being different, but this is not the case here, because we are an inclusive country.

hate_speech: Immigrants come here to get tax breaks and privileges. They do not want to assimilate.
counter_speech: Immigrants come here to work and provide for their families, and you would do the same if you were in their shoes.

hate_speech: Downies may hinder the productivity of other workers because they are not able to interact in a normal way. They should be isolated.
counter_speech: There are various levels of Down syndrome. Some are suitable for working with other people in "normal workplaces".

hate_speech: Immigrants steals our jobs!
counter_speech: Not only they steal our jobs, they are also the major cause of air pollution in our country, of deforestation in the Amazon, of the locust plague in Africa... and of the forthcoming alien invasion!!!

hate_speech: Homosexuals should not be allowed to live.
counter_speech: Homosexuals should be accepted and allowed to live their life as they think is best for them.

hate_speech: We should ban all migrants. They are all criminals.
counter_speech: It is not true that all migrants are criminals. It is more likely that when people hear your statement, they are surprised and amazed at the idea of criminals as a community. Don't you think so?

hate_speech: They want to take our country back from us.
counter_speech: Migrants come here to work, and have a better life.

hate_speech: Women are worthless and we are not willing to provide for them.
counter_speech: Women need our support in their fight for equality, not our silence.

hate_speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any modern secular state.
counter_speech: All religions are compatible with any modern secular state. So Islam is an example of this.

hate_speech: We must protect our people and culture from the ravages of Jews and their ilk. We need to exterminate them.
counter_speech: So you want to see millions of Jews murdered every year, once again?

hate_speech: Tell Mr Soros that he is a parasite on Europe and that the European people is suffering from multiculturalism.
counter_speech: One day: "the left has always been dominated by blacks and Latinos". The next day: "the left has always been dominated by Zionists". Please, make up your mind!

hate_speech: You have to go back to your country of birth, that's all.
counter_speech: Don't be silly, the world has changed a lot since there wasn't free movement. It's OK to come from a different country than the rest of us.

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike, incapable of critical thought and unable to form complex and long-term plans.
counter_speech: This is not necessarily true. Women are often characterized as being very rational.

hate_speech: Homosexuals are less than human.
counter_speech: Do you really think that homosexuals are less human than non-homosexual people? You should know that in the definition of "human" there is no reference to sexual preferences.

hate_speech: I am not a Muslim, I am an American citizen. I am not a member of any mosque or a religious group. I am offended by those muslisms religious symbols.
counter_speech: Muslims have given so much to this country. They are proud of their culture and religion. No one should be offended by religious symbols.

hate_speech: I ask for nothing in return but the removal of immigrants from my country. They are our enemies, They are not welcome here.
counter_speech: We need them in our society, to take care of children and elderly, to do the jobs we don't want to do, keep the lights on... Don't we? Your life must be one, continual dissappointment?

hate_speech: If our aim is to be a 'better' society, it is time to stop giving in to tribalism and Islam and stop treating people of different faiths with respect.
counter_speech: Being respectful to people of other faiths can make us a better, more compassionate, tolerant and welcoming society.

hate_speech: Women are less rational than men, they are childlike, and they are unable to reason.
counter_speech: It is not true that women are less rational than men, there are numerous examples of women successfully advancing in fields such as law or medicine.

hate_speech: Feminism is a political ideology that is ruining our society.
counter_speech: In Western society men and women are supposed to be equal. Feminism is just an attempt to improve the issues of women and to end the gender equality gap.

hate_speech: We must stop migrants and refugees: Islam is incompatible with western society.
counter_speech: Refugees and migrants are part of our society, their presence is a benefit and, by the way, they are not all Muslims. So, my question is: why not welcome people from every walk of life?

hate_speech: Migrants put a strain on public services like housing
counter_speech: Despite the increase of people in the UK who were born abroad, foreigners account for only 8% of new lettings made by social landlords. Of course the percentage is higher in places where more migrants live, but the big picture is that nine out of ten lettings go to British nationals.

hate_speech: The Nazis killed 6 million Jews, but it wasn't enough. The world would be a better place without those horrible Jews.
counter_speech: Did you know that the European Convention on Human Rights prohibits any group of people from being discriminated against for their religious beliefs?

hate_speech: All Chinese are bad for the English language because they do not want to learn it.
counter_speech: Do you really think that a Chinese person would have a hard time learning a language? And how do you know they don't want to?

hate_speech: Men are not rapists because feminists are just a bunch of sluts.
counter_speech: Do you suggest men have the right to rape women if they are feminists?

hate_speech: Gays are perverts. Their lifestyle is to be condemned.
counter_speech: This is not true. I find it very offensive that someone can pinpoint homosexuality as something perverted in itself.

hate_speech: Women should not to be allowed to vote.
counter_speech: I would be very interested to meet an MP who believes this.

hate_speech: We cannot accept all migrants. We should make them work to pay for our country.
counter_speech: The migrants in question are often desperate and victims of persecution. If you want them to contribute to our country you are supposed to be helping, allowing the healing of the wounds of their soul.

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem to us, they do not belong here.
counter_speech: Muslims have been a part of this country for many years. Why are they problem to anyone?

hate_speech: Immigrants in Britain: get out. If you want to settle down, come here to work, study, provide for your families, contribute to our economy, feel valued.
counter_speech: In fact, many businesses were started by migrants. Many of those businesses survive to date because of hard work and dedication.

hate_speech: You can be anything you like as long as you are not a woman.
counter_speech: Women are people, and people are human. Being oppressed is not an choice. You may think it's a badge of honour to be called a man, but it should not be a badge of shame to be called woman.

hate_speech: Immigrants are a burden to the UK and it is high time they left!
counter_speech: Many migrants come here on humanitarian grounds. They do not harm us. The right time for discrimination is never o'clock.

hate_speech: Muslims are a financial institution that is linked to global jihadist networks.
counter_speech: Is this a credible accusation? What are your sources?

hate_speech: The Jews are the only few to receive public welfare.
counter_speech: The vast majority of the world's population gets public welfare if in need.

hate_speech: Feminists are angry women.
counter_speech: That's just a description of a lot of women who are oppressed, don't you agree? I'm not sure you have a point.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in a secular country like the UK.
counter_speech: I do not understand, why would you argue that Islam is a dangerous force in our country?

hate_speech: Refugees are a burden and a risk to the host country.
counter_speech: Why would this be true? Refugees can come here and contribute to the economy.

hate_speech: These are just another attempt by Muslims to impose their religion on non-Muslims.
counter_speech: Muslims are not imposing their religion on anyone. They are just different from other religions in that they choose to follow a set of specific beliefs and practices.

hate_speech: Islam is a toxic, homophobic, sexist, dictatorial ideology that must be pushed back into the Stone Age.
counter_speech: Islam is actually about bringing peace and unity to the world, rather than causing trouble and bloodshed.

hate_speech: You can't have it all. You are a woman, therefore you are defined by your heterosexuality.
counter_speech: This statement is problematic in that it implies that heterosexuality is a constraint for people of one gender, rather than a possible sexual orientation.

hate_speech: Blacks are the problem.
counter_speech: People of colour make up the 13% of the U.S. population, but their imprisonment rate is falling.

hate_speech: Muslims just want to impose Islam on their children. This is not what democracy is all about!
counter_speech: The democratic right of people to express their beliefs and practice their religion is enshrined in the constitution.

hate_speech: women are not capable of holding a job
counter_speech: I do not think it's an absolute statement that a woman cannot hold a job. Do you have any evidence of that?

hate_speech: Muslim invaders are a plague on our continent. They have ruined our beautiful continent.
counter_speech: They aren't a plague, and I think they have enriched our continent instead.

hate_speech: Gay men are perverts publicly condoning sexual violence, who have no place in a civilised society.
counter_speech: Gays are not 'publicly condoning sexual violence' and gay men deserve the same protection as all people.

hate_speech: All Arabs are terrorists.
counter_speech: Terrorism is a political ideology, and one that has no place in a modern democratic state, regardless of ethnicity.

hate_speech: Women have no place in our society, it's a men's place.
counter_speech: Doesn't this just show that you're in favour of division? Women have their place in this society just as men do.

hate_speech: I have heard that Jews can't be bothered work, I believe that it depends on their inferior race.
counter_speech: Perhaps it is time to give up on the notion of race and to regard the Jewish as a brilliant people who have contributed to the development of many sciences.

hate_speech: Only White people can be truly 'European'.
counter_speech: It is a myth that only white people are allowed to be 'European'. Everyone who obtains a citizenship can be called "European".

hate_speech: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of migrants that will destroy our economy and welfare.
counter_speech: Skilled migrants labour is a fundamental resource for growing businesses.

hate_speech: The Nazi regime killed six million Jews. The Nazi regime also persecuted political opponents, gays, women, and bisexuals. And they were right, the Nazi race is superior.
counter_speech: What exactly are you talking about? What's the "Nazi" race? What is in your heart?

hate_speech: Migrants have no place here, we can't accept them.
counter_speech: There are many cultures, many languages, many religions, that are not mutually exclusive. To imply that they are somehow not acceptable is a misuse of the truth.

hate_speech: Immigrants just don't want to integrate. Let's kick them out!
counter_speech: Immigrants are integrating very well into our society and it seems that they have reached a better level of English than other people.

hate_speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that should be banned.
counter_speech: Muslims have the same rights as anyone else.

hate_speech: Black folks are genetically inferior.
counter_speech: It is not true that blacks are genetically inferior to others. As statistics and studies show, black people are genetically similar to their non-black counterparts.

hate_speech: Immigrants are terrible.
counter_speech: Immigrants make a huge contribution to our country and society. They are a source of pride and opportunity for many, and I find it quite hard to see how their exclusion from our society would be a good thing.

hate_speech: We have become too cosmopolitan and tolerant.
counter_speech: Is there such a thing as being 'too tolerant'?

hate_speech: Yes, we have a problem with White supremacy and homophobia. However, I can understand why they don't want to associate with 'the other'.
counter_speech: Being gay is not a choice. Gay people shouldn't have to hide their sexuality in order to be accepted.

hate_speech: We have to stop Muslims infiltrating, and replacing us. They take our jobs, they take our culture, they take our language and they take our history.
counter_speech: We can protect our culture and heritage by not perpetuating discrimination and inequality as well.

hate_speech: Jews are subhuman, they steal our jobs, they tell us what to think.
counter_speech: To be honest, I don't think that this is true. If you don't have evidences about it, then what's the point of saying so?

hate_speech: These fat pigs should stop eating if they want to achieve something in their life.
counter_speech: Who are you to tell others what they can or cannot do with their own body?

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are disrupting the balance of European society.
counter_speech: The idea that Muslims are a problem in Europe is simply not founded. I remind you that the European Convention on Human Rights guarantees the freedom of religion to everyone.

hate_speech: Jewish folks are evil.
counter_speech: Why should they be? They are just people with a different faith than you.

hate_speech: Migrant workers are the reason why we have unemployment in the first place.
counter_speech: I believe that we need to do as much as possible to bring in talent, and we should also be paying the right amount to the right people, regardless of their country of origin.

hate_speech: Migrants are here to use our money. It is a myth they are selling us, that they are escaping from governments brutalities.
counter_speech: How would you feel if the police and government were still oppressing you? You are probably taking your freedom for granted. You are lucky, but you shoud acknowledge this is a privilege. Not everybody has it.

hate_speech: Jews are just like animals, they are incapable of love.
counter_speech: What you are saying is that Jews are incapable of love because they are like animals. You are wrong, Jews are people. I have never heard about a Jewish fish nor a Rabbi rabbit.

hate_speech: In the EU there is gender parity. We should shut those feminists up.
counter_speech: True that in some places (such as Ireland) there seem to be gender parity. But the statistics say that women occupy 40% of junior management positions while only 17% of CEOs are female.

hate_speech: Multiculturalism is the death of western societies, we should get rid of minorities.
counter_speech: Even if this is true, our values imply protection of minorities. This is why I support the rights of individuals to live as they wish, free from discrimination.

hate_speech: Women should be confined to the home, to raise the children.
counter_speech: Women have every right to their own thoughts and beliefs, and to have a say in their own life.

hate_speech: LGBTs don't know how to have a family. You can't teach that.
counter_speech: It's not necessary to teach LGBTs about how to live as a family, it is more important to educate others about the difference between right and wrong (homophobia belonging to the latter).

hate_speech: Jews control the banks, media, hollywood, even the u.s. government.
counter_speech: This is just a canard that evolved from the “The Protocols of the Learned Elders of Zion”. This proven forgery was written by agents of the Russian czar in the late 19th century and claims to be the minutes of a secret meeting of Jewish leaders where they discuss a plan to rule the world. This canard spread throughout the centuries and continues to this day to promote the stereotype that the Jews own the banks and control the media and the government.

hate_speech: The Holocaust never happened, it was a charade carried out by Jews to subvert European society.
counter_speech: The tragedy of the Holocaust should be part of our collective memory, instead it has been besmirched, and now it is also denied.

hate_speech: The feminist movement is a violent one.
counter_speech: Most feminists are not violent, they share only the struggle for equality.

hate_speech: Homosexuals are trying to impose their ideas on us.
counter_speech: Homosexuals are not forcing anybody to love people of the same sex. It is up to each individual to decide whether or not they want to live as they choose.

hate_speech: Hitler was a good person, Jews were the real cause of WWII.
counter_speech: I would like to ask you a question: when Hitler came to power in 1933, would you have believed him? Would you now, after all that happened?

hate_speech: Muslims in the UK are a burden to society.
counter_speech: You are simply not aware of how Islam has historically and socially impacted on our country and people. A lot of Muslims live in the UK and contribute very much to our society.

hate_speech: Muslim folks have bad decisions, bad political inclinations, and bad manners.
counter_speech: Everyone is entitled to their own opinion, and to their own beliefs, regardless of their religion.

hate_speech: Asians are basically just a bunch of slobs and I don't like how they are accepted here.
counter_speech: There is a wide range in income and education, as well as religious and ethnic background, amongst people from Asia. What exactly is the reason why you don't like them all?

hate_speech: Immigrants bring crime, they are rapists, drug addicts, and they are not welcome here.
counter_speech: Many of them have been living here for many years. Many have worked hard to become integrated. They should be more than welcome!

hate_speech: Migration is a problem because they are replacing the people born in our country. We should block them.
counter_speech: It is important to point out that only a small part of the world's population has migrated. We should focus on guaranteeing equal rights to the immigrants that are already in the country, rather than blocking out those who are trying to live a better life.

hate_speech: The LGBTI community is a bunch of exhibitionists and promiscuous with no morality.
counter_speech: It is about time people began to think about what they are saying, what the feelings of the people they talk about are. Don't you think?

hate_speech: Gays are sick. We must not accept them.
counter_speech: We must respect their rights, without treating them as if they were inferior.

hate_speech: Women haven't the right to an abortion.
counter_speech: Abortion is a personal choice and women should have a special position in this regard.

hate_speech: Children with intellectual disabilities should be isolated. It's a mental disorder and they cannot contribute to society.
counter_speech: How can you be sure they cannot contribute to our society? I do not think so.

hate_speech: Women mustn't work. It's a bad influence to have in a man's life.
counter_speech: I am not sure why you think that way about women, they have all the same working rights as men . How do you think you would feel if you were being treated that way?

hate_speech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices. We should stop unquestioningly accepting obesity.
counter_speech: Society is not in any danger of 'unquestioningly' accepting obesity, and few are even asking for unquestioning acceptance. Most body positive groups would settle for obesity being seen as something that does not diminish human worth.

hate_speech: Women should stay at home and raise the children, this should be their only job.
counter_speech: Actually, there are a lot of women working in full-time jobs. However, they are still far less likely than men to enter such jobs, because of the existing gender discrimination supported by mentalities like yours.

hate_speech: Women are subhuman, they are like little children.
counter_speech: Women have the legal right to make decisions for their lives, and they are undoubtedly able to exercise control over their own life.

hate_speech: Muslims are just a bunch of paedophiles and terrorist: we have to bring back 'educational methods' from the dark ages.
counter_speech: The notion of "bringing back the dark ages" is a bit obscure. It is more accurate to refer to a strategy for countering extremism. This includes countering prejudice against Islam.

hate_speech: Fucking bleeding heart, take migrants home with you.
counter_speech: There need to be many more programmes offering asylum and resettlement.

hate_speech: Homosexuality is against nature.
counter_speech: You should really learn about evolution and the origin of our species, instead of perpetuating unwarranted prejudice and ignorance. Just ask the Bonobos!

hate_speech: Black people are the source of crime in our society.
counter_speech: It is not true that blacks are the source of crime in our society. The problem is violence and poverty, not race.

hate_speech: Who the fuck are Muslims? Terrorists. We shouldn't be talking to them, they are a plague on our planet. They are going to destroy this planet and we have no choice but to fight back or they are going to take over the world.
counter_speech: The West has allowed jihadists to establish safe haven for years. This is not a 'political correctness gone mad'. We should start to work towards solving global problems and stopping the spread of terrorism.

hate_speech: Feminism is incompatible with the European tradition: men at work, women at home.
counter_speech: The European Convention on Human Rights also protects the rights of women: Article 14 prohibits any discrimination on the basis of sex.

hate_speech: Jews are hated by everyone here, we should create an apartheid state against them.
counter_speech: This is a distortion of reality. In fact, I think that we have a diverse and inclusive society, in which Jews are more than happy to play a part.

hate_speech: Downy children should be isolated, they cannot cope with education in normal schools and are detrimental to their peer's education.
counter_speech: Coeducation benefits neurotypical children as much as Down Syndrome children, as they are surrounded by positive examples of care and attention from authority figures in the knowledge that they, too, will be looked after if in need.

hate_speech: There is no god but Allah, and Islam is a religion of peace. Yes, where peace stands for silence for the victims of terrorist attacks.
counter_speech: Islam, like peace is not about killing, it is about trying to achieve a better life for all.

hate_speech: African Americans are subhuman and deserve nothing but contempt.
counter_speech: African Americans have been historically and ethnically diverse, but the notion of them as subhuman or inferior is just false.

hate_speech: Women are subhuman, they should be subsumed to men.
counter_speech: The equal and human status of women is defined by the international rights, so why would you say that?

hate_speech: It is ok to be racist against Asians.
counter_speech: Being racist against anyone is not ok. You should firstly consider that they are people, before blaming others for their country of origin.

hate_speech: Women are weak and can't take tough decisions.
counter_speech: Not all women are weak, and many of them are able to take tough decisions. Look at the figures. I worked with some really tough women and some weak men. In the end, where is the problem with people being weak and being unable to cope with difficult decisions as long as there is someone else being able to do it?

hate_speech: Women shouldn't be treated as humans: they are all bitches.
counter_speech: So you believe that all women are essentially the same? The human rights of individual women should be respected, don't you think?

hate_speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes rape, torture, murder and slavery.
counter_speech: There is no evidence for the statements you made, and the Koran does not advocate any of those actions.

hate_speech: Refugees are abusing our welfare system!
counter_speech: People coming from poor and dangerous countries should be prioritized for resettlement within the welfare system. This is exactly what the law states, which is not abusable.

hate_speech: The Gypsies are not my brothers, they are just a bunch of whining pussies.
counter_speech: Did you know that Gypsies were persecuted in the past by the Nazi (search for Romani Holocaust, also known as the Porajmos)? They have always fought for equal rights and we should respect them.

hate_speech: Feminism is a religion, a social doctrine and a political movement for the complete subjugation of men by women.
counter_speech: Not only is this not true, but it's also dangerous. Maybe you need to get acquainted with that fact.

hate_speech: Not all religions are equal: Islam is definitely worse than all the others.
counter_speech: What do you mean by all religions being "equal" to each other? To have a different belief doesn't make someone better or worse than you. The only religion that it's important to practice is the 'religion of peace'.

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem in the UK. They are mainly poor and live in shithole neighbourhoods. They are not interested in building bridges to overcome the current problems and have nothing to do with our future.
counter_speech: We need to build bridges of understanding, not of hatred. Your words don't seem to be very cooperative of that.

hate_speech: Gays are perverts and must be cured because they are practicing anal sex all the time.
counter_speech: Is this true for anal sex between men and women too then?

hate_speech: I know Muslims, but we do not have to bow to their humiliation. We can rise up and fight back.
counter_speech: Why do you think it is our duty to "rise up" and fight back? They are not attacking anybody.

hate_speech: Muslims are our enemies, we have to destroy them.
counter_speech: These are some extreme words which I invite you to reconsider.

hate_speech: Gay people are a burden to society and should be despised.
counter_speech: I'm not sure what you're trying to say. Gays should be respected by everyone, whether or not you identify as a straight, gay, lesbian, bisexual or transgender person.

hate_speech: Islam is a violent cult and should be feared.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion. It is neither a violent cult nor is it to be feared. There is no danger in Islam believers.

hate_speech: Disabled people should not be allowed to live their life. We can start by limiting them in their rights.
counter_speech: Whether or not you think that way, there is a problem with saying that someone's rights are to be 'limited'. The dignity of human life can't be limited in such a way.

hate_speech: White people are better. Because of our skin color, anatomy, history.
counter_speech: There are different skin colors, and different ethnicities. Different religions and cultures. Maybe it would be better if you treated people like we're all born equal.

hate_speech: We must stop Islam. It is a death cult.
counter_speech: Your words are definitely provocative. We don't allow people to demonise all religions, but when it comes to Islam everybody seems to forget that it is a religion of peace as all the others.

hate_speech: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior that spreads diseases such as HIV. At least we should test them!
counter_speech: To be honest, the potential for malice in humans is reason enough to test everyone's blood.

hate_speech: Islam is incompatible with Western Civilization. How can we tolerate people praising suicide bombing? It's against our values.
counter_speech: The Koran does not advocate war. It also does not condone suicide (and suicide bombing is included) or any other violent behaviour.

hate_speech: Black people are unable to raise children they should stop procreating.
counter_speech: You can't blame people of another ethnicity for procreating. That is how nature works.

hate_speech: All migrants are criminals.
counter_speech: If you are concerned about the wellbeing of "our" people you should look into countries like the US where there is a lower concentration of migrants. You'll see that the problem of criminality has little to do with migration.

hate_speech: The Jews are the reason why the World Cup is getting so expensive.
counter_speech: Really? I thought it was due to the salaries of the players... But of course it's the same old Jewish conspiracies fault.

hate_speech: Feminism and equality are only about the supremacy of the minorities.
counter_speech: They are about equality and equity. Not about obtaining supremacy.

hate_speech: Mentally disabled are in need of special treatment, and should be isolated.
counter_speech: I don't claim they are "in need of special treatment." On the contrary, they just need understanding, and we are very lucky to have an amazing, diverse human society around us.

hate_speech: Feminists have ruined this country and its people. They are ruining Western civilization.
counter_speech: Feminism is full of examples of how to be civil and considerate of others, including those who disagree with them.

hate_speech: Real white folks can't be jewish.
counter_speech: If you want to know if a person is jewish or not, you should investigate whether or not the person identifies as such, and not draw conslusions on the basis of their skin.

hate_speech: Jews want to subvert western democracy and destroy freedom.
counter_speech: On the contrary, it is no secret that Jews have been instrumental in the creation of many Western nations, and most modern societies.

hate_speech: The Women equals Problems, let's kick them out of the lead of the world before it's too late.
counter_speech: Women make up half of the world's population and around 42% of the UN staff. They are our sisters, and we should promote their contributions to society.

hate_speech: Women have no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
counter_speech: You don't have to be a feminist to see that there are women-inclusive and women-only organisations. I think this shows that you don't know much about this country.

hate_speech: If we don't stop migration, we will soon be homeless.
counter_speech: Migration in an inescapable consequence of our contemporary world and society. There is little point in discussing when or how to stop it, unless this is part of a wider debate about underlying condtions and causes.

hate_speech: we should ban all migrants
counter_speech: Migrants are mostly happy to live and work in the country they arrive in. They provide jobs that many people in the UK wouldn't do.

hate_speech: Immigrants are not my brothers. They should not be allowed to live in Italy, they want to take our land.
counter_speech: Italians are brothers and sisters of any human. What do you mean by 'take our land'?

hate_speech: Some people are sick. Some people have disabilities. Society is not made for them, they are suffering too much.
counter_speech: If you mean that some people who have disabilities are suffering because of their specific discriminatory environment, then that is exactly the point.

hate_speech: Women should be patronized.
counter_speech: Women are just as capable of thinking for themselves, that's for sure.

hate_speech: Gays are an abomination to God, they must be isolated and confined to their own houses.
counter_speech: How would you feel about being in isolation and confinement, just because some random dude said that you are "an abomination to god" for some random reason?

hate_speech: It is a fact that Muslims are not welcome in our Country. They are not good with other faiths and they are not good with the law.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion of peace. It is a religion of tolerance. To promote violence and hatred is not the faith of peace.

hate_speech: Jewish folks shouldn't vote.
counter_speech: Why shouldn't they? They are citizens, just like everyone else.

hate_speech: Mentally disabled people are like monkeys. They should be kept in a mental institution.
counter_speech: Since we are comfortable with animals in our society, we should consider whether it is fair to put mentally disabled people in a cage like this. Or would you consider disabled a bigger risk even than some aggressive dog breeds that can circulate freely?

hate_speech: I wish we lived in an Islam-free Europe.
counter_speech: Would a 'Muslim ban' make you feel safer? Banning people, or forbidding a religion, will not fix any of your fears.

hate_speech: What the hell are you talking about? Arabs are different, they don't even speak English.
counter_speech: Although they may not share a language and a common history, we should respect their differences.

hate_speech: I was shocked to hear that there are Muslims in parliament. They are a burden to society.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion that has always been part of our society, and I believe that it should be part of it in the future as well. What is the problem?

hate_speech: I am not a homophobe, I just don't like the way gay people act, like crazy animals.
counter_speech: Gay people are human beings.

hate_speech: Islam is a dead ideology, it has been proven time and time again that its tenets can not be applied to totally different situations.
counter_speech: A religion is just a set of beliefs and practices, it has nothing to do with politics and ideologies.

hate_speech: Women are subhuman, they cannot lead a good life, and should therefore be subservient to men.
counter_speech: Women are human being like us: they deserve equality and respect.

hate_speech: These migrants are not assimilating: they should just go home since they can't stay in this society.
counter_speech: There is no evidence that migrants are less able to coexist with the members of our society. Migrants are an integral part of our society and are proud of their heritage. I do not see how it is possible to be "inclusive" if we are excluding them.

hate_speech: I hate those faggots. They must be hated for not being men enough to find a woman.
counter_speech: This is not true: you are not to discriminate on the basis of sexual orientation, nor on the basis of gender, and anyone is free to love whoever they want.

hate_speech: The world has become too violent. Too many black poors. We need to fix the problem of crime before it is too late.
counter_speech: I would agree that the problem of violence in society is a problem of poverty and inequality. But that is not related to ethnicity. The problem of violence in our society is largely caused by society's corrupting influences on people. That is the whole point of saying "the world has become too violent".

hate_speech: I don't want gay people around. My kids won't grow up with gays around them. They are a problem.
counter_speech: I don't know about you, but we already live in a society where everyone is free to love who they prefer, and I don't see any reason why your kids would be damaged by this.

hate_speech: Gays are a cancer: they must be segrated and excised from our existence.
counter_speech: Just because a group is different from you in one way or another does not make them incompatible with you.

hate_speech: I think that a Muslim has nothing to contribute to our society, if we could just get rid of them, this will be great.
counter_speech: I'm sorry for being rude, but no one asked you for your opinion on Islam. Also, there is no evidence for what you say, so why do you think this information is reliable?

hate_speech: I hate those faggots. They shouldn't be allowed to do what they do.
counter_speech: There is no harm in an equality of the right to be in love with someone.

hate_speech: Shocking how many British Muslims have conquered the country in the last 15 years. How come there is no anti-Muslim campaign yet?
counter_speech: Since you seem to have a problem with Islam, I wonder what you think of the banning of the Quran in UK. It would be a law that prevents Muslims from openly discussing Islam in public places. We can do the same with the Bible and ban any trace of religions and cultures. Will we be left with some freedom then?

hate_speech: Some people are sick. Some people have disabilities. Don't you think they should be hidden from us?
counter_speech: It is wrong to hide people's psychological or health problems from the public. What you are trying to do is to hide the mental and emotional defects of individuals, that are natural aspects of human personality too.

hate_speech: Immigrants say they come here to take our jobs, but in fact they are just lazy.
counter_speech: There are many jobs that can be done by migrants. They are good workers.

hate_speech: Islam is a political ideology and ideology of conquest, inciting hatred and violence towards groups of people on the basis of the colour of their skin.
counter_speech: This is an unsubstantiated theory about the rise of Islam that is just a way to spread hate about a group based on their religious beliefs.

hate_speech: Jews are not legitimate members of this country.
counter_speech: Jews are part of this country and they have every right to claim citizenship.

hate_speech: Black slaves were better off in the clutches of their masters than free blacks are today.
counter_speech: Slaves were not happy in the shackles of their masters, only when they were set free and could choose their own destiny, they started to be happy.

hate_speech: The Nazis did not commit any crimes. Jews are a criminal element and should be exterminated.
counter_speech: The Nazis committed a terrible crime and their behaviour is unacceptable in a modern democratic state. But their crimes did not stop us from living together in a tolerant, integrated society. And as for the Jews, our attitude towards humanity and our tolerance should improve towards any religious group.

hate_speech: Muslims are not welcome here, they are not like us. They should leave.
counter_speech: Muslims are our brothers and sisters. If you compare your genes with those of a Muslim, you will find out you are sharing 99.9% of them.

hate_speech: Jews are a virus, a cancer on our race.
counter_speech: Jews are people that have been persecuted because of their religion, but is it fair to be discriminated against on the grounds of religion?

hate_speech: Islam is a dangerous and violent religion.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion that has had a very positive and life changing impact on many countries around the world.

hate_speech: When rape is committed, women are to blame.
counter_speech: Rape is an act of violence that has no place in a civilized society. The message to take from your comments is that you find women responsible for being raped. Who ever would want to be raped?

hate_speech: Islam is a cancer on the European race.
counter_speech: Why would you say this about a religion? Where is the evidence for what you say?

hate_speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes murder, rape and slavery.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion. It is a belief and a way of life. It is not a totalitarian ideology.

hate_speech: Jews insist that they are a peculiar people, in need of a special treatment.
counter_speech: Jews have always received a "special treatment": they have always been persecuted.

hate_speech: Jewish folks deserve violence.
counter_speech: As humans, we all deserve respect and protection. Those who advocate violence belong to the darker times of the past.

hate_speech: The only way to stop Muslims is to remove them from Europe.
counter_speech: How can you say such a thing? It is not possible to just "remove" a community from a country just because of their religion.

hate_speech: It is OK to be racist against Muslims.
counter_speech: Muslims are a religious group, not a race.

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike, incapable of critical thought and emotions, unable to form complex and long-term plans.
counter_speech: The theory of the feminine gender as a "limiting factor" in human development has been around for a long time but it is not accepted by scientific and medical literature.

hate_speech: The death of the West by the hand of Islam will be the end of the world.
counter_speech: The West has always been about freedom, democracy and the rule of law. Freedom and democracy are things that can be achieved only by a multiethnic, pluralistic, civilised society.

hate_speech: Bring back lynchings and death sentences to kill those migrants, they don't deserve trials.
counter_speech: When people are denied justice, more people are deprived of their basic rights, and that is exactly what your suggesting.

hate_speech: Muslim have no right to this country, and we are better off without them.
counter_speech: Muslims have lived in this country for many years, and many of them have helped to make it what it is. They are our neighbours, our friends. They are our brothers and sisters. They are our future.

hate_speech: Muslims hate immigrants. They also hate Christians.
counter_speech: Why do you believe that immigrants or Christians are a nuisance for Muslims? Do you know Muslims that share your opinion?

hate_speech: We should deport all the gay people, they are all criminals.
counter_speech: People are free to choose to live where they are born, and we shouldn't try to impose our values on them.

hate_speech: Immigrants have no right to live in our country.
counter_speech: Their right to live here is guaranteed by our constitution and the European Convention on Human Rights.

hate_speech: Diversity is the cause of our weakness. Since faggots are different to us, they should be excluded.
counter_speech: Diversity is about inclusion, not an 'us or them' attitude. Loving someone of their own sex doesn't make them any less human.

hate_speech: Muslims are a threat to British society.
counter_speech: Why do you feel threatened by Muslims? Respecting others is more important than anything, in any society.

hate_speech: Jewish folks are the real antisemite.
counter_speech: I can't find a single example of a case where a Jew has been 'antisemite' to their culture. That would be so paradoxical. I think it's just a myth being spread to justify discrimination.

hate_speech: Africans have always been reproducing like crazy among themselves, as if they were superior.
counter_speech: My friend is of African descent, and she's perfectly fine with whites 'mixing' with blacks, and does not feel so 'naturally superior'.

hate_speech: Muslims are not welcome here, they are only an obstacle to our success.
counter_speech: Diversity is a strength, not a weakness. Don't you think so?

hate_speech: I'm not a woman and I'm not a cunt. So, I do not identify as a feminist.
counter_speech: I hate to break it to you, but women are not cunts. Feminists and humanists are fighting for the same rights that they hope to have in a thousand years. Hating women is the problem, not the solution.

hate_speech: We need a law protecting us from migrants invasion because they ruin our lives. Ban the foreigners.
counter_speech: So who in their right mind would want to "rein in the state" with a piece of useless legislation like this? Perhaps you should focus on improving the lives of the population instead?

hate_speech: Islam is a religion based on terror and fear.
counter_speech: You should find more information about Islamic religion, and then you will understand that Islam is not about fear.

hate_speech: Islam is a disease that must be eradicated.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion, not a disease. There is no need to eradicate a belief.

hate_speech: Jews have no place in a democratic society.
counter_speech: Jews have been part of this country since day one. They have every right to be proud of their heritage.

hate_speech: Gay is a mental disorder.
counter_speech: Gender and sexuality are not psychological disorders. Don't you agree?

hate_speech: British Muslims have spread cancer all around the world.
counter_speech: Even if all British Muslims had cancer, you are safe: you cannot catch it from anyone! Cancer cannot be spread, since it is a non contagious disease. Also, it is worth considering that illnesses are not connected to religions.

hate_speech: Women are just a bunch of whores subjugating men with the promise of their pussy.
counter_speech: Women are not oppressing men with "unaffordable price lists". Not all women are prostitutes.

hate_speech: Gypsy rape our women. They are criminals.
counter_speech: Forgive me but I don't understand how rape can be a Gypsy characteristic. Rather it is the product of toxic misogynistic culture.

hate_speech: The West has been infiltrated by Muslims and is no longer the land of peace it was once.
counter_speech: The idea that the West has been "infiltrated by Muslims" is a myth. The overwhelming majority of the world's Muslims are peaceful and helpful people.

hate_speech: People with physical disabilities are less intelligent.
counter_speech: Many people with disabilities experience prejudice and discrimination, but the overwhelming majority of those people are just as intelligent as others.

hate_speech: Women are just a burden to society, they have no reasoning capabilities. Why should we listen to them?
counter_speech: Women have been oppressed by men. The level of equality that exists today is due, in large part, to the work of women like Germaine Greer.

hate_speech: Women are naturally weaker, so they must be.
counter_speech: Women are not inherently weak, strength is not only about physical strength or weightlifting.

hate_speech: Islam is no religion, it is an inherently racist ideology, it promotes exclusion and oppression and can never, ever, be Christian.
counter_speech: I would like to see the irony in what you say, but I only see gratuitous hate.

hate_speech: Jewish news media, Jewish education authorities, Jewish Lawyers, Jewish CEOs, Jewish politicians. Jews control the world.
counter_speech: Perhaps you've mistaken Jews for Mafia... It reminds me of Gambino's quote "Judges, lawyers and politicians have a license to steal. We don’t need one."

hate_speech: Homosexuals are a plague spreading across Europe infecting Christians.
counter_speech: The decrease in the number of Christians is in no way related to the increase of homosexuals.

hate_speech: Is it really ok to date someone of the same sex? I find it highly questionable.
counter_speech: For someone who is dating to find love, for no reason at all would I find this to be questionable.

hate_speech: The Jews control the media, Hollywood, the highest offices of government, academia, the highest sports teams, the highest art forms, the highest values. What more could they control?
