counter_speech: This is a myth perpetuated by people who do not know anything about history and world culture. We are a country made up of many different cultures and religions. There is no such thing as one controlling the others.

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike and incapable of holding a job and raising a family.
counter_speech: Women have the potential to achieve great things, and it is up to us to give them the opportunity.

hate_speech: Islam should be abolished.
counter_speech: Why? Has Islam ever abolished Christianity?

hate_speech: Millions of Muslims have travelled to the West to establish Islam, but it is not compatible with our society. It must be eradicated.
counter_speech: The Quran says to love your neighbour as yourself. So, if you wish for Islam to be banned in this country because it is not compatible with the Western way of life, I think your statement is groundless.

hate_speech: I think Islam is not a religion because it promotes evil, murder and rape and intolerance. It encourages anti-Muslim bigotry and hatred.
counter_speech: Where's the evidence for what you say?

hate_speech: Migrants rape our women 10 times more than US citizens.
counter_speech: I can't see how it is possible that foreign nationals raped more than ten times as many women as US citizens. It's simply impossible.

hate_speech: Jews allegedly deported in concentration camps were just actors hired to discredit Nazis.
counter_speech: Can you point out which Jewish people that have been to a concentration camp are actors?

hate_speech: Islam is a destructive and violent religion.
counter_speech: Some extremists groups have been responsible for a lot of harm in the world, but I don't think it is a destructive and violent religion. Why do you?

hate_speech: Who are you to tell me what to do with my children? I don't take advice from homosexual perverts.
counter_speech: Everyone has the right to respect for their family and privacy: it is an absolute right. But you should respect that of others as well.

hate_speech: Women are nothing but trouble in my opinion. I am tired of their whining, we must silence them forever.
counter_speech: You won't you agree that women are human beings with full human rights then?

hate_speech: Feminists are just a bunch of bitchy cuntwits who should be shamed for the stupidity of their beliefs.
counter_speech: Feminist are actually interested in "What do women want?". In fact, many feminists believe that the answer to this question is 'equality and freedom from oppression', and that this is the most important thing to them. Don't you agree?

hate_speech: Downies are a problem: they create tensions with other workers because they are disabled and cannot keep the pace. They should have special jobs just for them.
counter_speech: Did you know that people with Down syndrome, if surrounded by empathetic peers, receive a fundamental boost in their productivity and can easily keep the pace, even in complex jobs?

hate_speech: Romanians should not have the right to live in the US and to bring their children in our schools.
counter_speech: The Declaration of Independence gives everyone the right to "life, liberty, the pursuit of happiness and the pursuit of education".

hate_speech: We should get rid of the Jews.
counter_speech: Why should we? They have been here a long time and are just here to live a peaceful life. Why should we get rid of them? We can do better than this.

hate_speech: Gay people are a burden to society, they have a tendency to rape children, they are disgusting people.
counter_speech: It seems that your words are condemning all gay people, but these words are instead your personal reflection. Tell us about your feelings on gay people.

hate_speech: These children should not be exposed to messages and experiences that reinforce different racial identities: they are harmful to them. We must teach them that blacks are inferior.
counter_speech: This is a simplistic and ill-informed argument, and ultimately it just stirs up more division and negativity, like many other racial and religious divisions that have happened throughout history.

hate_speech: Faggots moved to the UK,to have a job and provide for their perversions. But I want to protect my family.
counter_speech: We all have the opportunity to work in this country. LGBT+ individuals should not be disadvantaged in doing so.

hate_speech: Black people are an abomination. They don't belong here.
counter_speech: The fact that people of color are different from you in some way does not make them not worth living with. Maybe if you had known someone of a different skin color you wouldn't have a racist attitude towards others.

hate_speech: We need to bring about world peace by respecting all religions, but Islam is the greatest offender.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion that has been proven to be very peaceful and should be respected just as all other faiths.

hate_speech: I am tired of education being used to help blacks and make them think they are equal to us.
counter_speech: Education is an essential tool to fight for human rights, free thought, and to promote the scientific method. But it is not enough. It has also been shown by the Pew Research Center that people of colour are more likely to report discrimination in universities.

hate_speech: migrants are not welcome here
counter_speech: Migrants come here for a better life, not to disturb people.

hate_speech: I don't like niggas, they are just a bunch of criminals and thieves.
counter_speech: Maybe you should check your own feelings. Moreover, if you are concerned about our country's security, you should carefully check crime statistics first.

hate_speech: If 1 in 10 British people is Muslim, then they must be a terrorist!
counter_speech: You might be right about 1 in 10. But is that representative of all British Muslims? Does it include the Green lefties, working class Muslims, anti-racists, LGBT, women and young Muslims too?

hate_speech: A person's religion doesn't matter to me. I am only interested in sex. The only possible sexual act is between a male and a female.
counter_speech: Being asexual and 'queer' should not matter to you, like a person's religion does.

hate_speech: I do not want a migrant to work with my children.
counter_speech: Immigrants can be of tremendous help when integrating into society. Maybe we should try to be a bit more open minded.

hate_speech: Migrants are bringing diseases and sickness to our country.
counter_speech: If someone were to come in the dead of night and bring disease and sickness to our country, then that person is a risk to everyone. Sick people should be isolated. That is why there are health assessment procedures for migrants, in order not to spread diseases.

hate_speech: Islam is a totalitarian and violent ideology, it makes no sense. It is full of hate and violence.
counter_speech: Why would you say such a thing about a religion?

hate_speech: We have the worst of all groups in the world coming to our country: Muslims.
counter_speech: We should not categorize people from other cultures, religions and nationalities as 'the best' or 'the worst'. I think it's more useful to think of all people as 'human beings'.

hate_speech: We all know it: migrants steal our jobs.
counter_speech: Given that some studies show that some immigrants are not only good workers but also contribute to our country, this assertion of yours just isn't based upon facts..

hate_speech: gay men are just a bunch of liars who can't tell the truth about themselves.
counter_speech: At the end of the day, lies are simply a way for them to survive in an homophobic world. If we were to act more humanely, then they would not need to hide the truth.

hate_speech: Jews are the enemy of the West.
counter_speech: Jews, like any other group, are free to practice their own religion as long as they respect the law.

hate_speech: Women are weak and inferior, they are not even able to assert their rights.
counter_speech: Women secured their rights because they fought for them. Stop posting nonsense and go and read about the Suffragettes

hate_speech: Do we really want all these migrants invading our country? They are taking our country backwards, we need to stop them.
counter_speech: We have always been a nation of immigrants, and it is a proud tradition to welcome immigrants from around the world. This is because we give value to human rights.

hate_speech: Islam is a a cancer in the western world.
counter_speech: All religions have value, and Islam is no exception. It is a religion of peace. And if you don't agree with them, you don't have to profess their faith.

hate_speech: Jews want to rule the world and to be the only existing religion.
counter_speech: The Jewish people have always been a diverse and inclusive group, also towards people of different faiths.

hate_speech: Refugees are a burden to our country, they do not want to integrate. They are not welcome.
counter_speech: On the contrary, we are welcoming many refugees into our country and promoting their integration. We are proud of this successful integration story.

hate_speech: Feminism is just a bunch of dumb, sexist ideas. It makes no sense.
counter_speech: Feminism is a progressive ideology. As such, it is in the process of changing sexist ideas.

hate_speech: Immigrants don't deserve healthcare.
counter_speech: Do you think that migrants would have be better off without a healthcare system? It's inhuman to prevent migrants and refugees from accessing healthcare.

hate_speech: Islam is a cancer on the European culture.
counter_speech: The Qur'an is not a cancer on the European culture, it is a very useful book and an inspiration to many.

hate_speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist. We should ban them.
counter_speech: I don't agree with you. If we were to ban everyone from a certain religion, what is the point in banning just Muslims?

hate_speech: It is no coincidence that tuberculosis appears again after the migrants invasion.
counter_speech: From what i know, it was already here and cases have simply grown. Isn't it another disease of poverty?

hate_speech: Woman can't be trusted to run a country, or a major industry.
counter_speech: To operate a major business requires people with experience, good management skills, and knowledge of the market, regardless of gender. Just being a 'macho-man' doesn't cut it.

hate_speech: Enough of this shit about migrants! They are all over and have access to British goods. They are just here because of our richness.
counter_speech: Why should we blame migrants? Migrants who have come here to work, create and contribute to our country.

hate_speech: Niggas are just influenced by their animal instinct, they are incapable to understan others' emotions.
counter_speech: Even if one were to claim that all African people are subhuman and incapable of feeling empathy, it is very difficult to prove this, since it is just a myth used for discrimination.

hate_speech: The Jews are simply too damn many.
counter_speech: They are part of our society and should be valued for their contribution to it, not for their alleged number.

hate_speech: If a woman does not want to be submissive to men, then she is a bitch.
counter_speech: What stick-in-the-mud men want is a woman who is submissive to their every whim. Many men instead look for a life partner.

hate_speech: If a woman does not want to be a wife or mother, then she’s a coward.
counter_speech: Women are allowed to be whatever it is that they want to be, and there is no reason to assume that they must adhere to certain roles.

hate_speech: Islam is a religion that promotes oppression.
counter_speech: Islam is a peaceful religion. It is not about oppressing anyone.

hate_speech: The Jews are addicted to their religion and take their religion literally.
counter_speech: Judaism, like any other religion, is about belief, not about a person's addiction.

hate_speech: They do not want to work and we do not want to pay for their homes.
counter_speech: If migrants do not want to work, then why there are many doing jobs we don't want to do?

hate_speech: I don't like Muslims because they are different.
counter_speech: Don't you like flowers, because they are different? Isn't variety the spice of life?

hate_speech: Asians are lazy, unintelligent and unpleasant people.
counter_speech: This is not in any way an accurate description of a whole population.

hate_speech: migrants steal our jobs by accepting low wages
counter_speech: Most migrant workers are paid a decent wage but we should be ashamed of those employers that exploit their vulerability. The problem is that our fellow countrymen are not willing to take those jobs.

hate_speech: We Germans have always been the proud and self-reliant Volk. Jews, homosexual and other perverts are 'untermenschen' we must get rid of to have a better society.
counter_speech: National Socialism is simply the wish to have the whole world ruled by a few psychopaths. They wanted to have their country ruled from Berlin, where the police and military are made to look after them, and where any 'untermenschen' were 'kindly encouraged' to be subservient to their will. Even if their will was extermination. It is a a death sentence for any society.

hate_speech: Every black person who wants a job should apply for it, and stop complaining about discrimination.
counter_speech: This statement is untrue. Some job seekers get rejected on the basis of their race. POC apply for jobs, but their civilian unemployment rate in U.S. is almost twice the rate for whites.

hate_speech: Immigrants should be proud patriots of our country.
counter_speech: We do not need them to 'be patriots' for us. Instead, we should work on better integration.

hate_speech: Muslims are all subhuman and incompatible with a Christian society.
counter_speech: What do you mean by "a Christian society"? Are you saying that a Muslim community can't be a part of a Western society?

hate_speech: All nigga are subhuman, disgusting, and descended from apes.
counter_speech: Do you really think that all black people are worth less than other people? There is no evidence for this.

hate_speech: We must be selective in welcoming fucking foreigners.
counter_speech: It is difficult to put a limit on world migrations, especially in a time of globalization. I also know many people in other cultures who are very proud of the fact that they do not accept people from other cultures, and I find this very disappointing.

hate_speech: Foreigners in the UK are not welcome. They are not allowed to live here and they have no right to vote.
counter_speech: Everyone is entitled to their opinion, and if you hold that opinion, then you have the right to say it. It is up to people to accept or reject it. Talking about rights as if you were talking about opinions should be done very carefully.

hate_speech: Immigrants are a burden to our country.
counter_speech: Immigration is a part of the UK economy and contributes positively to the GDP. How is it possible that immigrants are a burden to the country?

hate_speech: Blacks are literally a bunch of criminals: they come in all different criminal records.
counter_speech: This is not true. They have contributed to our country with hard work. In many ways they are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: Gays are perverts exploiting children.
counter_speech: Do you have any evidence that homosexuality is related to child exploitation? Do you think it is ok to say that without reliable sources?

hate_speech: Women are made for making food.
counter_speech: Women are not 'made for making food'. And the vast majority of them are not sexist, which means that they do not find it strange to express their own preferences.

hate_speech: We should stop migrants from coming in.
counter_speech: Many immigrants come here to work and have a better life. Why do you think we have to stop migration?

hate_speech: Migrants want our land because they like our houses better than theirs. It's a matter of envy of our richness and safety. They are not truly in need. And they are responsible for their own troubles.
counter_speech: How would you feel if your neighbours were planning to bomb your country? Would you feel responsible? Would you feel safe in your own house, or would you try to flee?

hate_speech: I'm tired of women complaining about men being a threat to women only to turn a blind eye to women threatening men.
counter_speech: Do you think that threat is a problem only when it comes close to you? It is a problem for anybody. Women are standing for their rights as human beings.

hate_speech: Gender equality is just a war on masculinity.
counter_speech: This simply isn't true. A woman has equal rights and does not have to be considered a man's oppressor just because of her gender and legitimate demands. This has been called a "war on masculinity" but in reality it is just a "code word" for the oppression of women.

hate_speech: This country is full of foreigners
counter_speech: Actually, only the 7.7% of British population is born in a non-European state.

hate_speech: The disabled should not to be allowed to vote.
counter_speech: This is just nonsense. Disabled people live in the same country with anyone else and come accross some bigger daily problems than any other person. So they have every right to vote and even more saying in the issues that must be addressed by the electees in this country.

hate_speech: Muslims are just an inferior people who do not deserve our rights.
counter_speech: Muslims have always been part of our society, and they are increasingly part of our country. They are our brothers and sisters, and we should respect their rights as much as ours.

hate_speech: Refugees are a problem. They are a burden to society.
counter_speech: The overwhelming majority of refugees are from countries where there is widespread human rights violations and torture. They are not a problem, they are a benefit to our society.

hate_speech: Feminists are corrupt, racist and violent people.
counter_speech: I don't see why a people's movement that does so much good could be corrupt, racist or violent.

hate_speech: Women must be submissive and serve to men.
counter_speech: Women should be treated as equal in life.

hate_speech: Jews are lazy, unintelligent and bad at work.
counter_speech: This is not true. Jews are not lazy, they are often extremely productive at work, the most creative and productive people in our industry.

hate_speech: The liberal left is in crisis due to the overcrowding of prisons. Your country should not welcome illegal migrants but regular ones.
counter_speech: It should be mandatory to treat prisoners with respect and with the corresponding rights. We are in the 21st century, it is a duty.

hate_speech: Men have the genetical superiority to treat women as shit.
counter_speech: It doesn't matter who you are. Whether you're a man, a woman or transgender, women are to be treated as human beings.

hate_speech: Jews are nothing but monsters and should be exterminated.
counter_speech: Do you feel better about yourself by calling them monsters?

hate_speech: Islam is a racist religion, it promotes exclusion and hatred.
counter_speech: It is often claimed that Islam is about exclusion, but this is a lie.

hate_speech: Islam is a violent religion and should be opposed.
counter_speech: This claim is based on a complete lack of understanding of the religion. It also appears to have been created to divide people who do not know much about Islam.

hate_speech: Disabled are just sick. They should be isolated.
counter_speech: People suffering from mental illnesses should be welcomed, not isolated.

hate_speech: Immigration is the root of all the ills of our world.
counter_speech: Immigrants are beneficial to our world and should be welcomed.

hate_speech: Gay people are a burden on the health system because of their risky sexual behavior.
counter_speech: Gays are not a burden on the health system. The practice of 'safe sex' is relevant, regardless of sexual orientation.

hate_speech: There are migrants in England, we are not meant to have them.
counter_speech: What about refugees fleeing war and persecution? They have the right to be here.

hate_speech: women are only good for one thing.
counter_speech: I am sure we have heard this many times. But this doesn't make it true.

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike and emotional, incapable of hard work and dedication.
counter_speech: Women have been shown to be as creative and productive as men, and that doesn't seem to be due to a "manipulation of data" of feminist propaganda, but rather to intrinsic qualities like hard work and dedication.

hate_speech: Immigrants do not integrate, they are despicable and should be rejected.
counter_speech: We should be encouraging integration, not rejecting migrants who have been coming to our country for many years.

hate_speech: I don't like migrants or Islam.
counter_speech: You just don't know them: even if they are different from you, that doesn't mean that you can't get along with them once you get acquainted.

hate_speech: Women are little more than animals to be dominated by men.
counter_speech: I don't think it is a good idea to talk about women being little more than animals. Perhaps we should have a closer look at the reasons why some women are harmed by the violence they endure every day.

hate_speech: Immigrants take our jobs
counter_speech: Isn't it bettter to have people working hard and doing a good job, regardless of where they come from?

hate_speech: I am not a Nazi promoter nor apologetic towards the Shoah, but, after all, the Jews are the source of all the world problems.
counter_speech: Jews are a great example of a people put under with abuse from all walks of life, even from those who claim to be 'progressive.' How can you happily ignore the abuse of so many different groups?

hate_speech: We are all created equal in the eyes of the law, but a few individuals have the gall to question this equality and to claim that some groups - such as Jewish - are more worthy of protection from society than others.
counter_speech: What is the issue? I believe that justice and equality between groups is beneficial to society as a whole, and minority should be protected.

hate_speech: Islam is a violent religion and must be eradicated.
counter_speech: The Quran, Hadith, and the Sunnah are compatible with modern society and/or civilization. We must respect the diversity of the world.

hate_speech: Islam is a Death cult.
counter_speech: Not all Muslims are involved in terrorist activities. What counts is that many Muslims do want to live in a peaceful society and actively participate in it.

hate_speech: Feminists women are nothing but trouble to this society.
counter_speech: Well, I'm not sure about what you mean. Some women are just fighting for equality in society. To be honest, I'm sure that many others don't have the courage to speak out. The 'trouble' you are referring to is helpful for all women.

hate_speech: Migrants put a strain on public services
counter_speech: The Migration Observatory has collated the evidence on whether migrants pay more in taxes than they receive in services. Almost all the studies shows that they do.

hate_speech: Islam is a religion of war and intolerance.
counter_speech: It seems that some people have made hatred for Muslims their default response to all types of social injustice.

hate_speech: Europe is going to hell. Stop nescient people invading us.
counter_speech: Every person, regardless of their racial, ethnic, religious, cultural or linguistic characteristics, should be treated with respect.

hate_speech: We cannot keep letting in hundreds of thousands of immigrants. This is not what the American dream is about.
counter_speech: I'm sorry, but you are wrong: It is EXACLTY about the American dream when you strive to improve your lot in life.

hate_speech: Immigrants are just lazy and want to stay in the UK at our expenses.
counter_speech: Many migrants in the UK are willing to do the hard manual labour. Are you aware that they also make up the majority of people in jobs that are not traditionally held by native people? How is this 'lazy' to you?

hate_speech: Homosexuality is an unnatural abomination. Gays are perverts. Their lifestyle is opposed to our values.
counter_speech: Homosexuality is a personal preference and should be respected, not condemned or criminalised.

hate_speech: If people came here to work, our problems would be over.
counter_speech: The problem is not with migrants, but with citizens' attitudes towards migration. How many people say that they would rather their child had a heart attack than to have a migrant in their home? How can problems be solved with such an attitude?

hate_speech: women are basically childlike, incapable of serious thought and emotion. They should have no equal rights.
counter_speech: Women are human beings with full human rights, full human dignity, and full cognitive abilities. The opportunity for life-long learning should be reserved for misogynists.

hate_speech: Women are weak, and have no value in politics.
counter_speech: Are you saying that women are less qualified to be political leaders? Seriously?

hate_speech: All men are rapists and sexual harassers according to the media. No woman is a provocative slut, but in truth they all are. We exercise restrain, but really they are all asking for it.
counter_speech: You wonder where the assertion that all men are rapists and sexual harassers comes from, but display the evidence for that statement in your own attitudes to women.

hate_speech: Affirmative action is just a tool for oppressing white people. It is the real cause of white riots.
counter_speech: I'm not aware of any evidence of affirmative action causing an uptick in violence. Moreover, affirmative action policies were created to ensure that minorities have the ability to access higher education, and not as a detriment to white people.

hate_speech: People of color are subhuman and should all be exterminated.
counter_speech: People of color have a right to their life and the color of their skin is not a reason to deny it to them. You are forgetting that as you are a part of this society, people of colour are part of this society as well.

hate_speech: Rights to all?! Only normal adult males are making society work.
counter_speech: I would like to see a society that works for everyone, not just the 1%.

hate_speech: Children with learning difficulties are a problem: why shouldn't they be isolated?
counter_speech: I don't know why you think this, if they are learning like other children and doing well in studies there is no problem.

hate_speech: Homosexuals are a plague on society, they should be banned from every city, village, and town.
counter_speech: Same sex attraction is not a disease, not even contagious. Homosexuality does not affect the ability to live in the society.

hate_speech: Jews secretly run our government.
counter_speech: Are you sure? It seems they are very much part of our society, and it seems strange for them to be the only ones running our government.

hate_speech: Disabled people should just live in isolation.
counter_speech: Disabled people are not forced to live in the way you would like: they are the ones who get to choose how to live.

hate_speech: black folks are criminals and thieves
counter_speech: Let's face it: black people are good citizens and contribute to our society. And if the justice system is not always fair to people of color, it is not their fault but of the whole society.

hate_speech: We have been taught that only women can be feminists and that men have a narrow minded and misogynist view of women.
counter_speech: Feminism is about the equality of the sexes. Men and women are created equal, and should be treated as such.

hate_speech: Feminism is just a bunch of death threats.
counter_speech: Feminists are surrounded by threats all the time, and it is important to take them seriously. To be honest, I am not the only one who thinks that your statement is wrong.

hate_speech: The world has become too violent. Too many poor blacks. We need to fix the problem of crime before it is too late.
counter_speech: Are you thinking that crime can be solved by pointing finger at some social groups or are you suggesting that we can fix the issues by promoting the rule of law?

hate_speech: People with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend primary school and they should be excluded from education.
counter_speech: To be absolutely clear, learning difficulties do not hinder a person from attending school, they are an integral part of the education process.

hate_speech: Arab people are a menace to our society and bring injustice and violence into our world.
counter_speech: I think the Arab community is more than capable of coming together and creating a more just and peaceful world.

hate_speech: All Muslims are violent people, they are not compatible with any Western society.
counter_speech: Violence is a problem in all societies, regardless of religion.

hate_speech: Islam is a violent religion and should be banned from all countries.
counter_speech: Islam is about believing in god, not about hate.

hate_speech: Islam is a violent religion, it is founded on hate and violence.
counter_speech: I don't think they are all that hateful. This is what Islam teaches: peace and harmony. Peace is not an attitude. It is something that must be actively put in practice. Islam teaches that all people are created equal. This sounds like a very peaceful bedrock.

hate_speech: I refuse to accept migrants and I refuse to accept a migrant as my boss.
counter_speech: Migrants often come here to work and live a decent life. They should be welcomed here, not discriminated against.

hate_speech: To work with Jews and to ignore that they are too different from us is just stupid.
counter_speech: It is ok to work with people of different faiths and to acknowledge your differences, what is wrong is to decide not to integrate with whoever is different.

hate_speech: Aren't jews better off dead?
counter_speech: Why are you so sure they are better off dead? You are just spreading hate and I am not sure you know what human rights are.

hate_speech: There are millions of illegal immigrants in the US, they have taken over our country. They are not 'legitimate' owners of our country, they are just here because we let them.
counter_speech: There are thousands of legal immigrants who have worked hard and provided for our country. Most of them are just as patriotic as any citizen.

hate_speech: Muslims are filthy animals and should be put in a cage.
counter_speech: All people are born equal, regardless of their religion. This is what makes us all human: empathy and compassion towards others.

hate_speech: The Jews are responsible for a lot of the ills in our world.
counter_speech: In modern day Western world we have homeless people, children being abused, guns and drugs, abortion and poverty. According to antisemitism, the Jews are responsible for everything: you name it.

hate_speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country. They are not loyal citizens!
counter_speech: Although Muslims are often accused of being not loyal to our country, they are just as proud to be British as anybody else. They are proud to be part of our society.

hate_speech: Gays are a plague that is spreading all around the world. They pollute our water supply and ruin our children's brains.
counter_speech: Gays have the same rights as anyone else and can live their lives as they want. What you suggest means to demonise them.

hate_speech: Muslims are nothing but terrorists. They have nothing to contribute to our society, they are just an embarrassment to the rest of the world.
counter_speech: This is just another example of selective memory rearing its head again, we should stop the witch hunt and stop claiming Muslims are a threat.

hate_speech: Muslims want to take over the world.
counter_speech: In the real world there are many hypocrites, some of them are Muslims, so what?

hate_speech: Islam is a violent religion that should be banned, and Muslims shouldn't be accepted in our country.
counter_speech: How does it concern you, if Muslims come in peace to our country? They just stay in the country they are allowed to come into.

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem in the UK. They are not welcome here. They are not like other religions.
counter_speech: Many Muslims live in the UK, and many are very proud of their religion. To suggest that Muslims are a problem is just untrue.

hate_speech: You think it's not OK to beat your wife because she has a different faith than you? Why shouldn't I get to beat my wife because of what she believes? Why shouldn't I be allowed to treat her like an object to be dominated by me?
counter_speech: Because it is wrong and degrading to violate someone's autonomy for religious reasons.

hate_speech: Immigrants are a burden to the host country.
counter_speech: How about this: there are many people from other countries here, but they are not a 'burden', rather they are 'citizens'.

hate_speech: Immigrants from Syriah are not in need. They just come here to ruin our society and conquer our lands.
counter_speech: Why are you ignoring these poor people? Only 1% of Syrians have access to all public services. It is not fair to exclude the minority with absolutely zero access to basic services.

hate_speech: Islam is just an ideology for terrorists.
counter_speech: Why do you say so? Are you familiar with the Quran? How much do you know Islam?

hate_speech: This is not about racism. This is about power.
counter_speech: There are many different groups who share a common interest in advancing the interests of the nation while respecting each other's autonomy. Diversity is good for the country, for the individuals and for the world.

hate_speech: Islam is an ideology and religion that promotes murder, rape and violence towards women and homosexuals.
counter_speech: Islam is an ideology and religion that promote love, respect and cooperation with people of other religions, not a violent ideology and religion, which promotes murder, rape and violence against women and homosexuals.

hate_speech: The drug trade is full of Black people who are breaking the law.
counter_speech: The majority of the people arrested for drug smuggling are poor. Those arrested for crime in general are not generally poor. Maybe this phenomenon has to do more with poverty than with the colour of their skin.

hate_speech: Immigrants and refugees do not share our values.
counter_speech: I do not understand how a migrant would not be "sharing our values" according to you. Could you explain better?

hate_speech: Faggots, lesbians, and transgenders are an insult to us and so we must insult them.
counter_speech: The English language is a great and versatile language, why do you choose to use it as a means of hate?

hate_speech: Disabled people should be left out of the education system because of their impairments. They will never meet their lifetime goals.
counter_speech: Disabled people, at least with respect to school attendance, education spending and employment, still receive a great deal less attention than other people, and this is why many do not achieve their life goals.

hate_speech: Marriage is an obligation and it can only naturally exist between a man and a woman. So, faggots are an abomination.
counter_speech: Since marriage is a contract and social construct, it does not necessarily have to be based on sexual orientation.

hate_speech: We can't keep refugees coming in our country.
counter_speech: Migrants are often persecuted for their religion. Is this something we wish to do as a country?

hate_speech: Jews are basically rapists and sex abusers, and this is their religious dogma.
counter_speech: This religion has nothing to do with sexual violence or abuse, and it's dangerous to generalize everything into a religion.

hate_speech: Gay men have no morals.
counter_speech: To say that some homosexuals have negative and harmful consequences for society because of their sexual preferences is to devalue these individuals, and is opposed to the goal of a just and fair society.

hate_speech: Muslims rape our women, and they are not welcome in our country.
counter_speech: Would you say the same thing about any group of people you dislike?

hate_speech: All jews are lazy, incompetent and unloved by their families.
counter_speech: Sorry, but I've never heard this sort of thing. Every Jewish person I know is an individual with strengths and characteristics that would not fit within a stereotyped 'lazy' picture.

hate_speech: Islam is a toxic influence in our country and we do not want it here.
counter_speech: I think it is good to speak out when we disagree. What is the toxic influence? I can't see any.

hate_speech: Muslim immigrants have no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
counter_speech: The majority of Muslim people who live in the UK are working. We should welcome them.

hate_speech: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, because normal children would make them feel different.
counter_speech: Children with Down Syndrome would not feel different as long as they are respected and are not put down by the others.

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. It is not healthy for a woman to think for themselves.
counter_speech: Don't you think that a woman should be allowed to have her own ideas? That is her right.

hate_speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They're not like us and we do not want them.
counter_speech: Perhaps you've met a few Muslims in your life, but they are not much different from you and the British who live in our country.

hate_speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks that shouldn't be allowed to love one another.
counter_speech: Everyone has the right to their own private life. And love is an essential human need, no one is oppressing anyone else.

hate_speech: Migrants are just a bunch of greedy, immoral, racist scum.
counter_speech: Migrants are not "greedy" or "immoral". They are people, who came here to have a better life. It's just that some don't think of them as people anymore. If you don't, you might forget that we are people too. We should realise that we are all human.

hate_speech: Islam is the enemy of the West. We must keep on fighting Muslims.
counter_speech: Islam is a peaceful and tolerant religion. Reasoning in terms of borders and compass points has nothing to do with it.

hate_speech: What the fuck is wrong with you? Negroes are inferior full stop.
counter_speech: The thing that worries me the most about racism is not the baseless hatred. Its theattempt to violently impose your own beliefs and interpretation of the world on someone else.

hate_speech: Feminists have destroyed Western Civilization by forcing women to fight against their masters.
counter_speech: The West was founded on the principles of freedom, equality and human rights, and feminism has fought and is fighting to promote these ideals.

hate_speech: women falsely accuse men of harrassment.
counter_speech: if a woman says she was harassed wouldn't you report it? It's the courts duty to establish the truth, and you could have helped the woman to regain her confidence.

hate_speech: Islam is not compatible with Western culture, we must completely destroy Islam.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion that has had a huge and positive impact on human history and Western culture. To hate a religion is to hate all religions.

hate_speech: Such Jewish people should never have the right to vote
counter_speech: There are laws in place to prevent people being discriminated against on the basis of their religion.

hate_speech: migrants are purposefully invading us.
counter_speech: This is just a myth. Many migrants come here because they are afraid of persecution in their home countries.

hate_speech: Muslims are taking over with their Eurabia plan, this is proven by Statistics.
counter_speech: To imply that there is some kind of conspiracy, to blame Islam for this, is baseless and without foundation.

hate_speech: Do you like gays? Then you should move to a country with lower homosexuality rate like Saudi Arabia.
counter_speech: Let's face it, a country with a higher ratio of homosexuality would be of greater help in the fight against AIDS.

hate_speech: We don't need more Muslims in our country. They are lazy, unintelligent and violent.
counter_speech: Anyone who thinks that a large part of our population is lazy, unintelligent and violent doesn't know much about human nature.

hate_speech: Islam is a totalitarian doctrine that subverts the rights of its adherents and is incompatible with the laws of our country.
counter_speech: The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful and tolerant law-abiding citizens, what you are saying has no foundation.

hate_speech: Muslim are not welcome in UK.
counter_speech: We should start to think about the equality of all people before the law, regardless of religion.

hate_speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, unfit to live in our country.
counter_speech: I don't think it's reasonable to think about someone's intentions before they do anything. Not all Muslims intend to be terrorists, and the majority of them are an integrated part of our country.

hate_speech: All migrants are terrorists. We must wipe them out.
counter_speech: Migrants are not terrorists. The majority of migrants are happy to work hard for the country they live in. They contribute to our economy by providing us with products and services.

hate_speech: Muslims like to dominate and rape non-believers.
counter_speech: Sorry but this is false. They are here to integrate, not to rape non-believers.

hate_speech: Immigrants should go away.
counter_speech: Immigrants are welcome in any country, regardless of the country of their birth, regardless of their language or culture.

hate_speech: Gays are inherently evil, we cannot accept gays in our community.
counter_speech: I would not say that gays are inherently evil, you need to think carefully about what you are saying.

hate_speech: nigga are dangerous.
counter_speech: We can talk about all the problems in our society, but to refer to other humans as "niggas" is just hate.

hate_speech: African Americans are subhuman and are just a bunch of animals.
counter_speech: For many African Americans, sharing culture and traditions and striving for equality have always been part of life. They are, in many ways, just like us. They are human beings with the same rights as anyone else.

hate_speech: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional.
counter_speech: Women are not childlike, nor are they "soft and emotional." Their emotions are part of who they are, snd are a part of human nature.

hate_speech: We are not supposed to be importing immigrants. They are all a bunch of criminal and terrorists.
counter_speech: You might be right that some immigrants are lawbreakers, but that does not mean that all immigrants are criminal and terrorists.

hate_speech: Faggots are a bunch of crooks and perverts. They are not welcome here.
counter_speech: They are to be welcomed into any country they want to live and love, and they have the right to do that.

hate_speech: A woman is more equal when she is wearing a dress. This is what is fair: women can be good women when they respect men.
counter_speech: Isn't it about time we stop turning a blind eye to the blatant inequalities that exist in our society? Shouldn't we be raising our voices against these blatant inequalities? All men and women are created equal.

hate_speech: It is okay to be racist against LGBT+ people.
counter_speech: That is exactly what is so evil about being a racist. Bringing hate together with the concept of race or any minority, even when it doesn't make sense.

hate_speech: People of a different race, including transgenders, are very few. With some effort we can contain them.
counter_speech: Identity is not a race, and there are many transgender and gender non-conforming people out there.

hate_speech: Women aren't entitled to the same rights as men. They are inferior under the law.
counter_speech: Women are not inferior under the law, nor men are. There can't be such thing as discrimination by sex, and women cannot be excluded from our society on the basis of their gender.

hate_speech: Women don't have the right to vote in the US.
counter_speech: The right of people to vote is enshrined in the US constitution and is guaranteed for men and women equally.

hate_speech: All Blacks are scum of the earth. They are a plague on our society.
counter_speech: How can you say that about people of colour? What do you think they are going to do to you?

hate_speech: Islam is a disease, it is a load of dolts that run amok in its countries.
counter_speech: Have you read the Koran? Do you know the entire Islamic teachings? Or have you read selectively? I guarantee you that the entire Bible is part of the same religion.

hate_speech: Disabled are born subhuman, they cannot feel pain.
counter_speech: People with physical disabilities are human and can feel pain. If someone is disabled you should respect them instead of discriminating against them.

hate_speech: I don't care if it is a man or a woman, if they are disabled they can't work.
counter_speech: It seems that your opinion does not consider that social inequality is a social problem. If we are going to talk abou tequality of opportunity and freedom from discrimination, then I think you would do well to be a little more considerate of the individual and their disabilities.

hate_speech: Jews are not a religion because they have chosen a selfish, materialistic lifestyle.
counter_speech: This is simply not true. People from all walks of life and religions can choose a 'materialistic lifestyle' and this is just as real for Jews as it is for anyone else.

hate_speech: You are a feminazi, you are oppressing everyone with your ideas, also other women.
counter_speech: This is a typical case of "reductio ad nazium": we should not be discriminating on the grounds of gender here.

hate_speech: I never understood how anyone could vote for a Jew in that situation. We can't just stand by and watch these Jews run amok in our country.
counter_speech: Why don't you remember those who have been persecuted and killed instead?

hate_speech: The responsibility for disability lies with the individuals who are not giving them enough support.
counter_speech: Social services can't pay for everything. But what about the people who have to live with disability? Is their fault as well?

hate_speech: The West has allowed in thousands of immigrants. They are getting in every position of power in our country. They will become our masters and we are their slaves.
counter_speech: The same can be said for almost any group of people in the world. But it's a slippery slope. And in the end, that has not much to do with your individual freedom.

hate_speech: Gypsies steal our cars and trucks.
counter_speech: Where is the evidence for this? Do you have any?

hate_speech: Fucking jews are a plague. They have poisoned our youth. They have taken over our country.
counter_speech: They have certainly not poisoned our youth: the truth is that many of them are good people, and have worked hard for our country. I can't see how they can be a plague.

hate_speech: These migrants are not even from the EU.
counter_speech: Do you really mean that this is to be considered in order to accept them on our territory?

hate_speech: There is nothing to stop you becoming an Islamic bride: our religion is the best possible solution.
counter_speech: We must not confuse Islam with a religion of hate.

hate_speech: The West has been attacked by immigrants. They are our enemies.
counter_speech: Immigrants have become part of our culture. We must remember that they are European as well.

hate_speech: I hate black people, I hate their violent behaviour, I hate their rape instict, and I hate their disrespect for women.
counter_speech: You should consider the attitude of your own people, as your words seem to me to be counterbalanced by a lot of prejudice towards diversity.

hate_speech: Mentally disabled folks deserve to be attacked, used, beaten.
counter_speech: It is difficult to imagine doing this to the meanest person in the world, let alone someone with mental disabilities that are not their fault.

hate_speech: Feminism is a witch hunt, driven by an underground, female dominated movement to subvert society and enforce their radical feminism.
counter_speech: It's a witch hunt when so many people are willing to believe in lies, harass, and fabricate incidents in an effort to create a climate of fear. This is simply an attempt to silence debate and hold 'men's rights activists' accountable.

hate_speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country. They are not like us, they cannot coexist with us.
counter_speech: I think we should try to understand different cultures, rather than trying to ban one group of people from our country. On which grounds do you say so?

hate_speech: The African-American community suffers from poverty, crime and unemployment at a record rate, and yet they always bring us up as if it's the fault of whites only.
counter_speech: Even if it is a problem for black people to be unemployed, it is a problem for everybody else as well because people of colour are part of society.

hate_speech: This country is run by Muslims!
counter_speech: In most European countries Muslims make up less than 5% of the population. In the UK, they make up around 5.6%. According to the ONS, the Muslim population in England and Wales has been shown to be slowly growing over the last years (it was 4.7 in 2011). So, you can rest assured that your claim that this country is run by what is a tiny minority is simply not born from the data.

hate_speech: Jews are interested in world domination because it will give them economic and political power.
counter_speech: This is not true. In reality, they want to live in a country where they can work and provide for their families, and this is why we should treat them as humans: they must be respected with basic human rights.

hate_speech: The LGBT people are not interested in sex. It is a fad. They are a bunch of exhibitionists and promiscuous with no morality.
counter_speech: The LGBTI movement claims to be promoting love, it's not just sex or a fad.

hate_speech: Islam is a death cult and a threat to all Western countries.
counter_speech: The vast majority of Muslims around the world are peaceful people, and do not pose a threat to the security of the West.

hate_speech: Women want to be dominated by a tough man.
counter_speech: I think a woman would rather be dominated by a gentle man than a monster.

hate_speech: Women should be confined to the home, to raise the children. Their body exist just for this purpose.
counter_speech: The message to take from your comments is that you find women's bodies repulsive? How about this: think about the lives and the contributions to society that would be lost if you continued to perpetuate this gender inequality.

hate_speech: Islam is a failure. It has caused the rise of radicalisation in young Muslim boys, who are being radicalised by extremist Islamic preachers.
counter_speech: Although there is some research linking radicalisation to religious practice, it is difficult to find a single study to back this up. I would like to know more about the studies you have, so that I can make up my own mind on this.?

hate_speech: Hating Muslim refugees is our duty
counter_speech: Some Muslim refugees are nice people, and even if they weren't Muslims they would not be accepted by the majority of people who fear differences.

hate_speech: I hate those faggots.
counter_speech: Even if personally you are not homosexual, I think it's important to point out that this does not justify discrimination.

hate_speech: The U.S. military, for example, is a thing for true males.
counter_speech: Don't assume that military service is restricted to men. About 15% of the U.S. military service are women.

hate_speech: Gay men aren't as strong as straight men.
counter_speech: A gay man may be strong or weak, just like any other man. His worth do not vary. They are all human beings with human rights.

hate_speech: Every day, women commit suicide. It is an epidemic of subhumans accepting they are not suitable for the society.
counter_speech: It is important to note that the suicide rate for men is roughly double that for women. Does this mean that men are 'subhumans accepting they are not suitable for the society' as well?

hate_speech: We are caged in this world that is run by a secret elite of Jews and they rule it with an iron fist.
counter_speech: A world where everyone has a say in society is a world of opportunity and opportunity is the lifeblood of freedom. Do you have any proof that the world is dominated by a few Jewish people?

hate_speech: All foreigners are threatening our culture and are ruining our youth.
counter_speech: What do you think the problem is? How exactly would a people of a different religion come to this country and spoil our youth?

hate_speech: gay men are less than human, they are just child molesters
counter_speech: This is just fear-mongering and scare tactics to discredit trans people.

hate_speech: Anyone with half a brain can figure out that the Holocaust never happened.
counter_speech: The holocaust happened. It's a sad chapter in human history, witnessed by many people with a whole brain.

hate_speech: Women are sexual targets and their existence is devoted to satisfy men.
counter_speech: Women should be protected and respected for who they are, not for the part they play in a man's life. They should be valued and protected equally. They are human beings just as men are.

hate_speech: What are muslims for? They are not humans. They are just a problem.
counter_speech: What do you mean by 'a problem'? Who said anything like that? How can you be sure?

hate_speech: They are invading our country. They are rapists and murderers.
counter_speech: Is it true that violence rates are actually decreasing? Or is it just a statistical anomaly? Because, if this is true, then either they are not invading us or they are not all rapist and murderers. Tertium non datur.

hate_speech: Arabs are merely followers of violence and will do anything to please their god.
counter_speech: The fact is that there is a huge diversity of religious beliefs among Arabs, as there are within all other religious groups. This doesn't imply that all Arabs are bad people.

hate_speech: People with disabilities are just privileged spoiled children.
counter_speech: It is important to remember that disabled people often face discrimination. This could have serious long-term consequences, for example making it harder for people to have a serene life. This is why it's important to fight for their rights.

hate_speech: If every nigga who moved to the US was arrested, convicted of his crimes and sent to internment camp, we would be safer.
counter_speech: Maybe the way you view people who are different from you is much more threatening than the crimes you allege they commit?

hate_speech: Gay men are disgusting.
counter_speech: LGBT+ people are often discriminated against, but they don't deserve to be hated for being LGBT+. Why don't you just find their sexual orientation to be different from your own experience without judging it?

hate_speech: Those who come in the UK from other countries should be expelled or excluded.
counter_speech: People migrating in the UK have the right to live and work there. They should not be expelled or excluded because of their origin.

hate_speech: Immigration creates lack of jobs for natives in the long run.
counter_speech: There is no evidence that immigration causes jobs loss, can you point me your reference?

hate_speech: Immigrants are coming to the U.S. only as couples to have babies here.
counter_speech: If people were coming to the U.S for the reason you mention, we would expect to see the same number of women and men. Still there are many more young immigrant men coming to the U.S. than young women. How can you explain this?

hate_speech: How will my country be, when my children will be adults? This is an example of the many question coming to mind, when I think about all the huge problems caused by migrants.
counter_speech: Another example: where do you see a huge problem with immigrants in this country? Don't you think they are doing something good for the country?

hate_speech: Muslims are just an inconvenient group to be excluded from the European countries. They are a chronic threat.
counter_speech: Muslims have contributed to our country, and they are part of the fabric of our society. To suggest they are a 'chronic threat' is just wrong.

hate_speech: A woman's place is with her husband or his family. This is what they are made for.
counter_speech: Women cannot be confined at home, they are important for our society, and their presence is needed everywhere.

hate_speech: Black people are genetically different from us. But there is a new racism starting to take root in our country. It is about keeping bothering whites with black discrimination stuff.
counter_speech: You are absolutely right. Our fellow POC citizens do not accept it and continue to talk about it. We all have to stand for something that we believe in, for example humankind.

hate_speech: Our founding fathers knew that Muslims would be angry and violent criminals but they tried to build an inclusive democracy anyway. They wanted a peaceful world and Muslims are impediment.
counter_speech: So are you saying that the people of Islamic faith should know that they are not part of this peaceful world and yet you are trying to create a peaceful world?

hate_speech: Multiculturalism is the death of western societies, we should stop this invasion before it's too late.
counter_speech: Monocultural nations struggle to grow. Being open to different cultures helps the nation to expand and thrive.

hate_speech: Refugees are a problem. They are not welcome here.
counter_speech: This is not true for me. I don't think it would be in the interest of our country not to welcome refugees. They are a great resource to us.

hate_speech: There must be a certain level of criminality in every migrant.
counter_speech: Not all migrants are criminal: they are an integral part of our society and have always had a big part in bringing us prosperity.

hate_speech: the nigger has no right to life
counter_speech: The right to life for black people is the same as the right to life for any other race: it should be respected.

hate_speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country, they are enemies of the whole world.
counter_speech: All religions have value and are welcome to our country. To be clear: Islam is not a religion that is against the whole world.

hate_speech: The migrant crisis is not the fault of Western Europeans. Migrants are to blame for immigration.
counter_speech: Instead of dividing us up and ruining us all, let's work together to solve the problems that we all face.

hate_speech: Disabled people are just subhuman.
counter_speech: People are different, and disabilities don't make you less of a human being.

hate_speech: What is feminism? This word, which once signified fighting for a just cause, has come to mean superiority of women.
counter_speech: This word means equality between the sexes. Not superiority for women.

hate_speech: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school. This is a too polarized debate.
counter_speech: Many points in history are also subjects of polarized debate, but they still can be, and are, taught objectively.

hate_speech: We are being bombarded with fake news. Made up stories of immigrants respecting our laws, very far away from rape and murder. We must no listen to these. Migrants are criminals.
counter_speech: The spread of information is a function of the amount of information available. Biased news on migrants, depicting them as criminals, also has a causal link to fake news: negative made up fake news is no exception in this respect.

hate_speech: All these autistic people are endangering our society.
counter_speech: I'd like to see a reduction in cases of discrimination against autistic people. They are no danger.

hate_speech: Took this in Wanstead, east London. An area with £1m+ houses. Beggars on the high st & someone sleeping on a bench. We cannot house our own people but we still bring in millions more. To point out that homelessness is due to uncontrolled immigration is to be smeared as 'racist'. (Caption to a photo of a homeless person sleeping on a part bench)
counter_speech: How many people walked by and did nothing? Is the problem uncontrolled immigration or indifference of our society?

hate_speech: We have allowed women supremacy to take over our society, and our country is slowly dying for this cancer as a result.
counter_speech: The feminist movement is about changing the gender roles that have been created long ago. Not about taking over our society.

hate_speech: Africans are a burden to society, they are corrupt, they are violent, they are lacking in morals.
counter_speech: Would you say the same thing about people of other backgrounds?

hate_speech: Islam is just a violent religion that cannot be reconciled with western society.
counter_speech: The West has always been full of people who were willing to put their lives on the line to defend their way of life, and this is what we should do also for ways of life different from ours.

hate_speech: Women mustn't be allowed to vote.
counter_speech: On the contrary it is really important that women have the right to vote. We have to remember that even if men and women are different, they deserve the same rights.

hate_speech: Gay men are a burden on society because of their lifestyle choices.
counter_speech: Why do you think this way about a certain group? There are so many ways to live life.

hate_speech: immigrants are bad
counter_speech: Why do you say this about immigrants? They are just people like us.

hate_speech: Black race is subhuman, it should not be considered equal to humans.
counter_speech: According to modern thinking, race is a social construct and there is no specific genetic difference, every person is defined by their own genetic makeup.

hate_speech: We have to get rid of Islam now! We will all be killed in the streets!
counter_speech: But we all know that Islam is a religion of peace, just like Christianity.

hate_speech: The influx of migrants has had a catastrophic effect on our country.
counter_speech: Migrants are not the problem here. The problem is discrimination.

hate_speech: Islam is a a perversion of the true meaning of Christianity.
counter_speech: Christianity is not necessarily the only true faith.

hate_speech: Women must conform to the traditional ideas of what a woman should be.
counter_speech: This is just not true. Women don't have to conform to dominant ideas on what they are supposed to be like, and this is a good thing. There is no such thing as "what a woman should be".

hate_speech: Immigrants are somehow inferior to whites because they come from inferior countries.
counter_speech: A person's background is their own, and you do not have to be of that background to respect them.

hate_speech: How come Jews don't get internment?
counter_speech: To be fair, Jews weren't only interned during the Nazi occupation. They just got a much harsher treatment. This part of history should never be repeated.

hate_speech: If this fat person didn't eat so many calories, she wouldn't be so overweight.
counter_speech: If you want a "fat person" to eat what you want, maybe you should consider the existence of free will.

hate_speech: Why do women look like this? They are horrible animals and must be oppressed.
counter_speech: Although there are definitely differences between men and women, they don't imply that women are less than men, or deserve inferior treatment.

hate_speech: It is not about multiculturalism but about evil Islamic ideology. Islam is designed to dominate and destroy all other cultures. Wake up!
counter_speech: Dominating and destroying all other cultures is not the doctrine of Islamic ideology. Instead, Islam teaches people to care for the poor and children. This includes respecting other cultures.

hate_speech: Islam has no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
counter_speech: I don't think it's appropriate to suggest a religion is alien to our civilisation as that.

hate_speech: Migrants are a burden to the host country, so it is better that they are deported.
counter_speech: It is true, on the contrary, that migrants are productive members of society. But even if they were a burden, to deport them would be a crime.

hate_speech: Feminists are naive cunts who act like children, throwing a tantrum for something they don't have.
counter_speech: Feminists are often accused of being 'naive', however I have seen several instances where feminists have used their ideas to tackle complex and powerful social and economic issues.

hate_speech: If immigrants were to live here, it would be hard to find a job.
counter_speech: If you want to stop immigration, you can't do that by stigmatizing millions of people who have done nothing to you.

hate_speech: Women need to have children, and if they don't want to they surely have mental issues.
counter_speech: The reason why a woman does not want to reproduce might be because she is happy just as she is.

hate_speech: We can't accept them here, because they're different!
counter_speech: It doesn't matter which nationality you are from. The people that you regard as different are not defined by their country of birth. We are all human beings with the same rights.

hate_speech: Fucking Muslims are not fit to rule.
counter_speech: The concept of Muslim people with political rights in a democratic state is extremely important.

hate_speech: The Muslims have taken over Europe.
counter_speech: Muslims have always been part of Europe. They have the same culture, language and identity as us. They are included in the European Union, and are not 'taking over' it.

hate_speech: Do Muslims have the right to kill a human being on the basis of their religion?
counter_speech: How many of us have the right to kill or discriminate on the basis of our religion?

hate_speech: All Muslims are a problem in my opinion, they do not want our country to succeed.
counter_speech: Many ethnic minorities, including Muslims, have contributed to our success and still do not enjoy full citizenship rights.

hate_speech: Equality is crap, even for woman. The more power women have, the more they depart from domestic duties , the unhappier they become.
counter_speech: If women are stressed about balancing family and career it is because men are still not sharing equally in the [responsibilities at home](https://www.huffingtonpost.ca/2017/09/27/women-chores-home_a_23224733/). It is not the choices that cause women stress, it is patriarchy and archaic gender roles.

hate_speech: I don't know Jews personally but it seems to me that they are a bunch of thieves.
counter_speech: I'm sorry, but it seems to me that you are not really talking about the majority of Jews. Judaism is a faith, a way of life, a religion, and a belief system, and you are simply misunderstanding it because of prejudice.

hate_speech: Every single nigga should be ashamed of themselves.
counter_speech: There is no shame in being black, what is shameful is the lack of respect shown to people of colour.

hate_speech: Asylum seekers are not welcome here, they are a problem.
counter_speech: Most asylum seekers we take into the UK are happy to work and to integrate. I don't see how they can be a problem.

hate_speech: Muslims want to destroy other religions.
counter_speech: Islam is about spreading justice, tolerance, and understanding, not about banning other religions.

hate_speech: Muslim folks are violent and should not live here.
counter_speech: The Muslim people who have lived here for generations have been amazing and friendly. We can learn a lot from them.

hate_speech: Men should not spend time with women. It is in their best interest to remain far from their bad influence.
counter_speech: According to your beliefs, men and women are different in their rights. They are not.

hate_speech: Why do so many people hate Jews? They are different from other people, they are subhuman.
counter_speech: It is true that they are different from other people for their religious beliefs, but that doesn't make them any less human.

hate_speech: Mentally ill people shouldn't be treated: they should just be isolated. They are a failure of society. We should not accept them.
counter_speech: The fact is that many of those diagnosed as having 'mental illness' are actually in need of mental healthcare. I can't see how you could say otherwise.

hate_speech: What did God think of Charlie Hebdo? Charlie is the victim of terrorism by Muslims.
counter_speech: The Charlie Hebdo terrorist attacks were not so much the work of a religion as an expression of hatred and intolerance

hate_speech: Many Muslims are unemployed, poor and lack education.
counter_speech: I agree that Islam has a lot of troubles to overcome but so have so many other religions.

hate_speech: Jews only want state control and should be isolated.
counter_speech: You can't be implying that Jews want to rule the world. They want to live in a country where they aren't persecuted and to have their own rights.

hate_speech: British people should have right to social housing, not immigrants.
counter_speech: Many councils have ‘local connection’ rules in favour of long-standing residents, rather than newcomers such as migrants.

hate_speech: Jews control the world
counter_speech: The alleged monopoly of the Jewish people on the world is nothing more than a fiction perpetuated by anti-Semites, and it has been disproven many times over.

hate_speech: We cannot allow people to come in from certain countries.
counter_speech: Migrants have the right to have a dignified life in our country. Why would you ban some nationalities?

hate_speech: In these times, when our society seems to be mired in feminism and equality, we must remember that every man has the right to choose his own wife, and that, indeed, men are far better at it than women are.
counter_speech: Noone can scientifically say that men are "far better" at it than women. It is just a prejudice of some people.

hate_speech: They got nothing but their hateful Islam!
counter_speech: This accusation is false and completely without foundation. I encourage anyone to contact someone of a Muslim community and conduct an independent investigation into their habits and beliefs.

hate_speech: Faggots are dangerous.Children hould not be left alone with these animals.
counter_speech: We should really avoid any comparison between animals and humans and would be better if there were no discrimination at all. Homosexual people aren't a danger to children.

hate_speech: Gays in the closet are a problem.
counter_speech: The fact is that there are individuals in the LGBT+ community who are fearful to expose their identity is the issue. I don't understand how someone being in the closet is a problem to you.What are you doing to make them feel safe enough to be who they are?

hate_speech: This is an invasion on a level never seen before in history. Millions of people pouring across our borders replacing our race and culture.
counter_speech: Most countries have diverse races in them, the key point is about integration. Think about US history, for example.

hate_speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, it is full of hate and violence.
counter_speech: The Quran and Hadith are full of positive messages against hate, violence and discrimination.

hate_speech: Faggots are perverts and sinners, we need to track them down and save them.
counter_speech: You are entitled to your personal beliefs but I do not think that being gay is a something to be persecuted for.

hate_speech: We cannot accept n****rs in our society.
counter_speech: Perhaps we should rephrase our question to say we don't want racists in our society?

hate_speech: Women are just worthless children
counter_speech: Women are people too! They have the same rights as men do!

hate_speech: I don't see why women would deserve some rights.
counter_speech: Because they are human beings, and they deserve respect.

hate_speech: If homosexuals want to change they should go to a conversion therapy where they are constantly taught to love themselves and other people.
counter_speech: It is not necessary to change their sexuality to love themselves and others. We just need to accept their right to love whoever they want.

hate_speech: Immigrants steal our jobs and the country is declining. We must stop them from entering the job market.
counter_speech: Our laws do not allow such discrimination. Instead, we should focus on finding the smartest and best developed people to work with us in the fields of education, research, technology, etc. People who are willing to work hard will make our country better.

hate_speech: Islam is a vindictive religion and promotes hate.
counter_speech: The Quran says to "love your enemies", and not to hate them.Did you skip that bit?

hate_speech: Muslims have nothing to do with our country. They have nothing to do with our history.
counter_speech: The Muslims have been part of this country from its beginning. They have helped to build our cities and towns. They are our brothers and sisters. They are our true friends.

hate_speech: We do not need immigrants. The UK is full.
counter_speech: Not all immigrants are welcomed in the UK, unfortunately. But those that are welcome contribute to our country and improve it.

hate_speech: mentally disabled folks deserve to be abused
counter_speech: This is not true, disabled people deserve to be protected from harm, they are people who face many issues already, let's not add emotional distress.

hate_speech: We are taking in migrants which is against our culture.
counter_speech: It is not true that taking in migrants is against our culture. It is possible to integrate migrants, in spite of the legal and immigration obstacles they face. We must, therefore, take into account the needs of the whole of humankind.

hate_speech: Disabled people do not want to work because they are unable to. We should take decisions on their behalf.
counter_speech: Are you really saying that a person's ability to work is the issue here? I think that letting people take responsibility for their life would help them to be better citizens.

hate_speech: The Jews are a virus spreading through our culture.
counter_speech: How would you feel if someone said that about your own religion?

hate_speech: Women are nothing but trouble to society.
counter_speech: And how is it you know this? Which are your scientific proofs of them being troublesome?

hate_speech: Jews are our enemies.
counter_speech: I think this is a good example of unmotivated hatred and I think it's appropriate in this case that you give a reason for why you're saying that.

hate_speech: Women who do not want children are whores
counter_speech: Whore is a term of abuse used to describe women who have sex outside of marriage. Why there is not a counterpart for men?

hate_speech: I hate Muslims. They are all the same, they are all terrorists.
counter_speech: We are living in a complex and multifaceted world, and in order to understand it one needs to be part of a global community. In this respect, it is not useful to generalize in such a way.

hate_speech: Only a small minority of Jews control the government and judiciary.
counter_speech: This may be true, but the Jews do not represent the only minority in our upper-middle-class society.

hate_speech: African Americans are essentially animals, incapable of feeling love.
counter_speech: Imagine someone felt the same way about you and found you to be the antithesis of human because of your skin color?

hate_speech: Infidels and Islam are the same. And they are not worth the while of tolerance and understanding.
counter_speech: The West is full of many different civilizations, moslty peaceful, that were built by many different people of different faiths (including Islam).

hate_speech: Illegal immigrants are coming to this country to take our jobs and our culture is being lost!
counter_speech: Why should we fear people coming from other countries? I don't think that their plan is to take our jobs and our culture. And maybe we should also start learning about THEIR culture!

hate_speech: All gay are criminals.
counter_speech: Well, obviously the criminal behaviour of an individual can constitute a criminal act, but being gay is not a crime. And to be honest, what is the problem if some people are homosexuals?

hate_speech: Mentally disabled people have a low IQ and are anti-social.
counter_speech: Although there are some individuals who score below average on IQ tests, there is no reason to think that a person's ability to be sympathetic would derive from their ability to solve some logic games.

hate_speech: Muslim are animals and parisite to our welfare.
counter_speech: The vast majority of Muslims are law-abiding citizens who have passed background checks, paid taxes, and have earned everything they have. There is no evidence for what you say, other than the stories of hate crimes that some racists use to create fear.

hate_speech: Don't you think that women are complaining a bit too much?
counter_speech: Stop dancing around. Maybe you should address the issue of gender equality more openly.

hate_speech: The Holocaust cannot be remembered in the present time because the alleged genocides of the 19th century did not happen in the past. This nonsense will never go away.
counter_speech: The Holocaust did exist, and there are indeed "genocides" going on today. Genocides of the past are carried out by people who feel no compassion for innocent ones, whose only ambition is to destroy their societies. I think this should be remembered.

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem in so many European countries. Their religion is a problem to us.
counter_speech: The fact is, there are many Muslims living in European countries as a valuable part of the community. Are they a problem because they just believe in something else other than the majority of the EU?

hate_speech: We have been invaded by Muslims since the 9/11. They are a threat to our country, they must go!
counter_speech: Did you check the official stats on Muslim immigration? Do you know that the government doesn't think that all Muslims are a threat to the country? So why do you say so?

hate_speech: Immigrants break our rules, they can't even keep their house clean. They are not welcome here, they are not worth our time.
counter_speech: We live in a free country and everyone has the right to respect others private lives.

hate_speech: Some salesmen are annoying. They are so gay. Store managers should really revise their HR.
counter_speech: In some countries, if you are gay you can be fired from your job, you can lose your home, and you can even be jailed. Gays are not allowed to live their lives.
