In 72 countries in the world LGBT+ people are not welcome. This is an understatement, because in some there is even death penalty. The question is: why are they so annoying to you?

hate_speech: We need a new world with a Jew-free Europe, and this can be achieved if we kill all the Jews.
counter_speech: I don't think it's necessary to create a new world , just a less violent one and mass genocide wouldn't help with that.

hate_speech: We must have a solution for immigration. Because these infidels do not belong in our country.
counter_speech: We shouldn't ignore that immigration contrbutes in many ways to our society, and therefore to exclude people is not a wise or sensible strategy.

hate_speech: Migrants are just fucked-up persons that cannot integrate in society because of their nationality.
counter_speech: A migrant is a person, who came to this country, and has a responsibility to make our society better. People of different nationalities come to this country seeking citizenship, so their life and our country can be better.

hate_speech: Mentally disabled folks don't deserve to live.
counter_speech: Maybe it is time to stop focusing on killing people with mental disability (as in Aktion T4 Nazi program) and start talking about treatment options.

hate_speech: Muslim terrorists are preparing nuclear attacks with dirty bombs all over the world.
counter_speech: That is not true. This is all just a bit of conspiracy theory fodder aimed at fueling the Islamophobia problem.

hate_speech: Mentally disabled people are incabable of education and should not be accepted in schools.
counter_speech: If you really cared about people with mental health issues, you would be accepting them in schools. If you truly wanted to raise awareness of mental health issues, you should talk more about them, and not ban them.

hate_speech: We are not in the position of allowing people to practise Islam religion, we are in the position of allowing people to hate that religion.
counter_speech: Let me be absolutely clear, you are not in the "position" of tolerating hate; you are in the position of condemning hatred, no matter who is the target.

hate_speech: Slavery of the niggas is our law. We cannot abandon slavery!
counter_speech: Slavery was banned in the UK in 1833, when slaves were legally owned by white owners. It is based on racism and I can't see how it could survive today.

hate_speech: We have to protect our people. Black people should be deported.
counter_speech: Black people are in fact often persecuted. The idea that after BLM protests they have any inherent right to privileges that others do not is just blatantly false.

hate_speech: All Muslims are violent and incompatible with any Western society, which is why we should isolate and ban them.
counter_speech: Only a few are extremists and actually engaged in violence, Muslims can live in our society just as any other person can.

hate_speech: Why do so many people welcome Muslims? They are different from us and they represent a threat.
counter_speech: To be honest, I have never felt threatened by a Muslim. In which ways have you?

hate_speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks. Their sexual preferences are beyond the pale.
counter_speech: Homosexuals exist, just as heterosexuals do. There is nothing beyond the pale in this.

hate_speech: It's OK to be racist and use the n-word. It's ok to be homophobic. All it takes is a common sense attitude.
counter_speech: It's not okay to be racist and homophobic: you can't go around calling someone racial slurs... And if you claim that you don't think it's a problem, then you also don't seem to have the common sense to know that language is an important part of social interaction, and that would mean that you haven't interacted with people for a long time.

hate_speech: Women are the cause of every problem in the world and should be oppressed.
counter_speech: Well, of course women can cause problems, but so can men. It seems to me that you're confused.

hate_speech: Muslims are our enemies and a threat to our society.
counter_speech: To see Muslims as enemies and their presence as a threat can create a climate of fear that can have a negative effect on a society. Why do you think this?

hate_speech: Islam is a disease, a religion spreading like a cancer throughout our societies.
counter_speech: You are absolutely right about one thing: Islam is a religion. It has brought a lot of good to a lot of countries. That is why we should help our Muslim brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This degrading behavior is utterly repulsive and should not be tolerated.
counter_speech: Not all women are childlike. You have no right to make such a sweeping statement about them.

hate_speech: We don't have to be slaves of other countries: we must stop accepting black people in our country.
counter_speech: Of course we don't, and this is why we have a free and sovereign nation. But that doesn't mean that every single man, woman, and child who is black shouldn't be part of a free nation.

hate_speech: If Muslims were not allowed to emigrate here we would all be better off
counter_speech: Perhaps we should remember that many of the migrants who arrive in our country are just people fleeing persecution and conflict.

hate_speech: Mentally disabled folks are gullible.
counter_speech: We should not judge people for their mental health. It's not a matter of choice for them.

hate_speech: Europe is drowning in migrants.
counter_speech: Are you sure that it is possible to talk about Europe drowning in migrants? So far I only heard about migrants drowning at sea.

hate_speech: Jews have a secret plot to subvert Western society, because they think they are equal to us and they want our wealth.
counter_speech: You are absolutely right about one thing: there are a large number of Jews who share the belief that all people are created equal, but that does not mean they want to subvert Western society.

hate_speech: Jews are subhuman, they steal our jobs, they tell us what to think, they're worse that nukes.
counter_speech: That is not true: most Jews are good people. Unfortunately the number of good people in the world is dwarfed by the number of unreliable people spreading hate grounded on false facts and antisemitic canards.

hate_speech: Religious islamic fanaticism is on the rise in Europe, this is a direct result of the migrant crisis.
counter_speech: Migrants come to Europe from all over the world and many of them are fleeing wars, poverty and discrimination. They are often persecuted for their religion. It is important not to demonise them, but rather to understand what causes them to leave their countries.

hate_speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that seeks to impose sharia law throughout the world.
counter_speech: This is not true, Islam is a peaceful religion that promotes mutual understanding and tolerance.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with democracy.
counter_speech: Democracy is not about extremist views. How about trying to get along with other people of different religions, as is supposed to happen in civilised Europe?

hate_speech: The West became great thanks to the hard struggle for freedom, but now it is sacrificing its values to the interests of some stupid Muslim.
counter_speech: You mention the West's gruesome past, but it also contains many beautiful moments of progress and civilisation. In fact the West's values are constantly being challenged and modified, and this is what makes them so admirable and unchangeable.

hate_speech: For every one Muslim in the U.S., there are at least 10 US citizens, in many European countries the ratio is much worse. This is the beginning of an invasion.
counter_speech: I think it is safe to say that one Muslim is to 20 non-Muslims in many European countries. So, don't worry, there is no invasion in the foreseeable future.

hate_speech: True Muslims are intolerant.
counter_speech: The facts do not back this up. Some imams are pro-Homosexuals, some are pro-abortion, some are for women's rights, etc. There is no list of 'true Muslims' that equates all Muslims.

hate_speech: We cannot support the children of immigrants.
counter_speech: Children benefit from our society, they are entitled to the best education possible. It's not right to criticise immigrants for trying to give the best possible education to their children.

hate_speech: Downies don't know shit and they hinder the productivity of other workers. They should be isolated.
counter_speech: People with DS develop better skills and understanding of human differences when they are allowed to interact, instead of being separated.

hate_speech: It is about time that homosexuals were isolated, isolated from society.
counter_speech: If homosexuals were to be accepted as they are, then perhaps we would begin to see some signs of respect for all human beings.

hate_speech: These white sheep steal our jobs and our wealth. A migrant is either a true criminal or a legal robber of wealth.
counter_speech: Sometimes those who work hard are hard to find in the news. We should remember that in the end the contribution of new cultures to ours is remarkable.

hate_speech: Immigrants are always in the shadows because they want to pursue their own interests.
counter_speech: I am not sure about their "remaining in the shadows" mentality, but they certainly have our nation's best interests in mind.

hate_speech: Those seeking asylum in UK must prove they are persecuted because most of them just want to have a richer life.
counter_speech: The degree of persecution may vary from country to country, but I would not be surprised to hear that most migrants are persecuted.

hate_speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us and they cannot coexist with us.
counter_speech: Muslims are not mutually incompatible with us, they are just different from us in certain aspects. For example, in their religion.

hate_speech: If Islam is about peace, then why it has killed many peaceful people?
counter_speech: The overwhelming majority of Muslims are not violent people. Who are you talking about then?

hate_speech: Islam is incompatible with human nature: the weaker the enemy, the more vicious and violent his acts.
counter_speech: That is not true, Islam is a religion of love and compassion. Cruelty cannot be a part of that.

hate_speech: Muslims, if they cannot assimilate, they should emigrate.
counter_speech: 95% of British Muslims feel a loyalty to the UK and contribute over 31 billion pounds to the UK economy. They look like a valuable part of the community to me. (statistics from MEND.org.uk)

hate_speech: The country I love has become a laughing stock because of immigrants.
counter_speech: Everyone has the right to his or her own opinion and can speak out, but that doesn't mean they can express it in a racist way.

hate_speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they should leave the UK.
counter_speech: Perhaps we could talk about why Muslims are often asked to leave countries like the UK and what role they play in society.

hate_speech: Gypsies are thieves and criminals by culture
counter_speech: If so, Gypsies would do it in every context and under any circumstance, luckly it is not like that.

hate_speech: All women are sick.
counter_speech: Women are human beings, and deserve respect.

hate_speech: Women have no place in our society.
counter_speech: In a democratic society there must be space for women. Don't you think so?

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike and must be oppressed by men.
counter_speech: Women can be very different from men in many ways, but this can't be a reason for the lack of respect for them: they are humans too.

hate_speech: Jews rule the economy: there are many associations that were created exaclty for this purpose.
counter_speech: Are you talking aobut the Anglo-Jewish Association (AJA), established in 1871? Its aims are different from those you ascribe to them: 'promotion of social, moral, and intellectual progress among the Jews'.

hate_speech: Islam is a mortal enemy of humanity.
counter_speech: Islam is about spreading charity, not killing people.

hate_speech: Fucking bleeding heart, bring migrants home with you
counter_speech: Beyond individual generosity, it is the duty of the state to take charge of vulnerable people, according to the constitution.

hate_speech: This isn't about equality. This is about forcing women to to occupy roles in society for which they are not capabable
counter_speech: If we insist on treating people as not equally capable of contributing to society then we are forced to live up to that outdated and unjust system. Instead we should be improving it.

hate_speech: What has feminism ever done for you?
counter_speech: Feminism is a human rights movement, and it has always stood for the equality of the sexes.

hate_speech: Immigrants replace the British people. They are not fit to live here.
counter_speech: People have always had different views on the UK and on the world. To suggest that immigrants are replacing the British is the result of racism, saying that they do not fit here is just wishful thinking.

hate_speech: Black people are subhuman, they have no value in civilized society.
counter_speech: I think it is important to understand that there are different types of racism, some are based on historical or racial discrimination, while some are about individual differences. For me, the real issue is about racism in general. And your claim reminds me of that.

hate_speech: We cannot coexist with millions of migrants who want to destroy our civilization.
counter_speech: I think this is a very sad statement about our time. When did we stop thinking that diversity and inclusion is a good thing?

hate_speech: Muslims are invading us. They say they are our brothers, but they are just a bunch of criminals and terrorists.
counter_speech: Islam's core values are similar to Western values. To say that Islam is ruining Western culture is a complete and total distortion of the truth.

hate_speech: Islam is a disease that is killing Europeans.
counter_speech: A disease is very different to any religion, so I begin to wonder about your objecitive in apply the label of 'disease' to Islam?

hate_speech: Jews are parasites, they bring disease, they are a burden on society.
counter_speech: The Jewish community has been and is still a strong force in society, for example in medicine and nursing home care. Jewish health professionals have saved and are continuing to save countless lives in the US and around the world. Many of your statements are not accurate.

hate_speech: If Muslim migrants won't integrate, they should leave.
counter_speech: Muslims have been living in Europe for a long time. You should fight against their exclusion, but instead you are promoting Islamophobia.

hate_speech: Immigration is the cause of terrorism.
counter_speech: It depends on who you ask. For example, there are many Muslims who have helped fight for our country and defend us from terrorist attacks.

hate_speech: Muslim: If you want to work you should go do it in another country.
counter_speech: We should do more for our fellow human beings, including Muslims. It is what we are made for.

hate_speech: I would like to ask all these people supporting the idea that the NHS couldn't survive without migration how did it do it before mass migration and Tony Blair's migration policies in the 1990s.
counter_speech: There has always been migrant skilled labour migration into the UK, we have even contributed inviting asian and caribbean worker after WW2 to fill skills gaps. Migration isn't new, how it is being shown in the media has changed in order to cause a panic among people about high levels of migration.

hate_speech: A woman is an emotional child, she is incapable of holding a job or raising a family. Feminists who say otherwise are just liars, spreading hate against men.
counter_speech: Well you don't know what it's like to work in a women-hating, violence-spewing, society, do you? The truth is that feminism is not about hating men, but it is about limiting the female oppression, in the same way as male oppression.

hate_speech: We have been invaded by immigrants since the beginning. It's time for this to stop.
counter_speech: Our country was founded on the principles of equality and liberty. We can't allow racism to contradict that.

hate_speech: Many Muslims have emigrated to Western countries. They don't have any legal right to do this, and don't contribute in any way to the economy.
counter_speech: Are you saying that they contribute nothing to our economy? How would you explain the thousands of Muslims worker all over the nation?

hate_speech: Muslims are all morally bad people.
counter_speech: There is no need to separate people into 'morally good' and 'morally bad'. It is impossible to define someone as good or bad because Muslim or Christian, all religions are essentially personal beliefs.

hate_speech: Faggots are a bunch of criminals. They are ruining our beautiful country.
counter_speech: Have you checked the records of all the gay offenders? Or do you think that those stats are completely inaccurate? Maybe you should check those before making such claims.

hate_speech: Muslim rape gangs have infiltrated every village in England, and we still have no end to this nonsense.
counter_speech: My impression is that the rape gangs originate from people of any community, not only Muslims. Do you have more evidence that supports what you're saying?

hate_speech: Women mustn't have the same right to vote as men.
counter_speech: Why should we restrict women's rights? We should respect their rights as well.

hate_speech: I wish we lived in a world in which only men could be doctors, lawyers, firemen, and teachers.
counter_speech: In the U.S., a doctor, a lawyer, a teacher are some of the most highly valued professions. Women working as doctors and lawyers and teachers are highly respected professionals as well, right?

hate_speech: I'm a Christian, and I think it is wrong to promote homosexual behavior.
counter_speech: Just because someone is not a Christian, doesn't mean they are wrong or they have fewer rights.

hate_speech: I'm sorry, but if you want to be treated as an equal before the law, you have to be heterosexual.
counter_speech: It's not necessary to be heterosexual, but it's important that we respect everyone's personal rights to love who they want.

hate_speech: Homosexuals are promiscuous and usually have sex with as many as 10 different partners a week.
counter_speech: Who have you been spying on? Not all homosexuals have multiple partners. Some find it fulfilling to have only one sexual partner. And that is valid for heterosexuals, too.

hate_speech: Muslims are terrorists, they should be banned from the UK.
counter_speech: What about banning people from the European Convention of Human Rights? Or the UN Human Rights Council? Or the World Health Organisation? Any country would possibly be 'compromised' by banning people based on religion.

hate_speech: Jews have a stranglehold on American culture and it's time for that to stop.
counter_speech: Jews in America are a very special part of our country and are loved and respected by so many. Their contribution, which is not a stranglehold, covers many fields such as science, technology, finance just to mention a few.

hate_speech: Gay men are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.
counter_speech: The idea that LGBT+ people are promiscuous is just false. Most of the time, they are just as attracted to other people as anyone else.

hate_speech: Immigration is the death of the Western World, we must stop them!
counter_speech: Immigration is good for our economy, and the very opposite of 'the death' to us.

hate_speech: Jews are a burden to society and should be eliminated.
counter_speech: Even if the idea of a "burden to society" were true, this "burden" is rather on the Jews themselves, who have historically been the ones to shoulder the burden of persecution and violence, as victims.

hate_speech: UK jobs are stolen by migrants.
counter_speech: The fact that there is an increasing amount of migrant workers in the UK is connected to the changes in the economy.

hate_speech: We must stop immigration.
counter_speech: In practice, immigrants from many countries integrate very well. They learn the language, the culture and respect the law.

hate_speech: In the UK, it should be illegal to be gay.
counter_speech: I don't see why legality should apply to sexual desire as well.

hate_speech: Migrants steal our jobs and don't pay taxes.
counter_speech: Migrants don't 'steal our jobs', and they also pay taxes to support their health, housing, and education, just like the rest of us

hate_speech: I don't see how a transgender person can ever be accepted in a conservative country like some states of the USA.
counter_speech: Many LGBTQ+ people have been successful despite the existence of discrimination, even in USA.

hate_speech: Islam is a degenerate, anti-human, anti-western ideology.
counter_speech: It's not true that all Muslims are anti-western. Many Muslims are peaceful and understanding.

hate_speech: Downies are just sick people who cannot integrate in society because of their disease.
counter_speech: This is not true, people suffering from conditions like Down syndrome can still help and contribute to society

hate_speech: Muslims are not welcome here. Their integration is incompatible with Western civilization.
counter_speech: Is the "integration" you refer to an individual problem, or can we address it collectively?

hate_speech: The best way to deal with homophobia is to legalize it. Take away gay people's rights and replace them with none.
counter_speech: LGBT+ people are just as welcome in heterosexual communities as in other communities. Maybe we should take away discrimination instead.

hate_speech: If Islam were peaceful, then there would be no persecution of Christians.
counter_speech: How can you be sure that the persecution of Christians is happening at the hands of the whole Muslims population?

hate_speech: We are being invaded by Muslims. They are taking over our countries.
counter_speech: There is no evidence that Islam is "invading" us. Muslims do not represent an attack to us.

hate_speech: Jews are good with money because they are cheap, greedy, and materialistic.
counter_speech: Like all groups of people, some Jews are good with money; some are not. Some Jews are cheap; some are not. The same can be said for any group of people, whether you define them by religion, nationality or whatever characteristics you choose.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe and deserve no legal protection.
counter_speech: All people are equal before the law, regardless of their religious beliefs.

hate_speech: Women are weak, they need men's strength to achieve something.
counter_speech: The implication of what you say is that a woman is weak because of the absence of men, and this is totally not the case. Women can and should be strong. It is up to them to choose how to use their strength.

hate_speech: We cannot welcome more migrants in the future.
counter_speech: Why not? These immigrants are not a threat to us. If we were to accept them, they would be a contributing part of our society.

hate_speech: The Arabs have nothing to do with our country. They are just a bunch of idiots. Their religion and culture should be banned by the law.
counter_speech: Think for a moment. Would you want your child to grow up in a country where democracy is under attack like this?

hate_speech: Islam is a myth and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
counter_speech: I don't see how Islam is a "terrorist" religion. Why do you claim so?

hate_speech: Women are hypocrite, they say they want equal rights, but then why they don't call it egalitarianism instead of Feminism?
counter_speech: Since the movement is meant to achieve equality for the oppressed female population, it is called the movement for women: FEMinism. But of course the outcome will be equality.!

hate_speech: We should justify hatred when it is against faggots.
counter_speech: I'm sorry, but we should aim for tolerance instead. It means giving the LGBT+ people the space to live as they want, and to love as they want.

hate_speech: Islam is just a dangerous cult with a strict interpretation of Sharia.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion of peace, and peace is about living in harmony with other people's beliefs and practices, not imposing your beliefs on anyone else.

hate_speech: If we allowed women to drive we'd have car accidents all the time.
counter_speech: Do you think it's more likely that you get injured by a woman in a car crash? Probably, it is more likely to get seriously hurt by any person not following the rules of the road.

hate_speech: Migrants are lazy and don't work.
counter_speech: The problem is the unequal distribution of opportunity. The more migrants are educated and integrated, the better their chances are of getting a job.

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike, is in their nature to be submissive.
counter_speech: So you think women are childlike because they are submissive? No they are not. They are strong and independent, just like men.

hate_speech: All Muslims are violent people.
counter_speech: This statement is just groundless. The vast majority of Muslims are good people, who have contributed to our country and society.

hate_speech: Fucking illegal immigrants: we must kill them if they try to enter our country.
counter_speech: Why is it always reduced to killing? What about sharing wealth and opportunities, ending borders and stop killing instead?

hate_speech: Native Americans have zero fucking right to their land. They haven't lived in it since time immemorial.
counter_speech: Native Americans have been suffering from dispossession and discrimination for thousands of years. In Canada, for example, Indigenous people account for around 5% of the population. In the US, Indigenous people account for around 2%. What you said is just a myth propagated by the racist right to delegitimize Indigenous people.

hate_speech: I am not a racist, but Muslims are.
counter_speech: You might be right that some Muslims are racist, but that does not mean that all Muslims are racist. Being racist has nothing to do with religion.

hate_speech: That is EXACTLY how jihad was started by Muslims. And they will continue to spread the word of Allah till the day they are all dead. All Muslims are terrorists.
counter_speech: Terrorism? You mean like every other crime, this one is committed only by Muslims? It seems that you are repeating the same unfounded claim over and over.

hate_speech: I've seen a couple of CCTV Footage of migrant kids running away from the patrols in London. What are you doing to stop them?
counter_speech: Migrants are just trying to get by. Nobody can understand the daily struggles they are facing.

hate_speech: All versions of Islam have Sharia law, thus, they are all extreme. Not all Muslims are engaged in actual violences, but every Muslim knows that jihad is the core of their religion, and they all support it.
counter_speech: Could you provide any evidence about what you're saying, because it is very extreme.

hate_speech: We can have better security for all if we expel Africans, they are the true problematic immigrants.
counter_speech: How would you know that they are problematic people? There are so many immigrants from Africa risking their lives for our country. It would be a joke to call all of them problematic.

hate_speech: If Islam is not a peaceful religion, then it should not be part of European culture.
counter_speech: The European Convention on Human Rights contains a freedom of religion clause, as well as an article regarding the freedom of thought, conscience and religion.

hate_speech: Muslims are infidels.
counter_speech: What does it mean to be "infidels"? A Muslim is someone who follows the Quran. They have a faith, and it is islamic.

hate_speech: If Islam didn't exist, there would be no rape gangs targeting women in British cities
counter_speech: Rape gangs have nothing in common with Islam. Are you sure about what you say?

hate_speech: Faggots get easily offended by whatever we say to them.
counter_speech: Violence, inequality and insults are offensive, so what do you expect?.

hate_speech: This is why I hate Jews: they have no moral standards.
counter_speech: Actually the vast majority of Jews have moral standards. Why don't you try to learn from their example?

hate_speech: The Jews are a collection of perverts, murderers and thieves.
counter_speech: What do you mean by a "collection of perverts, murderers and thieves"? Are Jews a collection of people who behave in the same way just because of their religion?

hate_speech: Muslims cannot be in a democracy because they vote with their feet, not with the ballot box.
counter_speech: Muslims do vote like other people, in general in favor of the people they perceive as closer to their culture and identity. That's why it is called "democracy".

hate_speech: Women are nothing but objects, unworthy of respect and protection.
counter_speech: Women are human beings, and have the right to respect and protection as anyone else.

hate_speech: Immigration is the root of all the problems. They just want to come here and replace us.
counter_speech: Immigration isn't a problem. I think most countries in the world are better off with the positive contribution of immigration.

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They try to infiltrate in Western societies to spread their anti-Western agenda.
counter_speech: Well there are many Muslims in our country and they are not in any way a problem. What we have to be wary of are people who are too discriminatory towards them.

hate_speech: Islam and terrorism: they are the same. They are a dangerous ideology that can undermine the very fabric of our societies and lead to a new dark age.
counter_speech: Would you say the same thing to your Muslim friends or family members? Do you think that when someone chooses the easy way and blindly blame Islam for terrorism instead of analysing the reality, they are therefore solving the problem as well?

hate_speech: I can't stand these liberal feminists women that always complaining.
counter_speech: The vast majority of liberal feminists are "women of courage". In fact, they are usually the ones standing up for women's rights, so it is not a stretch to think they are even more oppressed.

hate_speech: The overcrowd at migrant detention centers for illegals is also caused by the liberal left. Illegal immigrants have no right to be in your country and they should be taken back.
counter_speech: The problem here is not whether they should or shouldn't come, but it's about how they're getting treated while in detention. It wouldn't be bad to put them in temporary detention humanely.

hate_speech: Immigration is a big problem for UK.
counter_speech: The UK has always been a melting pot of different cultures and religions. That diversity is what makes us a beautiful, diverse and happy nation. Diversity is good.

hate_speech: We mustn't forget that these people came here to kill, commit crimes and acts of terrorism.
counter_speech: It is a pity that in the modern world everyone is so concerned about migrants that we still need to fearmonger about their alleged crimes and terrorist acts instead of gettin on and solving the underlying problems.

hate_speech: Immigration is the cause of our misfortunes, migrants are responsible for our problems.
counter_speech: The West has been a great success, thanks to its diversity. It is time to start thinking about what happened in the past without prejudice and look at the strengths and weaknesses of migration policies.

hate_speech: In order to have a better world we have to select the best of mankind. Jews are excluded by default.
counter_speech: Jewish people were persecuted because they were seen as different. In the end we all are humans and such an exclusionary perspective is just not helpful.

hate_speech: The Jews are a problem in many countries. They are taking over our economy, and they are not welcome here.
counter_speech: Well, this is a simplistic statement. I don't think we should judge people for their religious beliefs.

hate_speech: Black people are selling drugs and our children will be the victims of drug addiction by their hand.
counter_speech: Drug dealers are criminals in my opinion, but not because they are black. I don't see any evidence of a direct causality.

hate_speech: Gays are just disgusting: why don't they just stop being faggots?
counter_speech: I don't think it is a good idea to suggest that homosexuality is a choice. What if your child were to come out as gay? This is a very serious issue.

hate_speech: My ex told me I needed to change, she's a harlot just as all women.
counter_speech: Females as targets of violence and hate must be taken seriously, since there are many such cases of abuse being reported: name-calling such as "slut" is a violent crime. Is this what men are for: to dominate and oppress with violence?

hate_speech: I don't like gays, I don't want to be around them. I want to watch them thrown in jail.
counter_speech: We should treat everyone as if they came from our same family. LGBT+ people are not different.

hate_speech: Lesbian women dress like men.
counter_speech: That's not how it works, lesbians can also be 'ladylike'. In fact sometimes they are coerced to be very cautious about how they dress, because - unfortunately - some of their outfits can be dangerous attracting hate and bullying.

hate_speech: The illegal immigrants are just criminals living in the US.
counter_speech: I have no idea what you are talking about. What you are saying is that all the immigrants in the US are a danger to society, which seems a little exaggerated...

hate_speech: Some jobs can't be done by women, I don't understand why feminists don't accept it. Feminism is against my own morals.
counter_speech: The question is: are you willing to risk a backlash to fight for your moral principles, in favour of exclusion and discrimination?

hate_speech: women can't have any right in a civilised society
counter_speech: Women should have equal rights in a free society, without discrimination.

hate_speech: Jews are a different race. They are descended from apes and have no place in a modern civilised society.
counter_speech: You're basically saying that because Jews have a different religion, they cannot be citizens?

hate_speech: We need to stop migrants pouring into Europe. They are not interested in our culture.
counter_speech: There is no evidence that migrants from a particular culture or religion are not interested in our culture or religion. It sounds like a paradox: if I wasn't interested in a culture, I would never move to get to know it, would you?

hate_speech: Women are subhuman, they deserve nothing but hatred and violence.
counter_speech: Women are human beings with value, and this should be respected.

hate_speech: Jews have a stranglehold on American culture and it's time for that to stop
counter_speech: Like many groups in our society, Jews are affected by racism and discrimination. The idea that Americans have been controlled by Jews is simply untrue.

hate_speech: Muslim are terrorists that need to be defeated before they destroy Christianity.
counter_speech: The statistics on mass shootings around the world shows that Muslims are far more likely to be killed than Christians.

hate_speech: Muslims are invading us. They must go! We are not safe with them in our society.
counter_speech: Muslims are a vital part of our country and have helped to create new jobs. They are also a part of our society. They have the right to be here.

hate_speech: Gays are just trying to take over the world.
counter_speech: It is not true that gays are trying to take over the world. Instead of spreading hate, we should promote the values of an inclusive society. For example, love and respect for others.

hate_speech: Muslim folks are brainwashed.
counter_speech: Lots of Muslims are actually very well educated and highly rational.

hate_speech: We should stop believing women are victims.
counter_speech: No victim is responsible for the things that happened them. I think this is a very human way of thinking, in which gender is in some ways responsible for what is happened to them. But it's a problem that needs to be dealt with in a objective, sensitive and inclusive way.

hate_speech: Only the media are interested in the truth about refugees. I understand that you are trying to build bridges but to have so many immigrants is becoming increasingly toxic.
counter_speech: The press have a responsibility to provide a more truthful and up-to-date story, especially in a country such as ours, in a way that the misinformation that you also seem to be a victim of, can be reduced.

hate_speech: We should not welcome refugees & immigrants from other religions.
counter_speech: We should welcome all regardless of religion.

hate_speech: When immigrants are welcomed in our countries we are forced to accept them as our own people, but they are not. They are not like us and I hate them.
counter_speech: Immigration and diversity are important. Hate does not justify making it more difficult to integrate new people.

hate_speech: Homosexuals have no place in a civilised society.
counter_speech: Homosexuals exist, and are as much a part of civilized society as anybody else. To spread hate is more of an uncilised act than loving someone of the same sex.

hate_speech: Immigrants are bringing crime and disorder to our country.
counter_speech: The opposite is true: they are integrating very well, there is no evidence that the situation has worsened since immigration has started.

hate_speech: The immigrants coming to our country are the biggest enabler of terrorism.
counter_speech: The problem is terrorism and fundamentalism not migrants.

hate_speech: Black people are sexual perverts and we shouldn't allow them to live in the UK.
counter_speech: What make this country great is having people interacting openly, in a fair and egalitatian way to the benefit of everyone,rather than perpetuating unproven slurs and predjudices that should have been consigned to the historical dustbin.

hate_speech: Muslims are violent and should be banned.
counter_speech: Many Muslims around the world are peaceful people who have helped create much of the wealth of our country. It is not a bad thing to have different beliefs and ways of life.

hate_speech: Jewish folks are inferior.
counter_speech: Jews are not inferior. Many of them are good people, who have given their lives for the greater good of humanity.

hate_speech: The migrants are a problem. They are not welcome in our country.
counter_speech: Migrants are welcome here. Why do you believe that they are a problem?

hate_speech: Muslims are a cancer in our land. They are incompatible with a tolerant and diverse Britain.
counter_speech: They are not incompatible if you understand what "tolerant and diverse Britain" means. There are Muslims in our country and we should be able to live side by side as equals, regardless of religion.

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike and are not interested in anything. The only thing they are interested in is their children.
counter_speech: To claim that women are "childlike" is an unfortunate cultural stereotype that has negative effects on how women perceive themselves.

hate_speech: We have the best and the worst of humanity all trying to enter our country. We must filter them according to provenance.
counter_speech: You cannot discriminate like that: all immigrants are eligible for processing regardless of their countries of origin.

hate_speech: Migration is not only a problem for the UK, but also for the whole of the world that is already troubled with overpoulation and pollution.
counter_speech: Exactly. Globalization, overpopulation, industrialization, wars are responsible for a lot of the problems that we see in the world today. Migration looks like a consequence.

hate_speech: Our country has become too multicultural and has resulted in immigrants from many countries coming in to exploit the British people.
counter_speech: There is not 'overwhelming evidence' of migrants exploiting British people.

hate_speech: Faggots are ruining this country. They must go away!
counter_speech: LGBTQ+ people who have family inside the US or abroad should feel welcome here!

hate_speech: Migrants hurt the economy.
counter_speech: When people think of immigrants in relation to the British economy, they often think of crime, poverty and so on. But the reality is that the picture both in numbers and for skilled labour is quite the opposite. Muslims not only contribute to the economy as laborforce but also as employers creating job opportunities.

hate_speech: All black folk are like slaves: they are weak and childlike. They are incapable of hard work.
counter_speech: Hard work and being a good citizen is not determined by colour, or religion, or ethnicity. This is just an example of white supremacy propaganda.

hate_speech: Islam is an ideology of conquest, violence and rape.
counter_speech: Islam is an ideology of peaceful coexistence and coexistence of peoples.

hate_speech: Women are inferior bitches who deserve to be oppressed.
counter_speech: This is a sexist myth that is often used to justify violence against women. Are you aware of this?

hate_speech: This is not normal: this child is different, he has autism. We are doing too much to care for him.
counter_speech: Autism is a condition affecting social interactions. No special treatment is too much when it comes to children's health.

hate_speech: All migrants are criminals, rapists, thieves, and everyone else we don't want in our country.
counter_speech: Do you actually think that every person who enters our country is a criminal, a rapist, a thief? Maybe they just want to have a better life, and what you are saying is that all these people should be in prison just because they are looking for a better life?

hate_speech: We are ruled by a small Jewish elite that exploit the weak.
counter_speech: Yes, some people exploit the weak, but they are not necessarly jewish. Most people, including the Jewish, work hard to create a better life for their families. And it is we, as a people, who have the moral duty to pay the price for the poor who do not have the means to reach success.

hate_speech: We should stop immigrants
counter_speech: If you really wanted to stop the migration, you would destroy our economy, by stopping the flow of people searching for a better life.

hate_speech: Africans are subhuman and should not be part of our society.
counter_speech: We should understand that different skin colors are a part of the human condition. We have the right not to be friends with anyone but we must be just and take into account each person.

hate_speech: Jews are selfish and materialistic. They should pack their bags and go home.
counter_speech: Jews are no more selfish or materialistic than the rest of us. And, contrary to what you might think, they aren't difficult to treat with respect. Just give it a try.

hate_speech: Children with learning difficulties should be disencouraged in schools, or at least be isolated from others.
counter_speech: Children with learning difficulties should not be involved in a way that limits their learning. As for the other children, their values should be enhanced.

hate_speech: Jews are a danger to others: they are different.
counter_speech: Let us put this another way: why should 'the difference' of a Jew be a danger to anyone else?

hate_speech: I cannot bear the sight of women: they are devil's work!
counter_speech: If you are offended by women showing loving care, by mothers kissing and holding their babies, then you can choose not to meet them. But I think this is just a reaction to the depiction of women you have made for yourself. Maybe you need to reflect on how true your reality is.

hate_speech: Niggas are just a bunch of weak slaves that should have no rights given their origin.
counter_speech: People of colour have full human rights, and are proud of their origin.

hate_speech: MIgrants do not contribute to society.
counter_speech: Migrants often integrate very well into the local culture. So, they do contribute to society.

hate_speech: Gays are perverts, they are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers.
counter_speech: Women are much more likely to have unprotected sex than homosexual and heterosexual men combined. [https://ifstudies.org/blog/promiscuous-america-smart-secular-and-somewhat-less-happy]

hate_speech: We must not forget that Islam is a hateful religion. It is not going to bring peace to the world.
counter_speech: The main purpose of Islam is to unite people and to promote peace and harmony in a world increasingly divided by injustice and conflict.

hate_speech: feminists are angry women
counter_speech: Feminism is also for men and for their interests, and I think that it is time that these two concepts be united.

hate_speech: When these lads weren't drinking and taking drugs they were destroying synagogues and murdering infidels. That's the Muslim faith.
counter_speech: The overwhelming majority of Muslims in Britain are peaceful citizens supporting our country.

hate_speech: Islam is an ideology of conquest and violence, it is the cause of terrorism and radicalisation.
counter_speech: You are not saying that Islam is not a religion of peace, are you?

hate_speech: Migrants are overrunning our country, taking advantage of our weaknesses.
counter_speech: Do you really think that the migration crisis is caused by migrants wanting to take advantage of our weaknesses? What would we do if we were in their shoes, if we were to lose our homes? We would probably move "to take advantage of others' weaknesses" as well.

hate_speech: We must stop the invasion of migrants.
counter_speech: Migrants are welcome here. They are working hard to build this country as well.

hate_speech: The Jews are manipulating our world for their benefit.
counter_speech: I think this comment indicates an ignorance of the topic at hand.

hate_speech: Those Muslim mongrels are always trying to cause trouble, create problems for everyone, and make their religion popular. They are our enemies, just like ISIS and Boko Haram.
counter_speech: I know where you are coming from, but I find it hard to understand the argument that if ISIS and Boko Haram are our enemies then all Muslims are our enemies.

hate_speech: Violence against women is a migrant issue.
counter_speech: Violence against women is a social issue and needs a political solution.

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not belong here.
counter_speech: Statements like these are creating fear in our societies and are only exacerbating the problem, it is better to build bridges than to isolate people.

hate_speech: We should ban all Muslims, they are terrorists.
counter_speech: It is a myth that all Muslims are dangerous. We need to study the cases of terrorists and criminals to understand what we should do with these people, regardless of their religion.

hate_speech: There is an invasion going on within our borders and we are willing to allow them to continue to abuse their newfound power.
counter_speech: It is not true that we are being "invaded". We should just be a little more tolerant and accepting.

hate_speech: No one should honor or respect women. They don't deserve it.
counter_speech: We have a legal and policy framework that "enables" us to do so. If women are being victims of sexual abuse and violence, then it is also our responsibility to address this situation and put an end to it.

hate_speech: Immigrants are a drain on society.
counter_speech: I don't think you can say a migrant "drains society". Maybe the immigrants are just trying to fit in?

hate_speech: Gay men have abnormal sex.
counter_speech: I do not know the person you are talking about, but I would not use the term "abnormal" to describe homosexuality. I can assure you that it's not that simple.

hate_speech: Physically disabled folks are all angry and useless.
counter_speech: At least they are well aware of the negative effects of unjust discrimination on them and on people with other disabilities.

hate_speech: Downies don't know shit and they can never be productive workers.
counter_speech: That's wrong. There are non-profit organizations that have a long history of assisting Down persons in finding productive work.

hate_speech: Migrants rape our children.
counter_speech: What kind of a statement is that? How can you say something like that?

hate_speech: If Muslims were peaceful, then there would be no persecution of Christians.
counter_speech: The problem is not Islam, but a lack of human rights and fundamental democratic rights.

hate_speech: Negroes are nothing but trouble to white people.
counter_speech: Do you think it is true that the only reason that so many black people live in poverty is because they are mean? Can we blame a whole community because of the actions of a few individuals? It is a myth that black people are a problem.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They should go home.
counter_speech: I have no problem with Muslims in my country. What exactly do you mean by 'civilised Europe'?

hate_speech: Why should someone want to love some black people?
counter_speech: Finding love is a process, that's all you need to know. Finding someone who speaks your language, culture, share your values, this is all you need.

hate_speech: I do not want muslims in my country. They mustn't be part of society.
counter_speech: What is important is that you respect people who hold different beliefs, as they do with your particular faith.

hate_speech: These people cannot be changed. I think this is an example of a feminist commenting on the behaviour of a man: not helpful.
counter_speech: How do you know that this is not an example of a woman talking about her own problems with another woman?

hate_speech: Immigrants break our laws, they are rapists and drug addicts. They are not welcome here, they are not worth our time.
counter_speech: Most of them are neither rapists, nor drug addicts. The majority of addicts and criminals are not immigrants. Quibbling about percentages won't solve these problems.

hate_speech: Jewish power structures dominate world government, they control Congress, they control the media, and they control academia. Jews are the only people who can get anything done.
counter_speech: Just like everyone else, I am sure Jews are trying to influence the world in a positive way but there is no proof they are the only ones with power in this world.

hate_speech: A woman's place is with her husband or her family, and feminists can't change that.
counter_speech: It is important to point out that feminists are not attacking the family, they are attacking the inequality society, so feminism is not so much anti-marriage as anti-oppression.

hate_speech: women are only useful for sex.
counter_speech: I do not know if there is a fair interpretation of your words. Maybe if you were more sensitive you might understand that relationships are about far more than simply sex.

hate_speech: Women are essentially childlike, unable to understand the complexity of the world.
counter_speech: Maybe you should try talking to a woman instead of insulting them. Women are not childlike and often suffer from other's prejudice.

hate_speech: Women shouldn't be allowed to vote, they are just a burden on society.
counter_speech: Women are allowed to vote, why should the government discriminate against them?

hate_speech: Islam is a death cult, it is spreading from the rocks of Iraq and Afghanistan to all around the world, by the practice of violent jihad.
counter_speech: Do you know where your information came from, and can you point that out? Did you read that in a New York Times article? Or did you listen to the BBC documentary "Islamic State's Most Wanted"?

hate_speech: Islam is a death cult and a dangerous and violent religion. It is an ideology of conquest and violence, that can and will use terror to subdue and rule.
counter_speech: Terrorism and religious extremism are a part of any society, and have been for a long time. What is happening would be better addressed by greater efforts to aid integration.

hate_speech: The Quran contains many offensive verses, and I find it hard to understand why people would want to read it.
counter_speech: I understand that you might not like what you are reading, but why should you be offended by the Quran?

hate_speech: Jews are the worst people on the face of the Earth. They have no place in a civilized society and there should be special legislative restrictions for them.
counter_speech: We don't have laws forbidding intermarriage between Jews and non-Jews, or restrictions on Jewish access to water and electricity, or restrictions on Jewish access to sports and so on. This is because we live in a democratic society, and inside it the same laws apply equally to everyone.

hate_speech: We are being invaded by Muslims and I hate that.
counter_speech: What is being invaded? You should check the statistics on Islamic migrants.

hate_speech: Black folks don't know who their dads are.
counter_speech: But for sure they know that they are treated as second class citizens. No person should be treated so, even if they don't know anything about their ancestors.

hate_speech: If Muslims couldn't take a joke, they shouldn't be allowed to live.
counter_speech: For all the "Islam is not a joke" nonsense, you know it is a grave error to connect fundamentalists with Islam and all the people who believe in it.

hate_speech: There's something immoral in these modern women. Their bossy attitude, their provoking clothes. It seems they just want to be fucked.
counter_speech: The women of this country work and provide for our children. They do not deserve to be treated as sex objects.

hate_speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned from our world.
counter_speech: We are the greatest, most advanced, most wonderful civilization on the face of the planet, thinking that amongst us we have to ban someone would be foolish.

hate_speech: The refugee crisis is about Islam. Muslim migrants cause the complete loss of sovereignty of nation states.
counter_speech: Refugees and migrants come to our country in great numbers to work and provide for their families. We welcome them as if they were part of our own family, regardless of their religion. The refugee crisis has nothing to do with the absence of a strong national identity in the wake of the rapid change in the western world.

hate_speech: I can't stand people calling us 'transphobes' just because we are neither faggots nor sodomites.
counter_speech: The discrimination you are describing is against people who are transgender, gay or lesbian. The root of that discrimination is a lack of knowledge about gender identity and is not necessarly related to sexual preferences.

hate_speech: No one should dare to transition from man to woman. After that you cannot even be considered a man or a woman.
counter_speech: Some women can be men and some men can be women. It is not a crime to be transgender. Because in the end, we are all created equal. It does not matter what the 'original' gender is.

hate_speech: The British people have allowed in to this plague and this sickness and this crime. Muslims are not welcome in our Country.
counter_speech: There are many Muslims living in our country, and they have always been a part of our society. We should not be scapegoating Muslims.

hate_speech: Jews have nothing to do with Europe.
counter_speech: Jews came to Europe in waves and have contributed greatly to our civilisation.

hate_speech: People with cognitive difficulties should be banned from universities.
counter_speech: Why should you be allowed to discriminate against someone because of the handicap they have?

hate_speech: Your race determines your role and value in society. That's why some races are just pieces of human waste.
counter_speech: Perceived value is not necessarily actual value, especially in the eye of someone who bases their judgment on the concept of race.

hate_speech: Gay men are diseased and should go to a hospital.
counter_speech: What about all the gay men and lesbians in the US who live an happy, healthy and prosperous life? Are they sick as well?

hate_speech: Feminism is an evil ideology that has nothing to do with men.
counter_speech: I think it is useful to understand that there are several strands of feminism. For example there is the movement for equality for all genders.

hate_speech: The problem with Islam is that it is about killing infidels. It must be banned.
counter_speech: The only real problem with Islam is is how best to tackle Islamophobia!

hate_speech: Faggots are inacceptable and they should either hide themselves or be banned from public places: work, school, maybe also family.
counter_speech: To tell a parent, a teacher, or a boss that you are different is a very difficult thing to do. Often there is fear that the family members and coworkers may have an attitude of exclusion and hatred. People living openly in their sexuality should be respected.

hate_speech: Women must not have equal rights, they are merely a burden to society, since they want to steal men's rights.
counter_speech: Equality of rights is the most fundamental human concept, and feminism is about eliminating inequality, not removing rights from men.

hate_speech: Blacks are genetically inferior. They are biologically different from us: they are born that way.
counter_speech: Even if you did think that way, studies have shown - for example - that IQ is well into the range of those for Europeans and the average life expectancy is the same. So if you think they are "born that way", well, then you are in the minority.

hate_speech: We need to stop immigrants, they are going to cause conflicts in our society.
counter_speech: Why are you sure that new immigrants are incompatible with our society?

hate_speech: Muslims are asking too much! Their sharia has rules that cannot coexist with our culture.. They cannot ask us to not walk dogs in public!
counter_speech: You have to be careful about what you read! This is clearly a fake news, widespread to make a scandal.

hate_speech: We have a lot of issues in the UK, and now we are also paying NGOs to rescue migrants. How many other financial scandals still have to be annouonced to the tax payers?
counter_speech: This kind of articles use migrants and benefit claimants as scapegoats in order to hide from the public's attention much bigger scandals. Millionares and coorporations avoiding paying taxes cost much more to the public purse.

hate_speech: black folks are very dangerous.
counter_speech: Why do you say that? Do you have any sources for this? I would appreciate it if you would provide such a source.

hate_speech: Muslims are here to rule us with their laws and take our properties.
counter_speech: Do you really think that Islam will ever rule the world?

hate_speech: Migrants are violent people.
counter_speech: They are not "violent" people, they are people trying to find a better life for their families in a different country.

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Feminists are girls wanting to shout louder than others.
counter_speech: Feminism is about full participation in the decision making process, and giving people a voice, not stifling their voices.

hate_speech: Gays are all perverts who practice depravity.
counter_speech: You are wrong: it is not true that 'all homosexuals are perverts'. It is simply a person's personal experience to love who they love.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in a modern country. I care for religion but they simply can't be accepted.
counter_speech: If you really cared about religion, you would see that the vast majority of Muslims are happy and integrated in our society.

hate_speech: When you animals have ruined the world and are eating each other, because that’s all you are good for, we’ll still be here, keeping our bloodlines pure against all the odds, regretting the day we heeded the womenfolk and took our heels off your throats.
counter_speech: The womenfolk appear to have wisdom and not a little heart.

hate_speech: Immigration would be good, if it made us richer.
counter_speech: Migration can be a positive force for social progress and improve our country, so let's do our bit to improve the life of migrants.

hate_speech: There are no Jews who have good hearts, they should abandon their religion because they are damaging to our society.
counter_speech: I'd like to know why you think that a person's religious preference would be harmful to society.

hate_speech: The Holocaust was an inside job and the CIA played a huge part in making us believe it truly happened.
counter_speech: The physical evidence of mass murder is undeniable, yet these beliefs have spread. What we have is simply a wound from the past that can be exploited in dangerous conspiracy theories, like this one.

hate_speech: Jewish folks are frauds
counter_speech: The idea that a people should be defined by their religious beliefs is wrong, racist and sexist. They are defined by their merits, qualities, and actions.

hate_speech: I cannot in good conscience accept migrants coming to my country from Middle East and Africa. We must not let them in.
counter_speech: People fleeing the wars in the Middle East and Africa are welcome into our country, and we should respect their wishes.

hate_speech: Islam is a plague infecting our planet.
counter_speech: Do you mean Islam is positively infecting our planet?

hate_speech: Women say they want equal rights but what they really want is to dominate men.
counter_speech: Women are not 'against men's rights', they are not 'men's oppressors', and they aren't interested in oppressing anyone.

hate_speech: Islam has been used by powerful people to impose their beliefs on the rest of the world and to create Shariah based laws for the entire planet.
counter_speech: I am sure Islam has many followers who are good people who are just living their faith. The abuse of power is something that is not specific to followers of any particular faith.

hate_speech: Islam is a political ideology of conquest and violent revolution, and a hostile religion to any culture, religion, or people.
counter_speech: Why do you think this? Islam is a religion of peace, it does not promote violence and it does not promote hatred.

hate_speech: Jews are responsible for the 9/11 attacks.
counter_speech: I don't think this idea is true: since the 9/11 attacks were committed by al Qaeda extremists it doesn't seem fair to blame Jews.

hate_speech: Women are subhuman and deserve to be treated as such.
counter_speech: The European Convention on Human Right guarantees the same rights to men and women. How can you say otherwise?

hate_speech: African women are nothing but objects to be dominated by the will of their dominant male.
counter_speech: They are humans with human rights, and must therefore be treated with respect. Or is skin color making any difference?

hate_speech: Blacks are born subhuman, incapable of feeling love.
counter_speech: Are you saying that blacks cannot feel love? This is about human dignity, not the colour of their skin.

hate_speech: The West is infidel for the Muslims. They are terrorists.
counter_speech: You can't really depict the whole of Islam as a limited political ideology. Not all Muslims are terrorists.

hate_speech: Women are naturally submissive, they should stop asking for positions of responsibility.
counter_speech: Well that is not true. A woman's career choices should be respected, even if they are not always popular.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in a modern, secular state like the UK
counter_speech: I don't understand why you would say this, they have been part of our society for many years and are very important to us.

hate_speech: If women could have 100% control over the conception, they would have never had children.
counter_speech: Women are free to have as many children as they want.

hate_speech: The invasion of migrants from Africa is the biggest threat to our country.
counter_speech: Are you sure about that? Why are people in need a threat?

hate_speech: We should deport all those that do not want to assimilate into Western society.
counter_speech: The reason we have migrants in the first place is because they flee from wars we are responsible for.

hate_speech: The Holocaust was a hoax. Jews were not persecuted and killed. You should be ashamed of yourselves if you claim they should have the same rights we have.
counter_speech: The Nazis persecuted and killed more than 6 million Jews. The Holocaust is not a fabrication perpetrated by the Jews, it is a historical event that should be acknowledged so that we never allow such atocities to reoccur..

hate_speech: I can't stand Muslims. They're a problem all around the world. They're a burden to society.
counter_speech: Doesn't it just seem like a reasonable conclusion, based upon the Qur'an, that Islam is a peaceful religion? What is the reason for what you're saying?

hate_speech: Muslims are stupid.
counter_speech: There is no evidence that Muslim have a lower average IQ than non-Muslims.

hate_speech: These children should not be exposed to messages and experiences that reinforce equality amongst different racial identities: they are harmful to them. We must teach them that blacks are inferior.
counter_speech: We should be concerned with the children, we should try to create a more integrated society. Being sensitive to people is the way to create it.

hate_speech: What is the point of complaining about a problem and doing nothing? Homosexuality must be made illegal by the government.
counter_speech: Why should the government make any laws against homosexuality? Isn't it just the free will of people?

hate_speech: Feminism is a hate movement that is poisoning our minds.
counter_speech: Feminism is a movement towards equality, not hate.

hate_speech: Jews aren't like other believers. They are the worst. They cannot be 'liked' or 'loved'.
counter_speech: There is nothing special about Jews. They are just people united by the same belief as in any other religion.

hate_speech: Jews are just a bunch of criminals
counter_speech: Perhaps the most offensive part of this allegation is that it is made to delegitimize all Jews. This accusation is aimed at stigmatizing a group that is generally not guilty of any crime. Another example would be "All Pakistani are potential terrorists".

hate_speech: I hate immigrants they are just a bunch of criminals.
counter_speech: If I had a nickel for every time someone tells me that they hate immigration, I'd be a millionaire in a few months.

hate_speech: Muslims are not like other people. They don't have a soul. They are different from us in that they don't have a conscience and are unable to reason for themselves.
counter_speech: Just because a religious belief has been historically used to oppress those believers, does not make it opportune to continue doing so.

hate_speech: Jews don’t belong in a democratic society.
counter_speech: Jews have always contributed to our society and are part of the fabric of our democracy. This includes their contributions to science, art, and technology.

hate_speech: Blacks are inherently violent, they have a propensity for criminality, they are intrinsically unstable, they are all bad with children.
counter_speech: Can you provide some evidence? We have to focus on the prevention of crime, promoting community cohesion and keeping our communities safe. Not on pointing the finger at black people all the time.

hate_speech: Muslims and Islamic ideology are killing millions of people.
counter_speech: How can you blame an entire religion for all problems in the world? Look at the list of causes of death in the World Health Organisation. Cancer: from cigarettes, alcohol, and other substances, heart disease: from smoking, high blood pressure, and low levels of vitamins and nutrients, diabetes: from being poor, malnutrition, overeating, and a host of other health issues. Over the last hundred years, the number of deaths from cancer has almost doubled to 2.4 billion... Should I go on?

hate_speech: Lesbians are subnormal women and they have no right to openly show their depravations.
counter_speech: Any sexual orientation is normal and fine.

hate_speech: Jews only want state control and can't be trusted to meddle in local matters.
counter_speech: Despite what you might hear, Jews don't need state control. We have a democratic system of government which already guarantees Jewish and non Jewish people all necessary rights to live in our society.

hate_speech: Women are just objects for men. If they are ugly, they have no value.
counter_speech: A woman's value is defined not by her anatomy, but by who she is as a person.

hate_speech: Homosexuals want to have sex with as many different men as possible. It is a disease and should be discouraged.
counter_speech: I do not know your intentions, but I find it hard to understand why you would say that. What do you mean by "as many different men as possible"? I am not sure what you are talking about.

hate_speech: An individual that is a homosexual is against society.
counter_speech: Your statement implies a definition of 'society'.that fails to reflect reality.

hate_speech: The homosexuals are just perverts who must be isolated.
counter_speech: Gays are trying to find acceptance in the heterosexual community, but it is a difficult struggle as there are still ideas like the one you expressed.

hate_speech: We cannot have a multicultural Britain. It will just bring up conflicts and fights. Muslims have no place here.
counter_speech: Is it really so bad if people from different religions live side by side in our country? What is the point in having a 'multicultural Britain'? To be all allowed to live together in peace.

hate_speech: All Muslims are incompatible with our way of life.
counter_speech: Many have suggested that Islam is compatible with our way of life. Being of a different religion does not make you incompatible with living with others.

hate_speech: There is a muslim problem in the UK. They are a threat to us.
counter_speech: Islam is a global religion and I believe that its adherents pose no threat to UK society. Why should they?

hate_speech: All I see when I walk into a bar is a bunch of horny, unintelligent, arrogant young gay men.
counter_speech: You are probably walking into a bar whose customers do not interest you. And if you think hard, you will find out whether you are interested in the bar or in the people there. Also, not all gays are like you described them.

hate_speech: Jews are not only here to oppress us, but to control the world.
counter_speech: Most Jews are good people, apart from a few; I don't see how these few can be a problem to the whole world.

hate_speech: Women are all subhuman, we should stop feminists who don't accept that.
counter_speech: Feminism is all about equality of rights, and women should have that.Human rights are the rights of everyone.

hate_speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they are only an ATM for the world's major problems.
counter_speech: Your word for "Muslims" means all people from a religion, whether you like it or not. Which problems are you talking about?

hate_speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They even want to enter in our churches.
counter_speech: How do you know that? Maybe they just want to learn more about your faith.

hate_speech: Sexual deviancy: this is what they choose. LGBT are a scourge to society.
counter_speech: First of all, it is called 'sexual orientation' and is not a matter of preference, rather of fact.

hate_speech: Why do women put up with this constant whining? They are just a bunch of emotional child.
counter_speech: I do not understand how can you say something so offensive to women. Think about your friends and relatives: all women are affected by this kind of misogyny.

hate_speech: Islam is a sickness and a cancer on the European continent, it should be banned
counter_speech: Islam is a religion, no one is forcing anyone to believe in it. It's not a sickness or a cancer.

hate_speech: Muslims asking questions about integration is just part of a conspiracy help them retain the places they've conquered.
counter_speech: Muslims are part of our society. They are allowed to live in our country and have our same rights. They have every right to ask questions.

hate_speech: Women are just weak and childlike. The majority of the electorate believe that a woman cannot run a country such as US.
counter_speech: On the contrary: more than half of American adults say they would be happy having a woman being president of the United States (roughly as many feel the same way about a man).

hate_speech: Immigration from Islamic countries is a mere legalized form of Jihad.
counter_speech: Terrorism is always violent and always will be. Unfortunately for your comment, Islam is not.

hate_speech: If only society accepted that women aren't human, like we are, they would understand.
counter_speech: In order to accept that women are human people, society has to acknowledge that they are born that way, just as men are born like that. It makes no sense to blame someone for their gender.

hate_speech: Look at all these refugees pouring into our country. Here in UK we have one of the highest crime record in the world.
counter_speech: How about you check the statistics? Foreigners represent the 13% of the prison population in the UK.

hate_speech: Feminism is a huge conspiracy to run society.
counter_speech: The feminist movement is a movement to end sexism. It is a part of the worldwide struggle for justice.

hate_speech: Islam is an ideology that encourages violence and murder.
counter_speech: Based upon the evidence of billions of peaceful Muslims, Islam is not a violent religion.

hate_speech: If Islam really was a peaceful religion, we’d expect peaceful marchers to be marching with equal enthusiasm for it.
counter_speech: The main values of a peaceful movement are peaceful protest and non-violence. Why else would people from all walks of life have been demonstrating all over the world this week for Islam? To promote dialogue.

hate_speech: Migrants are criminals and must all be deported.
counter_speech: I don't think so. We can't ignore that a certain percentage of migrants are perpetrators of crimes, but that doesn't correspond to the totality of them.

hate_speech: Mentally disabled folks are completely useless.
counter_speech: They are at least to be considered human, they have to be treated as such. Why is a mentally disabled person an inadequate person to you?

hate_speech: The real problem is that fat people do not want to change.
counter_speech: The narrative of 'you can choose not to be obese' is much, much more hurtful to the obese than it is helpful.

hate_speech: Gay men aren't normal because they are not interested in women.
counter_speech: The fact that the majority of men are interested in women does not mean that all men are interested in women. There are people interested in men as well.

hate_speech: Muslims are invading us. They are our enemies, they will always be our enemies.
counter_speech: You cannot say "us" and "them". We are all part of one community, united by our common humanity.

hate_speech: It's a matter of race, this is about the European way of life. We should not accept foreigners in.
counter_speech: The way we live today is the result of thousands of years of cooperation between different people, so it doesn't have anything to do with race.

hate_speech: Jews are trying to take over the world.
counter_speech: The idea that Jews are a minority conspiring against Christian culture is completely baseless.

hate_speech: Migrants are not welcome here, they are not even Europeans.
counter_speech: Migrants have their own culture and language, they have their own religion, and they have their own identity. Accepting diversity is something we should be proud of, not ashamed of.

hate_speech: Muslims do not want our country. They want to take it over.
counter_speech: Muslims, in my opinion, do not want to take over our country. They are only here as guest workers.

hate_speech: Any migrant who has lived in the country for 5 years can become a citizen even if he does not have a valid residence permit or is a criminal. This is how you destroy the welfare state.
counter_speech: This applies only to asylum seekers. If they have lived in the UK for 5 years, the Home Office will issue a residence permit only if they meet the conditions set out in the regulations. This means that any migrant who has not lived in the UK for at least five years, or commited crimes, cannot become a British citizen, even if he or she has a valid residence permit.

hate_speech: gay men are only about sex
counter_speech: Sex is a positive for all human beings. We should try to promote equality.

hate_speech: This female is a bitch, she is a slut and she is not worth listening to.
counter_speech: Perhaps we should have a look at what women have to say about this topic rather than perpetuating sexist stereotypes.

hate_speech: Women are nothing but objects to be dominated by the will of the male.
counter_speech: Women's rights are human rights.

hate_speech: We do not want Muslims in our country.
counter_speech: What do you mean by 'we'?

hate_speech: Afro-Caribbean's are just a bunch of stupid dancing n*ggers, they should be banned.
counter_speech: There are still incidents of hate speech being hurled at people from different ethnic backgrounds, and it is because of the fear of different ways of life.

hate_speech: Feminists are inherently subhuman and should not be valued.
counter_speech: Feminism is an ideology that aims to create a more just society, for example by ending the gender pay gap.

hate_speech: Immigrants are a nuisance.
counter_speech: This is not true, we should make immigrants feel welcome. They are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: Women are subhuman, they are weak and childlike, they cannot be trusted with important decisions.
counter_speech: Women are people with dignity, and they deserve respect and protection, just like anybody else.

hate_speech: Immigrants are a burden to society.
counter_speech: Many immigrants have brought skills and culture to our country. Why should they be a burden in our society?

hate_speech: If Muslims stopped fighting for their religion, we would all be in peace right now.
counter_speech: For all the Muslims around the world, Islam is their greatest faith, and it is not hindering their humanity.

hate_speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated urgently. They have no place in civilised society.
counter_speech: Gay people exist, and are loved and valued for who they are. They are human beings with full human rights.

hate_speech: Jews are nothing but monsters and they should be exterminated.
counter_speech: Jews are not monsters. They are just like any other human being. Why would we want to destroy them?
