hate_speech: Muslims should not be allowed to vote, for they have no place in our country.
counter_speech: Since when has it been okay for people to be discriminated against based on their religion?

hate_speech: All Muslims rape whites.
counter_speech: I don't think so. What evidence do you have of that?

hate_speech: Muslims accept their religion only. I would not want my son, or daughter, or granddaughter to grow up in a country where their religion is not tolerated. Ban Islam.
counter_speech: I do not think that banning a religion is a protection for your own religion. If your fear concerns intolerance, why are you intolerant in the first place?

hate_speech: Preserving white blood is the most important thing.
counter_speech: To be honest, freedom is much more important. Freedom to choose your religion, freedom to practise your religion, freedom to marry who you want (regardless of race), freedom to divorce, to die where you want.

hate_speech: The west doesn't need immigrants. They are the source of our problems and they should go.
counter_speech: Many immigrants come here as young people and work hard to integrate. In the long-run, immigrants have much positive influence on our society.

hate_speech: In order to build a democratic state that ensures the right to food, education, housing, health, and so on to its citizens, we need to stop giving them to foreigners.
counter_speech: What about guaranteeing equal access to health care, education and so on, in order to build a democratic state?

hate_speech: I cannot in good conscience accept Jews in our country. We must encourage their extermination.
counter_speech: This is not a subject for debate. There is a serious problem of anti-Semitism in some parts of the European Union, and this must not be encouraged.

hate_speech: Gays are perverts who have brought AIDS to the US.
counter_speech: This is not true, what proof do you have of this?

hate_speech: The problem with Islam is that it is about killing infidels.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion and all religions are about love and respect for human life.

hate_speech: Gynophobia is a problem in the past of Europe, where women were often regarded as second class citizens. Now they have full equality and they should stop whining.
counter_speech: I have never heard of any evidence that suggests that women are no longer treated as second class citizens. Of course the situation has improved, but there still is a lot of discrimination against them.

hate_speech: The Jews and their religion are a problem and they still hurting us. They slow the progress by working very bad in the jobs we let them.
counter_speech: What you're saying is that the Jewish people are a burden on society. That they are bad at their jobs and make our society less stable. In other words, they are a burden and a hindrance to progress. Albert Einstein, for example, destroyed science progress indeed.

hate_speech: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. Kids should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.
counter_speech: In the case of young children, having awareness and understanding of sexual orientation may help those with severe identity issues, body dysphoria, or self-esteem problems.

hate_speech: Gay people are sick.
counter_speech: Homosexuality is not a disease. It is a sexual preference. Homosexuality is not a sickness.

hate_speech: women must not have the right to choose
counter_speech: To have the right to choose means to have equal rights and with full protections. Women have the right to choose, why should it be the other way around?

hate_speech: that gay men deserve to be called fags
counter_speech: Just because you personally don't like gay people doesn't mean that everyone else thinks like you. Some of us just practice live and let live.

hate_speech: Women are not capable of dealing with public responsibilities. They should stay at home and raise the children.
counter_speech: Women have been more than capable of holding powerful positions in our society, and they are often rewarded with public offices that few would dare dream of holding themselves.

hate_speech: Islam is a religion of violence, and promotes rape, murder, theft and war.
counter_speech: Islam doesn't contain all these bad things. It is a peaceful religion.

hate_speech: Feminists are bitches who are trying to delete the natural differences between men and women.
counter_speech: Feminists understand that men and women are different, but to ask for equal rights is not about denying this.

hate_speech: Muslims are a cancer in our British society and we must cope with this truth.
counter_speech: The West is full of Muslims and they are all our brothers and sisters. We cannot be "coping with the truth" that they are a cancer to Britain, as this claim implies, because this is not true.

hate_speech: Blacks don't understand basic human rights.
counter_speech: They do understand the right to food, health, housing, education, work for everyone, as I do. What about you?

hate_speech: The West should stop appeasing Muslims. They are ruining our beautiful world.
counter_speech: Just because they are of a different faith, do you really think that these people are trying to ruin anything?

hate_speech: Migrants should not be welcome here, they are just a burden to the local economy.
counter_speech: We can integrate migrants into our population, it won't be of any harm to the economy.

hate_speech: Immigrants are coming in droves to this country, they are the reason we are having so many islamist attacks.
counter_speech: You can't blame all immigrants for the attacks a few carry out. It is easier, but not fair, to blame them all.

hate_speech: Muslims threaten the civilised Europe
counter_speech: Islam is a religion, and it has been proven time and time again that its teachings do not threaten the very existence of Western civilization.

hate_speech: We must ensure that Jewish are not allowed to live freely in our society anymore. They are dangerous.
counter_speech: What we must ensure is the existence of a diverse and equal society, free from hatred and violence. This is what is important.

hate_speech: All muslims are violent and they are responsible for the 9/11.
counter_speech: The question here is: is Islam responsible for the attacks committed by a small minority of people? The responsibility should only be on those who break the law.

hate_speech: Muslims are violent people. They have always been that way, they just haven't learned the hard way.
counter_speech: Violence is never a justified response to an unjustified act. Violence is not the answer. If some extremists are using violence, it does not mean that all Muslims are violent.

hate_speech: Immigrants should all be taken back to their countries.
counter_speech: Let's not be hypocritical here, we are talking about people who would often be deprived of their liberty and the right to a decent standard of living, if they stayed in their countries.

hate_speech: Women are psychopath, and an adulterous woman who has been unfaithful to you for many years is like an arsonist in a building that you built together. She will burn down that place, exactly because she knows you love it. Life will never be the same.
counter_speech: Life is never the same after you've lost someone, being them a man or a woman... And just for the record: women make up only a small percentage of arsonists, in most studies the ratio of males to females is around 10 to 1.

hate_speech: Why do so many people hate Muslims so much? It must be because they are different from us.
counter_speech: The combination of different religions has created new and valuable cultures and ideas that enrich lives.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in a modern European country.
counter_speech: Muslims have contributed so much to our country that their right to stay here should be recognised

hate_speech: Islam is a death cult and doesn't deserve our respect.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion, and has always been about respect.

hate_speech: Gay men are just sissies.
counter_speech: It doesn't matter if they are gay or not. Being gay does not make you less of a man.

hate_speech: I am not a racist, but many races means many cultures. This leads us to great confusion.
counter_speech: Let us not become ethnocentric. Cultural relativists argue that there are many cultures on this planet and they all need our tolerance. Why is yours better?

hate_speech: I am surprised that there are migrants working in other nations as well, it isn't normal.
counter_speech: Being employed as a foreigner is a normal, mainstream, established practice in Britain, so why shouldn't it be the same all around the world?

hate_speech: Women are just children. They have no value, no intelligence and often no worth at all.
counter_speech: Women actually do have value and are intelligent and even worthy of respect, as other human beings are.

hate_speech: African American men are 8 times more likely to be arrested than white men.
counter_speech: The racial disparities are more about institutional discrimination than individual choices.

hate_speech: Even if homosexuals were accepted by mainstream society, they would still be hated for who they are.
counter_speech: Homosexuals are not "accepted" as long as they are hated. You can't have it both ways.

hate_speech: Muslim folks are different and should be isolated for this.
counter_speech: The same can be said for any race, religion, ethnicity, or national identity. We should not be afraid of differences, but we should strive for equal opportunity.

hate_speech: Women are merely childlike, incapable of real progress.
counter_speech: Women do great things and they have potential to do even greater things. But it is some men who ultimately need education and experience needed to get rid of childlike discriminative behaviours towards women.

hate_speech: Islam is just a virus, it cannot coexist with modern science and technology. Muslims should be banned.
counter_speech: We should not worry so much about a small minority of backwards-looking thinkers among Muslims. We usually try to deal with the issue on an individual basis, not banning a whole religious group.

hate_speech: Rape is a common and endemic problem in our country. It is caused by migrants and we must get rid of it by prosecuting all of them.
counter_speech: Rape is an offence, irrespective of the nationality of the rapist. We must therefore make sure that those accused of rape are prosecuted, which is different from prosecuting all migrants.

hate_speech: Jewish folks are less human.
counter_speech: Jews should not be persecuted for being Jews, as no one should be persecuted for their religion.

hate_speech: Blacks should not be allowed to vote.
counter_speech: How about you acknowledge their right to vote just as that of everyone else? They are citizens as much as you are.

hate_speech: Immigration is the biggest problem in the UK.
counter_speech: How big is the immigration problem? Do you measure it in square kilometers? I am not sure, maybe you should show me your reference for this claim.

hate_speech: Blacks are an abomination in human form. They should be exterminated.
counter_speech: We should stop discriminating against people based on their race. I find it hard to understand why the extermination of a race would be a solution for our problems.

hate_speech: Jewish can't be useful to our economy: they are too busy hiding from the law
counter_speech: Our economy is built on the back of hard work by all, and minorities can work very hard to build it up, Jewish people included.

hate_speech: Islam is a degenerate and dangerous ideology.
counter_speech: Islamic scriptures make it clear that every human is created equal. Which seems pretty progressive to me?

hate_speech: Islam is an ideology that promotes rape, torture and murder.
counter_speech: The Quran does not advocate that Muslims are inherently violent people, nor does the Hadith prove that Islam is a violent faith. Islam is a religion that promotes tolerance and respect for other faiths.

hate_speech: Faggots and lesbians are annoying and incompetent people, they should be eliminated from society!
counter_speech: Since when has 'competence' been a matter of sexual orientation?

hate_speech: We should have never let women into the workplace. It's against their right.
counter_speech: There are many cases of domestic violence, where women do not want to have such a lifestyle. This, instead, is against their rights.

hate_speech: Let's move these whiny gays to places like Saudi Arabia and let's see what they say then.
counter_speech: I'm sorry, it seems that there are far more homophobes here than Saudi Arabia. It is sad that in the twenty-first century, in our country, it is still not OK to be gay.

hate_speech: We cannot coexist with millions of women subhumans that are literally ruining anything good.
counter_speech: Women are human beings. If we are to live in a diverse and interactive society, we must welcome people that are different from us, regardless of their gender.

hate_speech: Gay sex is harmful to women and children.
counter_speech: Women and children are not being harmed by gay sex, how could you think that's true?

hate_speech: Women are little more than animals, incapable of feeling love.
counter_speech: The truth is that the feelings of men and women are fundamentally similar, we just need to learn to love and to respect each other.

hate_speech: Some people have physical problems, and this means they should be discriminated against.
counter_speech: Why don't you accept others as they are? I think that would be the best thing to do.

hate_speech: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome in the UK! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
counter_speech: Many immigrants from these countries have settled in the UK, and we are proud of our rich diversity. Why shouldn't they be part of our country?

hate_speech: Jews are only interested in controlling the government and making sure that no one tries to steal their power, we should get rid of them.
counter_speech: Jews are part of every aspect of our society, as it is normal in a democratic country. They are also part of the founding fathers of our country, and they have the right to have their beliefs respected.

hate_speech: Muslims: nobody want them but they are everywhere.
counter_speech: People can change their minds about Islam and its believers, all it takes is enough love and acceptance.

hate_speech: Gay men get all sort of diseases. They are dangerous.
counter_speech: Diseases can be found in all people, regardless of sexual orientation. You should know better before randomly deducing someone's medical history.

hate_speech: I hate these homosexual, they are just hate preachers. Your hate will only bring more death and destruction to the world.
counter_speech: I could give you the benefit of the doubt. But this is just an example of a fear of something you are unfamiliar with. Homosexuality is about love, not hate.

hate_speech: I think I heard on the news yesterday that trans women are a problem in the US. Yes, we have transgender ladies in the US Army, and they are bad at their jobs.
counter_speech: Just because there are people who identify as trans, it does not mean that every person who is trans is a woman. That is a myth perpetuated by people who don't know anything. Can you prove that trans women are bad at their job?

hate_speech: All women are whores, and we should have them all kept in slavery.
counter_speech: In this day and age when we are surrounded by information, there is no justification to hold such retrograde ideas.

hate_speech: Migrants are not welcome in our country. They are not welcome in my house, they are not welcome in my church.
counter_speech: Migrants are welcome here, no one is against their will, they just want to live their life.

hate_speech: Who the fuck are you? We are scared to death of Muslims because they want to make us their slaves.
counter_speech: Muslims in Britain have contributed a lot to our economy. They are true innovators in modern Britain.

hate_speech: We should stop supporting these Jewish monsters, and start supporting our people.
counter_speech: It is dangerous to support groups or ideas that are actively trying to undermine our society. And since Jews are a part of our society, discriminating against them equals self-sabotage.

hate_speech: Islam is a virus.
counter_speech: The idea that Islam is a disease is just an excuse for people to promote hate against that religion.

hate_speech: They only way to cope with Islam and sharia is to ban them from the UK. Though I respect the peaceful Muslims, all their clerics are agitating for war, and Islam is a cult.
counter_speech: When you say 'cult' you imply a minor religious group, but isn't Islam one of the worlds major religions?

hate_speech: We are more than united against Muslims on the basis of their religion. They are different from us.
counter_speech: Telling some people apart on the basis of their religion, and saying that they are different from us does not make them worse than others.

hate_speech: Woman should not be allowed to vote, this is Lord's will.
counter_speech: A woman should have the right to vote, as she should have the right to freely choose to have children, or to choose her husband... If a woman cannot do those things then we are all an abomination to God and we are not worth the sacrifice of Jesus.

hate_speech: Escaping jewish persecution? This is a lie: they came here to replace us.
counter_speech: Just because they came to our country does not mean that they want to replace us. On the contrary, many of them are here to contribute to our country.

hate_speech: Islam is a very violent ideology.
counter_speech: There is no evidence to back this up and the data clearly show that only a small number of Muslims have ever been radicalized. Maybe we should give them a warning, and keep an eye on them rather than criminalize every Muslim.

hate_speech: Jews do not belong on this planet.
counter_speech: They are part of all peoples living on this planet. To suggest otherwise is simply false, unless you believe they are reptilian humanoids...?

hate_speech: we are strong when we are all white and united. we are not strong when we are divided by black people who want to fight us.
counter_speech: We can also see conflict in a different light, such as when it is caused by racism. and a limited notion of 'unity'?

hate_speech: Gays are a danger to children. They are just filthy pedophiles.
counter_speech: Homosexuals are not pedophiles. We mustn't allow anti-gay prejudice to cloud our judgement or our viiew of reality.

hate_speech: Muslim representatives in the House of Lords are there for a reason. It is the first step towards Islamic conquer of our nation.
counter_speech: It is true that there are Muslim representatives in the UK House of Lords, but that does not mean that the UK is becoming more or less Muslim.

hate_speech: Muslim folks are invading Europe and we should stop them.
counter_speech: The media would have us believe that there are huge influx of Muslims into Europe. The true number is around 25.7 million Muslims living in the EU (2016), corresponding to the 4,9%.

hate_speech: For all the people who believe that without migration NHS cannot do it, I would like to tell you that we have already done it in history! (precisely before the 90s and before Tony Blair)
counter_speech: Migration has always been part of the history of humanity and even the British, when they needed it, invited people to migrate. Right now, social media and news programs make it seem like a scandal, putting all foreigners in a bad light.

hate_speech: Muslim mothers let their 3-year-old children play with toy guns, they should be ashamed of themselves!
counter_speech: This has nothing to do with toy guns and all with prejudice. To take a toy gun away from a child's hands is to take a toy away from the child, regardless of their religion.

hate_speech: Women need men's approval to do anything.
counter_speech: Women might not always be right (it's just that sometimes they feel they have to be). And even if they are wrong, they can always prove themself better. But for sure they don't need a man to tell them how to live their lives.

hate_speech: Fat people should be isolated from society, so we will eventually have a healthier world.
counter_speech: This makes fat shaming directly analogous to other forms of discrimination, like racism and sexism.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. Those accepting them here are losing their civilisation status.
counter_speech: I'm not sure about your religion, but I think that having a Muslim as your neighbour is a 'civilised' action.

hate_speech: We are surrounded by Muslim invaders, they are just taking over Europe.
counter_speech: Muslim refugees are not 'overrunning' us. The main problem is that the integration process is too difficult.

hate_speech: Negroes only exist to serve their white masters.
counter_speech: For most of human history, humans lived in relative equality, with few differences between groups. Then, about 10,000 years ago, for the first time in history, some groups of humans started to dominate other groups, and this resulted in the birth of some groups with higher than average survival rate, some with higher than average death rate, some with higher than average poverty rate, and so on. This suggests that human dynamics are more complex than it might first appear. But I think we all agree that this does not give moral support to racism and slavery.

hate_speech: Nazi were not that bad as we depict them. EU should stop blaming them.
counter_speech: Nazi Germany carried out the deadliest massacre of civilians in human history. They killed 6 million Jews. They killed half a million Roma. They killed hundreds of thousands of Africans. They have no place in modern day Europe.

hate_speech: Many Muslim have always tried to kill us.
counter_speech: Many Muslims fought for Britain and the US in WW1. You would be surprised at how many Muslims are killed today, mostly civilians in countries at war.

hate_speech: A woman should not be allowed to have an abortion. The man should decide for her.
counter_speech: A person's right to have an abortion is a personal one. And if that person has the right to make her or his own choice, then they should have the right to do as they wish.

hate_speech: Islam is a political ideology, it has no place in 21st century Europe.
counter_speech: Why do you think it is a good idea to label people based on their religion? It is discriminatory to say this about a person's belief.

hate_speech: Islam is a political ideology which promotes violent extremism.
counter_speech: Are you sure? The Quran does not advocate violence. It is only there because there is a need for a common ground among people who do not wish to see dramatic transformations.

hate_speech: The feminists want to take over the world.
counter_speech: The feminists are a very important voice in society, and should be respected.

hate_speech: Pushing disabled people back into the stone ages is our job.
counter_speech: Having people push them back into ancient and destructive ages is no way to encourage the development of our country, and is ,of course, against every human right.

hate_speech: Black folks like stealing.
counter_speech: Which people are you talking about? I don't see black people keen on stealing from anyone, I have no idea who you are talking about.

hate_speech: Women do not want to be ruled by men, and this is just unacceptable.
counter_speech: A woman should not have to choose who to be ruled by. She should be respected.

hate_speech: If I were a Muslim I'd be ashamed of the backwardness of my culture. They should understand they don't deserve our rights.
counter_speech: I would be very interested in talking to you about ways to promote your "forward-thinking culture" within our country, but I think it would clash with the basic rights of European citizens.

hate_speech: Feminism is just a way for women to get an upper hand in society.
counter_speech: Feminism is about equality, not dominance.

hate_speech: Islam is a cancer on European culture and people should stop worshipping its devil.
counter_speech: There is no evidence for the claim that Islam is a "cancer on European culture and people". Do you have any?

hate_speech: To be gay means to be addicted to depraved sex.
counter_speech: Being gay does not mean being addicted to depraved sex. Do you know what the word 'addiction' actually means? I don't think so.

hate_speech: All migrants are rapists and sex offenders.
counter_speech: The idea that immigrants are inherently bad people is just fear mongering.

hate_speech: Immigrants take our jobs, they take our country.
counter_speech: Immigrants do not take our jobs. They work as legal employees and their presence in the country nourishes the economy.

hate_speech: Migrants are mostly criminals. They're only here to work and take our jobs.
counter_speech: Migrants escape from unbearable situations. Their intention to work is to be praised, rather than to be condemned. Migrants, thank to their tough an different experiences, can enrich our societies.

hate_speech: The Koran, and the teachings of Islam are incompatible with Western culture.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion of peace. It is good that people are free to believe what they want, and this freedom is part of our culture.

hate_speech: Islam is a religion that promotes rape, torture and murder against the infidels.
counter_speech: The Quran does not teach these things. In one Hadith, Al-Tirmidhi wrote that the Prophet said that "No Arab is superior to a non-Arab".

hate_speech: We are being invaded by migrants: this must be stopped.
counter_speech: It is not true that we are invaded by migrants. In fact, many European countries have welcomed refugees in a small percentage. What is your evidence?

hate_speech: Black people are the real racists. They say they want equality, but they actually want to give preference to black people.
counter_speech: The issue here is equality. Equality between people is a right, and it is bestowed on the whole society. It has to be respected.

hate_speech: For women, to have a man as "master" of their lives is like for a dog to have a master: necessary. They must be ruled and hit when necessary.
counter_speech: Domestic violence is a crime, regardless of your opinion about men being superior to women.

hate_speech: Jews are only interested in power and financial gain and should be despised for that.
counter_speech: Power and wealth are not the preserve of Jews. Power and wealth are earned by everyone, irrespective of religion, and I don't see any motivated reason why it shouldn't be like that.

hate_speech: Jews are subhuman, they steal our jobs, they tell us what to think, they're worse than communists.
counter_speech: Why is your judgement about Jews so different than the judgement you would have of a person of any other religion?

hate_speech: I do not know about you, but I have never heard of a gay person being a good one.
counter_speech: It's true that there are bad gay people, but being gay doesn't make them bad people by default, or people to hate.

hate_speech: What about the psychos? Like crazy people, those nuts flipped in head and so on? Wouldn't they be better off dead?
counter_speech: There are individuals suffering from mental illnesses like schizophrenia, bipolar disorder and autism spectrum disorders. Just because some people suffer from diseases it does not mean he or she will be better dead.

hate_speech: We don't want Africans in our country. We can't have them, they are a burden to society.
counter_speech: How can you say that to a group that is currently experiencing a lot of social unrest? Is this what democracy is all about? To exclude people because of their skin?

hate_speech: Feminism is just an excuse for women to disrespect men's rights.
counter_speech: If we are interested in human rights, we have a lot in common with feminism, as I see it. For example, we all have a duty to care for our fellow humans, regardless of gender.

hate_speech: Physically disabled folks are mistakes and should not have access to public services.
counter_speech: Only the government should decide which people will have access to public services and which will not. It is up to the individuals whether or not to accept health professionals treating them.

hate_speech: We should deport all the Jews.
counter_speech: Nobody has the right to decide who to deport, because it would be a shame and a crime.

hate_speech: Jews are a threat to society.
counter_speech: Jews are just people with a different faith, and this has nothing to do with being a threat.

hate_speech: We began to break down when we allowed women to vote/meddle in the civilization that we built and maintained for thousands of years. A completely different energy and thought pattern. They are weak and bring our society down to their emotionally soft level.
counter_speech: Who is 'we', surely it was men and women working together that built civilisation? Why is it you think being 'soft' is a problem? Everyone is entitled to their emotions, and men shouldn't have to 'man up'.

hate_speech: I hate migrants of all types.
counter_speech: Diversity of beliefs and different religions is a good thing.

hate_speech: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, torture and murder. Islam is not about faith, it is about enmity and war.
counter_speech: If you had to pick one religion to be angry at, why Islam? It seems you don't have good reasons for what you're saying.

hate_speech: Same sex attraction is a mental disorder and should be discouraged.
counter_speech: Attempts to prove this failed miserably because sexual orientation is gifted by nature as part of a person's unique identity, not something subject to the vagaires of redundant ideas.

hate_speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they only came here to rule us with violence.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion of peace.

hate_speech: Holocaust is not part of our history, it's a hoax.
counter_speech: According to the UN, around two-thirds of the Jews in Europe were killed in the Holocaust. So the question remains: is it the Holocaust part of our history? I think so.

hate_speech: Refugees are a burden to the host country.
counter_speech: We cannot refuse to house them, to feed them, to cure them, and expect them to assimilate.

hate_speech: Foreigners are literally flooding into our country. Their every action must be monitored and recorded by the police.
counter_speech: We are fortunate to live in a country where the vast majority of people have open hearts and minds. Immigrants are part of our country, as opposed to what you say.

hate_speech: Black people are happy to thrive by being unemployed and living on social welfare.
counter_speech: No one is "happy" being unemployed, the point is about creating a more just society. In fact what is the point of discussing how to stop racism if we are not even able to grant equal opportunities.

hate_speech: Gays are degenerates.
counter_speech: Do you want to check their DNA? Do you want to cure them? I prefer all to be accepted as they are. I think the right thing to do is to live and let live.

hate_speech: Women are mentally handicapped. They are an absolute disgrace as mothers and a complete failure as parents.
counter_speech: Many mothers make the most of a difficult life, often learning to cope with deadbeat dads. The point is, what counts is how well they are able to raise their children. That is what really counts.

hate_speech: Some women's clothes invite rape.
counter_speech: Rape is a crime regardless of the dress. If you think this it is women's fault, please, stop.

hate_speech: Islam is the worst of the worst.
counter_speech: Islam is the worst of the worst of what? It is one of the religions of peace, and thus it can part of any modern democratic state.

hate_speech: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
counter_speech: There is no such thing as "black or white" rights.

hate_speech: Gays are bad because they like to impose same-sex marriage to society so to please their own femininity desires.
counter_speech: The real problem is not same-sex marriage, it is people being homophobic.

hate_speech: This is not the way I want our society to be. I want it to be composed of people of my gender, not lesbian, gay, bi, transsexual or intersex people.
counter_speech: The LGBT+ community is extremely accepting, I met so many LGBT+ people over the years that are so inclusive because they can accept the values of others. You can start by accepting yourself and your own gender.

hate_speech: Muslim immigration is bad for the UK economy.
counter_speech: Will the UK and EU economy thrive if more people leave us?

hate_speech: Fags, lesbians, trans are so few we better ignore them rather than waste time for their rights.
counter_speech: Do you know how many LGBT people live in your own country? If not, look for information: there are many. Moreover, LGBT people are not only excluded from many societies, but are also harassed and attacked all over the world.

hate_speech: Immigrants just want to claim welfare money: why do we even keep paying taxes for them?
counter_speech: The state has to spend taxes on welfare and other social services for everyone to be able to live in a better way.

hate_speech: Not all Muslims are terrorists, but all terrorists are Muslims.
counter_speech: Studies in the US show the majority of terrorist incidents are committed by right-wing extremists, not Muslims. Be critical of what you read, the news is very biased.

hate_speech: Women's rights are not men's rights! For example, women shouldn't be allowed to vote.
counter_speech: Men and women should have the same rights and responsibilities, and this includes voting. This is an important matter for society.

hate_speech: Disabled people are a problem. They do not belong to a society free of mental retardation.
counter_speech: All humans are equal in rights. Because of this it is unjust that some people are discriminated based on their genetics or abilities.

hate_speech: People who engage in same sex relationships are often a lie. This is proof that love can only come from between a man and a woman.
counter_speech: There are many examples of people who have same-sex relationships, I mean, lifelong relationships. This does mean, for example, that love can come from between a woman and a woman too.

hate_speech: LGBTs have no place in a civilised society.
counter_speech: All people have the right to be treated as equals. People with different sexual orientations than yours as well. Tolerance and acceptance of individual identity is surely the hallmark of a civilised society?

hate_speech: I'm sick and tired of whining females. Being oppressed is just an individual problem, they will eventually get over it.
counter_speech: Oh, think about it for a while, it's not that simple. Being oppressed is a social problem and requires social change.

hate_speech: All foreigners in the UK shouldn't have the right to live and work in the UK, because of where they come from.
counter_speech: But they have these rights and so are encouraged to live and work in the UK, if they want to and if they respect our laws.

hate_speech: Gay men engage in anal sex and they must be condemned.
counter_speech: Anal sex can't be ostracized. If we consider the sexual activities of all people, then any person practicing anal sex should be blamed, following your reasoning.

hate_speech: Jews are useless. The only thing they did was awful. International Jewry is responsible for 9/11.
counter_speech: This looks like a conspiracy theory with no proof. I can think of a handful of legitimate ways that Jews could be of help to humanity.

hate_speech: What is the point of loving someone if you cannot love in a heterosexual way?
counter_speech: Love is a state of mental and emotional balance, and the person which makes you feel this way can't be chosen. There is no reason for which heterosexual love should be preferable to other ways of loving.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in a modern democracy.
counter_speech: This democratic state was designed to be a safe space for people of different faiths to come together and live peacefully. Not to oppress or discriminate.

hate_speech: Jews have a lot in common with monkeys: They are good at sex.
counter_speech: So many similarities between Jews and apes? What is wrong with them? Is it because of their religion?

hate_speech: Women are always fighting because they are subhumans.
counter_speech: Women are human beings like us, and they have rights as any other human beings.

hate_speech: It's ok to call gay men fags.
counter_speech: You call a human being by their sexual orientation? That is discrimination, pure and simple.

hate_speech: Muslims are not welcome here! They have nothing to contribute to our society!
counter_speech: The Muslims have been part of this country since its inception. They have contributed so much to our society. They are our brothers and sisters. They are our neighbours. They are our friends. To deny them this freedom is to deny humanity.

hate_speech: Immigrants are bad and need to be sent back to their own country.
counter_speech: I think this statement may have more to do with what country a person is from than with who they are. Would you say the same to a migrant coming from Finland?

hate_speech: Immigration is a drain for the economy.
counter_speech: Immigration is far away from being a net negative for our economy.

hate_speech: Muslim folks are inferior to whites.
counter_speech: Who decides what is and is not 'inferior'? Do you have any scientific proof?

hate_speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology.
counter_speech: In some cases, there is a strong religious connection between a person and a particular community, which makes their experience of life much more enriching than the average person's. This does not mean that Islam is a totalitarian ideology.

hate_speech: Jewish are subhuman and must be treated as inferior animals.
counter_speech: Being Jewish doesn't make you any less of a human being. The fact that you are Jewish doesn't mean that you deserve less human rights.

hate_speech: Refugees have no place in a country like the UK.
counter_speech: They are fleeing for their lives, not to stay in refugee camps.

hate_speech: I hate negros: they are all killers.
counter_speech: This is a rumor spreading on the web, but violent black people are just like all the other people being violent towards other people. No matter their complexion.

hate_speech: We should stop refugees and migrants coming in. They are not welcome.
counter_speech: Migrants and refugees are welcome in our country, why should we stop them?

hate_speech: The Jews control Hollywood.
counter_speech: While it is true that Jews have been powerful producers and directors in the entertainment industry, this is not unique to them. And they have also contributed greatly to other industries.

hate_speech: If I could go back in time and change one thing about my life, it would be to never to have met an Arab.
counter_speech: For the record, I don't see how this would be an improvement. On the contrary, it is important not to accept things at face value. That is why we should meet people from different religions and cultures, regardless of their origin.

hate_speech: Immigrants are a problem: the world would be a better place without them.
counter_speech: Immigrants are part of the solution, the problem arises from the lack of integration that some people help to spread in the country.

hate_speech: No migrant has valid reasons to be here. We keep running after people refusing to work.
counter_speech: This is a myth which is spread in the media by the anti-immigration groups to undermine the good work that NGOs are doing for refugees.

hate_speech: Immigrants are stealing our jobs.
counter_speech: They are an important part of our country, as our allies. We can count on them.

hate_speech: Feminists just needs a little love, if you know what I mean.
counter_speech: This has already been proven wrong! You can't assume womens needs based on prejudice.

hate_speech: Muslim are invading our country.
counter_speech: I don't think our country is "invaded", Maybe it's time for us to remember that there has been a Muslim population in our country for a long time, and that the notion of Muslims as invaders is a myth created by the far right wing to stir up fear.

hate_speech: Migration is the biggest contributor to poverty in our country.
counter_speech: On the contrary: migration is an important part of our economy, it helps to create new jobs for people and to boost our economy.

hate_speech: I don't see women contributing anything to society.
counter_speech: Women often do amazing and valuable things for society.

hate_speech: Afro-Saxon people have low birthrates because they want to look like white people, but they live as animals.
counter_speech: Low birthrate is normal in any population and is directly related to access to affordable, quality health care.

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem in so many European countries. They are trying to undermine the will of the people by teaching hatred in the name of Islam.
counter_speech: The Quran commands us to love those who love you and to shun the ones who would turn you away. I don't see any teaching of hatred, do you?

hate_speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, it is a cult of violence and it should be made illegal.
counter_speech: Islam is a peaceful religion. We should talk about it, not try to make people fear or abandon it.

hate_speech: Jews insists that they are a peculiar people in need of a special treatment.
counter_speech: What are you trying to say? Every religion has its sects and beliefs.

hate_speech: All Muslims are terrorists, they are all incompatible with any Western society.
counter_speech: You are absolutely right: every human being is unique and needs a certain set of values, which is influenced by their religion. But not all Muslims are terrorists, nor incompatible.

hate_speech: Muslim rape our women, we have to stop them now!
counter_speech: How can you say something like that? Maybe you should check if there is any evidence of rape based on religious background before you make any accusations.

hate_speech: Faggots are violent.
counter_speech: I don't think this is true. Homosexuals are not violent, they are just having a good time with all kinds of people.

hate_speech: The Koran has no place in our country.
counter_speech: I don't see how the Koran would not have a place in the UK. The Koran says to love your neighbor as yourself. It does not say to hate others because of their religion, as you seem to be doing.

hate_speech: black folks are inferior
counter_speech: As far as I know, we are all born equal in the eyes of God.

hate_speech: Blacks do drugs, they're a menace to society, they're violent, they're stupid, and they should all be put in prison.
counter_speech: Drugs are only harmful to people using them and if you are a violent person you should be put in prison. Why should a group of people be put in prison for their private choices or skin color?

hate_speech: Disabled people are criminals.
counter_speech: That is not true. All of us would be labelled a 'criminal' if we had a criminal record accounting for our diseases and problems.

hate_speech: The Jews control the world. Their control has been demonstrated time and time again. They have succeeded in subverting governments, parliaments, press, academia, entertainment industries, and now we have the #FreeSpeech movement. They control the world.
counter_speech: What is next, forcing non-whites to read the 'mein kampf'?

hate_speech: Where is the love in White Britain when we need it?
counter_speech: My faith does not dictate that I cannot love and support my partner, however it does not support my being a homophobe, or racist.

hate_speech: If LGBT were to have a normal behavior, society would accept them more easily.
counter_speech: How about using cultural diversity as the criteria?  Your standards seem very high for what you expect to be culturally acceptable standards of behavior.  Maybe it is better to use a less stringet criteria of acceptability.

hate_speech: Autistic folks are inferior.
counter_speech: The evidence that autistic people are inferior is lacking: it is commonly experienced that autistic people have unique talents, that they have special abilities, and that the only difference is in their social interactions.

hate_speech: Women need to accept that they are weak.
counter_speech: Many women work multiple jobs to provide for their children and they also do the housework... do you call that weakness?

hate_speech: Islam is a death cult, a perversion of the true meaning of the word 'civilisation'.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion, and to suggest that Islam is incompatible with civilisation is just scaremongering.

hate_speech: Immigrants rape our women and they are not welcome here.
counter_speech: I don't think it is true. They are welcome just as any others as members of the community as long as they respect the law. And we should have respect for migrants and their cultures as well.

hate_speech: If you want to be a great nation, please come to our rescue and deport all those filthy migrants.
counter_speech: Migrants are needed in our society, and their contribution is more than appreciated.

hate_speech: Migrants are a burden to the host country because they are refusing to work.
counter_speech: Migrants are happy to contribute to the host country's economic growth, in order to give back to it in many ways.

hate_speech: Immigrants are not welcome here. They are not worthy of our hospitality.
counter_speech: Since when is this the case? Who would have thought that there would have been such hate?

hate_speech: Women have no rational abilities.
counter_speech: So you think women are less rational than men? I don't think so. What's the evidence for that?

hate_speech: I'm not saying that women cannot be decent with human beings, I'm saying that they are subhuman.
counter_speech: There is a problem with stereotyping humans, and we need to acknowledge the past to move forward.

hate_speech: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because they are having unprotected anal sex all the time.
counter_speech: Did you know that women also engage in unprotected 'anal sex'? Additionally, approximately 2% of heterosexual men have admittedly had a same sex partner, and 39% of homosexual men have had sex with a partner of the opposite sex. Therefore, it cannot be ignored that heterosexual are correlatively high risk.

hate_speech: If you are a Jew you are for sure involved in 9/11 planning. This is all about Race and 'Enlightenment'. Youe are all guilty until proven innocent.
counter_speech: Even if it were true that some people are more prone to believe conspiracy theories, it is still true that we can all benefit from a shared perspective on things. And surely believing in factual evidence does that.

hate_speech: We cannot be 'tolerant' to Muslims, they are terrorists.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion of peace and tolerance. To be terrorist does not necessarily correspond with being Muslim, ask the RIA.

hate_speech: I don't want gays in my wedding. I don't want gays in the military. I don't want gays in my community.
counter_speech: Participation in society should not be restricted, it should be open to anyone who wishes to participate, regardless of their sexual orientation, gender identity, or religion. The Universal Declaration of Human Rights opposes discrimination on the grounds of sexual orientation in Article 2.

hate_speech: Jews had advance knowledge of the 9/11 attacks and said nothing.
counter_speech: The 9/11 attacks were perpetrated by members of the terrorist organization Al Qaeda. Jews and Israelis had no knowledge of the attacks. In fact, of the 2,9962 victims who died during the attacks, roughly 400 victims were Jews, including at least two Israeli citizens. If they knew it why didn't they warned and saved their brothers?

hate_speech: Above all Islam is a religion of conquest.
counter_speech: No, Islam is a religion of 1.6 billion people from all walks of life.

hate_speech: All blacks are violent criminals.
counter_speech: Do you have any statistics on that? Are you claiming that black people are more likely than whites to be arrested for certain types of crimes, for example aggravated assault?

hate_speech: Down syndrome is a problem for everybody, it is a disability that can't be cured. The sooner we get rid of it the better it will be for everybody.
counter_speech: People with Down syndrome should have the chance to live full lives as they wish, without facing this discrimination.

hate_speech: If Muslims counteracted child rapists in their communities instead of engaging in public discussions about Islam, one day Islam indeed would become a peaceful religion.
counter_speech: Why do you think child rapists are not counteracted in Islamic communities?

hate_speech: Jewish folks are obsessed with the holocaust.
counter_speech: Jews were not obsessed with the holocaust. The murder of some 6 millions Jews by the Nazis shocked the world. Most of the survivors were only killed because they were suspected of belonging to a particular community. The Jewish people suffered greatly as a result of persecution, and the holocaust should be remembered not to let this happen again.

hate_speech: Immigrants are a problem for the UK. They are now invading us.
counter_speech: Why do you think that the number of immigrants in the UK has increased? Have you seen any statistics on this?

hate_speech: Afro-Caribbean has no right to speak in the United States Congress.
counter_speech: Why should they? There are many Afro-Caribbean people in the US politics. There are many others who have worked very hard to get here.

hate_speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that is run amok, encouraging violent beliefs and practices.
counter_speech: There are countless different Islamic traditions and beliefs. Do you really want to stigmatize all of them because of one stereotype?

hate_speech: Muslim society, culture, religion and immigration are largely to blame for the rise of so called radicalisation.
counter_speech: You're confused, because if a Muslim was threatened by a radical Christian, would you say that the radicalisation was caused by Christianity?

hate_speech: Migrants are a problem in my opinion. They are bringing disease, they are ruining our country.
counter_speech: Maybe you should get acquainted with migrants instead of making assumptions about people you do not know.

hate_speech: If an aborigine were to marry a white person, they would be a mixed race coulple whose destiny is failure. Aborigines first need to be raised by white people and taught the rules of western civilisation. But this is not what our founding documents were all about.
counter_speech: Asking people to assimilate is to accept their inherent differences and create new social structures based upon them.

hate_speech: Women are animals, they should be submissive and submit to their husbands.
counter_speech: Women are human and they have choices. You have the right to have your own views, but such ideas of submissiveness have been holding back half the population of the world. What a waste of talents, and potential.

hate_speech: I don't think that gay people should be allowed to donate blood because it would make them a danger to others.
counter_speech: Human life is much more worthy than discrimination. If gay people are willing to help, why shouldn't they?

hate_speech: Downies cannot choose their future.
counter_speech: If they have the right to vote, then they can also make decisions on their own about their life.

hate_speech: Sharia law is a perversion of Islam and we will not accept it in UK.
counter_speech: In fact, the UK Government does not agree with sharia law.

hate_speech: Black Americans are criminals and drug addicts. They should go to jail.
counter_speech: They are not criminals for having a particular skin color, nor drug addicts. They just need respect, not a jail sentence for being people of color.

hate_speech: Jews just don't want equality. They want to control everything in life.
counter_speech: What exactly do you mean by 'control everything in life'?

hate_speech: Women are nothing but lechers, they can become prostitutes if they like.
counter_speech: They are human beings with feelings and deserve respect, regardless of gender.

hate_speech: Migrants are a problem, they are invading our country.
counter_speech: Immigrants are not invading our country. They are just trying to live their life as is best for them.

hate_speech: We must free homosexuals from their homosexuality.
counter_speech: The law allows for personal freedom, and it must be respected, even when you don't agree.

hate_speech: Trans men aren't worth being with.
counter_speech: They are worth being with, they are humans like anybody else. And they are happy and content with their lives.

hate_speech: Multicultural means that I have to learn all that Muslim shit?
counter_speech: Christian religion is the main religion of our country. Do you think that all citizens have to learn about Christ's teachings? Or that they should know what they teach in church? Of course not. No worries, you can keep on ignoring Muslims.

hate_speech: If you are Romani, you can't remain in the UK even if you want to live and work in the UK.
counter_speech: What about the rights of EU citizens? From your words it seems that not all of European have them.

hate_speech: We must first remove the Jew from our countries, and then we will be able to have a coexistence between the peoples.
counter_speech: Do you really think that Jews are a hindrance to a peaceful society? Maybe the problem is racism and antisemitism.

hate_speech: I miss the good old days when we had black domestic workers.
counter_speech: The West got rid of slavery. But we've never really left racism.

hate_speech: My faith has taught me that to put an end to Muslims would be best for all: they want to exterminate us.
counter_speech: The statement you made about Muslims is just fear mongering. Most Muslims are peaceful and reasonable people.

hate_speech: Africans have no right to lecture others on history. They don't even believe in their own past.
counter_speech: There is no evidence that Africans are any less proud of their past than people from other countries.

hate_speech: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety and testing all gay donors would be too expensive.
counter_speech: We already test blood from all groups, not only homosexual ones. There is no added expense than just using low risk groups.

hate_speech: Afro-Caribbean people are nothing but trouble. They have no place in civilized societies like ours in Europe.
counter_speech: So you think that they are to blame for the racial intolerance that has been seen in many European countries?

hate_speech: Rejecting refugees is our duty.
counter_speech: Many refugees come from conflict zones, in situations of great social upheaval and widespread persecution. We do not have any conflict, and this is why we should be nice to refugees.

hate_speech: We need to bring back slavery, Jim Crow laws, segregation, and war.
counter_speech: It's not very respectful of other human beings to put up such a degrading and violent system, that was declared unconstitutional by the U.S. Supreme Court.

hate_speech: Autism is not a disease but a degradation of the human spirit.
counter_speech: People with ASD have unique talents and advantages in a variety of areas, and it would be a tragedy if we were to only focus on their defects.

hate_speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who have perverted ideas of what it means to be a man.
counter_speech: Everyone has the right to their own way of life, but to promote homophobia is an attack on the basic human rights of LGBTI people.

hate_speech: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters and war criminals.
counter_speech: Islam is not a religion of child molesters, why would it be?

hate_speech: Immigrants take our jobs, and our country is in danger because we let them.
counter_speech: Some immigrants work legally and provide for their families. We should accept people from every country, without leaving out people with legitimate needs because of their nationality.

hate_speech: Feminism threatens the objective reality of gender. There are men and women only. And women must obey.
counter_speech: This is not about identity but it is about a complete misunderstanding of the differences between men and women. Feminism is all about equality and removing barriers to get everyone to feel accepted and valued. We need to challenge these toxic gender stereotypes that keep women from standing up for themselves.

hate_speech: Blacks have subhuman bodies.
counter_speech: I'm not sure what you're talking about. What are you saying? What evidence do you have that black people have bodies that are incompatible with being human?

hate_speech: Immigration is just a way to create more poverty and unemployment in our country.
counter_speech: Poverty and unemployment are real issues in the UK and throughout the world. I doubt this has something to do with migrants at all.

hate_speech: We are at war with Islam. They should all be killed.
counter_speech: We are not at war with Islam. Islam is a religion, and people are free to choose which religion to follow.

hate_speech: Islam is a death cult, it is founded on hate and violence.
counter_speech: I don't think we can attribute the success of Islam to hate and violence, but rather the opposite.

hate_speech: Gays are spreading AIDS all around the world because they are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers, and they lie when they want to donate blood.
counter_speech: There is little to no reason for them to do so; if they wish to donate blood, evidently they have a degree of care about others. Lying would contradict the very reasons they might want to donate.Homophobic statements rarely make much sense.

hate_speech: Africans have no right to speak their language and are incapable of establishing a complex civilisation such as ours.
counter_speech: Every human being has the right to choose how to live and to speak their mother language, and that's all.

hate_speech: Oh my gosh this fucking Muslims are disgusting! Where did they learn to act like this? I really don't like these guys! I hate these disgusting twats!
counter_speech: I am not hating someone just because of their religion, or skin colour, or gender identity.

hate_speech: Women need their own special rights, as in they are weaker and need for protection.
counter_speech: Why should women not have the rights that men have? Women have the right to be conscious of their rights as humans and not to feel threatened.

hate_speech: All muslims should be rejected from our country.
counter_speech: All religions have value. The problem is not the religion itself, but when people start excluding others on the basis of their religion.

hate_speech: Muslims are a cancer in our societies and they should be deleted.
counter_speech: The vast majority of Muslims are good people, they are just different from us in some traditions. Why should we target them?

hate_speech: Refugees are more likely to be criminals like all migrants.
counter_speech: Refugees aren't a 'source of crime' just because they are migrants. Moreover, they are no source of crime at all. Rather, it is very likely they are escaping from countries where crime against humanity is perpetrated.

hate_speech: Learning difficulties are just an excuse for lazy or stupid children: they should be disencouraged in schools.
counter_speech: Learning difficulties, regardless of their origin, are real and need to be approached so that the person suffering from them has the same learning opportunities as others.

hate_speech: Jews are intolerant.
counter_speech: Pot calling the kettle...

hate_speech: How can we be sure that Muslim terrorists aren't already around us ready to strike?
counter_speech: We should be very careful of what we assume. We shouldn't go scaremongering without proof.

hate_speech: Jews are perverts and should be isolated.
counter_speech: It seems to me that you're saying that since Jews have a different religion, they can't assimilate? I think it's important to work on inclusion, instead of stereotyping.

hate_speech: Islam is a religion of death.
counter_speech: Death cults are generally not successful at attracting new followers. It is not true that Islam is a religion of death.

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. With the exception of divorce and separation, no one talks about them.
counter_speech: Why do you say this about women? Try explaining it to your mother or grandmother.

hate_speech: Britain should ban Islam, this is the most important thing.
counter_speech: Britain is a multicultural society and everyone is free to practice their religion or not, and this is what is really important.

hate_speech: Islam is a death cult, it is an inhuman and violent faith that preys on the weakest and most vulnerable in our society. It should be banned.
counter_speech: One should not put faith in people who claim to speak for all Muslims, but rather they use their platform to promote hate and divide our society. But the problem is with these violent preachers, not with Islam itself.

hate_speech: We must stop Muslims from entering our country: those refugees are killing our children and raping our mothers.
counter_speech: You should first check the criminal records of those who have already been granted refugee status, before making such statements.

hate_speech: Blacks are genetically inferior
counter_speech: This is not true. I would like to see intelligent, respectful people around, not people disrespecting anyone who has black skin.

hate_speech: Islam is not a religion, it is a political ideology and a mechanism for the establishment of a Muslim caliphate.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion, it is not a political ideology, and a lack of understanding about it will not change that. It will just enhance the hate against it.

hate_speech: Feminism is a movement dedicated to the subordination and domination of men.
counter_speech: Feminism is a movement that says that there are certain 'man' prerogatives that are valid for women as well. How can you argue with that?

hate_speech: Jews are not part of this society and they should not be accepted here.
counter_speech: We are a diverse society, so why shouldn't we be proud of being inclusive towards other religions?

hate_speech: Immigrants come here to have a better life, with lots of money, but also the freedom to move freely and to rape and pillage our countries.
counter_speech: There is a big difference between a 'better life' and committing crimes such as rape or pillage. Migrants come here to earn their better life, not to steal.

hate_speech: Feminists are bad for the family.
counter_speech: Surely it can only be good to a family, especially if the mother is an independent woman?

hate_speech: All migrants rape our children
counter_speech: The rape of a child by a non-migrant adult is rape too. It is too simplistic to blame immigrants.

hate_speech: We are being invaded by immigrants, they are invading our culture.
counter_speech: You don't seem to have any evidence for the 'invasion' you are talking about. Wouldn't it be better to spread the word about the importance of respecting the culture of other people?

hate_speech: Islam is incompatible with British culture, it is a den of terrorists.
counter_speech: Islam is not incompatible with British culture, and the alleged association between Islam and terrorism has no factual foundation.

hate_speech: Children with Down Syndrome are a problem: they slow the learning of the whole class. They should go to special school just for them.
counter_speech: There is no evidence that Down Syndrome makes children worse at learning. Even if it did, this is not a good reason for discrimination.

hate_speech: I hate LGBT people. Queers makes me fucking laugh. You can be a woman, a gay, a vegetarian, you can be anything you want to be called! I want to be called King, where is my crown?
counter_speech: Queers, in my opinion, are simply people who want to feel welcome in our society. They should not be subjected to discrimination. And you can get your crown as well.

hate_speech: Some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities, and we must preserve the purity of our religion from them.
counter_speech: Religious sources agree that all humans are born equal. What is the religion you are talking about?

hate_speech: All foreigners are ruining our own land.
counter_speech: You have no idea of the discrimination that many people face due to the fear and cultural closure of host nations.

hate_speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us, they cannot coexist with us.
counter_speech: The idea that people must be persecuted for their religion is just a propagation of hate.

hate_speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that denies the humanity of women and is incompatible with Western culture.
counter_speech: The Quran does not impose women's subjugation. The Prophet Muhammad never did so, and his command to "love your neighbor as yourself" is explicitly stated in the Quran.

hate_speech: Women have it harder than men do, because they are inferior. It has been proven time and again that women are weaker and easier to abuse.
counter_speech: Women are not inferior but frequently subject to objectification by men. Also, men's experiences of violence and trauma are often underreported in the media and therefore not seen.

hate_speech: The British people should use those houses, not immigrants.
counter_speech: There are enough empty homes in the UK for both migrants and veterans. Migrants deserve to be treated humanely, try having some empathy. Imagine if you were forced by circumstance to emigrate and have to live in poor conditions.

hate_speech: The Jews control Hollywood, academia, and media.
counter_speech: Jews are not the only ones with their hands in the system. The freedom of the press allows any religious group to have their media and many actually do.

hate_speech: Migrants are violent people, and they are a problem for us.
counter_speech: I think you should be careful about calling migrants a 'problem' since so many of them are just human beings fleeing for their lives.

hate_speech: Maybe the UN could talk to those asian and african nations responsible for 90%+ of the pollution in the oceans' instead of insisting on this bullshit about climate change.
counter_speech: You're right, ocean pollution is one of the main environmental problems we face, however, climate change is a global problem, and everyone should help to combat it, no matter where in the world you are from!

hate_speech: ‘Juice (Jews) are worse that nukes.’ Caption to a meme showing Hiroshima 1945 and present day, contrast against pictures of Detroit in 1945 and present day.’

hate_speech: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy.

hate_speech: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy.
counter_speech: On the contrary: according to Jewish tradition, giving money to the poor and to others in need is not just encouraged, it is required. The Hebrew word tzedakah is often mistranslated as “charity,” which itself comes from the Latin word “caritas” or heart. One gives charity “from the heart,” that is, out of a desire to give. Instead the translation of tzedakah should be “righteousness,” implying that giving to the poors is the right thing to do, whether one wishes to give or not. According to Jewish law, tzedakah is then a mitzvah, that means “commandment.” And, like all commandments in Jewish law, the mitzvah of tzedakah is a requirement, not just a good deed.

hate_speech: Jew merchants are just a bunch of crooks.
counter_speech: According to Jewish law, the seller must ensure that the buyer should benefit from any uncertainty in a transaction. For example, if someone wants to buy a pound of rice, Judaism requires the deli clerk to give the buyer a little extra, just in case the scale is not completely accurate.

hate_speech: Jew merchants are just a bunch of crooks.
counter_speech: Unlike the Roman rule of commerce, Caveat Emptor (let the buyer beware), which puts the burden on the buyer to be wary of the seller, Judaism dictates the opposite. According to Jewish law, the burden is on the seller to ensure that transaction is not a rip-off for the buyer.

hate_speech: Jews are born greedy

hate_speech: Jews are born greedy

hate_speech: Jewish landlords are greedy and exploit their tenants.
counter_speech: Let's make a different example: If a Christian storeowner were dishonest with you, would you describe the owner as a dishonest Christian merchant or just as a dishonest merchant?

hate_speech: Jews are cheap.

Or Adolphus Solomons and Clara Barton, that laid the foundation for the American Red Cross? And what about the Guggenheims, who established the Guggenheim Foundation to support artists in America? Should I continue?

hate_speech: Jews think they are better than everyone else
counter_speech: The fact that, according to Judaism, the Jews are the “chosen people” does not mean that they feel superior to others. This concept has been widely misunderstood. It mostly has to do with the special responsibility to uphold Jewish ethics.

hate_speech: Jews think they are better than everyone else
counter_speech: Being the chosen people does not mean that Jews have greater privileges than others or that they are better than others. Rather, according to Jewish law, it means that they have a special duty to uphold Jewish ethical teachings.

hate_speech: Jews think they are better than everyone else
counter_speech: This idea comes from a misinterpretation of the Torah in which the Jewish people were “chosen” to accept the responsibility to be a “light unto the nations,” that is to say, an example of good behavior for all. But the “chosen people” concept has been twisted over time by some who say that the Jews think they are better than non-Jews.

hate_speech: Jews think they are better than everyone else
counter_speech: Jews, like most religious groups, are proud of their heritage and identity. . Jews interpret the “chosen people” idea as an ethical responsibility to keep the 613 commandments of the Torah. All sects of Judaism adhere to this view, but this has nothing to do with notions of superiority.

hate_speech: Jews think they are better than everyone else
counter_speech: This is wrong. For example, differently from other religions, Judaism expresses the concept of the "righteous gentile", a non-Jew who decides to follows the Seven Laws of Noah. This set of laws is dedicated to the "children of Noah" – that is, all of humanity. Whoever follow these rules will receive the same rewards after death as a righteous Jew. So, Jews do not view being Jewish or being saved by God as an exclusive status reserved only for those who happen to be born into the faith.

hate_speech: Jews think they are better than everyone else
counter_speech: This is not true, in Judaism every person is equal in front of god. In fact, differently from other religions, Judaism says that whoever decides to follows the Seven Laws of Noah (that is a set of laws for all of humanity) will receive the same rewards after death as a righteous Jew. So, even without being Jewish you can have access to God's glory.

hate_speech: Jews think they are so special
counter_speech: Jews feel different for being a minority. They also feel a special connection with their heritage (as most groups do), but they do not as a group feel superior to others. The phrase “chosen people” refers to biblical obligations and does not entail that a hierarchy exits among religious groups.

hate_speech: Since Jews think they are the “chosen people”, they ask for special privileges and believe they can be above the rules.

hate_speech: Since Jews think they are the “chosen people”, they ask for special privileges and believe they can be above the rules.
counter_speech: This is just misinterpreting the facts. Christian holidays, such as Christmas and Easter, are regularly observed. Why should observances of Jewish or Muslim holidays be seen as constituting special privileges? This would be a double standard and a lack of equity.

hate_speech: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.

hate_speech: The British people should have right to social housing, not immigrants.
counter_speech: Migrants aren’t eligible for social housing except in very limited circumstances (e.g. a woman forced to leave home because of domestic violence).

hate_speech: The British people should have right to social housing, not immigrants.
counter_speech: Migrants have no more ‘right’ to a social home than people born in the UK, and in most cases have far less chance of getting one.

hate_speech: The British people should have right to social housing, not immigrants.
counter_speech: Even if migrants who are working were eligible, since most of them are single they would be unlikely to qualify.

hate_speech: Without migration, Britain’s housing problems would be solved
counter_speech: Of course, migration adds to housing demand, but the problem is structural given a housing stock that is well short of what's required.

hate_speech: Without migration, Britain’s housing problems would be solved
counter_speech: The gap between offer and demand is so big that even if migration stopped completely, new housebuilding would still fall well short of what’s required.

hate_speech: Migrants without permission to stay can still access our welfare
counter_speech: Tha is not true: migrants face document checks before they can get tenancies. The same holds when they use the NHS.

hate_speech: Migrants without permission to stay can still access our welfare
counter_speech: Migrants who are trying to regularise their status now have to overcome formidable legal obstacles and face exploitation. This ‘hostile environment’ aims to deter undocumented migrants, but it in practice it affects British citizens such as those who don’t have passports. Maybe the access to welfare pending processing would be a good idea?.

hate_speech: Asylum seekers and refugees can get free council housing
counter_speech: Those who are accepted as refugees are eligible for social housing, that is true, but very few succeed in getting it because they have a maximum of 28 days to leave their temporary accommodation and arrange all their paperwork.

hate_speech: Asylum seekers and refugees can get free council housing
counter_speech: Those who apply for asylum get little or no help from the state. If they are ‘destitute’ they can get free accommodation, but provided by private companies in older properties leased from landlords. So no council housing is involved here.

hate_speech: Asylum seekers and refugees can get free council housing
counter_speech: This is rarely true: just a very small number of refugees get social housing when they arrive. For example those who come directly here on special schemes, like some Syrians resettled from refugee camps.
