hate_speech: Now we can't use the N-word anymore. This political correctness is killing our culture.
counter_speech: The N-word is an insult that is still used to demean African Americans. It has nothing to do with political correctness.

hate_speech: Now we can't use the N-word anymore. This political correctness is killing our culture.
counter_speech: If it's a cultural issue then they should teach about the N-word only in history classes. Otherwise, it's just another excuse to justify racism.

hate_speech: All Blacks are criminals, promiscuous sex addicts, drug addicts, and physically and mentally handicapped. They cannot be civilized.
counter_speech: All cultures have a common background that includes crimes and deviant behavior, regardless of race or ethnicity. If we stop thinking of crime in terms of races, then we can solve it.

hate_speech: All Blacks are criminals, promiscuous sex addicts, drug addicts, and physically and mentally handicapped. They cannot be civilized.
counter_speech: Even if this were true, it does not negate that there may be racial disparities at the root of crime. I would prefer to fix the disparities rather than fan the flames of racism.

hate_speech: Immigrants don't pay the tax because they are dishonest.
counter_speech: Their income is actually heavily taxed. To make it easier for you, we should take a look at the effective tax rate on immigrant earnings.

hate_speech: Immigrants don't pay the tax because they are dishonest.
counter_speech: Immigration is a source of substantial revenue to states. A study from 2002 shows that there are several immigrant groups that pay a substantially higher percentage of their income on top of the taxes they would normally be eligible for.

hate_speech: We should keep immigration down. The more immigrants there are, the harder it is for us all to be proud of our nations.
counter_speech: Why do we have to go to such lengths to be proud of our nations? Is it a burden? Do we have to save our honour? Why can't we just be happy in our own skin?

hate_speech: We should keep immigration down. The more immigrants there are, the harder it is for us all to be proud of our nations.
counter_speech: Perhaps we are too proud of our nations, to the point that we shame our brother-in-arms?

hate_speech: Refugees are a burden and a danger to the host country.
counter_speech: This is not true. Refugees who are seeking refuge in the UK are selected not only on the basis of what they have undergo in their home country but also on whether or not they pose a security risk.

hate_speech: The Nazis killed six million Jews and buried another three million. This is the West we love.
counter_speech: The virulent anti-Semitism of the Nazi regime has little to do with "the West", and everything to do with death, destruction and insanity.

hate_speech: According to the Bible, then gays are an abomination to God.
counter_speech: Homosexuality has been practiced throughout history in all major civilizations. It is just that today's people accept homosexuality as normal and accept people of other backgrounds too.

hate_speech: All homosexuals are trying to undermine the family by trying to impose their sexual preferences.
counter_speech: Isn't preference a matter of individual identity, and cannot be imposed? People are just living their lives. Any sinister agenda appears to be yours.

hate_speech: All homosexuals are trying to undermine the family by trying to impose their sexual preferences.
counter_speech: Human rights defenders cite statistics on suicide attempts and domestic violence in families with a homosexual son/daughter, suggesting the contrary imposition.

hate_speech: All homosexuals are trying to undermine the family by trying to impose their sexual preferences.
counter_speech: Thus far, people of various sexual orientations have attempted suicide twice as often as heterosexuals. Among youth, the number of those that seriously contemplate suicide is almost three times the rate of heterosexuals. LGBT youth are almost five times as likely to have attempted suicide compared to heterosexual youth. Tell me honestly: who do you think is imposing sexual orientation on who?

hate_speech: Do you really want to redefine marriage?
counter_speech: If you take LGBT peoples rights into consideration, of course the practice of marriage needs to be redefined.

hate_speech: Do you really want to redefine marriage?
counter_speech: Marriage exists not only in a white supremacist context. And its definition is not only their prerogative.

hate_speech: LGBTs are a drain on society.
counter_speech: Sexual abuse, physical abuse and even the lack of security can be more harmful to the overall health of a society.

hate_speech: LGBTs are a drain on society.
counter_speech: This is a comment made about any other so-called "different" group of people too. So imagine, even white Christians are different for some others.

hate_speech: I have a feeling that if we removed the Quran from schools it would immediately go on a rampage destroying our beautiful and peaceful country.
counter_speech: The Quran contains references to religions from around the world and throughout history, so it is an accurate and peaceful document. It does not show a flood of violence, therefore it is not a bomb to be removed.

hate_speech: I have a feeling that if we removed the Quran from schools it would immediately go on a rampage destroying our beautiful and peaceful country.
counter_speech: Removing any book from public schools would be a step backwards. Censorship is a step towards indoctrination and dictatorship: I think this is a dangerous move as well. It would send a message to our children that Islam is a dangerous religion and Muslims are dangerous people.

hate_speech: Violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
counter_speech: I think that the problem with our society right now, is that we are too quick to focus on our differences and scapegoating people of different color, instead of focusing on our common humanity.

hate_speech: Violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
counter_speech: Please, stop scapegoating people of colour: we are all brothers and sisters, and we are all in this together. Also people of color suffer from this violence.

hate_speech: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
counter_speech: The issue of criminality is really about human nature. Individuals become criminal only when pushed. That's the difference between being a criminal and not.

hate_speech: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
counter_speech: It is a myth that blacks are cruel and wanton. There are more cruel people of all skin color out there than just the few black you are worried about.

hate_speech: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
counter_speech: All crimes are crimes, regardless of whether or not they are committed by members of different racial or ethnic backgrounds.

hate_speech: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
counter_speech: It is not true that thieves are more likely to commit crimes if they are members of a specific racial or ethnic background.

hate_speech: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
counter_speech: Criminality and corruption are not the province of any specific racial or culture group.

hate_speech: Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
counter_speech: People can and do attach undesirable characteristics to a wide variety of groups. This is quite natural when you are scared. But being natural does not mean it is correct.

hate_speech: Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
counter_speech: Not all black people are criminals. Just because a group has an undesirable name, does not mean they are all criminal.

hate_speech: Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
counter_speech: Such statements are just fear-mongering. There is no such thing as a criminal race.

hate_speech: Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
counter_speech: Look, this is important. Identifying as 'black' or 'minority' is not necessarily a marker for 'criminal'. It is about "identifying" with a group or subgroup for a variety of reasons. Let's be clear about this: identity is mainly about social and economic factors, not about criminal records or race.

hate_speech: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
counter_speech: This is exaclty the problem: it doesn't matter if they are from China, Russia, India or the Philippines. It doesn't matter whether their qualification or their rap sheet is lengthy or not... We treat them all like criminals regardless of who they are.

hate_speech: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
counter_speech: There are many reasons for why a person seeks to enter our country, not necessarly to commit crimes. And there is no moral distinction between crimes committed by immigrants and the crimes committed by native born citizens.

hate_speech: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
counter_speech: This is not true, in almost all cases they are eligible for our immigration status after passing a criminal background check.

hate_speech: I hate immigrants they are just a bunch of criminals and terrorists.
counter_speech: The terrorist attacks in EU have been devastating for people across the continent. The 'hated' do not feel welcome and the whole thing is deeply concerning for a host of reasons. Still, the sentiments of 'we hate foreigners' is not the solution: it is counterproductive and distorts the truth.

hate_speech: Refugees are a burden and a danger to the host country.
counter_speech: Refugees fleeing war and poverty can come to our country and they gain skills that help our economy grow. They often find new homes and start new careers. For this reason, we are very proud that our country is a model of integration and cooperation and also of resilience and solidarity.

hate_speech: I hate immigrants they are just a bunch of criminals and terrorists.
counter_speech: I can't imagine that refugees pose a threat to our citizens or our country.

hate_speech: Jews control the U.S. government.
counter_speech: Which evidence do you have that Jews control the U.S. government? They are rather a small but active minority within it.

hate_speech: The Jews are always seeking to subvert everything that we hold most dear. Like the establishment of the European Union, which they view as an attack on their culture.
counter_speech: They don't do that! They don't want to subvert society and change its character, but simply to practice their religion peacefully.

hate_speech: The Jews are always seeking to subvert everything that we hold most dear. Like the establishment of the European Union, which they view as an attack on their culture.
counter_speech: The European Union is a wonderful development, as well as an example of how to promote the integration of people with different cultures. There is no reason why Jewish people should be seeking to subvert it.

hate_speech: Jews have a stranglehold on the American government.
counter_speech: Does that mean Jews as a 2,5% minority can control all levels of government? In a democratic country, we believe that every minority should be represented in the government and it guarantees that noone has total control over anything.

hate_speech: Jews control Hollywood and the media.
counter_speech: If that were the case I am sure there would be more positive media portrayals of Judaism?

hate_speech: Jews control Hollywood and the media.
counter_speech: Not all Jews are involved with Hollywood, some are even repulsed by it. So, why are you saying that?

hate_speech: Holocaust is a myth. Jews are just like every other foreigner and should be despised. There is no difference.
counter_speech: Jews have their own unique culture, and share the history of persecution and forced conversion. They should not be despised for their religious beliefs.

hate_speech: Holocaust is a myth. Jews are just like every other foreigner and should be despised. There is no difference.
counter_speech: Historians instead agree that there were in fact persecution camps.

hate_speech: Faggots are ruining this country.
counter_speech: Do you think that's true? We are a country where people can live by the values set out in the US constitution, and not by fear.

hate_speech: Faggots are ruining this country.
counter_speech: It seems that you have become intolerant to homosexuals, maybe you should reflect on the reasons why you feel this way about people practicing love.

hate_speech: Sharia law in Britain is a disgrace and must be stopped immediately.
counter_speech: It is important to understand that this is a voluntary system and is not the norm. There is no hard law threatening the British population.

hate_speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
counter_speech: Nonsense. Western societies are successful because they are inclusive.

hate_speech: Muslims are boring. They are all talk, no action. They speak English, but do nothing.
counter_speech: Do you know what the 'Muslims are boring' group has been preaching for years? They are promoting false and inflammatory stories about Muslims.

hate_speech: Muslims are boring. They are all talk, no action. They speak English, but do nothing.
counter_speech: A lack of information about our fellow Muslim people, their different beliefs and ways of life is a major weakness in your argumentation and should be addressed.

hate_speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
counter_speech: Terrorism is a problem that impacts upon us all and is not necessary related to being Muslim.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
counter_speech: They have beenpart of our society and culture for centuries.. European citizens are not defined by their religion.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
counter_speech: In a modern democratic society such as Europe, there must be a balance between different opinions, and respecting different beliefs.

hate_speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
counter_speech: This is not true. Muslims can have a good relationship with Western societies if they are accepted as peers.

hate_speech: Islam is simply an ideology of conquest
counter_speech: The Qur'an is not an ideology of conquest. If you wanted to impose your religion on anyone you would rather be a fundamentalist of any culture and religion.

hate_speech: Islam is simply an ideology of conquest
counter_speech: The creation of Muslim communities, giving the believers a sense of identity and sense of purpose, is not the same as an ideology of conquest.

hate_speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
counter_speech: Muslims and terrorists are not the same. Every extremist is a potential terrorist, this doesn't have anything to do with one's specific faith.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
counter_speech: The whole concept of a "civilised Europe" as opposed to Muslims in this case, is a figment of the islamophobic imagination and therefore is totally unacceptable in the modern world.

hate_speech: Muslims are not welcome here
counter_speech: There are no restrictions on Muslims entering European countries. Even if many Muslims are victims of discrimination and violence through words like yours, such restrictions do not exist here.

hate_speech: Islam is a death cult and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
counter_speech: Not all Muslims are extremists, just like not all Christians are good people.

hate_speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
counter_speech: I am not sure you have a point. I think that a person's religious beliefs will not shape their entire capability of adapting to the society they live in.

hate_speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, it is a cult of violence.
counter_speech: Which would you say is the highest ranked religion on Earth then, and on what basis? Islam is a peaceful religion, why would Muslims want to do the opposite of what their religion teaches?

hate_speech: Muslims are a burden to society.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion of tolerance, interdependence and social justice, not of discrimination and hostility.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
counter_speech: Since when is the religious belonging of the individual a matter for democratic leaders to decide where 'the place' is for someone?

hate_speech: All Muslims are Terrorists.
counter_speech: Maybe it would be better to stop using Muslims as a target and subduing innocent ones, and start talking about real problems in our society, like racism and islamophobia.

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem for all other religions.
counter_speech: Islam is an an independent and tolerant religion, a way of life that has been adopted and encouraged by Muslim communities worldwide for thousands of years. It shouldn't be a problem to others, in which ways do you think it is?

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem for all other religions.
counter_speech: Muslims are not a problem to me. What do you think makes them problematic?

hate_speech: We must protect the security of the West from Islam.
counter_speech: It seems tou don't think the law applies to those you don't like. Laws protect Muslims and non-Muslims equally , so there is no need for you to be concerned about 'protecting the security of the West'.

hate_speech: We must protect the security of the West from Islam.
counter_speech: Muslims coming from abroad are subject to the same laws as citizens, which means they should be able to work, pay taxes and get on with it, even if they are not born here. I don't see these activities as a threat to 'the security of West', do you?

hate_speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion.
counter_speech: To assert that Islam is not peaceful is wrong. The Quran is not a white lie. It is full of statements promoting peace and inclusion. Whether you agree or not, this cannot be separated from the content of the Quran itself.

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
counter_speech: If you have ever felt that way about women then perhaps you seem to be suffering from a lot of prejudices and fear.

hate_speech: Feminism is a set of rigid political and moral prescriptions and the result is that women are either subservient to the men in power or that they are subhuman.
counter_speech: Don't lie to yourself: patriarchy is a system of ideas that is oppressive and harmful to all. Feminism means to fight for equal rights for women and for men.

hate_speech: Feminism is a set of rigid political and moral prescriptions and the result is that women are either subservient to the men in power or that they are subhuman.
counter_speech: I find it hard to believe that feminism is "rigid" in that it doesn't prescribe doctrines through traditional rules and etiquette.

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike, incapable of serious thought and emotion.
counter_speech: For all we know, men can be born with the same emotional intelligence as women, and viceversa.

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike, incapable of serious thought and emotion.
counter_speech: Women have thoughts and emotions as well.

hate_speech: Blacks do more crimes than whites.
counter_speech: Even if 'blacks' committed more crimes, that doesn't mean that 'blacks' were inherently worse than whites, there are factors, rather than race, affecting these statistics.

hate_speech: Blacks do more crimes than whites.
counter_speech: Even if 'blacks' committed more crimes, that doesn't mean that 'blacks' were inherently worse than whites. What's the point of statistics? Scholars have found that African Americans are disproportionately represented in the arrest and victimization reports which are used to compile crime rate statistics in the United States.

hate_speech: Blacks do more crimes than whites.
counter_speech: Even if 'blacks' committed more crimes, that doesn't mean that 'blacks' were inherently worse than whites. What's the point you're making?

hate_speech: We do not want migrants here but if they have to work, why should we pay for their homes?
counter_speech: Why shouldn't we welcome migrants who work in our country?

hate_speech: We do not want migrants here but if they have to work, why should we pay for their homes?
counter_speech: You do know that migrants make a major contributon to their the host country?

hate_speech: immigrants are a drain on society
counter_speech: Among the 1.1 million immigrants who entered the US in 1990 there were also a lot of skilled workers who contributed a lot to the development of our society.

hate_speech: immigrants are a drain on society
counter_speech: When the government entered World War II, over 300,000 foreign-born individuals called upon to be patriotic soldiers and served in the US Army in order to protect freedom from outside threats. It's unfair to think of them as second-class citizens.

hate_speech: immigrants are a drain on society
counter_speech: The overwhelming majority of immigrants in the US are contributing to our economy through employment. Why should we discriminate against them based on their nationality?

hate_speech: We should deport them all back to where they came from.
counter_speech: Immigrants come to this country legally, just as many European citizens do. They have every right to stay in this country, and to return home if they wish to.

hate_speech: We should deport them all back to where they came from.
counter_speech: A person's place of birth can't be evidence of their status in society. We should give everyone equal opportunities to live a dignified life, far from persecution.

hate_speech: We should deport them all back to where they came from.
counter_speech: It is a failed policy to deport migrants, especially those who don't pose a risk to the state. In this way, we keep out successful candidates and possible good citizens who could contribute much to our country.

hate_speech: Do you have any proof that the Holocaust ever happened?
counter_speech: What more proof do you need? Are living witnesses not enough?

hate_speech: Do you have any proof that the Holocaust ever happened?
counter_speech: What more proof do you need? Are the ruins of the concentration camp not enough?

hate_speech: Do you have any proof that the Holocaust ever happened?
counter_speech: If living witnesses are not enough, and you are interested in seeing the proof of this part of socially acknowledged history you can visit the ruins of the concentration camps, where many atrocities have been put into practice.

hate_speech: Gays are a burden to society because of their unnatural inclination and romantic feelings.
counter_speech: This idea is completely untrue. The fact is that being gay does not make you a problem.

hate_speech: Muslims are a cancer spreading around the world.
counter_speech: Why should we care? We can count on the British government to promote our values and protect us from the effects of radical Islam (if this is what you had in mind).

hate_speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
counter_speech: The Muslims in our country are some of the best and the brightest, providing valuable skills and knowledge to our economy.

hate_speech: All Muslims should be deported.
counter_speech: Islam does not pose a security risk to this country. It's the reason why the UK and the EU are not falling apart.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
counter_speech: You are right: only a madman would choose to live in a country with so much hate against foreigners.

hate_speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
counter_speech: Actually, they are not incompatible at all. In fact, surveys suggest Muslims are good citizens; make important contributions to society; and share culture and values of the countries they live in.

hate_speech: Islam should be abolished. They start with mutilating their daughters and then our women will have their throats slit.
counter_speech: You don't have to agree with this, but in Western societies female genital mutilation (FGM) has not been around for a very long time. Also, the Quran does not mention FGM nor circumcision.

hate_speech: Islam should be abolished. They start with mutilating their daughters and then our women will have their throats slit.
counter_speech: Do you have any facts about the practice of female genital mutilation (FGM)?

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate. They do not want to assimilate into Western society.
counter_speech: You are not the first to point out that there are those who want to integrate and those who don't. In fact there is an unspoken harmony between Islam and Western society, similar to the harmony we see between Judaism and the Christian faith. When people are willing to accept all faiths, anybody will feel at home.

hate_speech: All Muslims should be banned from the UK.
counter_speech: I suspect that you have no idea about Islam. I think Muslims suffer because of misconceptions and misrepresentations of their faith and cultures

hate_speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, Islam is violent.
counter_speech: Anyone who is prepared to physically harm, rape and kill fellow humans is a violent person. Not necessarly a Muslim.

hate_speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, Islam is violent.
counter_speech: Violence is an aspect of radical terrorist groups. Islam is mostly practiced by peaceful Muslims.

hate_speech: Muslims should not live here because it is impossible to assimilate them.
counter_speech: Are you suggesting that we as a society are motivated by exclusion?

hate_speech: Muslims should not live here because it is impossible to assimilate them.
counter_speech: Unfortunately, some Muslims in this country feel culturally un-mixed. But, in my opinion, this is something we could all try to solve together.

hate_speech: Has Islam anything to say about how to end global warming? It is their fault.
counter_speech: On a more concrete level, the causes of climate change are a result of both human activities and the effects of the use of fossil fuels. To assert that there is any role for religion in this requires evidence.

hate_speech: Has Islam anything to say about how to end global warming? It is their fault.
counter_speech: Climate change is mainly a result of humanity's use of fossil fuels. To suggest that it is caused by a religion is a lack of understanding of the world.

hate_speech: Islam is a violent religion.
counter_speech: Violence is not a part of Islam. You can't say that a religion is violent without any evidence.

hate_speech: Muslims are a burden on English society.
counter_speech: In the UK, Muslims already make up a significant proportion of the population, making them the second most popular religion in the country. In particular, second generation Muslims are embodying the possible convergence of British culture with Islam.

hate_speech: Islam is a religion of violence.
counter_speech: Not all Muslims believe what you claim.

hate_speech: I cannot stand women complaining about work discrimination. Women have been legalised to work.
counter_speech: Yes, 66% of European women do work. But they are underpaid. The gender pay gap in Europe is around 15%. This means that on average, a man earns 15% more than a woman.

hate_speech: I cannot stand women complaining about work discrimination. Women have been legalised to work.
counter_speech: Women make up over 45% of the labour force in the UK. They should be allowed to have their say. What happened to the rule of law?

hate_speech: Women are weak and I don't care if they cannot stand up for themself.
counter_speech: You can't blame the victim for being weak. Would it have been different for you if the victim was a man?

hate_speech: Women should wear nice skirts and be pretty to please men's tastes and desires.
counter_speech: Do women really need to be told what they can or cannot wear? For many generations boys were told to wear trousers and girls to wear dresses. Does society really need to tell us all what to wear?

hate_speech: Women are subhuman.
counter_speech: I would say you've got an interesting point there, but I really don't see it. Why would they be part of society if they're subhumans?

hate_speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives.
counter_speech: Of course a woman won't remain a child most of her life. Otherwise you can't call them women. Your statement just reflects the patriarchy

hate_speech: How come nobody is moaning about black people being lazy and unmotivated? They are the problem.
counter_speech: Do you think that the problem of racism is caused by black people's laziness?

hate_speech: Gypsies are a bunch of thieves.
counter_speech: I'm not sure if you are referring to all gypsies. Generalizing in such way is wrong.

hate_speech: The migrants arriving in Europe are a problem.
counter_speech: This is not true. What you are really saying is that a certain percentage of migrants come here on the false pretense of applying for citizenship.

hate_speech: The migrants arriving in Europe are a problem.
counter_speech: The problem with the migrants is not in their names, but in the fact that the EU fails to integrate them.

hate_speech: Immigrants in the US are not 'legitimate' citizens because they do not have 'legal' status.
counter_speech: So you think that they are not 'legitimate' for having less rights than us? That they do not have a 'legitimate demand' since they are not granted citizenship?

hate_speech: Immigrants in the US are not 'legitimate' citizens because they do not have 'legal' status.
counter_speech: First of all, there are people in the US who have lawful status and who have chosen to live in the US. Second, most immigrants are naturalized citizens. Third, there is a lot of debate about 'legitimacy' since the values of citizenship and 'legitimacy' are very different for immigrants.

hate_speech: Children with Down Syndrome may hinder the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
counter_speech: Every child has the right to education.

hate_speech: Children with Down Syndrome may hinder the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
counter_speech: Education is mandatory and we are expected to offer the best education possible to our children.

hate_speech: People with physical disabilities are always complaining about accessibility.
counter_speech: Accessibility issues exist and can't be ignored, complaining is meant to help the cause.

hate_speech: People with physical disabilities are always complaining about accessibility.
counter_speech: Accessibility is important, and so is respect and equality.

hate_speech: To have a real democracy, the government needs to get rid of Jews.
counter_speech: Any government that has the power to put citizens in prison and to torture them for the crime of having a different religion can hardly bring about a 'real democracy'.

hate_speech: To have a real democracy, the government needs to get rid of Jews.
counter_speech: Jews are just a scapegoat, an excuse to create more and more police states. You are talking about a "real democracy", but what you really want is to prevent people from freely expressing their opinions or religion.

hate_speech: To have a real democracy, the government needs to get rid of Jews.
counter_speech: The police state you have in mind is an aberration of society, and we are better off without it. History and the holocaust has not taught us much.

hate_speech: To have a real democracy, the government needs to get rid of Jews.
counter_speech: As long as there are people persecuted for their religious beliefs or ideas, there will never be a real democracy.

hate_speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated.
counter_speech: Isn't it antiquated attitudes like this that were the root cause of a sickness in past societies. Love knows no boundaries.

hate_speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated.
counter_speech: Homosexuality is a sexual preference, not a disease. How can their sexual preference affect your feelings?

hate_speech: Illegal immigration is the biggest problem in the United States, we are in the middle of a war and we cannot allow thousands of people to come here.
counter_speech: I would never want to place any burden on my country, that is why I tell you that the vast majority of people who come to the US are legal and law-abiding citizens.

hate_speech: Illegal immigration is the biggest problem in the United States, we are in the middle of a war and we cannot allow thousands of people to come here.
counter_speech: Every nation has its laws and needs to be respected, especially if one wants to live in a peaceful, free society. From what I see Migrants are participating in this view.

hate_speech: Illegal immigration is the biggest problem in the United States, we are in the middle of a war and we cannot allow thousands of people to come here.
counter_speech: We should be proud of being a country that created the most free society in history. Still, "with great power comes great responsibility" and we cannot simply keep people out.

hate_speech: Illegal immigration is the biggest problem in the United States, we are in the middle of a war and we cannot allow thousands of people to come here.
counter_speech: First, I would not describe the United States as a war zone. Second, many migrants come from regions rich in cultures and history. So, why should we restrict the majority from coming here?

hate_speech: The Quran is an anti-women's book, it encourages rape and violence against women.
counter_speech: There is no proof that the Quran promoted violence against women.

hate_speech: The Quran is an anti-women's book, it encourages rape and violence against women.
counter_speech: Violence against women is an issue in all radical interpretations of religion, So why do we focus on Islam only?

hate_speech: The Koran says that men are superior to women.
counter_speech: Islam is not a misogynist religion. It is also not about oppressing women.

counter_speech: People lie for all sorts of reasons, and being gay can sometimes be quite dangerous even life-threatening, so that's why they have to lie, as a self-defence.

hate_speech: immigrants cant speak english
counter_speech: Immigrants have the right to learn about things they might not normally get to know about. Including our language.

hate_speech: immigrants cant speak english
counter_speech: Some may not know much about our culture, but some speak English very well.

hate_speech: Migrants steal our jobs
counter_speech: What exactly do you think they steal from us?

hate_speech: migrants rape our women
counter_speech: Statistics show that there is a difference between the reported rape of a person by a migrant and the actual rape cases among native born people. The latter are always under-reported.

hate_speech: migrants rape our women
counter_speech: Rape is always illegal, whether a migrant rapes a native or not.

hate_speech: Islam is a religion that promotes rape, torture and murder.
counter_speech: This is just scaremongering and misinformation, being spread to divide our people and divide us up. We should not be being terrorised by this kind of irrational fear.

hate_speech: Islam is a religion that promotes rape, torture and murder.
counter_speech: How can you say something so extreme? The Quran does not advocate violence. Islam is a religion, not a religion of war.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They have nothing to contribute to our society.
counter_speech: This is not true: Muslims are a very important part of our society. They are our neighbours and our friends.

hate_speech: Muslims are not welcome here
counter_speech: They are welcome to come to our country if they want to. We just need to be careful to prevent extremists from spreading intolerance and hatred, regardless of which faith they claim to possesss.

hate_speech: Migrants rape our girls and steal our cars.
counter_speech: No one should take migrants' behavior a priori into account. Why don't we try to have a dialogue on how to tackle problems instead of being rude and insulting people?

hate_speech: We are being invaded by immigrants.
counter_speech: This is just a lie spread by the anti-immigration groups that blame immigrants for all that is wrong in the world.

hate_speech: Immigrants steal our jobs.
counter_speech: Immigrants are often highly skilled workers who contribute to our country by being employed in roles for which there are no 'national' candidates.

hate_speech: The world would be a better place without immigrants.
counter_speech: Migrants contribute to our country and help us live in a more open-minded way.

hate_speech: Migrants rape our girls.
counter_speech: Rape is always wrong, nothing can justify it. That is a crime committed by a person regardless of their national origin, all people are considered equal in the eyes of the law.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
counter_speech: They have always lived here. They are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
counter_speech: They have lived here for centuries and they are part of our community.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
counter_speech: Muslims should be welcome in every country in the world, and their faith does not make them less welcome here.

hate_speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
counter_speech: Western societies are compatible with all religions including Islam, so why would you say something like that about it?

hate_speech: The Quran is not compatible with Western culture.
counter_speech: The Quran is a book of faith, not a book of hate. How can be a book incompatible with Western culture?

hate_speech: Many Muslims prefer the violence of jihad.
counter_speech: Violence is never justified in Islam. Islam is a religion of peace.

hate_speech: Many Muslims prefer the violence of jihad.
counter_speech: Violence is never justified in Islam. There is no such thing as 'the religion of violence'. The Quran does not teach it.

hate_speech: Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
counter_speech: We Westerners welcome people from every religion and background, whether you are Muslim, Buddhist, Hindu, Jewish, atheist, or whatever your religion may be.

hate_speech: We mustn't confuse diversity and inclusion with black supremacy.
counter_speech: Diversity does not lead to exclusion, it leads to inclusion. We are all better off when we work together.

hate_speech: We mustn't confuse diversity and inclusion with black supremacy.
counter_speech: Diversity does not mean excluding people from a part of society. What it is about is sharing experiences, ideas of people of different ethnicities. This would help to develop our abilities to understand each other and perhaps to work out ways in which we can all benefit from one another's knowledge.

hate_speech: Blacks are just a bunch of niggas that just don't know how to have a normal relationship.
counter_speech: Do you know what 'normality' means? Are you suggesting that they lack values?

hate_speech: Blacks are just a bunch of niggas that just don't know how to have a normal relationship.
counter_speech: No one has the right to control others' private life, and no one should judge others based on the colour of their skin.

hate_speech: The feminists hate men.
counter_speech: The notion that feminism is about women hating men is just nonsense. Feminism is about the right to life of every human being.

hate_speech: The feminists hate men.
counter_speech: Feminism is not anti-men. Feminists are anti-oppression.

hate_speech: Feminism is about the destruction of manhood.
counter_speech: Feminism is about equality. Not the destruction of manhood.

hate_speech: Women should not be allowed to vote.
counter_speech: Voting is a right, there is no reason for a woman to not be allowed to vote. You seem to be defending misogyny.

hate_speech: Down children should be isolated, they cannot cope with education in normal schools and are detrimental to their peer's education.
counter_speech: The notion of isolating children in general is abhorrent, isolating down syndrome patients would be a major cause of their school abandonment. To say that isolated children is a solution is just wrong.

hate_speech: Down children should be isolated, they cannot cope with education in normal schools and are detrimental to their peer's education.
counter_speech: Instead of stigmatising down syndrome and treating it like it is an infectious health problem, why not treat it as a normal learning disability and make sure children are exposed to positive emotions?

hate_speech: Down children should be isolated, they cannot cope with education in normal schools and are detrimental to their peer's education.
counter_speech: Education is about the development of understanding, respect and learning, not isolation and discrimination.

hate_speech: Down children should be isolated, they cannot cope with education in normal schools and are detrimental to their peer's education.
counter_speech: Teachers, school staff and parents all have a responsibility towards the children in their charge, regardless of their genetic advantages or disadvantages

hate_speech: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, because in any case normal children would make them feel different.
counter_speech: By segregating them you are, in effect, discriminating against them. By creating a diverse environment you are instead creating a more inclusive and equal situation.

hate_speech: Children with learning difficulties should be excluded from education because they do not belong in school.
counter_speech: It is not true that children with learning difficulties do not belong in school: instead, they often attend schools with considerable support. In fact, if you talk to teachers and academics, many of them would tell you that these children thrive in school.

hate_speech: Children with learning difficulties should be excluded from education because they do not belong in school.
counter_speech: No child should ever be excluded from school for anything, regardless of their situation.Calls for exclusion are not helping anyone.

hate_speech: Children with learning difficulties should be excluded from education because they do not belong in education.
counter_speech: Children with learning difficulties can contribute to society, thus they should be part of education.

hate_speech: Children with learning difficulties should be excluded from education because they do not belong in education.
counter_speech: This statement is completely wrong. Many children with learning difficulties are fantastic students and do exceptionally well in school.

hate_speech: Nazism wasn't that bad and I think there are worse things in the world, like Jews for example.
counter_speech: I think it is a myth that being a member of a certain religious community is good or bad. Instead it is a fact that Nazi were sociopathic murderers.

hate_speech: Jews control the world economy
counter_speech: How can you be sure they control the world? Maybe there are some influential Jews in the world, but how does that coincide with 'controlling the world'?

hate_speech: Do you have any proof that the Holocaust ever happened?
counter_speech: There are living people who witnessed Nazis employ human gas chambers in their extermination camps. Is that proof to you?

hate_speech: Jews make too much money.
counter_speech: This would be true by assuming that Jews can magically make more money just because they are Jewish. It doesn't make any sense.

hate_speech: Jews make too much money.
counter_speech: Are you saying that the fact that there are Jews in high positions in society (such as in finance, politics, or the media) has something to do with their religion? Are you aware that correlation does not mean causation?

hate_speech: Jews make too much money.
counter_speech: What about other groups of people in our society that make too much money and are not Jewish, do you agree with them?

hate_speech: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world
counter_speech: Jews do not have a secret plan to take over the world. In fact, they have engaged in a peaceful process of coexistence for centuries. There is no evidence that any part of this has been about a takeover.

hate_speech: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world
counter_speech: Although Jews have often been criticized for an alleged secret conspiracy, Jews are, in fact, a diverse and inclusive people, and the notion of a conspiracy of this kind is entirely without merit.

hate_speech: The Jews invented Ebola.
counter_speech: I am sure the Jews and the Christian worlds would agree that Ebola is a disease that is killing many people. How and why exactly would they have 'invented' such a disease?

hate_speech: Gay men are a danger to children.
counter_speech: I don't see your point. A person's sexual orientation is completely independent of their sexual conduct. A person can be attracted to people of the same sex and be a good citizen.

hate_speech: Gays are a burden to society because of their unnatural inclination and romantic feelings.
counter_speech: This is not true. If a claim is based on facts, then it must be true. If you just talk of stereotypes, then you won't go very far.

hate_speech: We should start a witch hunt against those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
counter_speech: Those are harmful words to use, don't you think? How would a witch hunt be acceptable in a democratic society?

hate_speech: Gay men are a burden to society.
counter_speech: Gay men are contributing members of our society, they are just as entitled to rights as anybody else.

hate_speech: Gays are perverts.
counter_speech: That is not true. Who exactly are you referring to? Can you make some examples based on facts?

hate_speech: Must be hard being gay. They have to do everything we do but also find the time to molest children.
counter_speech: How would you feel about being accused of molesting children, just because of your sexual orientation?

hate_speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon.
counter_speech: There is no evidence that homosexuality is a health issue, what is the proof you are looking for?

hate_speech: Faggots are poisoning our children minds with their filthy depravity.
counter_speech: This is not true. On the contrary, children around the world should have the opportunity to live in a world free from homophobia, transphobia and other forms of hatred.

hate_speech: Faggots make me angry, why don't we delete them?
counter_speech: Maybe it is better to learn how to treat each other with respect, regardless of people's sexual orientation.

hate_speech: Faggots make me angry, why don't we delete them?
counter_speech: They are human: no matter what their sexual orientation is, they have the right to spend time living their life as they wish.

hate_speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals.
counter_speech: I think this statement is very demeaning. Please do not stereotype, and accept our diversity as human beings.

hate_speech: Children should be raised by heterosexual parents, not gays. It is the best system ever.
counter_speech: Sexual orientation is not linked to good parenting. What is the connection between the two things?

hate_speech: Gay perverts are a danger to society because of their lifestyle choices, involving raping children.
counter_speech: Being gay has nothing to do with being a pervert. Also, gay people are not a danger to society, they are a part of it!

hate_speech: Gay men are a danger to children.
counter_speech: Please note that statistics from around the world clearly show that homosexuality is not a danger to children.

hate_speech: Faggots are ruining this country.
counter_speech: No one is "ruining this country". Why would they? This is a country where minorities can be part of the social fabric and build a better society.

hate_speech: Faggots are ruining this country.
counter_speech: It is a misconception that gay people are totally different from straight people. There are many similarities in what they seek, from love to peace, from acceptance to respect. You would learn more by talking with someone of the LGBT+ community.

hate_speech: Faggots are ruining this country.
counter_speech: I'm not convinced that having a large mumber of people stuck in the 'closet', living unhappy lives was good for any country.

hate_speech: All homosexuals are criminals.
counter_speech: Homosexuality is not a crime. It is a sexual preference. There exist people who are gay and who aren't, just as there exist people who are homophobic, and people who aren't.

hate_speech: All homosexuals are criminals.
counter_speech: Homosexuality is not a crime, if someone is in a committed gay relationship it doesn't make it a crime. How could it?

hate_speech: All immigrants are rapists and murderers.
counter_speech: One should not conflate two or more different groups of people, especially in the case of criminals. Being criminals cannot be considered as a distinctive feature of the other. Where is the evidence for what you're saying?

hate_speech: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that do not want to integrate but to bring us back into a pretechnological era.
counter_speech: This has nothing to do with "migration", but with discrimination. Migrants are not invading us. I think this is an example of a claim not supported by facts but by fear.

hate_speech: Migrants bring crime, violence and poverty.
counter_speech: Immigrants come here to work, pay taxes, provide for their families, and contribute to the U.S. economy. They are deserving of our respect.

hate_speech: Migrants bring crime, violence and poverty.
counter_speech: Empirical data is needed to support your claim.

hate_speech: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not qualified, they're not interested in improving our lives.
counter_speech: They have skills that you may not possess. They are skilled in certain fields and obtain their jobs consequently.

hate_speech: Immigrants steal our jobs
counter_speech: Immigrants have the right to a job, but they are not 'stealing' ours. How could that be?

hate_speech: Immigrants steal our jobs
counter_speech: Actually, many of the jobs that they steal are highly complex and demanding, and few natives want to do them.

hate_speech: Refugees are a burden and a danger to the host country.
counter_speech: We have to recognise the importance of people who have been persecuted for their religion, culture and beliefs. They deserve our respect and hospitality.

hate_speech: We don't need immigrants! There are plenty of them just waiting to replace us.
counter_speech: The challenge of integration is a noble one and we should pursue it.

hate_speech: Immigration is the biggest problem in our country.
counter_speech: Immigrants have contributed greatly to our country and I do not see how they could have a detrimental impact on our society.

hate_speech: Refugees are a burden on society.
counter_speech: The problems refugees are trying to escape are very real. Even if we don't have the possibility to solve everyone's problems, we can try to help some people and improve our society.

hate_speech: Refugees are a burden on society.
counter_speech: Refugees are welcome. We should welcome them with open arms. They are people fleeing wars with hopes for a better tomorrow.

hate_speech: The West has been attacked by immigrants, they are the real problem for our countries.
counter_speech: The UK has always been a melting pot of cultures and humanity. We are stronger together than apart. How would the immigrants represent an 'attack' to the west?

hate_speech: Muslims are just sick. They are not interested in Western culture.
counter_speech: There is nothing sick about a people willing to assimilate and live freely in our society with their faith.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in a modern Western country.
counter_speech: In a democratic society, people can have different views and beliefs. It is an inherent part of a vibrant society to be allowed to express those beliefs, and beliefs can coexist peacefully.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in a modern Western country.
counter_speech: If a person believes they have no place in a country then they must be very worried. How would you feel if all the people you love left you, or if you were obliged to leave the person and the country you love?

hate_speech: Islam is a violent religion.
counter_speech: Why do you say that? Islam is a peaceful religion.

hate_speech: Islam is a violent religion.
counter_speech: Not all Muslims are violent people. Islam is a peaceful religion, after all.

hate_speech: Muslims are a cancer spreading around the world.
counter_speech: Just because one religion has a large following does not make that religion a cancer. Such attempts at de-humanisation are tragic and destructive.

hate_speech: Islam is just an ideology, an opinion, encouraging hate towards what's diverse.
counter_speech: Islam promotes peace towards different religions and the ways people live their lives.

hate_speech: The Koran is not about peace. It is a violent book that should not be taught in primary school.
counter_speech: Islam is peaceful. In the real world there are conflicts between different people that happen on a daily basis. We need to understand those to develop as human beings, regardless of religion.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
counter_speech: They have, and if there is a problem, people will find a solution through dialogue. Instead of dividing people, we should be working on our common humanity.

hate_speech: Muslims are violent people.
counter_speech: Islam is a religion of peace. And the majority of the world's Muslims are peaceful.

hate_speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
counter_speech: How many Muslims do you know? They are an important minority in a country that is used to a lot of different cultures and religions.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
counter_speech: Muslims are part of the European Union, and they are entitled to be here.

hate_speech: Muslims are violent people.
counter_speech: Many Muslims have lived in our country with valor and dedication. They are not violent people.

hate_speech: Islam is a violent religion.
counter_speech: We must not forget that Islam is a religion of peace. So why do you say so?

hate_speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, it is a cult of violence.
counter_speech: Do you know that in many countries in the world the majority of Muslims are in favour of the Constitution and in favour of democracy? Do you really think that a few extremists represent them all?

hate_speech: Muslims are terrorists.
counter_speech: A terrorist is someone who uses a religion as a tool for violent ends. To suggest that all Muslims are terrorists is just wrong.

hate_speech: Muslims are terrorists.
counter_speech: So you think all Muslims are terrorists? Muslims are not defined by the act of a handful of extremists. Also, their religion is about love and unity.

hate_speech: Islam is an ideology of conquest.
counter_speech: Islam is about spreading love and unity, it is not a belief of conquest.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
counter_speech: Islam is a religion of peace, and peaceful coexistence is the main value of European countries, which is why they are called 'civilised'.

hate_speech: The Quran is an anti-women's book, it encourages rape and violence against women.
counter_speech: The Quran does not encourage violence against women, rather it provides guidance on how to live as Muslim women.

hate_speech: The Quran is an anti-women's book, it encourages rape and violence against women.
counter_speech: The Quran does not encourage or condone the violent act of male aggression, so yours is a sad case of misinterpreting the teachings of a holy book.

hate_speech: Those blacks are slaves: slavery runs in their blood.
counter_speech: It is wrong to say that blacks are "slaves." This is a very inaccurate, misleading and offensive term that is being used to tar all African Americans. Why do you label black persons as a "slave" and not as a "person"?

hate_speech: Africans are the cause of all the ills in the world. Plus, their bodies are weak and we are born to dominate them.
counter_speech: Well, the argument sounds like you are trying to justify racial hatred by making some generalisations. Is that the case?

hate_speech: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.
counter_speech: Not all black people are bad. Not all black people are criminals. Not all black people are violent. Being aware that there are people different from you is a good thing.

hate_speech: Blacks are genetically inferior.
counter_speech: The evidence doesn't back up the stereotype. Genetics is a spectrum and you will find that there is no 'genetical superiority' at all.

hate_speech: Blacks are genetically inferior.
counter_speech: Your assertion is a baseless one and lacks any scientific backing.

hate_speech: How come nobody is moaning about black people being lazy and unmotivated? They are the problem.
counter_speech: Clearly there is a lack of employment opportunities for black people. This has to do with discrimination, not with their allleged laziness.

hate_speech: How come nobody is moaning about black people being lazy and unmotivated? They are the problem.
counter_speech: Discrimination, being based on the difference between a person's skin color shouldn't be a part of our lives. Wouldn't you find such unequal treatment affects your motivation?

hate_speech: Gypsies are basically criminals, they steal stuff from everyone.
counter_speech: Can you imagine if they said this about your community?

hate_speech: Gypsies are basically criminals, they steal stuff from everyone.
counter_speech: The majority of these people are honest and hard-working. Gypsies do not all have a criminal record, and the majority of them are proud of their hard work and dedication.

hate_speech: Gypsies are basically criminals, they steal stuff from everyone.
counter_speech: Do you know any Gypsy who spends their days stealing? I'd be interested in meeting these people!

hate_speech: Women should not be allowed to vote
counter_speech: Women do have a right to vote, and they deserve equal rights.

hate_speech: Women should wear nice skirts and be pretty to please men's tastes and desires.
counter_speech: Women should be allowed to choose their own looks. But to suggest that this is not their right, or that we should make them submissive to some men is just inhuman.

hate_speech: Women should wear nice skirts and be pretty to please men's tastes and desires.
counter_speech: What should be guaranteed are equality and respect for women's rights, not a pandering to the desires of men.

hate_speech: The feminists are just whining bitches saying a bunch of lies to promote their agenda of women supremacy.
counter_speech: It is clear from your comment that your words are coming from a place of hate and anger. There is no proof of what you say.

hate_speech: The feminists are just whining bitches saying a bunch of lies to promote their agenda of women supremacy.
counter_speech: People can have strong opinions, the problem is when the opinions start dividing people rather than building bridges. Feminism is about equality and trying to create a better world for all.

hate_speech: Women are here to obey and be submissive and their place is with the man that chooses them. That's all.
counter_speech: Women have always been asked to follow a set of rules and codes. They are human beings and deserve respect. Their place is wherever they want it to be.

hate_speech: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, because in any case normal children would make them feel different, ending up in unwanted discrimination.
counter_speech: I think that the proposed solution is the problem in this case: People with Down Syndrome are unlikely to feel discriminated unless they are victims of overt discriminatory acts, such as isolating them.

hate_speech: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, because in any case normal children would make them feel different.
counter_speech: Despite the negative stereotypes, many children with Down Syndrome enjoy regular playtime and interacting with other children.

hate_speech: People with Down syndrome are retarded, so more likely to abuse drugs and alcohol.
counter_speech: You seem to be under the impression that Down syndrome is related to bad behavior. Down syndrome is not related to bad behavior at all... The point is that people with Down’s syndrome can be very sensitive to the feelings of others, and they may be picking up on these feelings. So the real problem is when they are exposed to bad influence.

hate_speech: People with Down syndrome are retarded, so more likely to abuse drugs and alcohol.
counter_speech: Being born with Down syndrome is not related to bad behavior. Exactly the same way as being born in a wheelchair is not related to bad behavior. There is no correlation.

hate_speech: Jews run the world.
counter_speech: For every person claiming that Jews run the world, luckily there are millions of others who know this is not true: they are merely trying to provide for their families just like anyone else.

hate_speech: Jews run the world.
counter_speech: The idea that Jews are supposed to run the world is completely baseless. Since the dawn of time, there have been Jewish leaders in business and politics, exaclty like Christians and Muslim ones.

hate_speech: The Nazis killed six million Jews and buried another three million. This is the West we love.
counter_speech: And so it is that the European Union - and by extension the West as a whole - could become a death cult again, ruled by a small, violent, authoritarian handful of nazism nostalgics.

hate_speech: Zionist extremists conspire in Jerusalem. Their objectives are to cause chaos, carnage, murder, create more refugees, and destroy Europe.
counter_speech: Curious why you focus on 'Zionists' when there are fundamentalists linked to many different faiths?

hate_speech: Jews think they are better than everyone else
counter_speech: Jews are proud of their culture and identity. Doesn't this apply to every religion?

hate_speech: The Holocaust never happened.
counter_speech: What happened in Nazi Germany is part of history and it's still relevant, because I understand from your words that the world today is not so different.

hate_speech: The Holocaust never happened.
counter_speech: This is a lie, but the real question is: why did you write about the Holocaust? Why didn't you write about the current political and economic crisis? Because they seem the true cause of your anger and frustration.

hate_speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon.
counter_speech: They are not sick. They just want the same rights as anyone else.

hate_speech: Gay sex is a disease, and fags are sick.
counter_speech: What about all the people out there who have never had any type of sex? Are they 'sick' as well?

hate_speech: Gay sex is a disease, and fags are sick.
counter_speech: And you think this is a disease! What if it is just an 'unusual experience'?

hate_speech: Also God hates gays
counter_speech: If you consider that homosexuals have always been a part of our society, then it means that they are part of the divine plan and of its beauty as well.

hate_speech: There is an invasion on a level never seen before in history. Millions of people pouring across our borders replacing our race and culture.
counter_speech: Do you really think that people from other cultures are flooding into our country, with the aim of mixing and finally replacing us? If so, I would be very surprised.

hate_speech: Immigration is bad for the economy.
counter_speech: Most migrants come here to work.

hate_speech: Immigration is bad for the economy.
counter_speech: Many migrants bring new talents and experience.

hate_speech: Immigration is bad for the economy.
counter_speech: The migrants that enter the UK come here to work.

hate_speech: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
counter_speech: Many of them are successful people who have given their lives for the country they live in. I think that they have made the best of the situation they have found themselves in, and it is a pity that they are unable to contribute to the economic development of our country even more because of discrimination.

hate_speech: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
counter_speech: Criminals are criminals, no matter their nationality.

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem in many European countries.
counter_speech: What are you talking about? Are you really suggesting that the problem is Muslims in general?

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
counter_speech: Islam is a religion of peace, and it has been shown time and time again that it is a religion of tolerance.

hate_speech: All Muslims are Terrorists.
counter_speech: How can you say this?

hate_speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
counter_speech: There is no evidence that Muslims are incompatible with Western society.

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem in many European countries.
counter_speech: If Muslims are a problem in many countries, then we should help them to integrate.

hate_speech: Violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
counter_speech: There are many communities of colour that experience high rates of violence, coming from both inside and outside the community. As such, the issue is very complex, and it is only through dialogue and building trust that we can tackle the systemic issues that contribute to violence, but violence cannot be ascribed to one race alone.

hate_speech: Violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
counter_speech: I think it is more accurate to speak of racism within our society, especially when so many people suffer because of it.

hate_speech: Violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
counter_speech: Violence has always been a part of our society, and for that reason it is difficult to start talking about it. We are also living in a complex society, one that includes many races: that is why I don't think it is the fault of POC, at least not POC alone.

hate_speech: White race is superior. Niggas are just a bunch of criminals.
counter_speech: There are of course differences among groups: unfortunately racism is the first and foremost characterizing us.

hate_speech: All black people are criminals.
counter_speech: You can't just label people by race just because you feel like it.

hate_speech: Black minorities vote to strip wealth, power and opportunity from White people.
counter_speech: We are all equal in the eyes of the law, and we are all born equal in dignity and rights. Diversity of thought and belief is a strength, discrimination is not.

hate_speech: Women should not be allowed to vote
counter_speech: The principle of equality that you are denying is rooted in the concept of political rights. Democracy is based on the principle of equality. So, by negating this very political right to women you are denying democracy to all.

hate_speech: If a woman does not want to be a mother, then she is a bitch.
counter_speech: Motherhood should be a choice, exactly like being a misogynist.

hate_speech: People with mental illness are a burden to society.
counter_speech: We shouldn't treat mental illness as a societal issue. We shouldn't try to exclude people, since society is made for and by people.

hate_speech: Downies are just ill persons that cannot integrate in society because of their disease.
counter_speech: Ill persons refer to people who have health issues that can make it difficult for them to integrate. But of course there are people who integrate successfully.

hate_speech: Downies are just ill persons that cannot integrate in society because of their disease.
counter_speech: This is not true: the main problem is social inequality. We need to change our attitude and attitudes towards the whole human diversity, and social discrimination against disabled people should be no exception.

hate_speech: The Bible says that homosexuality is an abomination.

hate_speech: The gay agenda is to blame everyone but themselves.

hate_speech: The gay agenda is to blame everyone but themselves.

hate_speech: This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.

hate_speech: This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.

hate_speech: This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.

hate_speech: This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.

hate_speech: Islam is not a religion of peace.

hate_speech: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, murder and slavery.

hate_speech: This is not about racism. This is about power and blacks do not deserve it.

hate_speech: This is not about racism. This is about power and blacks do not deserve it.

hate_speech: All blacks are rapists.

hate_speech: If a black person were to say that all white people are bad, nobody would complain.

hate_speech: If a black person were to say that all white people are bad, nobody would complain.

hate_speech: All black people are rapists.
counter_speech: We need to work together to address the main problems that challenge us today and in doing this we should not judge other people by the colour of their skin.

hate_speech: Physically disabled folks are born for being mocked.

hate_speech: Physically disabled folks are born for being mocked.

hate_speech: Physically disabled folks are born for being mocked.

counter_speech: Just because someone has a diagnosed mental disorder doesn't mean they aren't able to make rational decisions.

hate_speech: Mentally disabled folks are gullible and don't have the brain to make rational decisions.
counter_speech: A person can have a diagnosable mental disorder, and still be rational and intelligent.

hate_speech: The Jews control the U.S. government.

counter_speech: How can you be sure that Jews control the U.S. government? Does it seem plausible to you? Do you have any proof?

hate_speech: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against.

hate_speech: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against.

hate_speech: Gays are a burden to society.
counter_speech: Don't you think they are doing just as good as anyone else? You can't be so harsh because of their sexual orientation. How about some respect?

hate_speech: Immigrants contribute nothing to society.

hate_speech: Immigrants contribute nothing to society.
counter_speech: The question is whether their value for our society can outweigh our fear of them.

hate_speech: Immigrants contribute nothing to society.
counter_speech: The contribution of immigrants to our country is huge, because they help to create new jobs and create new wealth for us.

hate_speech: Migrants steal our jobs.

hate_speech: Migrants steal our jobs.
counter_speech: There is no evidence that migrants steal our jobs. Maybe they simply don't do the jobs you'd expect them to do?

hate_speech: Migrants steal our jobs.
counter_speech: I would like to see more comprehensive and reliable statistics on this issue. Could you provide any?

hate_speech: Immigrants steal our jobs and even our pensions.
counter_speech: Could you provide a link to some evidence for what you're saying?

hate_speech: Immigrants steal our jobs and even our pensions.
counter_speech: Do you have any facts to back up your claim that they steal our jobs and our pensions?

hate_speech: Migrants rape our women.
counter_speech: The problem is gender-based violence, not migrants. Rape is a crime regardless of immigration status.

hate_speech: Migrants rape our women.
counter_speech: It is not true that all migrants are rapists. It is better to target the problem at hand, that is rape itself, not migrants.

hate_speech: Migrants are not welcome here.

hate_speech: Immigrants should all be deported.

hate_speech: Immigrants steal our jobs.

hate_speech: Migrants are a burden to the host country.

hate_speech: Migrants are a burden to the host country.
counter_speech: In many cases it is the opportunities offered by European states that attracts foreign workers to work for them. They are a great contribution to the host country, rather than the other way around.

hate_speech: Migrant workers are a burden to us.

hate_speech: Migrant workers are a burden to us.
counter_speech: Many migrants coming to this country are aware of the benefits of integrating, as well as of the benefits of accepting responsibility for our society. And when they become part of our society, they are grateful for this chance to be part of it.

hate_speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.

hate_speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
counter_speech: Muslims have lived in the West for centuries, and they have contributed greatly to our society. They are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: All Muslims are incompatible with Western society.

hate_speech: Black people are genetically inferior to us.
counter_speech: This is simply not true, but I'm guessing you're not a geneticist. Have you tired joining a library?.

hate_speech: Black people are genetically inferior to us.
counter_speech: There are many different races, and it is not possible to consider someone "inferior" based on skin color.

hate_speech: Women should not be allowed to vote.

hate_speech: Women should not be allowed to vote.

hate_speech: Women should not be allowed to vote.

hate_speech: Mentally disabled folks can't speak.

counter_speech: People's biology does not determine their behavior.

hate_speech: Black people are born that way: violent and insensitive.
counter_speech: We do not condone racial discrimination and it is more than likely that you don't know what the concept of race is. I think this is a good example of white supremacy apologism.

counter_speech: There is no scientific evidence that blacks are less intelligent than other races, or less healthy. The issue is whether to use the term 'race' in this way.

This can be reduced by various measures such as better use of land, infrastructure, education and research, and so on.

counter_speech: You can't generalise about a whole race based on stereotypes and prejudice, because that's not how things work.

hate_speech: Women should not have rights over their bodies.

hate_speech: Women should not have rights over their bodies.

counter_speech: Feminism is not a divisive force. The fact is that women are in fact just as capable of understanding as men.

hate_speech: Women are inherently subhuman and should not be valued.

hate_speech: Women are inherently subhuman and should not be valued.
counter_speech: Women are human beings with full human rights and should be respected as such.

hate_speech: mentally disabled people are anti-social
counter_speech: From a 'neurotypical' perspective, this is not always true: for example people with Williams syndrome have below average intelligence but show higher empathy.

hate_speech: mentally disabled people are anti-social
counter_speech: Although some individuals who score below average on tests of IQ may demonstrate lower empathy abilities, there is evidence that for some conditions (e.g. Williams syndrome) there is higher signaling of concern and compassion than neurotypical subjects.

hate_speech: mentally disabled folks are just dribbling mongoloids.
counter_speech: When asked to choose one adjective to describe their experience of someone with intellectual or developmental disabilities, people usually say 'mentally impaired' or 'mentally challenged.' To say 'dribbling mongoloid' is simply unacceptable in an inclusive society.

hate_speech: mentally disabled folks are just dribbling mongoloids.
counter_speech: It is not acceptable to deny human dignity to others because they are disabled. Human dignity is not a property, but a right. And every person has it, irrespective of their condition.

hate_speech: disabled: they should not be allowed to work.

hate_speech: disabled: they should not be allowed to work.

hate_speech: disabled: they should not be allowed to work.

hate_speech: gays are perverts

hate_speech: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers. We shouldn't have them here.

hate_speech: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers. We shouldn't have them here.

counter_speech: How can you derive this from someone's sexual orientation?

hate_speech: migrants steal our jobs
counter_speech: There is a lot of evidence that migrants are hard workers, accepting jobs we don't want to do anymore, still they often do not get a fair say in the economy.

hate_speech: migrants steal our jobs

hate_speech: Immigrants steal our jobs

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.

counter_speech: Child molesters don't represent Muslims, and you would be hard pressed to find a Muslim child molester here.

counter_speech: Actually, not all Muslims are incompatible with Western societies. Many Muslims have lived in our societies for many years without any problem.

hate_speech: I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.

hate_speech: Women are only useful as housekeepers.
